1.intro: Lehi, ehome Sariah, tehegine ehmimmigan warbakegi sunmaisadi (ar onode eh machi tummadgine). Lamán, Lemuel, Sam, tehegine Nefi. Pab tummad Lehi owisoe, Erusolen gi noegala, ar weh. Webur owisosa eisguedi tehegine opurgebi kuarmala. Eh kwenadganmala nega tule sulidba iba pahgi nanaimala. Nefi Eh kuenadganba nadmoga, kannar Erusalen se nadmala udios igar narmakar maid sunaegale. Eh wilesad na soisadi Ismael sisgan abirgin nikusmaladi, Eh kuenadgan mala nega tule sulidba nade kusmaladi. Yar tule sulidba tummad wilesmaladi, Ehmar nanasmaladi. Tihi tummad naid sega modabmala. Nefi kuenadgan ese uludmala. Aku ittosmala, tehegine urso, bsa. Yar nuiymaisa ibmaribedi. Tihi tummad naidgine obasmala, yar ibmar ibedsega, etc. Weh di Nefi ibmar soisadi, wehgi soile sunna, Ani Nefi Weh Kaiya purba narmaisadi.
Ani Nefi, pabgan nuegangine an kualulesa, tehegine an pab immar wisid an wisgusmoga; tehegine tummad wilesa, na wisgusa, weh napneggi kudihidgine, ar tegineguale, Pabtummad an pentaisa, weh napgi kudihidi kusgua; eye ar na, an wisgusa Pabtummad, ibiyobi anmar sabe, ar ibmar wisomai, tehegine ahagala na an kusad narmake.
Eye, an pab, na imake, tehegine Udios igar wismaladbali, ar Egipcios kaiyabali.
Tehegine an na, wisi igar kusmaladi napiraguadi an narmake; tehegine an sunnad narmaisa, an ibmar wisidbali.
Ar weh yob ibmar kusa. Erey Kusa, Sedecias Eh pirga gi negguebur taimai kusadgine (Lehi, an paba ar na Erusalengi na tukkusa) eye, ar weh pirga margine Nergan pukidara nonimala, Negguebur owisodi nanasmala, ar eh isgumalad na nudaisurmalale, tegisulile, Erusalen Negguebur perguoe.
An Pab Lehi, wegi na nade kuali, tehegine Pab tummadse kodsa, eye, na kuage ulubse Pabse kodsa, ehneg webur nutakegala.
Tehegine Pabse na korsihidgine eh asapin akkua sihid sohoyobigue taide, ar ibmar ittosa, pukkidar taisabali, tehgi tummad wawan maisa, tobkusa, weh immar taisadgine, ar ittosadgine.
Tegkusadgine Erusalen, eh neisega kannar nonigua, eh kammadgine na meinonigi, ar pela eh sangi Pab purba nued gi ubosa, tehegine weh ibmar na taisadi.
Tehegine wegi Pabpurba pued ulubgi ubosadbali, ar ibya ubulude kusa, nibnega argade taide, ar Pabtummad, ologanagi sihi taide, tule pukkidar ebir pukua angermala pukkidara, wehgi tailegele, ga namai pukkuayobi tailege, ar Pabse korpukua.
Tehegine taide tule warguen nibneggi aidenai, ar tad yohrukkudba bur pule kae.
Tehegine an taidebali, waharme kaga bogua ba sorba nai, nibneggi nihisguamar kaed bur pule kamala.
Tehegine napneg tirbimakar naidsega aidenonimala, pela na mimiledmala, ar eidued, an paba kuidchidsega noniggi, tehegine karda madaguena ga uisa, ar ga soge peh absoge.
Tehegine absokuidchidgine, Pab purba nued gi ubosa.
Tehegine absosadgine, soide; peh Erusalen, peh isguhed an taisa! Eye, An paba ibmar pukidara absosa, Erusalen gi immar kuoedi. Ar ehtulamar pukidara absosa, Erusalen gi immar kuoedi. Ar ehtulamar perguoe; tule pukkidara esgi earwar purgemaloe, ar pukkidara Babiloniasega epibiledmaloe.
Tehegine wegihidba an paba absosgua, ar ibiyobi immar pukkidar taisa, keger taisa, Pab tummadga soidemala; Ibiyobi tungue immar peh imaisa, ar Pabtummad, tule tummadi! I peh olokana nibneggine sihidi, ar peh kantikidi, peh sabed, ar wile take pela tulemar napneggine; tehegine, peh wile tulemar takedi, peh se tanimalale, peh pentage.
Wegi an paba na soisa, Pab nuga okannosa; ar kuage ulubgine yeher ittosa, tehegine pela kuage ulubgi welidar ittosa, weh ibmar taisadi, eye Pab tummad immar ga oyosa.
Tehegine ani, Nefi (Nepi), pela na wisgudsuli, an pab ibmar narmaisadi, ar ibiya abulusa kabgi ibmar taisad, na pukidar narmaisa; tehegine na immar owisosad narmaisa, ar emimmigangala sunmaisa, pela ibmar takosurmala.
Ar an ibagangi ibmar imaisad bi narmakoe. Tehegi unnila na narmakoe bur nue abelemaladbi, an pab kaiya purba maidgine, an argangi nermaisa, tehegine pur eguahale na narmakoe, an igar kusadi.
Ar nue na wisgumalagala, an Pab Lehi ga, Pab tummad immar tummagan ga oyosa, ibiya abulusa Erusalen Negguebur perguoedgine, tehgi na negguebursega nade, ar tulemar owisode soide kusa na ibmar ittosadi tehegine eh ibmar taisadi.
Tehegine udios mar gi tudosmala egine, ibmar soisadgine, ar napiraguadgi ga soisa, eisgudihidi, ar na widsurtamala, tehegine na immar ittosad, ar taisad napiraguadi tehgi na soisa, ar weyobi kaiya purba mait absosa, nue soidi nanasa, tule pentaked tanikoe, tehegine napneg pentainonikoe.
Tehegine udiosmar weh ittosmargua ar se uludmala, igi ebbínne nergan imaisa yobi istar taisamala, akkuagi maisamaladi tehegine opurgismala yobi an paba imaide marmoga, ar opurgebi kusmala. Tehgi an Nefi, an oyogoe Pabtummad tule eba naid sabedi, tulemar pensurmaladga kangued na uke, na pentage.

Ar wegihidba tule tummad, an pab ga sunmaisa, eye kabgine ibmar gar soisa; Lehi, peh de tule nuedi, ibmar na peh imaisa; tehegine ba peh nue tae, ar peh dina weh negguebur owisosa, wehgi peh opurgebimala.
Tule tummad, An pabga kabgi soisa, peh mimmigan mala naeye, nega tule sulidbali.
Tehegine Pab tummad kaiya purba sogedba na imaisa; tule tummad sogedba igar na imaisa sunna.
Ar weh yobi ibmar kudsunna, nega tule sulidba nadsunna; tehgi enega na mete, napa nikadi, ehor eh mani, ar immar nuegan nikad obede, unnila na sesa, eh mimmigan, mas kul-lemalad, tehegi neiy tordo, ar nega tule sulidba na node.
Tehegine yar temar kinnid, eh ukkubmobine ar nanasa, nega tule sulidbali temar mobinne; tehegine kuenadgan ba nadmaladi, Sariah, an nana, tehgi an iamar, Lamán, Lemuel ar Sam de.
Tehegine nega tule sulidba iba paha nanaedgine, neba tihwar naidgi na nega sobsamala.
Tehegine wegine akua aila na sobsa, ar ibmar turgan kindaisa Pab tummadgalal, Paba ga nuedye na soisa.
Ar tihwar nomaidi temar kinnidsega nuga imaisa Lamán ye; tehegine tihwar kaga naba neba tummad nai, ar temar kaga sega weh neba nai.
Tehegine an paba tihwar taisagua temar kinnidse aromai Lamán ga na soide sunna: ¡ibiyobi peh wehe tihwar yobi nued taena, immar napiraguadga küena!
Ar Lemuel ga soidemoga: ¡Ibiyobi peh weh neba naid yobi nuedi, innigigua, ar kege aibane Pabtummad eigar maidbali peh nue tae!
Wegi na sunmaisa, Lamán, tehegi Lemuel gala, ehKuage tudusuladbali eh pabgi kalaguensuli sunmaide na kuarmala; ar kabtakegua, tehegine Erusalen yargine onolesmala, napa ga wilesmalad mete na armala, eholo, mani, ar Eibmar nikadi, nega tule sulidba yokuegar mala, tehgi ekwager na soimala, epinsaed akkar kudedba na wagginmali.
Ar weh yobi, Lamán, tehegine Lemuel emardi na tummagana, eh pabgine na sunmaidemala, ibmar na widsurmaladba, weh yobi tamala, Pabtummad ibmar obinnisadi.
Na ittossurmala, Erusalen negguebur tummad sunna akkargue wegi ner tummagan pato owisosa; tehegine Udios Erusalen ginmalad sunna tamarmoga Eh paba opurgebi kusmala.
Tehegine An pabagi Purba nued ubononigidgine sunmasa lemuel nebagine; ar kantikidgine sunmaisagua tehgi kuakidmala se akkue ibmar ittosmala, ar tehgidbali. Ehgi sunmaidemala, ar ebali ibmar imaidemarsunna.
Tehegine Ani Nefi, amba na sapínguagua, mastadagua tungue, Pab tummad ibmar wisgubie na kuali, Pabse na kodsa; ar ede ansega arbi, na kuagegine Pukib pinsasa, ar an Pab ibmar soisad pela na ittosa; tehgi soggudina pabgine na sunmaisasuli, igi an kuenadgan sunmaisa yobi.
Tehegine Sam ga na soide, pela Pabtummad anga ibmar soisadi, purba nued angi oubosangine, ar Eh an sunmaisad ittosa.
Lamán, ar Lemuel tehginiguale an ittobi suli kusmala; ar emar ba na nue pukib ittosa, Pabtummad sega na kodsa sunna ehmargala.
Tehegine Pabtummad anga soisa: Peh de tule nuedi, Nefi, ulubgi peh an pensuli, na nue maga ittoedgine, wilesakuaha, kuager peh an amisa.
Ar an igarba nanaele, nasguoe, tehegi napa nued pehga uilegoe; eye napa sokuena an na pehmarga nasigsa, napa paiganba bur sulesadi.
Tehegine peh kuenadgan, pehse urwedibe, Pabtummad gi pangumaloe.
Ar peh an igargan ba nanaele, ar peh tummadga kuoe, tehgi peh kuenadgan oturtakega na kuoe.
Wegihidba, ibaguengi angi idsoggua sunmakar mardibe, an poni tummad ba ukabsaoe, tehegine eh kangued kuen nikuosuli, eh mimmigan tanimogoedgi, ar Eh angi idsagua sunmaimogar dibe, teh yobi kumar mogoe.
Tehegine peh kuagan angi idsagua sunmakar malar, anse tummad oturtailem-aloe, igargan nuegan peh ga uilesad na kaoe ar nue epínsamalagala.

Tehegine tule tummad ambo sunmaisad sorbali, ar ani Nefi weh gidba an pab neiy maidse nonibarsunna.
Ar wegihidba na sunmaisa an soide; wegi an kabdaisa, tule tummad anga soisa, peh tehgi pehkuenadgan mala Erusalense kannar naye.
Ah de Labán di Udios (karda) ehigar kusmalad kanigi, tehgi peh tadgan tanigid igala; tehegine esnun madaregedgi narmakar mai.
Aulale tule tummad an (parmisa) ga soisa, peh tehegine peh kuenadgan, Labán neisega pehmar nae weh igar maid sunaegala, tehegine we sedagoe, ar nega tule sulid bali.
Tehegine peh kuenadgan urwemala soidemala, ega ibmar peheshegid sabi abehe; ar ani, na soisuli al tule tummad eigalad de ye.
Agine, peh sadén susu, Pab peh pentakoe, ar pedi pabgi akkar sunmaisa suli.
Ani, Nefi An pab ga na soide: na naoe, tehegine tule tummad sogedba ibmar imakoe, Ar an wisi. Eh de tule mimmigan ga igar yogasahale kege uke, ibmar sunna anga imakagegala.
Tehegine wegi an sunmaisagua, ar an paba yeher ittosa, na maga ittosa tule tummad anga igargan nuegan uisa.
Tehgi ani, ar ankuenadga, anmar tordo nega sesmala, nega tule sulidba na nadmar sunna, Erusalén yarse naegala.
Ar Erusalén se modab margua, na soidemar sunna muchub muchubi.
Tehegine na taidemar sunna, toa Labán neisega nao dibeye. Kebe Lamán kingusa. Eh Laban neise nade, ar neggi sihi taidabi, ehbo na sunmaisa.
Ar Laban sega na eigide, karda igargan (kusmalad) maidi esnun madaregedgine mai, an pab ehigargan tanigidi.
Tehegine, Laban ansega ulude ar ehneggi anonosa; kebe karda igar maid uibisuli kuali, tehgihidbali Anga soide: Peh tule ibmar addursili, tehegi an, peh opurgoe.
Ar Lamán iduar wagidsa tehegine anmarga soisa Labán weh yobi ehimaisadi, tehgi nue na pukib ittosmala kuage ulubgine, Ar an kuenadgan, na an pab se kannar naed naga, nega tule sulidbali.
Na wegi an soide: Pab tummad mai, anmar kudihid sunna eh kudihmoga pabse na naosurmala weh ibmar imaisuli Pab tummad ibmar soisadi anmar imaimaloe.
Tehegine Pab tummad igar soisadba imaimala. Napa anmar pabga uilesadse namala, ar wegindi Eh obesa olo, mani tehgine ibmar nuegan nikadi; Ar Pab tummad igar imakega na obesa.
Ar Ehde Nue Wisi Erusalén di perguoe, negguebur isgusadbali.
Ar Ehmar Nertummagan kaiya purba obadsamala, tehegi an paba weh yargi noar sulina. Eh de ar pergu-mogoena. Ar nue abelegedgi weh yargi noali.
Tehgi Pab tummad sogedba, na imaimar sunna, weh igar maid suhegala, kebe kaiya purba tadgangad nue mesegala (osaboegala) anmar mimmigan gala.
Weyobi nertummagan nuegan kaiya purba soisa, ar kebe nega saila unni ga uilesa Pabpurba nued kanguedbali, tehgi emi iba sega.
Tehegine weyobi na kuenadgan ga soide, Pab tummad igarba na nue imaimaloe.
Ar yar napa anmarga uilesadse nadmala, tehegi na ibmar wesmala, olo, mani, Ar pela anmar immar nuegana.
Tehegi ibmar pela wesad sorba, Labán neise kannar na armala.
Ar Labán kunaidse na modapi, tehgihidba ese egidemala, kaiyapurba narmakar maidi (esnun madereged), ebo okuaegala, anmar olo, mani, tehegine ibmar nue gan paigana.
Kebe wegidba anmar ibmar nuegan pukidar taidegua, Labán di na abede, Ar Eh neggi anmar onosa tehgine ega arbamaladga soide, opurgemala, ibmar anmar nikad suegala (wehegala).
Tehegihidbali na wagidmar sunna ehga arbamalad asapinni, tehgi ibmar sedanimalad na iedmarsunna, Labán na pela ibmar wedsunna.
Ar nega tule sulidba wagidmarsunna mel-lege bar anmar palegin negala, Laban ga arbamaladi, tehgine Aggua ol-loganagi na tukkusmala.
Tehegine Lamán anse ulude, Ar An pabse uludbali, Ar Lemuel uludmoga, Lamán ba nagudmoga, tehegihidbali Lamán Ar Lemuel kaiya isgana anmarga soide, Eh urbamra suargi sarsosmala.
Ar suargi Anmar ssarsonai anger warguen se kuisgunonigi asabinni, tehegine ga sunmai sa, ga soide: ¿Peh mar na wissurmarsi, Eh sulesa, pemar tummadga kuegala, pemar idsakua taedbali? Wegi pemar kannar Erusalén sega namaloe, tehegi tule tummad, pehmarga Labán urmaisa. ¿Ibiga peh urbamar suargi sarsomala?
Tehegine anmarga anger sunmaisadgine na nade.
Ar anger naded sorba, Lamán ar Lemuel kannar uluarmala: ¿Paba igi saoe? Tehgi Labán anmarga urmaisa, tehegine sunna sorda tulatale parmie. Eye ar sunna tulatale opurgebali, tehgi; ¿Sunna deyobi anmar imaisale?

Tehegine kwenadganga na soide: Erusalén se kannar namala, ar Pab tummad igar soisadba nue na tamaloe, Eh de tule kantikidi tulemar napneggin maladbali. ¿Tehgide Labán ba bur tule kantikidi, ar tuladar, tehgi Milibalidba, bur kantikidi?
Nadmardo, tehegi Moises yobi kantiki samarmoga; Ar Eh de napiragua temar kinnid ga sunmaisa, tehegine tihi obannosa, kaga paitsega ar Anmar pabgana gi obaise nagabba, kales puguadgi, nosmargua, tehegine Faraón sordamar paleginnai ar temar kinnidgi pela tihdulesmala.
Ar tehyobi napiragua kusa, tehegine na wismala Anger wargwen súnmasa; ¿igi na pemar ulubgi pengumar sunnoe? Namar do webali, Ar tule tummad anmar pentakoe, igi anmar Pabgan pentaisa yobi, tehegine Ehipcios kusa yobi, Labán kumogoe.
Tehegine istar nue amba ittosmala we yobi ega ibmar soisagua, ar ur-wenadabgusmala, tehginiguale anba nadmala, Erusalen kastibir maidsega.
Ar nue mutikgudsunna; na tukusmar sunna kasdibir maid nabali, tehgi nue tukus maladgi, Ani, Nefi Gwebur se na toidesunna, Ar Labán neise na nadsunna.
Tehgi na Purba nued ba nadabi kuarsunna, kwen ibmar kuoed na wis suli.
Tehgi na nadab kuar sunna, Ar Labán neiy mobinne an asabin tule wargwen ailede napagine, Eh ar nue mummuh.
Tehegine waliggah na nue taidegua, ar Labán.
Ar eh esa nue taidegua, eukka yaba yoid na onode, tehgi nue taide eargar kaed olobi nue ise sobar tailege esa ibi yobi nugus tailege.
Tehegine Purba nued anga soide; peh Labán opurge: Kuager na pinsade. Na kwen tule ablis eodisuli, Ar na opurgebi suli kuali.
Purba nued anga soide kannale; wegi ar tule tummad peh ga na urmaisa tehgi na nue wisbali ede an opurgebi kusa, Ar Pab tummad igar na imaibi suli kuali, tehgi anmar ibmar pela al susbali.
Ar Purba nued kannar anga soidebali: Opurge ar Paba peh ga urmaisa.
Wegihidba Paba tule isgana obeloge, ar Eh napirah ibmar abegedbali. Tule wargwen purged, Ar negwebur kuable yokkuedi tehgi ibmar pengudihi nakadguhedi.
Tehegine, ani Nefi, kannar na epinsade kaiya purba Anga soilesadi, Paba anga soisa nega tule sulidbali: Ar peh mimmigan (wagan) an igar nue sehele, nasguoe, napa ga uilesadbali.
Eye, tehegine na wisgbusdibe, Pab igar sogedba nanasulile, Moises igar ga uilesadbali, Ar wis na nikusdibe ye.
Tehegine na nue wisbali, ar igar narmakar maidi, esnun madaregedgine.
Ar na nue wisi, Pabtummad, Anga urmaisa, weh tule Labán nugadi, weh igargan maid suegala, Eh igargan maidi.
Purba nued sogedba na igar imaidesunna, tehgi Labán enono na onaidesunna, Eh esgine nono sigsa (Ekwadsa).
Tehgi Labán Eh esgi nono sigsad sorba, Ehmor pela na yod sunna, pela yosgua Ar Eh esmar pela na tikargine nasigsabali.
Ar weyob ibmar imaisagua, keb na nadsunna Labán Eh mani puguad sega tehgi immar puguadmosgua Labán ga arbaed tule wargwen, kunai an taide, mani etarbedi, Ar eh agguhed sunna na kaiya kodemosunna, ehga na soide, ansede ar pia mani osabole puguad sega.
Ar Eh de pinsade An ehtummad Labán tailege, Ar Mor yoi an taidegua, tehegi es tikarba nabali.
Na udios tummagan (sergan) ebo anga sunmaide, Ar weh tule nue wisi Ehtummad Labán, Ehmarba mutiki kudihi kusa.
Ar na soidebali an sedoe ormadereged narmakaledi, An kwenadgangale, Eh mardi kasdibir taisig an abido pugua.
Tehegi ga an soidebali, anba tageye.
Ar ga an soiye bie, ittoed nega ehsordamala, tehegi an Labán sunnadye pibali, na emisgua opurgisa, anba noali.
Kebe Udios tummagan (sergan) Anga nue sunmaisamala, nadabi kuargua, an kwenadgan kasdibir taisigi puguadsega.
Tehegine Lamán an taidegua nue kuagisa, tehgi kusmoga Lemuel, ar Sam. An kuagab tuhur maidemala, ar Labán ye anbimala, Ehde an opurgis ye bimar sog kudina, Ehmar opurgemar mogoye bimarbali.
Ar ihsedi na se kodegua, keb maga an kaiya ittosmargua, bar tobgus surmala.
Labán ga arbamalad, an kwenadgan taidegua, na kuagidmala (wawan maidemala) tobedbali, ar Erusalén negweburse nue wagid soggarmalana.
Tehegine Andi Nephi tule Mastummad sogudina, Ar Pabtummad anga purba kantikid uisa soggudina, labán ga arbamaladga an palegidgu na pargasa, mer bar wagidmalagala.
Kebe we yobi na ga soidesunna; an kaiya purba nue ittobimalale, ar ittomaloe, Pabtummad ga nue na sogoe, tehgi an sangala, an pehmar kwen na opurgo surmala.
Tehegi nue ise sogale na ga soide Mel-legi tobgumaloe; Ar peh ittolegedba na taimaloe, Anmar yobi, tehgi Anmar bali armala, nega tule sulidbali.
Ar An soisabali, tule tummad napiraguadba ibmar anmar soisadba, na tehyobi imaisa, tehegine. ¿Pab tummad igar ba nue tamalale a igi sunna? Tehgi pemar an Pab ba nabimalar, nega tule sulidbali pemarga nega uilemogoe.
Tehegine tule Zoram nugad. Maiga na kusad, we yob an ittosgua, nued na ittosa; Ar na soide namogoe ye nega tule sulidbali; Ar an Pab maidsega. Tehegine nuedgi na soidemoga anmargala, pemarba namogoye.
Kebe Anmar weyobi na abemala, Ar Udios mar bar anmar wisguosuli, wagidmaladi, nega tule sulidbali; Ar bar anmar palegilegosuli, anmar opurgegala.
Tehegine Zoram nuedgi soisagua, anmar Eh ba tobed surgudsunna.
Ar tehgihidbali nadmarsunna nega tule suilidbali, esnun madered sesa, tehegine Labán tule ga arbah edmala, an pab nega maidse nadmarsunna.

Ar tégikudsunna, nega tule sulidba nanasadgine, na mosmar sunna, anmar paba maidsega, wegidba yeher ittosa an nan tehgi na ittosmoga, ar napiraguadgi anmarba pukib pimsasmoga.
Ar nega tule sulidba pergosmar ye anmar bimala, tehegine tummad, an pab se ulusa, ar ga soide; peh kabtaged tule a ulale na nadmala: Peh Anmar onosa napa (gala) anmarga uilesadgine, ar an mimmigan bar kudihsurmala tehgi nega tule sulidba anmar pergumar mogoe.
Tehegine an nana we yobi, an pab se ulude kusa.
Tehgihidba an paba ar abin imaide, tehgi soide: Na nue wisi an tule kabtagegua, ar Pabtummad kábgi an taisa sulina Pab, nued angi pinsas sulina, Erusalén gine na pesmogana an kwenadganmala, ahmarba purge marmogoena.
Ar wegi an yeher ittoe, anga napa nasad uilesadi; Eye tehegine, an wisi Pabtummad, Labán gi an mimmimar pentakoe, ar kannar anmar se nonimaloe nega tule sulidbali.
Ar an paba we yobi, an nanga soide, anmargi na sunmaide, nega tule sulidba anmar nadabgua, Erusalén Gwebur sega, udios igargan maid sunaegala.
Tehegine an Pab neiy maidse nonimargua, welidar na ittosmala, ar an nana yeher ittosa.
Tehegine an nana soide: Emidi na nue wisgusa Pabtummad an macheredga (an sui) soisa peh naye nega tule sulidbali; Eye ar an na nue wisgusbali Paba an mimmigan pentaisa, Labán eargan nuggi abonosa, tehgi ego kanguhed uisa, eigar ba ibmar imakegala, ar we yobi soisa.
Ar welidar pela ittomaladgine Pabtummadga na ibtula ogummaismala (kintake), Israel Pabtummadga nued ye na soisamala.
Tehegi Israel Pabtummadga nuedye soisad sorbali, an paba Lehi, ar nue pela taide sunna Kaiya purba narmakar maidi.
Ar taide sogapake moises kaiya purba narmakar mai; soimai napa nega obinnilesadi, tehgi Piler (Adan) ar Makiryai (Eva) anmar pabgan sailaginedi.
Udios igar kusad mabali, kebe erey Sedecias Uda Gwebur taimai kusadi.
Kebe sailagi nertummagan nuegan nega owisosmaladi, tehukinbali Sedecias kebe yar sehsadi, tehegine ner Eremias pukidar neg owisosadgi sunmaimabali.
Tehegine, an paba taidebali esnun maderegedgi (karda) mabali eh tadgan tanimalad igala, ar na nue wisgusa Ose gin na tanigi, Ose dina Acob emachi Ehipto gi uilesadi, ar Pabtummad na sabosa, Eh pab Acob pentakegala, uggu tummad meshamargua, ar pela enegwebur pentaisa.
Ar Pab tummad onosa Ehipto gi wile pugua na kusmargua, ar Ah Paba na pentaisa.
Na weyobi an Pab Lehi eigar tanigid bar amisa, Eh tadgan igala, tehegine Labán de Ose gi tanimoga (Ehwagua) aulale Ehde Eh pabgan igar narmakar maid na osabomai.
Tehegi an pab pela we ibmar taisagua, purba nued gi ubononigua, ar na owisosa etanigid igala.
Soide we igar maidi, ar pela neg webur mar se, Kwenadganse, Kuabin ar, yohoe Gweburmar tanimaloedse naoe (we igala).
Tehegine na soide we igar maidi yokuosuli, we ibagan tanigidgi bar surguosuli, tehgi pukidar ibmar soisa (owisosa) yoho ewagan tanigoedgine.
An paba, ar ani, Pabtummad igargan anmarga uilesad nue sehedi na kusmar sunna we ibagangine.
Tehegine igargan maid abingasmargua, Pabtummad eigar anmar uisa, ar nue na taisamaladgine, tehgi nue wisgusmala, we de ibmar nue dar abelegedi; Eye ar anmargala ibmar nuedi, sunna na Pabtummad igar nue, osabomaloe, anmar mimmigangala.
Tehgihidgine Pabtummad ibmar wisidba, anmarga Eh soisa, sedmala, negatule sulidbali, napa kuapid an marga uilesadsega.

Nabir do ani, Nefi, an pabgan tanigidgine na sunmakosuli, we igargan an mesoedgine; paid ibagan an obarosurbali, we ibi an narmakoedgine, ar an pab kaiya purba mesisadgi pado mai, tehgi soggua na we ibmar narmakosuli.
Unni na sogoe Ose gi na tanimala.
Tehegine wegi an takkeh saele, nue obelesuli kuablegua we ibmar sogedi, ar pela an pab immar imaisad kege narmailege we kaiya purba maidgine, tehgi pur abelege Pab tummad eimmar narmailegedi.
Ar ibmar pur nue abelege, unnila tulemar pentakedi, Abrahan Pabtummad, Isaac eh Paba, tehegi Acob Pab tummad se tagedi, ar pentailegoe.
We ibmar an narmaked, ar weh napa neggarsuli, unnila Pab tummad yeher opinsaedi, tehgi weh napa neggined suli.
Tehgi na sogoe mimmigan gala, mel-legi yogasahale ibmar narmakoe, kaiya purba megoedgine tule mimmigan ga ibmar abelesulidi.

Tehegi na wisgusmala, an paba lehi we yobi nega owisosgua (ar soide) yoho emimmigan ambiguoedi, kannar tule tummad ga súnmaisadi, soide Ehde wegi unni ibmar saosuli, Lehi Emimmigan bi (kwenadgan) nega tule sulidba seledosuli; ar emasmala na ome amimaloe, tehgi napa nasadga uilesadgi yohoedse Pabtummadga mimmimar urbegala.
Pab tummad anmarga soidesunna, kannar Erusalen yarse namaloye, ar Ismael, emimmimar kwenadgan sedagegala nega tule sulidbali.
Tehegine ani, Nefi, al an kwenadganmala nadmarsunna, nega tule sulidbali, Erusalen se naegala.
Ar Ismael neise madabmargua nuedgi anmar abidosmala, tehegi na ga soidemala Pab kaiya purba anmarga soilesadi.
Ar Pabtummad, Ismael tehgi Eh Kwenadgan epinsamalad okuasa; tehgihidba anmarba armarsunna, anmar pab neg maidsega, nega tule sulidbali.
Tehgi nega tule sulidba nadapidgine, ar Lamán, tehgi Lamuel, Ismael sisgan wargogua, anmarba ibmar sabisur guarmala, ansega, Nefi, Sam, al Ismael, Eh ome, tehgi Eh sisgan warbogua, arse uluarmala.
Al kannar Erusalen yar sega naega uluarmala.
Tehgi ani, Nefi, pukib ulubgi na ittosa, Ehmar kuage tudusulidbali, Lamán, al Lemuel ga an soide, wegi pemar an kwenadgan idumaladi, ar ¿Igi sunna, kuage tudusurmala, al akku sunna nue ibmar ittomala, ani pemar kwenad pibiguadi, pemar ga an taed nued oyoge, tehgi ani pinsaed nued uibali?
Eye, ar ¿ibiyobi na pemar iesmala Pabtummad ibmar pukidar anmarga imaisadi, Labán gine anmar pentaisa, tehgi kaiya purba maid na amismarbali.
Eye, al ¿Igi Pab kanguhed nikad, iesmala, pela ibmar imake tule mimmigan gala, Eh abegedbali, tehgi Ehmar ulubgi pensulid nigmalale? Ar bar igar imaimar sunna.
Tehegi nue igar bar imakele napa nued nikumaloe; tehegine yoho ibagan tanigoe Pab kaiya purba na soisad imakoe Erusalen di kuinmakoe; al Paba we immar soisad saoe.
Al wegi Pab purba nued, par emar bogua urwosuli; ar ner tummad obadsamala, tehgi Eremias esgaryagi medsabmala ar anmar paba opurgebi kusmarbali, na tehegihidba wagginnali negweburgine.
Tehegine pemarga na soimala, Erusalense nadmalale, pemar purgemarmogoe. Napiri weh yar se nabimalale; ar wis igarmala, epinsamaloe an soisadi, pemar nadele, pergumarmogoe; we yob na Pab purba nued ba na peh marga soimala.
Tehegine an na we yob immar soisagua, ankwenadgan sae ittosmala, an ibmar soisadbali. Ar an kasmala, an opurgebi kusmala, tubgi an edishamala, an mete nadmala nega tule sulidbali, ibmar sappur barmalad an kunnegala.
Ar na Pab se kode, na soide: Pab ye an peh pensulidba, an kwenadgan argangine peh anonoe; Eye anga pe kanguhed uke sunna na tub itiregala, angi atil-lenaidi.
Tehegi, wegi na sunmaisagua, ar tubdina adshigsa an argan gi adinnaledi, ar maligi atinnaled adshisbali, al an kwenadgan asabin na kuisgudabi kannar na sunmadbali.
Tehegine kannar anse ulidmarbali, al an kae soggarmarbargua, ar Ismael sisgua wargwen, tehgi enama, ehmachi an pina soidemala, anga sunmaidemala an kwenadgan bogua, na kuage nugud marsunna bar akkar amimarsurmala.
Na nue kuagegi pukib ittosmala weig kusmaladbali, an asabin na pinge gusmala, an se egidemala, we yobi an imaisamalad ies saegala.
Tehegine na wile taisa ehmala, nuedgine we na imaisa, we immala, ar ga na soide Pabtummad se egisbali we ibmala al tegi imasamala. Ar Pab se kodshad sorba na nadmar sunna anmar pab maidsega.
Ar anmar paba neiy maidse mo-dabmargua ani, ar ankwenadgan al pela Ismael kwenadgad mo-dabmala, an paba ehneiy maidse Pab tummadga nued ye soisamala; tehegine ibmar turgan okummaisamala.

Tehegi ani, Nefi ibmar soisad sorbali, ar emar anga soide: Peh anmarga immar pehedse kanguhe soise, kege na ittoed nagamala.
Al an abinhimaisa, na wisi pehedse kanguhe ibmar soisad emargala, ar napiraguad ib isgana abelesulidi, nodidihid nudaisa, tule nueganga kusa, tehegi napirá soge, emar yohoedse nuiy tungumaloe; na isgusmalad tuggin saoe, tummad wilemaloe.
Kwenadgan nabiri, eye pehmar nuegan taele, tehgi ibmar napiraguad nue ittomala, ar nued nanaele, Pabtummad asabinni, mel-legi ibmar napiraguadgi urwemala, mel-le soimala pehedsena ibmar pemarga soisa.
Ar ani, Nefi na nuedgi kwenadgan unasa, Pabtummad igar maidba na nue nanamacagala.
Tehegi Pabtummad asabin na wile ittosmala, na yeher ittosa wegi taidegua, ar yoho igar napiraguadba nue nanamaloe.
Pela ibi soilesa, ar an paba nebagi maidgine (tordo neggi) Ehde onuisasa, Lemuel neba eye.
Tehegi ani, Nefi na omega imaisa Ismael sisgua wargwena; ar an kwenadgan Ismael sisgan nikusmarmoga; Zoram ehior tummad nikusmoga.
Al an paba pela imaisa Pabtummad ibmar ga soisadi, tehegi ani, Nefi Pabtummad immar nuegan anga uisa.
Ar mutikidba Pabtummad kaiya purba an pabga soide pane waidar namalo ye nega tule sulidbali.
Tehegi an paba waidar kuisgusgua, ar magaba nodgua, ibiyogi na ibmar taide nápagi tirbir immar sihi, ise sobale, tehegine ah yaggine ikoyobi kabonai, aha wargwen oyonai, anmar igar namalad, nega tule sulidbali.
Al na susmala, sehdegala nega tule sulidbali, ar ibmar paigan sesbali Pabtummad anmarga soisadbali; sapi kwagua kalaguhen suli, nega tule sulid ba sehdegala.
Ar anmar tordo nega sesmala, tehegine, na nadmar sunna nega tule sulidbali, Lamán yiteh war nugad obaisamala.
Tehegi, iba pakegua nanamala tada nagguhe siggi, ar tordo nega na sobsamala kannale; ar we nega onuggusmala Shaser ye.
Ahagine ar anmar kusimala na sesmala, nega tule sulidba mas aminaegala, an kwenadgan gala tehegi na amismala, kannar kwenadganse na nonimala ibmar amisa; nega tule sulidbali, nuggua Shaser ye. Ar bar nadmarbali nega tule sulidbali, neiy immar bur nue nikadba na nadmala, temar Kinnid Siggi.
Tehegi iba biguadihi na nadabgusmala, igar nadab pidba mas kul-leged ami nadab kusmala, anmar kúsimar, ibmar paigan niymaladgine.
Ar we ib tirbir, igar oyomaidba nadab kuarmala, neiy ibmar turgan nue nikadbali.
Tehegi ibi úndar nanasadgi negi sobsamala, wis na obunnomlaagala, ar mas nue unnidibali amiegala kwenadgangala.
Tehegi ani, Nefi, mas aminadgua, ani sigu pidsisa, ar eskorona; an kwenadgan anse uludmala, aulale tehegine ibmar amis surgusmala.
Tehegi na kannar aibilismala mas amis suli, kwenadgan sega, mas surgusmala, nanasadba nue keggusmala, al mas kunned sulidbar bali.
Ar Lamán, tehegi Lemuel, uludmala, ar Ismael mimmigan teyob kudmarmoga, tummad uludmala, nega tule sulidba ukkumeshalidgine, tehegi an paba, ar Pabtummadse uludmoga, weyobi na pela kuable uludmala, Pab nib neggined sega.
Tehegi ani, Nefi nue wegihidba pukib na ittosmoga an kwenadgan bali, ar na siku pidsisad bali, tehgi siku bar nued sur soggudina, igar pehedse kuarsunna, eye ar nue bar mas di amilesuli.
Al ani, Nefi kwenadganga tummad na sunmaisa, Ibigarsunna kuage tudusuli na kudmala kannale, Pabtummadse uludmarbali.
Tehegi an, Nefi urgo sigu na imaisa, suar innigiguadi; tehgine, peh ibmar na amisa kusi, akkuamala, an pab ga na soide: ¿Piali mas an aminaoe?
An Paba na Pabtummad se egidsa; ar nue wile na ittosa, angá sunmaisadgine; ar kantikidgi ibmar pukidar an soisa, kuage ulubse ga na ga ibmar pisa.
Tehgihidba Pabtummad, an pabga sunmaisa; ar napiraguadgi Pabtummad ibmar soisa, se ulusadgine, Al Kwage ulubse nue na wile ittosa.
Pabtummad ga soide: Ibmar tirbiled peh take, tehgi ibmar narmakar naid pe absoe.
Tehegi an paba we (ibmar) taidegua, immar narmakar naid, ibmar tirbir naidgine ar tobgude, tummad nue wawanmaide, al ankwenadgan tehyob ittosmarmoga, ar Ismael masmala, tehgi anmar omegan kuagidmarmoga.
Ar an, Nefi nue taide ibmar tirbir, eiko nai, ar banamainai, anmar ulubgi pensulidbali, anmar tamaladba we immar nanae.
Tehgi nabali ah pirgi kaiya purba narmakale, pinidi, ar pasur absolege, anmarga soinai igi Pab igarba nanalegoe, tehegine, imbaguna wis kuage anmar ibmar pensulidbali, anmar taedba we immar banamake, al ibmar pibiguhe Paba sunna na ibmar tummad akkaloge.
Wehgi ar, Nefi, yar pirgi na nakuide, we ibmar tirbiled anga igar oyonaidbali.
Tehgi ibturgan sappurbalid na opurgisa, wegihidba kebe na mas amisa kwendgangala.
Na kannar neise noniggi ibmar turgan purgaledmala; tehegine an taidemargua ibmar setaniggi, ¡Ibi yobi welidar na ittosmala! Tehgi soggua, Pabtummad asapin wile na ittosmala, ar nuedye na soisamala Pabgala.
Tehegi kannar nadmar barsunna, kege igar taniggidgi na nadmala. Ar ibagan undar nanaedgi, kannar na nega susmarbali iba piguaddi wis obunnoegala.
Ar weh yargi ismael di purgisa, tehegine tilesa, neg nuggua Nahom ye.
Tehegi Ismael sisgan nue posmali, eh pab purgisadgala, Ar nega tule sulidba tummad wilesadbali, wile ittosmarbali; al an pab se uludmala Erusalén yargi eonosadbali, we yob na soidemala: Anmar paba purgisa, Eye anmar igar widsur kudimala, nega tule tulidbali; tummad ukgu meshadbali, keg gusad, pudar ittosa, tehgine tummad na wilesmala. Ar weh yargine anmar purgemar mogoe.
Weh yobi an pab se uludmala, Ar anse teyob uludmoga; tehgi kannar Erusalénsega nabi kuarmala.
Tehgi Lamán, Lemuel ga soide, al Ismael mimmigangala soidebali: Wegi anmar paba, ar an kwenadgan Nefi opurgemala, anmar tummadga kubi kudih, ar tule oturtaibie anmar Ekwenadgan tummagan.
Emi na soge Pabtummad ega sunmasye, tehgi anger igargan ga uisa, ar anmar na pinsamala kagansae. Tehegi we epinsaed ibmar soge, eh iTtolegedba na immar imakegala, anmar yamoegala, nega tule sulid ba anmar selidegala, ar nega widsulidbali tehgi we yob na anmar sesale, eh erey ga kuhegala, ar eh sogedba ibmar saegala, ar weyob Lamán na Kuage gi pinsasa urwedgine.

Ar, tehgi nadmarbar sunna, nega tule sulidbali, temar sig pule nadab kusmala; al nadab kusmargu we igarba na tummad wilesmala, nega tule sulidbali. Anmar omegana wegi na mimmigan nikusmala.
Tehginiguar Paba immar únidibar anmarga uisa, al nega tule sulidba sanmaggid sedi kudmala únnidibali, anmar omegan nuhnis únnidiba nikusmala emimmigangala; tehegine mimmimar nuegan tukkusmala, ar machergan teyobmoga; al na Pabtummadgi bar sunmaisa surmala.
Wegihidba taidemala, Pabtummad igar maidba nue nanamala. Tehegi tule mimmigan Pab igar ba taile, eh de masi gar uke, ar kanguhed ga uibali, eh de igar uke bar imaimalagala; tehgi Pabtummad ibmar únnidiba anmarga uisa, nega tule sulildba kudihi kusmargua.
Tehegine wegi na pirgaba kudihi kusmala, Eye, Pirga Pahabaka kudihi na kusmala nega tule sulidbali.
Al yala (nasad) ibmar nikad se modabmala, ar ibmar turgan, tehgi, sapi turgan nue nikadba tehgi nukusa; tehegine Pab tummad ibmar turgan únnidiba urbisa, mel-legi purgegarmala. Ar temar taisamar sunna, nuga imaisamala Irreantum ye, we soilege tihi pukidar (naidi).
Tehegi temar naba na nega sobsamala; ar tummad wilesmar iniguale, eye pela ibmar kege (na) narmailege we kusadi, wergusmala temar kakaba modabmargua; ar we yala nuga imaisamala, yala immar ibedi, eibmar turgan (sapi) nikadbali.
Ar yala immar níkadgi, maidgine, ani, Nefi, úndarangine Pab Kaiya purba anse kornoniggi tehegine soge: ar pehe yarbali naye Ar an kwisgusa, yarba na nadsunna, al Pabtummad se na kodesunna.
Tehegihidgine Pabtummad anga sunmaisa, soge: Ur wargwen peh soboye; an peh ga oyogoedba na soboe, ani, peh neggwebur sedegala, wehe temar bali.
Ar ga an soide: Paba ¿Piali en ormar an aminaoe, oduregala, ar ibmar ebulegega soegala, ar gi ulu sobega, peh anga oyosad ba sobegala.
Al Paba anga soisa, piali we eskoro aminaoe; urgi sobegala.
Tehegi, ani, Nefi, ibtula ukka sobsa, soho ogaegala; tehegi na sobsagua, na soho ogadsunna, ar akkua kuabo sarsoged imaisa, soho onikkuhegala.
Wegihidba Pabtummad, sohó anmarga uisasuli, nega tule sulidba nanasmargua, ar eh de soisa: Ani, pemarga mas nued kul-lege imakoe, mel-legi pemar mas tuegala.
Tehegi, ani, pemarga kual-lu tummadga kummarbaloe, nega tule sulidbali; ar pemarga igar iduedga na kuoe, al an igar ba nue nanamalale, na pesedmaloe napa nued naidsega, ar pemar an wisguhegala, an pemar sesa.
Eye, tehegine Pabtummad soisabali: Napa (yala) nued se modapid sorba, wisgumalae, ani tule tummadi, ani Paba tummadi, ar ani tule tummad, na peh onosmala purgedgine; eye, ar ani Erusalén gi peh onosmala.
Tehgi soggu, ani, Nefi kantikidgi Pab igar ba nanadi kuarsunna, ar an kwenadgan na unadih na kuarsunna, Pab igarba nue nanamalagala, al ittaogua nanamalagala.
Ar na eskoromar sobsa sunna, akkuamar amisadgine.
Al an kwenadgan, ur sobsoggar an taidemargua, ar angi sunmaidemala; anmar kwenad akkargude epinsaedi, sunna na ur soboge pinsoe, tehgi pinsabali sunna gi obaggoe temargine.
Weyob an kwenadgan angi sunmaidemala, tehegine arbabisuli kuarmala, an ittosurmala, sunna na ur sobe; ar akkusun ittomarbali, we ibi, ar Pab tummad gan soisa.
Tegi weyob ibmar kudsunna, ani, Negi, na nue pukib ittosa, ankwenadgan taedba, ar weyob an taidemargua, na kuagegi yeher ittosmala, soidemala: Anmar wismala peh kege ulu sobe, na wismarbali, peh nono akkar gude, we ibmar tummad soegala.
Peh anmar Pab sunna tamoga unni peh pinsaedba immar imaibie; Erusalén yargi anmar onosa; tehegine igar widwuli nanasmala nega tule sulidbali, pirga bali; ar an omegan amba poniguar kudidihi na arbasmala; nega tule sulidba mimmigan nikudmala, tummad na wilesmala, purged gi san onosmala. Pur purgismalana, nabir sunna, Erusaléngi noarmargua, wileged tummad na abingasmala.
Wegihidba na pirgaba wilesmala, nega tule sulidbali; tehegine ah ibagangi anmar ga yar uilesadgi, nued ittodi kusmala gadine; eye, ar pur yeher ittodi kusmalana.
Ar wismala neggwebur, Erusalén yargi sihidi, ar nuedi, tehgi Pab tummad Sogedba eigarba nanadimala, igi Moises kaiya purba soimai yobi (nanadimala) tehgi soggu na wismala neggwebur innigi guadi; ar anmar paba eh sogedba imaisa, ar anmar onosa, na ittosmala. Eye, na tommoga. Al weyob an kwenadgan sunmaidemala, ar anmargi uludmala.
Tehegi ani, Nefi, kwenadgan ga na soide: ¿Pemar wismala, anmar pabgan, Israel mimmigana, Ehipto torganse na san onosmala, al Pab tummad ittos surmalana?
Eye, ¿Pemar na ittomala, pemar ga an soge, na nosmalan dibe ye, wile pukua kusmargua, al Pabtummad Moises par midsulina, tulemar pentakegala?
Na peh wismala Israel mimmigan wile pukua kusa, arbabed tummad imainai kusmala; tehegine wismarbali, na taidemalale, pule yeher ittosmalale, wile pukua nosmala.
Tehegidba wismarbali Moises Pab igar abingasa, ga arbaegala; tehegine ekaiya purba ba, temar kinnid argade ga kusa, ar nagab obaisamala pulale.
Al wismala Ehipciosmar, Faraón esordamar, temar kinnidgine pela tihtulesmala.
Ar wismarbali, Israel mimmimar, nega tule sulidba, más (madu) nibneggined ga uilesa.
Eye, tehegibbali, wismarbali Pabtummad purba kanguhedba Moises kaiya kodegua akkuagine tihi ga ariosa, ar tihi ga kusa, Israel mimmigan ukkud osuloge gala.
Tehegine, Paba tule pentaged, Pab tummad panebane idudihi kusa iniguale, tehgi Mutiki ekual-luga kusa iniguale, gi uludtamala, ar nuegan bar taile gar ibmar imaide kusa, ar Kuage kuaide tamala, Moises gi ulud tamamla, tehegine Pab tummad tula dihid egi uludtamar bali.
Ar Esogedba na opelosa we neggwebur, tehegi ekaiya purba sogedba idusa; ar ekaiya purba sogedba emarga pela immar imaisa; tehegine esoisuli ibmar kwen imaisuli.
Ar Ordan tihwargi obaisamargua, asorba, eh kanguhed uisa ah yarginmalad, tulemar oduhurmaisa, eye, pela owaggisha, tehgi obelosa.
Tehgi emi, ¿Pehmar pinsamala, mimmigan weh yarginmalad napa nued ga uilesadgi pukuahúnni, ar anmar pabgan oduhurmaisamalad, peh pinsamala, weh tulemar; tule nuegana? Wegi na pemarga soimala suli.
¿Pinsamala, ar anmar pabgan bur ibmar nuegan abingasmalana, we yar ginmalad, tule nuegan tamalana? An soi suli.
Al wegi Pabtummad pela Kuable tule sabe, tehegi nuegan tamalale, Paba pentake, ar wegihidba, we neggwebur Pabtummad kaiya purba obadshamala, al na nue isgusmala; tehgi Paba emar gi isgudmosunna; ar Paba napa ukabsasa emargala, al anmar pabganga ibmar nuegan uisa. Eye, obelogega na ukabsasa, al anmar pabganga igargan nuegan uisa, yoho ibmar nuegan nikuhegala.
Wehegihidba, Pabtummad napa nasigsa, tulemar, ibmar turgan gi ambiguhega; tehegine emimmigan odesa, napa neg sehedi kumalagala.
Tehegi neggwebur nued sisa, al isgana osulosa.
Tule nuegan selesa napa nuedsega, tehegi tule isgana obelosa, napa ukabsasa, isgudidihi ulale.
Nibneggi, nega taimai, ar eh olo kana, sihi tehgi we napa eh napa obunnoedi.
Tehegi sabguhe tulemar Pabtummad abingasmaladi. Wehgi Eh anmar pagban sabgusa, al eh ai nuedga imaisa, eye, Abrahán, Isaac, ar Acob bogua, tehegine epinsasa ebo igargan mesisadi, ar Ehipto yargi onosa.
Ar nega tule sulidba igargan pehedse gar kudmala, al eigarba nodmala, igi pemar kudmoga; Pab tummad pukib na ittosa, pemar isgusadbali. Tehegine náibe kugualed par miali sohobali. Ar ekudsamargua, ega ina uisa nutakegala, al unnila gi nutakegala, tehegi we pasusunná eina tailege, pukidar purgismarbali.
Tehegi kuagegine na isgudmala ar Moises gi uludmala, tehegine Pabtummad gi idsagua sunmaidemala. Teginiguale, wismala ekar kanguhedba, sehled kusmala napa nued naidshega.
Tehegi emi, pela we worbali, ibagandi mosa eisgusmaladi, perguoe; eye nue isgudmala, ar an nue widsuli, we ibayangi pergumalo dibeye. Al an nue wisi ibagandina noniggoe pergumaloe, unnila pokkuagua turgumaloe, ar emar seledmaloe wilegegala.
Ar Pabtummad an paba parmiali nega tule sulidbali, tehegine udiosmala, opurgebi kusmala, ar pemar tule opurgidmoga, kuage gi na teyob pinsamala, ar, peh mar Ehmar yobi tamarmoga.
Pemar nue igar isgana imaisoggaline, tehegi Pabtummad undaradgi epinsae taismala anger wargwena, an pemarga na soisadi; eye, pemar ekaiya purba ittosmala sikuasi, tehegi sunmaisa nuedgine, ar pemar iesa we ibi, tehgi niguale bar ekaiya purba ittosurmala; tehegihidba mala koled yobi, sunmaisa, napa owawanmaisa, marideyobi.
Ar pemar wisi ekaiya purba kanguhedba sunna napa obeloe; eye ekaiya purba kanguhedba sunna napnega obinniebali, sunna nega akkua pukidarad, nebaga imake. ¿Tehegide ipigar sunna na pemar akkunuhe ittomala?
Pehmar ular na nue pukib ittoe; tehegine kuage nunmage ittoe, an tobehe ittoe pemar parmel-led maloedgine, tehgi sadegua. Al Pab tummad purba angi ubosa, tehgi soggua an san kangued kwen nigsuli.
Tehegi weyob ga sunmaisagua, anse uludmala, ar temargi an metebi kuarmala. Al an waliggah kuarmala an kaegala ga an soide: Pabtummad pirigined nuggine pemarga na soge mer an kamala, ibigala, Paba Kanguhed angi oubosa, an sangi pela ubosa; ar pemar anse adsaele; pemar san tinguoe, suar yobi; tegi Pabtummad asabin ibmar kuen kuosuli, ar Paba pemar obelogoe.
Al ani, Nefi, an soide, pemar pabgine mer urwemala, ar earbaed mer osulomala, ar Pabtummad anga soge ur sobye.
Ar an soisa: Pabtummad anga soidele pela we immar imake, an imaisale Eye anga soide, we tihiga peh soge; napa ga peh imake pinnisale; tehegine we yob soide dibe ar imaisale.
Tehegine, ar Pabtummad kanguhed nikadi, al ibmar pukidar oyosa, ibmar taile disurmalad imaisa tulemar mimmigangala. ¿Tehgide, ar sunna, an oturtake suli kuoe ar sobedgine?
Teheginbali, ani, Nefi, ibmar pukidar kwenadgan ga na soisa, tehgi akku na ibmar ittosmala, ar bar anse uludsurmala; al kwen adsasurmarbali, pibisahale kwen bar an epudsurmala, iba piguadi tegi kusa, ar kwen bar an oakkalos surmala, tommaladbali, Pabpurba di nue kantiki an ittoe, ar Ehmarba we yob immar imaisa.
Pabtummad anga soide: Peh argan oyoe, peh kwenadgan sega, tehgi esan kwen akkar kuosurmala, peh asabinni, unnila parmel-ledmaloe, Pab soisa. Ar wisgumalagala, ani Pabtummadi.
Tehgihidbali an argan oyode, an kwenadgan sega, ar kwen akkar kudsurmala, an asabinni; tehgine Pabtummad parmetemala ekaiya soged bali.
Ar soidemala emidi napiraguadgi na, wisgusmala, Paba peh ba dihi, ar epurba kanguhed anmar parmetemala. Tehegi an asabin yokorgi sigidmala, an nug otummoegala. Ar tehgi na imagega, an imaisasuli, ar anga soide: Ani pemar kwenadi, napiragua, pemar urba, unnila Pab nibneggined se pemar kormala, tehgi pemar Pab ba igar imake, al tehegihile napa neggi suídihi kudihi kumaloe, we igar Paba pemarga ukoe.

Tehegi Pabtummadse kodsamala, ar anba immar imaisamala; al anmar urgomar akkarsaila sobsamala. Tehegine Paba anga oyomai kuali arbaedi, urgomar igi ur soblegoye.
Al ani, Nefi, tule urgo sobegi imaisasuli, tehegine ulu tulemar sobegi, an sobsa surbali; Pabtummad anga ibmar oyosadgi na sobsa; tehgih soggua tulemar ur sobegi sobledsuli.
Ar ani, Nefi, Pab se na ibmar egisdisunna, palibali, sappurba nanadih na kuali, tehegine Pabtummad ibmar pukidar anga oyosa.
Tehegi ur sobed pelosa, Pab kaiya purba sogedbali, an kwenadgan taisamala nuedi; ar nued sobale imailesa; tehegine Pab se kannar kodsamarbali.
Ar pab kaiya purba, an pab sega warmaisa, gar soide ur yabba toiye.
Ar waidaradba, pela ibmar imaisad sorba; sapi turba, sanmar nega tule sulidbalid, ibmar pukidar amisa, Pabtummad sogedba imaisamala, ur yaba toisamar sunna, anmar ibmarmala, sapi kuagua, pela Kuable immar sedanimaladi, epirgamar tunguhed bali; ar, ur yabba na toidemar sunna, anmar, anmar omegan, ar anmar mimmimala.
Tehegi nega tule sulidba, an paba mimmigan warbo nikusa, idued nuga Acob ye, ar Ose pibigwadi.
Ar pela kuable ibmar oubosmala, tehgi anmar toisamar moga, ur yabali ah sorbali, al pela immar imaisamala, anmarga soilesa gi, temarba nadmar sunna, ar purwa nued anmar sesa, napa nuedsega.
Al, ibapiguahdi purwa anmar sesgua, wegihidba, an kwenadgan, ar Ismael mimmigan, eomegana, eittoleged na kuarmala, tehgi na tododmala, namaidemala, ar kwen nued sunmakarmarsurbali, iedmala kanguhed nuedba seledanigidi wegine; Eye na nue isgudmala.
Tehegi ani, Nefi, al nue na tobgusa, Paba anmarse urwetagoe, ar anmar oturtaidagoe isgusmaladbali, temargi toidemar sunnoe. Tehegihidba, ani Nefi na nue sunmaide sunna kwenadgangala; al wegihidba uludmala ansega, soidemala: Anmala abesuli, anmar urba pibigwad, tummadga kuedi.
Ar, angasmala, Lamán, Lemuel an edishamala tubgine, tehegi an sabsur imaisamarbali; tehegine Pabtummad wilub ta kega weyob imaisa, ar tulemar isgana wilubtakegala.
Tehgi tubgi nue an edishamala mel-le úngegala, ibmar tirbír Pabtummad uisad anmarga bar arbadsuli.
Tehegine, bar wisgudsurmala igi ur semalodibeye, purwatummad korali, eye purwa tummad iba paha wilub kannar sorsiggi ur parmisa; ar tobgudmala, Tihdulego na pinsadmala. Teheginiguale an esessurmala.
Ar iba pakegine, kannar sorsig seledmala, purwadi bar kangude.
Tehegine, ar nue temar anmar obelo soggalina. Al iba pake kannar sorsig selesadgi, an kwenadgan Pabtummad maga kebe ittosa, eginmala, ar na purgemaloe, al nugusurmalale, tehegine anse nonimala, an esismala, argan nue ena nagusa, wegi yokkor teyob karbali, ar nue enanai, tehgi nue nunmake.
Tehegi na Pabtummadgi nued pinsae, pa bane se kordih; ar Pabgi kwen akkar sunmaisasuli, an pukib ittoedbali.
Ar, an pab Lehi ibmar pukidar soisa an kwenadgan gala, teyob moga Ismael mimmigangala; teginiguale tule wargwen an pentaibi tibe, agga se uludtamala. Tehegine an pabgan nue sered gudsunna, ar tummad wilesa, emimmigan taed ulale, ueledmala, eye, tehgi kasgi nue megidmala.
Tehgi an kwenadganba, na pukib ittomaladba, na Pabtummadga san uked naga; eye esailagiamar tákku kusa, ar nue napa ga kuhed naga; eye, temarga san ukednagamala.
Ar Acob, Ose amba pibigana soggua, masgi ogulleged abelege, nue pukib ittosmala enan; wile ittoedbali, ar an ome, an mimmigan, ga sunmaimar iniguale, ekuage isguhed kwen akkalos surmala, an esiggegala.
Tehgi kwen ittos surmala, unnila Pabtummad kanguhedba na kuegedi nugudmala; wegi na taidemargua, temargi pergumaloe; isgusmar na nugudmar sunna, an akkalosmaladgine, ar an esisamala.
An esismalad sorba, na ibmar tirbiled, igar sehed sushunna, ar an abegedba imaide tehgi Pabse na kode; Pabse kodsad sorba Purwa, ar temar pogiles nade, tehegine nega nue pohonade.
Tehegine, an, Nefi, ulu na ses súnna, ar kannar nadmar bali, napa nued sega.
Ar ibagan undar nanadgine napa nued se modabmala, pela kuable ibmar obadismala, anmar nega, tehegi we yala nuiy imasmala napa na sadi.
Tehegine ibmar tiggar mala, napagine arbaharmala, ibmar wearmar bar sunna; eye, ibmar Erusalén gi senonimalad na tiysamala, tehegi ibmar nuegan pela tungusa; al ibmar unnidiba nikusmala.
Tehegine napa nuedgi, nega tule sulidba, nadabmaladba ibmar turgan sappur bar malad taileali; moli, moli pebe nikad, sibad, sappur sibad, ar pela ibmar sappur bar malad ar tule ga ib nuegana, anmar taidebali, akkuamar kaleguhensuli, olo, mani, esnun.

1.intro: Lehi, Epurgisad. Nefi kwenadgan Eh se uludmala. Pabtummad Nefi owisosa, ukubtummad ba namarye. Ukub tummad ba nanasmaladi, etc.
Tehegine ar, ani, Nefi, kwenadgan oturtaisad sorba, Lehi anmar paba, al sunmaisamoga, ibmar pukidargine—Pabtummad ibmar ga imasmaladgine Erusaled yargi nosmargua.
Ar an sunmaisa, temargi ulusmaladgine, al Pab tummad wile anmar taisa, temargi anmar pentaisa.
Al sunmaidebali, yar nued kuabid abingasmala; tehegine ibi yobi Pabtummad wile anmar taismala, anmarga soisamala Erusalén yargi pemar noarmarye.
Wegihidba ar, an ibiya abulusa an soisa; an wisi Erusalendi pergus sunna; al anmar noarmalana, weh yargine pergumarmogoena.
Tehgi, na tummad wilesmar iniguhena, napa kuabidnued, annar nikusmala, bur yar paiganba nued egualesa; Pabtummad anbo igar mesisadbali, we yala an mimmiganga uilegoe. Eye Paba igar anga uisadba, we yala anga uilesa, teheginbali, Paba eargan nuggi senonibaloed we yarsega, ah marga uilemarmogoe.
Ar ani, Lehi owisosa, Purba nued anga ibmar sogedbali, we yarse kwen tulemar noniggo surmala, unnila wese Pab argan nuggi nonimaloe.
Tehegi we napa uiles nai, tulemar Eh wese senoniggoedgala, ar eigarba nanamalale, we yala yeher ittolegedga kuoe; kwen tulemar paigan maiga kuosurmala; al tegi kudmardibe ar ehmar isgusmalad ulale; tehegine isguhed pukidargusale we yala barmel-ledoe, ehwidsu tamalad ulale; ar tulemar nueganga we napa; yar nuedga kuoe.
Ar wegi, nuedgine napa naid, neggwebur paigan yohoe pela wisgumala; al wegihidba tule pukidar ambaguoe we napneggine, kwen pínunsurguoe, we tule marga napa uilegedi.
Al, ani, Lehi, anga igar uilesa tehgi, Pabtummad Erusalén yargi tulemar onosale, ar eigar ba taele we yargine nasguoe; neggwebur pamalad wisguosurmala, we yala na nikumaloe, tehegine Pab igarba nue tamalale, ibmar nuegan ga uilemaloe we yargine; tule paigan kwen ibe suosurmarbali; tehegine poki kudihi kumaloe.
Tehegine, ibagan noniggile, Pabtummad obaddemalale, ibmar nuegan, tummagan, Pab imaisad wisgusadi, kebe napa nasigsad; Pabtummad argangi ibmar nuegan abingasad shedbalile, pen sulidgi kanguhed abingasana, Paba igargan maid, nuedba selenonigi weh napa kuapid nued sega—wehe na pemarga soge, ibagwengi, PabMachi, we tule nued Pabtummad, pemar obaddemardibe, wegi, tulemar nuegan tamalad se, tummad oturtatailemaloe.
Eye, gwebur paigan, selenonigile, kanguhed ga uilemalale; we yala ibe sulegoe, tehegine tummad wilemaloe, ar otuhurmalegoe.
Eye, yoho tanimaloed pukidara ablis ariogoe; tummad wilemaloe; tehegine, mimmigan, pitigidba gi bepinsadi kusmalana gadina, eye, pemar ansunmaisad ittosmalana ga dinye.
¡Ibi yob! Na ataimala; ar ataimala kapugmalad, eye sohoneggi kapugmaladi, ar nega wawanmaidele, we eskoro tubgi addinnaledi, al tulemar mimmigana gi addinnemaloed, wilemalaga seledmaloe, tehegi na we yob sadegumaloe.
¡Addaimala; kuisgumala ukubgine! ittomala Paba wargwen esunmagedi, kantikidgine, ar esan emisbinsahale, uan negpokidigid gi toisoggali, ar we igarba tulemar gi nanamaid, kwenbar aibirmalosurmala; we ibagan taniggi, tehegine, we igarba naoe, pela nega tirbir naidgine.
Teheginiguale, Pabtummad, an sanpurba pentaisa, mel-legi sohoneise togegala, an taisa ekanguhedi, ar ansabedba esakuagi ansedihi.
Ar, an pehmar abege, Pab igargan maid, tehegi epinsaed ba nue nanamaladi; wegi na sanpurba abesa weyob pemar tamaladi.
An kuager na pukib ittodeh kúsa, nunmagedbali, an tobgudih kusa, pemar widsur tamaladbali, Pabtummad pela na mel-le pemargi urwegala, ar mer pergumalagala.
Mel-legi pemar oturtailegegala, ar wilegegarbali, peh mimmigan tanimaloed, mer wilemoga gala, tehegine, mer ablis aroegala esgine, mer ukumesegala ar mel-legi istar tailedihigusmalagala, tehegine mer nia ba nagumalagala, ar wiledmaloe esega.
Mimmigana, we ibi mer tegob kusana gadina, unni gwebur nued ga kusmala yeherbana, Paba, pemar ba nued pinsamogana gadin ye. Tehegine eigarmar nuegan innigiguadi.
Eh de soisa: Tehegine, an igarba nanadihmalale, we yargi nasgumaloe; ar an igar ba tasurmalale, an pemar parmetoe, an se bar warmaggosurmala, weyala bar pemargadga kuosuli.
Tehegine an sanpurba, pemarba welidar ittoegala; an kuage ulub we napgi nodesogele welidar nadenagadina, pemar bali, al mer huan se naipid ittoena gadina, mimmigan kuisgumala, tehegine tule ga na samala, ar pulagua na kudih kumala, kuage sogwena na pinsamala, pulale ibmar imake, mel-le yohoe emarga maiga kumalagala.
Mer pemar ukabsalemala na gadina, ibmar isgana sega; Paba tule nued mel-le pemar se ulusmalana gadina, yoedse mer Eh se oturtailemalana gadina, eye, sana, ar sanpurba oturtailedi kadegua.
Mimmigan kuisgumala, ibmar nuegan morga imake, isgudidihid mimala; nega sishid gi kudihidgi nomala, tehegi ol-li osulomala.
Pemar kwenadse mer bar urwemala, ibmar tummagan oyosa, ar Pab igar maid ba na nanasa, Erusalengi noalid akale, tehegine anmar pentaisa, Pabtummad argan nuggi napa nued se anmar sedagegala; al Eh wegi sasulina, anmar ukudba purgismalana, ukubtummad pali; ar teginiguale, opurgebi pemar kusmala; Eye, ar pemar tummad wilesa.
Tehegine an tobe ittoe pemar ulale, Eh tummad wilegoe pemarbali; tehegi pemargi-obinbie kusa; ar na nue wisi, al Eh tummadga kubie kudsuli, unnila na Pabtummad barbi pensadih kusa, tehgi peh mar nutakegala, ar san nued kudih gadeguagala.
Ar pahmar gi, sunmaisamala, ar napiraguadba pemarga soisa. Pemar soisamala eh toidar, pemar soisamala eh toidar, pemar epinsasa, pemar se ulusa; al Pab ga ibmar sogedba imaisa, ar ba kudihi kusa, tehgi pemar soisamala, anmar se urweye; al Pab ga ibmar sogedba, napiraguadgi pemar oturtaisa, Eh de pemar pasur taisasuli, pemar isgudihidba na ibmar soisa.
Al abelegedba, Pab purba kanguhed nikusa, ar ba pemar ibmar imakegala. Tehegine na suli, ar Purba nued eba dihi kusadba na kaiya poki Kudsuli, tehegi pemarga sunmaisa.
Tehegine, mimmigana, Lamán, ar pemala, Lemuel, Sam, pemar mimmigan moga, pemar Ismael mimmigana, wehe pemar Nefi kaiya purba ittomalale, kwen wilegosurmala, tehegine pemar ittomalale, ar purba nuegan na pemarga ukoe, eye, wehe kebe na igar nuegan ukoe.
Ar pemar akku ittomalale, we purba nued, kebe pemar ga uilegoed, bar uilegosuli, ar Egarbi na uisunnoe.
Tehegi, Zoram, peh ga na soge: we, peh Labán maiga kusa; tehegine Erusalén yargi semarmoga, ar na nue wisi, an Machi Nefi ai nuedga kudihi kuohe, tegi sadeguoe.
Tehegine, ba nued nanasa, peh mimmigan ga igar nuegan uilemogoe, Eh bali, ar tehgi ibagan sadegua we napnegine, ar tehgi sulile, peh widsur taele, peh mimmigan isgumogoe, we yargine tehgi kadegua.
Ar teyobdo, Pabtummad igargan maidba taele, Paba peh mimmigan ga we napneg nitakoe, yeher gi ittodihi kuhegarmala.

Emi, Acob, pehbo na sunmakoe, Peh An Machi: Ukub tummad ba kebe kualulesa, Ar wegihidba, peh pibigua unni tummad peh wilesa, kwenadgan widsur tamaladbali.
Tehegine, Acob AnMachi, ukub tummad ba kebe kualulesadi, Eh peh sanpurba onutakoe, wile peh ittoedgi, yeher ittodihi kuegala.
Tehegi peh sanpurba okannolegoe, kwenad Nefi peh pentakoe, ar Pabtummadga arbadih na kuoe peh ibagangine. Ar na nue wisi, tule pentaked, nued peh pentaisa; ar peh taisa, ibagan mosa sogele, Eh de tanikoe tulemar pentakegala.
Ar sapengwa unni ekanguhed peh taisa, tehegine peh, tule kuage nuedi, we yob tulemar paigan tamarmogale, we napa gi ga arbaega kumarmoga; Ibiga, Ar Purba nued, na emala, sabe, emi, tehegi na sadegua, al igar megisa (mai) tule wargwen nosad akkale, ar ittoleged ba na pentailemaloe.
Tulemar ar nue wismala, pidi ibmar nuedi, ar pidi ib isgana; tehegi tulemar ga igar tummar uilesa. Ar igar tummad tule sanpurba kwen osulonasuli, ar igar maid ba tulemar obal-lesmala; tehegi igar purbaledba ib nued obal-lesbali, al tummad wilesmala, tehgisadegua.
Tehegi, ar tule nued ba, pentaileged taniggi: Ibiyobi nued tae, ar napiraguadi.
Wegihidba, Eh na san urmake, tulemar isguhedgala, igar tummad egismaidba imakegala, tulemar wilesakua ittomalad gala; tulemar yosgu tamaladga; ar tule paid kwen abin sadsuli, igar tummad ibmar egidsadgine.
Tehegine, ibiyobi abelege, igar tummad, tulemar napnegginmalad wisguhedi; tulemar na Pab asabin kwen kuisguosurmala, tule paid nuggine, unnila tule nued, wile tule taked, enued nuggine, Ar Eh de, na esan uke, tehegine kannar na subali purba nued kanguhed bali, tulemar purgismalad otulogegala, al ehde eínse turguoe.
Eh de Pabga kebe saila ibmar imaisa, Eh de tule mimmigan ga idued ga kuoe, tehegi epensurmalad pentakoe.
Ar eh de tulemarga idugedi pabtummad asabinni; tehegi easabin kuisgumaloe, napi ga igar amiegala napiraguadbali, tehegi nued innigiguad tamalad bali, tehgine igar tummad soimaidba. Eh na uisa, bur tule nuedba, wilub taileged ba tanimoga, igar tummad maidba oturtailegoedibe, yeher ittogo dibe, gi purgisadgi, bar igar imakegala.
Tehegi pela ibmar nue abelege akkarhaggale, tehegisulina nega tule sulidba an Machi kebe kualulesad, igar napiraguadnued, ibmar isgana sulina, Purba innigiguad nued, ar wileged surbalina. Ar unni ibmar sokwenah kuana; tehegi ar ibmar san soigwen naguadba ar purged yobi, al san tulad, purged surbalina, ibmar kege isguhed, ib isgana surbalina.
Tehegine, ar ibmar pinsar obinnilesana, al kwen obinnules surbalina, weh ibmala. We Pabtummad na ibmar wisid pergusana, tehgi eigar mesisad kadeguad, ekan guhed, wile tule taked, tehegine, Pab igar nued innigiguad pergusbalina.
Al soimalale igar tummad suli, ar soimalale isguhed suli, tehgi noed surbalile, ar igar nued innigiguad surbali. Al igar nued innigiguad sulile, werguhed surbali, ar oturtaileged surbarsunna, ar wilege surbarsunna. Tehegi we ibmar sulile, ar Pabtummad masurbali. Ar Paba masulile, al anmar kudihisurmar mogana napneggine; tehegi ibigala, kwen ibmar obinniles sulina, ibmar imailes surbalina, kwen abingales sulina imakegala, tehegi pela ibmar yokusana.
Tehegi mimmigana emidi, peh marga we immar an soge yeher ittodih kumalagala, na wisgumalagala; Paba wargwenna mai, ibmar pela obinnisadi, nibneggined, napnegginedi, ar pela ibmar gi puguadi; gi ibmar arbalemaladi, tehgi ga arbaed ga kumaladi.
Eh igar kadeguad imakega, tulemargala; anmar Paba sailagined aidesad sorba, ibmar imakega ibtula, sappurbalid, nuhumar nibalidi, ar pela immar obinnalesa kaleguhen suli abelegedbali, tehgi soggu, akkarhaggar ibmar abelege, eye, sapi turba ised, tehegi sapi sanpurba tulad; ibi odsiguad, ar ibmar paid kaipirregedi.
Tehegi Pabtummad, tule ga ibmar uisa, wargwen imakegala. Tule na wargwen kege ibmar sae (tukin kege ibmar ibmake) unnila na mushubmushub imaker kege.
Ar, ani, Lehi na wisguherkebe, absosadgine, Pab Paliwitur wargwen aidesa, we narmakar naidgine; tehegine nia gi pinnisa, ar Pabtummad asapin na ibmar isgana abesa.
Tehegi niba par mel-lesad ulale, ar wiledihid ulale, tegi kadegua eh sunna kudihi, pela tulemar abemoga. Al we naibe epinneguad, ar nia, kakan saed tule epaba, Eba ga soisa: Sapi turba ised peh kúnye, ar peh kwen purgo surye, unnila Pabtummad yobi peh kumogoe, ibmar nued, ib isgana na peh wisguoe.
Ar, Adan, Eba ebo sapiturba ised kudsamargua, nabir ittoleged neggi par mel-ledmala, napagi arbaegala.
Ar mimmimar nikusa, eye, pela nap tirbir naidgala.
Tehegi pab sgedba tulemar mimmiganga ibagandi sugud sunna, napneggi karmaidihidgi nugumalagala; Ar we napagi wilub tailegega kudsunna, ar eibagan sugude, Pabtummad igar mesisadbali, tulemar mimmigan ga uilesa. Al Eh de soisa tulemar pela isguhed na mimaloe; Eh oyosa tulemar pela isguhed mimala, epabgan nosadbali.
Ar Adan Pabgi nodsulina, Pab igargi kwen nodsuline; Al nabir ittoleged neggi kudihi kudena. Tehegine ibmar pela obinnilesad kwen akkargudsulina; ambagua naina, kebe obinnilesa yobi, tegi gadeguana.
Tehgi kwen mimmigan nikud surmalana; ar ibmar wisi kwen kudsurmarbali, welidarad, wile ittoed, immar nued imaked, tehegi isguhed, wemar surbalina.
Wegihidba, Eh ibmar wisidba, pela immar imaisa, pela immar wisirba.
Adan nosa, tulemar kudihi kuhegala; Ar tulemar kudihi, yeher ittoed nikuhegala.
Ar EMachi yohoed se tanikoe, tulemar mimmigan isgumalad pentakegala. Tehegine nosmalad pentailemaloe, nugumaloe, welidar ittodih kadegua, wisgumaloe ibmar (igar) nued, ib isgana, na wawargwen ibmar saegala, ar mel-legi ibmar egi arbaegala, unni turtailesogalile, ga maigakuoe, igargan tummagan maid sogedbali, we ibagan napidgi Paba igargan uisadi.
Tehgi, tulemar napneggi hittolegedba kudidihi; ar pela ibmar gar uilesa, tulemar gadih. Al hittoleged ba ibmar samaloe, ar sanpurba kege perguhedi, Esucristo sogedba ibmar imailegoe, pela tulemargala, ar wileged, purged sumardibe, nia ba ibmar imaidoe, Eh de abege pela tulemar wiledihi.
Mimmigana, na pemar abege, Pab Machi gi nued pinsaedi, Ar eigargan maid nue ittomala; ekaiya purba sogedba nue tamala, ar sanpurba kadeguad sumala, epurba nued pemarga sogedbali.
Tehgi mer purged kadeguad amimala, wedi unnila napneggadi, isguhed nega, nia purba gadi, tulemar wiogedi, ar sohoneise anmar sedbimala, ar pemar eneggi sehedi sabie.
We kaiya purba peh marga na soisa mimmigana, ibagan napi an wegi kudihidgine; Ar ibmar nuegan na abingasa, nergan kaiya purba sogedbali. Tehegine ibmar paid pemarga kwen abesuli, pemar sanpurba kadeguadi. Tehgin kadina.

Emisguagi Osé na pehga sunmake, an machi pibiguadi. Peh kualulesa nega tule sulid ba, an wiledihi kusadgine; Eye, Peh nana, peh abingasa an tummad wilesad ibagangine.
Pabtummad, pega napa uisamoga, we napa nuedi, pega uilesa, tehegi yoho peh mimmimar tanimarmogoed gala, peh kwenadgan ba nue sehedi, pe kuhegala, tehgi sadegua, ar Israel Paba eigar nue peh sehedihile.
Tehegi, emigi Osé, an Machi napidguadi, ukubtummad ba na sehnonikidi, an wiledihi kusgua, Paba pega purba nuegan uke, tehgi sadegua, ar ibiga peh mimmimar yoho ambiguoed pela perguosuli.
Ar wegihidba peh an Machi sunnadi; tegi ani Osé gi tanimoga, Eh Ehipto se seled kusadi. Ar igar tummagan, Paba ebo mesisa.
Tehegine, Osé nue anmar ibagan taisa. Ar Pab gi igar abingasa, peh mimmigangi, Pabtummad, eana nued innikiguad sioe, Israel neggine; Ar Eh Machi suli, ar eana sogwen obannolego iniguar, kwen ielego suli, Paba ebo igar mesisadi, Emachi, Emarga ibmar soimogoe we ibagan napidgine, Purba kanguhed ba nega sushad gi onoega, neiy mehegwadsega; eye, nega sushad tukualedi, tehegi wileged, ar yeher ittoed sega.
Ar, Osé napiraguadba soisa: An, Pabtummad ner wargwen odegoe, we ner sunnad sulegoe an mimmigangala.
Eye, Osé napiraguadgi soisa: An ga Paba soisa: Ner tummad wargwen aidegoe, an mimmigangi sulegoe wagwena, yohoaidemaloedgine. Tehgi igar maid imakoe peh mimmigangala. Eh kwenadgangala, emarga nue abelegoe, ar wisgumaladsega, ega igarmar megisadi, an peh pabgan ehbo igar mesisadi.
Al pega na igar ukoe immar paid kwen imakosuli, unnila an soged ba na ibmar imakoe. Tehegine an asabin na peh otummogoe, anba ibmar imakoedbali.
Tehegi Moises sunna peh tungumogoe, al an soisa, an neggwegur onoega, selenoniki wesega, ¡Ibiyobi Israel nega!
Ar Moises senonikoe, peh neggwebur onoegala Ehipto yargine.
Tehegi peh mimmigangi new wargwen aidenonikoe, ar purba kantikid gar uilegoe, an kaiya purba parsogegala, peh wagangala; unnila an kaiya purba parsogegarbi suli, Paba wegi soge, napiraguadgi sogegala, emar gala, an kaiya purba pado parsoilesadi emar abargine.
Tehegine peh mimmigan narmakoe, ar uda mimmigan narmakoe; al peh mimmigan narmakoe, tehegi uda mimmimar narmaimogoed, ebo na tungudmaloe, Pabigar sulid obinnegala, urwed osulogega peh mimmimar ga neg pogid nasikoe, ar sedegarbali, ibagan napidgine, epabgan wisguhegala, ar ebo igar mesisadi, Paba weyob soge.
Ar wilemalad okannogoe, an kaiya purba neggweburgi toidele, kannar siegala, israel nega, Paba soge.
Tehgi, Osé weyob nega owisosa, soide kude: Paba wegihid ba ner ga purba nuegan ukoe, ar opurgebi kumaloed, na akgu ittodih kudmaloe, Pab ebo igar mesisad imailegoe, peh mimmigangine. Wegihidba na nue wisi, we igar megisad imalegoe.
Al an sunnaguad nuggumogoe, tehgine epab sunnagad nuggumoe. Ar an sunnagad kumogoe, Pab tummab nuggi weyob saoe, eh kanguhed nikadbali, an neggwebur pentakoe.
Eye, Osé weyob owisosa: Napira weyob an soimoga, igi Moises ebo igar megisagi; ibiga an paba anga soisa: Peh mimmimar nue an sabogoe tegi kadegua.
Al Paba soisa: Moises wargwen an okuisguoe, tehegi kabapaled gi kanguhed sogwen an ukoe, ar nuedgi uilegoe narmakegala. Ar kuabin pogilego suli sunmakegala, tehegine Kuher tule sunmakerba kuosuli. Tehegine an narmakoe an konugine an igala, ar tule paid ga an urmakoe ga sunmakegala.
Tehgi tuletummad soisabali: Peh mimmigangi aidegoe, eparsogega kuoe, arbaed ga uilegoe, ibmar kusad narmakega kuoe, (Peh mimmigangine ibmar kusad) peh immigan gala, ar ega parsogega kuoe yohodsega peh mimmimargala.
Ar an pinsaed sogedba, kaiya purba eh narmakoe, igar nuegan abeleged bar amiegala, pe mimmimar se nonikoe; tehegi peh mimmimar ga, napagi sunmaisa yobi kuoe, an kuisi eh ulubgi pensulidi.
Tehegi napagi mai na sunmaidoe ekwenadgangala, enosmalad nugumalagala, eye, amba pirga tikasur nasa iniguale. Al we yobi kudoe kaiya purba pasur soilegoedgine na soidoe.
Eh ulubgi pensuid nikadba, an sogedba, kaiya purba soidoe ekwenadgangala, ar we peh mimmimala. Nue kege sunmaked an okannogohoe eh pensulidgine, yohoe gi pinsaegala, ehpabgan ebo an igar mesisadi.
An Machi Osé, ar ahadi, weyob an paba nega owisosa, pirga milibardogi.
Tehegine, peh tule kuage nuedi, we igar megisad ulale; ibigala, ar peh mimmimar kwen perguosuli, kaiya purba narmakar maid ittomaloe.
Ar emar abar gi kuisgunonikoe, tule wargwena kantikidi, ibmar pukidar nuegan imakoe, kaiya purbagine, ar oyobaloe ibmala, ar Pab ga arbaega na kuhe, kuage ulubgi pensulidba immar tailedesulid imakoe, tehegi Pabtummad ibiya nugi ibmar tummagan imakoe. Israel nega kannar silnonikoe, Ar ekwenadgan mimmimar tegi yobmoga.
Al emi Osé peh di tule kuage nuedi. Ar pede pibigua, Peh kwenad Nefi kaiya purba, peh ittoe, tehegi na pega ibmar soisad, peh taedba we ibi kuoe. Peh paba kaiya purba epinsaoe, emidi na pergusokali. Tehgin kadinye.

Ar emidi an Nefi, an paba neiy owisosadba na sunmakoe, we yob soisa, Osé selesgusa Ehipto sega.
Tehegi, wegihidba, eh napiraguadba nega owisosa mimmimar pela yoho nonimaloedgala; ar bur idshe owisolesa ibmar nue abelegedi, eh narmasbali. Tehegine anmar gi eh sunmaisa, al anmar mimmimar tanimar mogoedgi sunmasbali; Ar we narmailesa esnunmadaregedgine.
Al an paba, Osé gi sunmaged pergusgua, Lamán masmala, eh sisgan se godsa, ar ga soide: Wegi, pemar an masmala, an sisgana, ar an mashi sailagined emimmigana, an kaiya purba sunmakoed, pitigiba pemar ittosmalana tibeye.
Tehgi Paba, tule tummad soisa: Ar pemar an igar maidba nanamalale, we yargi nasgumaloe; ar pemar an igar maidba tasurmalale, an asabin parmel-led maloe.
An Masmala, an sisgan ye, tehgine, na kwen purgebisuli, yoho purba nuegan pemar ga na uke; tehegine an wisi igar nued maid na wismalale, bar nanamaloe, mel-legi intaimaloe.
Tehegi obal-lesmardibe, we gihidba igar nuegan na pemarga obehe, ar mer isguhed pemargi naguhegala, tehegine pemar pabgan nuggin kuoe.
Ar, tule tummad kuen pemar opurgo surmala, al pemar ga purba nuegan an uisad ulala; unnila wile pemar takoe tehegine, teyob sadegumaloe peh mimmimala.
Wegihidba an paba; Lamán mimmigan ga sunmasgua, Lemuel masmala, esisgan se kol-lesmarmoga.
Ar ga weyobi sunmailesa: Wegi pemar anmasmala, an sisgana, ar an Machi abargi ned mimmimala, pemar ga na purbanuegan obemosunna, Lamán mimmimarga soisa sunnaguadi; tehegine, mel-legi pela prguhegala, ar yohedse peh mimmimar, igar nuegan akingamogoe.
Tehegi, ar an paba eh marga sunmaked pergusgua, al Ismael mimmimar ga teyob sunmaidebali, eye pela eh negginmaladgala.
Al sunmaked pergusgua, Sam ga sunmaide, ar ga soide: Peh kuage nuedi, peh mimmimar, peh kwenad Nefi sunnaguad, peh ga yala uilemogoe; ar peh ba wagan yoho epinsalemogoe; pedi eh sunnaguad kumogoe, peh wagan, peh sunnaguad kumarmogoe, ar peh ga ibmar nuegan uilegoe, pehibagangine.
Ar pela neggweburga we yob na soisa, eh kuage pinsaedbali, tehegine Paba purba nued se ubo nonikidbali, an paba nue seredgudsunna, tehegi wegihidba purgisa, ar tíylesa.
Tehegine an paba purgisad sorbali, Lamán, Lemuel, ar Ismael mimmimar anse uludmala, tule tummad ga ibmar soisanbali.
Al ani, Nefi, an osunmaisasunna, eh kaiya purba bali; ar ibmar pukidar ba angar sunmaisa, an paba teyob sunmasmoga eh purgoed iduale; tehgi we kaiya purkidar sunmaisad an na narmaisa megisa, wegihidba immar kusmalad narmailesa.
Ar an sanpurba gi na narmaisa, tehgi esnunmadaregedgi pukidar narmailesa kaiya purba. Al ibigala an sanpurba werguhe kaiya purba narmakedgine, ar kuager na gi pinsae, tehgi na narmake an mimmimar oturtakegala, ar an mimmigan pentakegala.
Tehegihidba, an sanpurba na yeher ittoe tule tummad ibmarbali, a an kuage na pinsae, ibmmar taisadgine, ar ittoshadbali.
Tehginiguale tule tummad, wile tulemar take, ar eh ibiyobi ibmar tummagan imaisad oyoge; kuager na pinnsulidgi na kode: ¡Ibiyobi na tule wilegedi! Eye an kuage naipi ittosa, an san taed bali, an widsur taedba, an sanpurba nue wile ittoge.
An na taide isguhedgi na noedsuli, tehgi na basursunna pinsaed galege.
Tehegi na wergubiele, an kuage di nue wile ittoe, an isgudihidbali; tehginiguar na nue wisi toase koloe.
An Pabtummad an arsosa; an idudihi nanasoh nega tule sulidbali; tehegine timarba nue an sehsa.
An sabedba, purba nuegan anga ulubsega oubosa, an san purbegine.
An isdarmalad ibmar akgu ittoe imaisa, asabin tobedba owawan makuishi imaisa.
Wegihid ba, eh an ittosa, an kaiya purba se kodsagua, neiy ibgine, mutikidba an owisosa, ibiya abulusgua.
Ibgine eh se kodsadgi an okannosa nuedgine; Eye, ar an kaiya purba de nibneise ittolesa; tehegine anger mar aidesnonimala, an pentaisamala.
Tehgi an sangina, eh purba nued ba seled kusa, yar tummagan pirsega, ar an ibiya ibmar tummagan taisa. Eye ibiyobi tummagana tulemargala; tehegine an ga soisa mel-legi narmakoye.
Al eye ibmar tummagan taisa, eye Pab tule tummad wile tule mimmimar takedba, sabedbali, arbi. ¿Ibiga an kuage pohe, ar wile ittogedba nanadkusa, tehegine an san nol-lo ittosa, ar wile ittogedba, an kanguhed de pergúdsunna?
Ar ¿ibigar sunna an san ibmar isguhed ga na uke? Eye, ¿al ibiga isguhed an obelogoe, an kuage gi isguhed togele welidarad ani obelogoe an san purba nue pukid pinsae? ¿Ibiga istar malad ebo an urwe?
¡An san purba kuisguhe! Mel-legi isguhed an gi obine. ¡An kuage weherguhe! Mel-le tule istarmalad ga an san purba bar uke.
Mer bar urwe an istar malad ehbogua, an kantik ittoed obelogedi, pukib pinsaedbali.
¡An kuage werguhe! Tule tummad se na kole, ar soge; ¡Tule tummad, peh nuga otummoe ar tehgi kadeguoe! Eye, an san purba ulub gi werguhe, ¡An Pabtummad ar an pentakedi!
¿Pab tule tummad an pentakee? ¿Istar an taimalad gi peh anonoe? ¿Isguhed asabin, peh an okuisguoe?
¡Soho nega an ga eh yawak peh odue, ar an kuage wile ittoe, an purba isguhed mie! Paba mel-legi igar napiraguadgi an oturtake, peh igargan nuegan maidba nuenanadih saegala, tehegi peh igar mar sogedba ib imakegala.
¡Paba, peh igargan nuegan, inniggiguad ba an sehe! ¡Paba anga igar nutake, an istarmalad gi wakinnegala! ¡An asabin, igar nutake! An igarba mel-legi ib isgana urbe, unnila igargan isgana anga, peh obane, tehegine mer an igar idshoe, unnila an istar malad peh obane.
¡Tule tummadi, na peh ginbi nue pinsae. Ar tehgi sadegua! Tule argangi mer nue pinsaoe; an na wisi par mel-ledoe (ukab salegoe) tule wargwen na san ginbi pinsaele. Eye, par mel-ledoe tule na tukin pinsaele, ar san tukin bi pentakele.
Eye, an wisi, Pabtummad pentakoe, ese ibmar egisele. Eye, Paba anga ibmar ukoe, se nuedgi egisele. Tehegine an kaiya purba na pese koloe eye, na pese koloe, an Paba, eye an okannoedi igar inniggiguadbali. Wegihidba an kaiya purba palibali na pese koloe an okannoedi, a an Paba kadeguadi. Tehgin Kadin ye.

Ani, Nefi, wegihidba na Pab tule tummad se kodsha, an kwenadgan uludmalad ulale.
Wegihidba nue tummad uludmala an sega, tehgi soggudina an opurgebi kuarmar sunna.
Eye, angi sunmaidemala, soidemala: Anmar urba neiy sehedgi na pinsae, tehegi Eh ulala anmar tummad wilesmala; opurgemar sunna, mer eh kaiya purba gi pinsamalagala. Ar anmar abesuli, anmar tummadga kuhedi; al anmar eh kwenadgan tummagana, we neggwebur semaladi.
Al angi ulusmaladgi, an narmakosuli, unniguar an soge, an opurge bi kusmala.
Tehegi tule tummad anga soide, Nefi, nega tule sulidba, emargi peh wakinnege, tulemar peh ba nabimalad mala, peh noye.
Wegihidba, ar an Nefi, an mimmimar na sesa, al Zoram mimmimala, san an kwenad tummad ar emimmimala, Acob, tehgi Osé, an urbamala, an punmar, ar pela tulemar anbanabimaladi. Tehegine tulemar anba nadmala, unnila na pinsamala, Pabtummad anmar owisosa, ar igar oyosa, weba namarye; ar aulala, an ibmar soisad ittosmala.
Tehgi, tordo nega anmar sesmala, ar pela ibmar niymaladi, al ukub suidba ibagan úndar nanasmala. Tehegine ibagan úndar nanaedgi, nega sobsamar sunna.
Ar an neggwegur, we nega nuiy sabi kuarmala, Nefi ye, al teyob na nuga imasmala.
Tehegine tuemar anba pela armalad, we neggwebur nuiy imaisa Nefi ye.
Ar anmar kantikidba, nued pinsaedgi, ar Pab igar maidba nanadi kudmar sunna, pela ibmar bar imaidemar sunna, Moises igar tummad maidbali.
Tehgi tule tummad anmarba kudihi kude, ar na nue nasgudmar sunna, al sapi kuaimar tiydemala, sepi turba unnidiba nagude. Tehegine ibmar turgan mergude, molimala, ar ibmar turgan kaleguhen sur nikudmala.
Ani, Nefi, tehegine igarmar narmarkar maid na searbali, esnunmadaredgi igar maidi; tehegine ibmar tirbiled igar sehedi, tule tummad, an pab ga uisadi, gi ibmar narmakar maidi.
Tehegine na nasgudmar sunna, ar we yargi tula mergud sunna.
Ani, Nefi, tehegine na susa Labán esa, paigan palil-la sobegala, pukidar na sobsa sunna, mer Lamánitas Tulemar nugad, uluar sogele anmarsega, mer se kala kuhegala; al an nue wisi, emar istar an take, tehgi an mimmigan, ar an neggwebur nuggusadi, istar se nue tailed sunna.
Tehgi neggwebur na oturtaide neiy sobedgine, urgogi arbaed, ar escorogi ibmar soblegedi, esnungine, olo, mani, ar akuagi ibmar soblemalad, we ibmar ar pukidar nika.
Ani, Nefi, tehegine Pab neg isliguad sobsa, Solomón sobsad gi, ar eh ibmar nuegan nikusad sunnaguad sobsad gi, ar eh ibmar nuegan nikusad sunnaguad sobles suli, tehginiguar ahgi sahale soblesa; ar nue yeher taile soblesa.
Ani, Nefi, tehgihidba an neggwebur arbaerba na kude, ar na eargan gi arbadmala.
Ar ehmar (neggwebur) erey ga annonag gubi kuarmala. Tehgi, ani, Nefi erey suli abesana teheginiguar, ibmar na nued gi ga imaisa.
Wegihidba tule tummad ibmar soisad kusa an kwenadgangala, anga soisagua, yohoe ani, eh sailaga nugkuoye eh iduedga nugkuoye eh idued ga nugkuoye, emar oturtakega kuoye, tule tummad sogedbali, an opurgegi kusmalad iba gansega.
Tehegine tule tummad kaiya purba soisad imailesa: Ar emar peh ittosurmalale, Pab asabin parmel-led maloye. Tehegidba wemar peh asabin parmel-led mar ye.

Emi nabirdo, kwenadgana, an pemarga we ibmar absosad, nue wisgumalagala, pela Israel negginmalad bogua tule tummad igar mesisa.
Ar Eh udios marga soisa kebe nega saila únni, Energan nuegan kaiya purbagine, tehegi pirgamar sadegua, ar kadeguoe, Pab ittoed nega kannar sigisale, igar napiraguad kannar nonigged sega, Eh yarga uilesadse ambigunonimalar, tehegine napa nega ga uilesad se kannar nonimarbaloe.
We gihidba pemarga, weh ibmar na soge, an kwenadgan wergumalagala, ar pemar nono onaiala, ar yeher ittodihi kadegumaloe, tehegi Paba tule tummad pehmar mimmiganga igar nuegan ukoe tehgi soggis pemar wergumala.
Tehegihidba na nue wisi, pemar ibmar pukidar turtasmala, immar yoho kuomaloed na wisgusmala, tehegi an wisi, pemar nue wismala, anmar sana perguoe, ar purgoe; teheginiguar anmar san purba Pabtummad yoedse taimaloe.
Eye, an wisi, pemar wisi Eh na Erusalén gi sanar kuoe ar webar na noarmala, ar nue emar abargi kudihoe; tehegine tule tummad ibmar obinnied, tule sunnaguad na kumogoe, san nikumogoe, tehegine tule marga purgoe, ar tehgihile pela tulemar Ehba nagumaloe.
Tehegine, ar pela tulemar pentailesa purgedgine, eh wile anmar takedbali, tule tummad ibmar obinnisad (igar) mesisadi, ar kannar turguhed kanguhed abelebali, tehegine kannar turgumaloe, tule wargwen nosad ulale; Pab igar gi nosad ulale weyob ibmar kusa; ar tule nossoggudina, tule tummad eh asabin parmete.
Tehegihidba, tule wargwen ga wilegoe, barperguosuli, ar tegi sulile, we isguhed perguosuli. Ar kebe igar amilesgua, tulega uilesad bar perguosulina. Tehegi we sanaúngudkuoena, ar napa ga pennidoena, kwen bar kuisguo surmalana.
¡Ibi yobi Pabtummad ibmar wisi! Ar wegi, san bar kuisgusur sogele, anmar purba wiledoena anger wargwen Pabtummad asabin par mel-lesad, niaga kusad, mer kuisguhegala (ehsorda kuoena).
Tehgi anmar purba esunnaguad kusmogoena, ar anmar nia ga kusmarmogana, nia angermala, Pabtummad gi yokusmalana, ar pab kakkan saed ba nadmalana, Ehyob wilegedga kusmar mogana; Eye eh sunnaguad, anmar pabgan sailagined yamosadi, na anger nued yobi na imaimoga, tulemar mimmimar pinsaed kadihi, igar kalaguhensuli mesdi, tulemar kintaked igar, igar tugguarmaladi.
Ibiyobi, anmar Pabtummad tule sabe, igar nued mesisa anmargala, nia gi wagginegala; Eye, we ib tummad isgana, purged, sohonega, ar we soilege san purgedi, tehegi Purbaled purgedbali.
Al, anmar Pabtummad e-igar wisid ulala, anmar pentakoe, we purged, gi an sunmaisa pemargala, ar we wis siguas purgedi, al we úan nega.
Tehgi, purgedgi an sunmaisad, we purged purbaledi, etule purgarmalad purba na uimaloe; ar we purged purbaled, wede sohonega. Ar purged, tehegine sohonega etula purgarmalad na uimaloe; sohonega etulamar oturtaile pukuad na ukoe, uan nega etulamar wile pukuad na ukoe, tehegine sanmar, tulemar purba mala na kannar adomaloe wawargwengine; ar we kuoed Israel tule tummad ekanguhedbali.
¡Ibiyobi Anmar Pabtummad igar mesisa! Tehegine paidbali, Pab neiy pokidiggid, tulemar nuegan epurbamar ukoe, ar uan nega teyobmoga, kannar tulemar turguoe; (esan, epurba turguoe) tehegi tulemar pela bar perguo surmala, bar purgo surmala; ar sanpurba tuladga kumaloe, kuable ibmar wisgumaloe, we san nikad gi kuoe, ar napiraguad ba ibmar na wisgumaloe.
Tehegine napiraguad ba ibmar wisgumaloe, na ibmar imasmaladi (na tuggin taimaloe); ar tule nuegan, bur nugumaloe, eye, mor sibu yobi ekuage ulub nagusa, pela ibmar wisgumaloe napiraguadbali, ar eyeher ittogoe.
Ar pela tulemar we purgismalale, we kebe idu purgedi, al turgumaloe, bar purgo surmala, we yob ibmar kudoe Esucristo asabin na kuisgudabmaloe, napi bar igar bar amimalagala, tehegine igargan par amiledoe, Pabtummad igargan nuegan inniggiguadba, anmarga igar imaidoe.
Ar napiragua tule tummad tuladihi, ar Pab tule tummad soisa, al ekaiya purba kege perguhedi kege akkarguhe, tule nuegan tehgi kadeguoe, ar tule isgana, isgudihi na kadegumaloe; tehegine tule isgana ar nia, e-angermala; ar soho nega kadeguadse namalohe, ar emarga we nega imailesa; al tummad wile maloe, soho abargine, esnun tihi abargi kudihi kudgumaloe, esoho kege akgine ar etuggú sulidi (kege perguhe).
¡Ibiyob, anmar Pabtummad eigar innigiguadi! Tehegi, ar eh, kaiya purba soged na imake, ar ekaiya soisa, tehegine eigar na sunna imake.
Ar wegihidba, tule nuegan, Esucristo ba kudidihid, tulemar eh pengudsurmalad ulubgine, napneg isguhedgi opidsamalad, istar tailedi kusmala, wemar Pabtummad nibnega ga ukoe; emarga nibneg nagusa, kebe saila napa nagusgua, tehegine na wehergudih kadgumaloe.
¡Ibiyob, anmar Pabtummad, tule sabe, Israel tummad nuedi! Ar Esordamar pentake niagine, purged ar sohoneggi onoe, esnun kordiggid yagine, wiledi kadgua.
¡Ibiyob anmar Paba tule tummad nuedi! Eh pela ibmar wisi, ar Eh immar widsuli na kusuli.
Tehegine napneise tanigoe, tulemar pentakegala, ar ekaiya purba ittobimaladi; tehegi Eh de tulemar ba wile ittoe, Eye tulemar mimmimar bali, masherganbali, omegan ar mimmi purwiganbali, na wile ittoge, Adán gi tulemar tanimalad ular, pukib ittoe pinsae.
Ar wile ittoe, tulemar kannar turgumaloedgala, ibagan pergusoggalile, tule mar eh asabin igar pinoegala.
Al pela tulemarga na soge, isguhed mimala, ar Pab tihigi obmala enuggine, ar tule nued Israel gined kuage ulubgi pensulidgine, ar tehgi sulile, Pabtummad neise naosuli.
Ar isguhed misulile, emisgkuage ulubgi penele, Pab tihi gi obsurbalile, tehgi kudihi kuele, tummad oturtailegoe; Ar Pabtummad Israel gined weyob soisa.
Tehegine, eh, igar uisa; al piar igar tulemarga uiledsuli, oturtaileged sulile, wilegosurmala; Ar wileged sulile, Pabtummad Israel gined tue wile take, ega na purgoe, Eh purba kanguhed ba pentakoe.
Tehegi, kintaileged igar nued, innigiguad maid nutake, pela tulemar igar abingadsurmaladgala, we ibmar isguhed tummadgi pentailegoe, ar onolegoe, sohonega, purgedgine, tehegi niagine, soho esnunkordigid yagine, kege perguhedi; tehegine Pabtummad kannar onogoe, sanpurba ga usadi, ar ahadih Israel Pabtummad nuedi.
¡Ar tule dar nue wilegoe igar tummad ga uilesmaladi, Eye Pabtummad igar kanimaladi, ar anmar, eigargan gi nodidihid, ar we napneggi Pab igarba nanadisurmalad! Ar Ebisguhed tummad sehedi.
¡Ar igar isganagi yamoledidihid! ¡Ar san tummarba na sadidihid, tulemar widsur tamalad! Tehegine na immar turtaisale, ibmar wisir na sadimalad ar Pab kaiya purba akkusun ittomalad; Pab igar istartaimalad, na ibmar wisirba san sae; eimmar wisid na nono akkargudoe, tehegine ibmarga kwen kuosuli. Ar emar perguoe.
Ar nuedi na ibmar wisile Pabtummad igar sogedba nanadihile.
¡Ar tuledar wilemaloe, mani ibedi, we napnegginedi! Ar mani bali, tule wilemalad, istar take, tule naigana paleginne, ar ekuageg; mani kimbi pinsae, tehegi soggua mani epab ga imaidi, tehgi emani eba perguoe.
¡Ar tule dar wilemaloe ibmar ittobisurmalad! Pergumaloe.
¡Ar tule dar wilemaloe ibiya surmalad, ibmar taibisurmalad! Ar pergumarmogoe.
¡Ar tule dar wilemaloe, tule kuage ulubgi pukib ittosulile! Ar eisguhed na wisi, ar ibagan napidgi na tummad nunmag ittogoe.
Ar tule dar wilemaloe kakan saegala! Ar sohoneise parmel-ledo.
¡Ar tule dar wilegoe, tule kintaked ar ibmar wisidba emar kintake! Tehegine na purgoe.
¡Ar tule dar wilegoe, tule tikarba (ome, machered nikad) nodidihid! Ar wemar sohoneise parmel-ledmaloe.
¡Ar tule dar wilemaloe suar mimmise kordidihid! Tehegi na nia, yeher opinsoe.
Tehegine, ar ¡Tule dar wilemaloe isguhed ba purgemalad! Ar Pab tummad na taimaloe, tehgi eisguhed bar surguosuli.
¡An, kwenadgan na nue epinsamaloe, ibiyobi isguhed tummadi, Pabgi noedi, Ar noed tummad bali ib isgana ga na sanpurba ukedi, wisid ba ib isgana imakele! Nue gi pinsamala igar isgana imakele peh purgoe, tehegine igar nuegan purbarmalad ginbi peh mar pinsamalale, sanpurba kege perguhed bar amimaloe.
