¡An kwenadgana, an kaiya purba pemar ittomala! Tule tummad Israel gined gi nue epinsamala. Mer soimala pemar ga immar na soisad toidar wilub opidsa ittomala (keyer ittomala), ar tehegihile na igar napiraguad abanodolee. Ar na wisi pemarga ib soisamalad, Pab kaiya purba na parsoisa, ar igar nued napiraguad, igar isgana ebo nued suli, tehginguale tule nuegan tobsuli, ar igar napiraguad sabgudiguye.
Teheyobi kwenadgana, tule tummad nued pirigined pemar taimala. Epinsamala eigar innigiguad waraguagua mai, easabinni; tehegine etaked tule nued Israel ginedi; ar igar paid suli, unnilo yawak soggwenagua toilege; ar Eh kege tule yamoe, tehegine enuga Paba tule tummadye.
Ar ese koler egaoe; al tule ibmar wisid, tule ibmar turtasmalad, tehegine tule mani ibed, we kwen ibmarga ga kuosuli, ar wemar Ehde istaradi, ar we tulemar we ibmar na per misurmalale, kege Pab easabin okuiyge, ar tulemar ehasabin pinkeg kumalar kebe kuage ulubgine, tehgi sulile, eh pemarga yawak egaosuli.
Ar tule ibmar wisid, emargi otuggulegoe, tehegi kadegua; eye, we weherguhed ar tule nuegangadi.
¡An kwenadganye, an kaiya purba epinsamala! Wegi na mola pemar asabin an unge, ar omormormake, Pab tummadse na egise, an pentakedi, ar an taimai, eh pela ibmar maga takedi. Ar wisgumaloe ibagan napidgi, pela tulemarga napi eigarmar nutakoe, Pabtummad israel gined eigar mesisadba na taisa anmar sanpurbagi isguhed mioe, ar easabin isguhed suli na kuisgutapoe, ar pemar ablis an kwen naguosuli.
¡Al an kwenadgan ye, pemar nosmaladgi aibanmala! Igar isganaba kudidihid (aibanmala) peh intaimala, we tule isgana ise apole tulemar imaibie, ar Pab tummadse taimala, ar Eh anmar pentakedi.
Pahmar sanpurba kuagua kudihi na samala, weh iba nued tanikid iduale, igar innigiguad tailegoe tule nuegan gala; Eye ar ibagan pergusoggalile al mel-legi bar tobgumalagala, pemar tummad isgusmalad mer bar epinsamalagala, pinnasulid gi na kotemar sunnoe: ¡Tule nuedye, tule nuedi, peh igargan napiraguadi Paba tule tummad kantikidi! ¡Al an isgusad maga na take; na peh igar gi aibadsa; ar isgusad angadi, tehegi nia angi obensha, tehegine e-ba seheledi sunna.
An kwenadgan mala; tehegine ¿Ar napiraguadba pemar epinsamala we ib isgana? ¿Pemar sanpurba kege ittoge na saodibeye; ar pehmar ibmar nuegan saele? ¿Ar an napiraguadba pemar na taodibe, igar napira maidbali, ar pemar isguhed suli kumalo dibeye?
Al wegihidba, tule nueganale, pemar immar nuegan ginbi na sunmaisale; Ar pemar tegisulide, ar pemar oturtaged sailaga na kuhe, tehegi soggua, mer isgumalaga, pemar oturtaileged abelege.
Tehegine, an sanpurba, igar isgana ihistaradi, ar an kuage ittoe igar innigiguad napiraguadbali; al an Pabtummad nuga nued okannogoe (otummohoe).
Kwenadgan taimala, pela ukkumesdidihid, tihise taimala; tule mani sulid, peh tage, ar ibmar pake, al maskúnne; Eye tage ibmar kobbleged, ar moli nunis pake, mani suli, tehgi ekargeguhedsulidi.
Tehegine, mer ibmar abelesulid pake, ar pemar arbaed yeher peopinsao surmaladi. Nue an ittomala, tehgi nue epinsamala, pemarga na sunmaisadi; tule nued Israel ginedse taimala, welidar pemar imake, mel-le yokumala, ar isguhed suli kudihi kumala, tehegine sanpurba pela na wehergumala.
Kwenadgana, wegihidba nue epinsamala anmar Paba kaiya purba; palibali kormala ibgine, ar enug nued gi, ga nued ye soimala mutikidbali. Pemar, kuage gi na wehelidar ittomala.
Na ga soimala, tule tummad ibiyobi túngu anmar ebo igar mesisa, tehegine Paba ibiyob túngu, tulemar mimmimar ebo igar mesismoga; ar eh tunguhed ulale wile tulemar takedba anmarga igar mesisa (soisa), anmar mimmimar pela kuable perguosuli, ar osabolegoe; tehegine yohoedse tanimaloed, tule nuegan ambigumaloe Israel negginedga kumarmogoe.
Tehegine, an kwenadgan emi na, pemarga kuhena sunmaibiena; ar pane pemarga amba soibaloe an kaiya purba; tehgin kadinye.

Wegihidba ib pukidar kudoe an ibagan modele na ibmar imaidoe, wehmar abargine, ibiyob ibmar tummad imaidoe, napi epinsamalaga an na igar mesisa tulemar mimmimar ebogua, tehegine an kannar sunna argan na oyodoe an negguebur Israel negginmalad gala.
Teheginbali, Peh Nefi, epinsaegala ebo na igargan mesisadi, ar peh pab teyob moga, al yoho peh mimmimar an epinsamalagala; tehgi an kaiya purbagi peh mimmimar sunmaidi kudmaloe; al an kaiya purba pínnasuli kotoe napneg tirbir pela naidgine, an negguebur pentakegala, ar Israel nega;
Ar an kaiya purba pinnasur kotoe—tulemar Pab ba nasurmalad soidemaloe; ¡Pab Kaiya purba Sokuen! ¡Pab Kaiya purba maid sokuena! ar niymala, tehegine Pab Kaiya purba paid abelesuli.
Paba tule tummad we yob soge: Tulemar ib Kuen wisshurmala, Pab Kaiya purba sokuenaguad nikumaloed; tehegine udios mar tanimaloe, an negguebur kebe sailaki anbo igar mesisadi. ¿Tehegi ar igi nuedye na soimaloe udios margala, Pab Kaiya purba abingasmaladgine? Eye, ¿Pab sorda surmalad we ibu soimala? ¿Na epinsamala, negginsuli kudihi kusmalad, udios mar tummad wilesmala tehegine, ekuage ulubgi pensulid ba nanadidihid tule Pab sorda surmalad anse sedamaloe, pentakegala?
Al Pab sorda surmalad ¿Udiosmar pehmar epinsamala, an negguebur, kebe sailagi anbo igar mesisadi? Suli, ar pehmar istar taismala, tehegi nagi nue pinsarsurmala kannar ambikunonimaloedgine. Tehegine an kannar pela ibmar saoe pehgi nue pinsamalagala; ar ani tule tummadi, an negguebur na ieshuli.
Tule ibmar kuen wisshurmalad, pehmar we soge: Pab Kaiya purba sokuenagua. Anmar nika Pab Kaiya purba. ¿Pab Kaiya purba maid na pehmar niykumalo dibana Udiosmar sulina?
¿Ar wisshurmarsi guebur sokuenna sisuli? ¿Na wisshurmar si, ani tule tummadi, pehmar Paba, pela tulemar obinnisadi, ar an epinsoe tulemar temar balid tuppu nanaidi nibneg kaniggid, ar napa neg kaniggidi, tehegine an kaiya purba sesa tulemar mimmigan gala eye, napneggi pela gueburmar gala?
¿Ibiga angi sunmaimala, ar an kaiya purba, abingasmaladbali? ¿Ar wisshurmar si guebur soibo parsoimalad, an parsoimaloe, ani Pabtummadi, tehegine an epinsae, we guegur soibopela? Tehegine an sogoe kaiya purba we guebur soiboguadgala, eye, guebur soibo peladgala. Tehegine guebur soiboguad na otosmalale, ibmar napiraguad soisomalad, ebo na soimarbaloe.
Tehegine tulemarga oyogega, ani na emala, sahegi, emi, tehgi kadegua; ar an abegedba kaiya purba na soge. Ar na soimardibe, pato an kaiya purba sunmaisa, kege na bar sunmake; al amba yohoe na arbaed peloge, ar perguosuli, tule pergudele, tehegi sadeguoe.
Tehe soggua mel-legi na pinsamala an Kaiya purba mai sokuennagua, ar paid bar masuli, ar unnidba Kaiya purba niymarye; tehegine bali igarmar paigan bar narmakosurdeye na soilesuli.
Ar pela tulemarga na soge, tada nakuesiggid, tada arguaneisiggid, yarbalid, ar temar ginmalad gala, ibmar an soged napmaia; al we karda narmaimaloed yohoe na napi igar nudaimaloe we napneggala, enanasmaladba karda narmailesadi.
Tehegi Udios marga na sunmakoe, ar narmaimaloe; ar Nefitas mar ga na sunmakoe, ar wemar nar maimaloe; tehgi Israel nega ehablis soisokuen puimaladga na súnmakoe, tikasur ehmar na sesadi, ar narmaimarmogoe, tehegi napneggi guebur puimalad ga na sunmaibaloe tehegi wehmar narmaimaloe.
Wegi immar kudoe, ar Udios, Nefitas mar Kaiya purba abingamaloe, Nefitas mar, Udios Kaiya purba abingamaloe, tehegine, Nefitas mar, Udios mar, Israel ablismarga kusmalad ekaiya purba abingamarmogoe, Nefitas mar, Udios mar ekaiya purba.
Tehegi an negguebur, we di Israel nega, napneggine ambigudoe eyargine; ar an Kaiya purba ba attomogoe, sokuennaguadga kudoe. Tehegine pehmarga oyodoe, an kaiya purba gi uludmaloe, ar wedi Israel nega, al ani Pabtummadi, Abrahán ebo igar na mesisa, emimmigan an epinsadi kadegumaloe.

Ar emi, kuenadgan, ani, Nefi, ibmar yoho kuoed bar na sogosuli. Ar na bar narmakosuli, unni sigguas na narmakoe, napiraguad gi wisi ibmar kuoed; ar an kuenad Acob Kaiya purba sigguas na napi narmaibaloe.
Tehegi, ibmar unnidba an narmaisa, ar wissiguas napi pemarga na sogoe, Cristo igar maidi; tehegine, napiraguadba, nue na pemarga soimaloe, an ibmar owisogoedbali.
Tehegine an sanpurba yeher ittoe ibmar nueganbali; ar weyob Pabtule tummad, tule mimmimarga ibmar imake. Ar Pab tule tummad maga ittoe tule imake; Eh de tulemar Kaiya ba sunmake, maga eittoe imakegala.
Tehgi pidigiba epinsadihi kusmalana kadina, peh marga soisadi we nele tule tummad anga oyosa, Pab sibad mimmi tihigi obed igar imakoe, (Bautismo) we napneg isgued osulogoe.
Ar Pab sibad mimmi tule nuedi, tehginiguar, Pab tihi gi obed Bautismo na abemoga, igar napiraguad maid imakegala. ¿Tehegi eba, pur tumma we igar anmar abemala, ar anmar pur isgued niymala, Pab tihigi na obmaloe? (Bautisar samaloe)
Al emide kuenadgana, pemarse na egismala. ¿Igi Pab sibad mimmi igar napiraguad imaisa, sogedbali tihigi obed igar imaisa. (Bautisar imar sa)
¿Na wisshurmarsi, eh de tule nuedi? Teheginiguar, eh tule nued isliguadi, oyosa tulemar mimmigangala, we napneggine, Pab asabin wile ittoe, na napiraguad ba soge, Pab igar maidba nue nanae.
Tehegihidba, Pab tihigi obsagua, Purba nued, ehse aidenoniggi, nuhu sibu sunnaguadi.
Tehegi ar bur tumma, tulemar mimmimarga, igar inniggiguad oyosa, tehgi igar waraguagua, eyauaggi sunna na toimaloe, eh de anmarga na oyosa.
Tulemar mimmimarga, ar soisa: Anba taimala. Tehegine kuenadgana. ¿Esucristo ba sunna igar imaimaloe, unni Pab tummad igar maidba nanamalale?
Ar Paba soisa: Isgued mimala, isgued osulomala, ar tihigi obed igar imaimala, Bautisar an Machi sabed nuggine.
Ar EMachi Kaiya Kale na ittosa, anga soge: Al toa an nuggi, tihigi obed (Bautisar) igar imakele, Paba purba nued ga ukoe, an sunnaguadi; tehegine anba take, ar ibmar imake, an ibmar imake taisadi.
Tehegihidba kuenadgan ye, an wisi eMachi ba kuage ulubgi nagumalale, ar Pabtummad asabin mer pinsaed akkargumaloe, unnila napiraguad ba tamaloe, isgued na mimala, Pab ga na soimala Cristo nuibi sehedi samaloe, tihigi obed (Bautisar) igar maidbali eye, tuletummad, ar tule pentaked ba nagumala, tihigi obmala, (Bautisar imake) esogedbali, ar wegihi igar imakele, Purba nued abingamaloe; eye, Purba kantikinedgi oilebaloe, tehgi Purba nued ginbali; tehegine anger Kaiya sunmaked sunmaimogoe, tule nued Israel gined, Pabtummad nuga okannogoe.
An kuenadgana, bur pemarga na soimala, we yobi anga sunmaisadgine, eMachi Kaiya purba gine: Ar isgusmalad mismalad sorba, tihigi obed igar imaimasgua, Pab ga na soisamala, an igarmar maid ba nue nanamaloye; Purba kantikinedgi obsamala, ar Purpa nued abingasmala, tehegi kaiya kuabid ba sunmaisamala eye, angermar kaiya bali, ar we sorbali an obanoe, bur mer an wisgud sunna na kadina.
Ar Pab tummad kaiya purba kole an ittosa, we yob soisa: Eye, an mimmi sabed, kaiya purba soisad, ar napiraguad sunsogedi tule warguen ba igar imaidihile, yohoe pentailegoe.
Al emide, an kuenadgana, aulale na we an wisi tule warguen ba igar imaisulile, Pab Machi nanasadbali, Kuen pantailegosuli.
Tehegine, pemarga na soisad ibmar imaimala, anmar Pabtummad tule pentaked, an taisa eh immar imake, ar aulale anmarga oyosa, al wisgumalaga, pidi yauaggi na toimaloe. Ar we yauaggi toimaloed al isgued osulogedi, tihi gi obed (Bautisar) igar imakoe; tehegine pehmar isgusad misale, purba kantikidgi ubohe, ar Purba nued abingaoe.
Tehegine, we igar inniggiguad, karaguad ba toisamalale, ar we igar pemar sedoe sanpurba kege purgedsega; eye, we yauaggi pemar taisamalale; Pab tummad igar soimaidba nanasmalale, tehegi eMachi igar bali, ar purba nued abingasmardibe, ar we napiraguadgi Pabtummad, eMachi parsogedi, Eh igar mesisad imakegala, ar abingamaloe we igarba toimalale.
Ar emide, kuenadgana, we yauag inniggiguad, karaguadba toisad sorbali, na pemar se egisbie. ¿Pela na immar imaisamala? Wegi na pemarga soge: Suli; tehegine unni pato na warmaisamala, Cristo Kaiya purba bali, ulubgi pensulid kege surgue di, nue gi pinsaoe, peh pentailegoedgine, ar we tule kantikidi, pehmar pentakedi.
Tehegi, Cristo ba, kantiki nanamala, ar ibmar nuegan apidomala, ar Pabtummad sabgumala, ar pela tulemar sabgubaloe. Tehegi Cristo Kaiya purba ba nue kudidihile, tehgi we yob kadeguale, wegi Pabtummad soge: San purba kadeguad nikumaloe.
Emi kuenadgana, we igala; ar paid igar bar masuli, nuga surbali, nibneg urba, ar tulemar pentailego suli Pab neggine, tehegine wehedi Cristo igar maid sokuennagua, ar napiraguadi, Pabtummad igala, eMachi, epurba nuedi, we de Pabtummad kege perguedi. Tehgin Kadina.

Kuenadgana, emidina pemarga na wissoggoloena, kuager pemar na pinsamala, we igarba toisamalale, ibu imakoe. Ar wegihidba. ¿Ibigar sunna na kuager pinsamala?
¿Na epinsa surmar si, pemarga ibmar soisad, Purba nued abingasad sorbali, sunna anger Kaiya ba sunmaimaloe? ¿Ar igi pemar sunmakoe angermar Kaiya bali purba nued sulile?
Angermala, Purba nued ba sunmaimala; tehgi soggu, Cristo Kaiya purba parsoge. Tehegine aulale an pemarga soisa: Cristo Kaiya purba nue ittomala; Ar tehgi soggu Cristo Kaiya purba pemarga sogoe, pela ibmar imaimaloedgine.
Tehegine an pemarga we ibmar soisad sorba, ar akku ittosmala, ar pemar kege ebumarbali, tehgi soggua, igar nuedba naosurmala, ar unni nega sishidba yóggumaloe.
Tehegi, pemarga an kannar soibali, ar we igar nued ba toimalale, al purba nued abingamaloe, eh pemarga pela ibmar oyogoe, ba imakegala.
Tehgihidba, we Cristo igar oturtaimaidi, ar igar paid pemarga uilegosuli, al eh san nikuedse pemarga sogoe. Tehegine pemarga sanar igar oyosale, eh, pemarga sogoe, we kantikidba imaimaloye.
Emi, ani, Nefi, bar pemarga na sogo surmala; Purba an Kaiya purba Kaniki, ar unnila pukib na ittoe tulemar gala, ibmar akkusun ittomala isgudidihidbali, ibmar wissurmaladbali, tehgi tulemar kuager akku ibmar nanue ittomala, ar ibmar turtaibisurmala, igar tummagan akku ittobali, ar nue emarga uilesana, eye, pela Kaiya purba nuegana.
Kuenadgana Emisguagine, na pemar take, amba pinsa puimala kuagele; tehegine naibi na ittoe we ibmargi pemarga sunmakedgine. Ar purba nued, nue ittomardibe, tulemar oturtake Pab se koledgine, pemar wisugmala Pab se koled nue abelege; Al purba isgana tulemar oturtake mer Pabse korye, tehegi soggua Pabse koled abesuli.
Tehegine, pemarga na soge palibali. Pab se kormala, mer pemar se isgued tagegala; tule tummad ga immar kuen imakosurmala, idu Pab se korsurmalale, Cristo nuggine, ar eh pemar immar abingaega, tehegine pemar arbaed abingaega we yob igar samaloe, ar igar nuegan ga kuegala pemar san purbagine.

Tehgi, ani, Nefi, an negguebur ibmargi oturtaisad, pela narmaisa surgusa; na sunmaked yob, an kangued narmaked nue niysuli; ar tule warkuen Purba nued ba sunmakele, tulemar mimmar ekuagese purba nued ouboge.
Wegihidba tule pukidar, kuage isgana nika, ar Purba nued gi na, nue pinsasurmala. Tehegi soggu ibmar narmailesad, kege na abingamala, ar ib nuedga sasurmala.
Ar ani, Nefi na ibmar narmaisa, nue narmaise; tehegine immar bur nued na take, an neggueburga na abege. Tehegine palibali Pabse na egise igala, neg ibgine, tehegine an poedba nonoonaged kwalatig kue mutikidba, Ehmar ulale; ar ulubgi pensuli pabtummad se kole, al nue wisi Eh an ittogoe se koledi.
Ar na wisi, Pab tule tummad si koled abingaoe, an negguebur yeher opinsaegala, tehegine kaiya purba an narmaise wile ittogedgine, ehmarga igar kantikidgi kuoe; ar ga soilegoe igar nued imaiye; ega soilegoe epabgan igar taniggidi, ar Esús gi sunmake, ga soge eh pensulidgi pinsae, tehegine arba eigarba nue nanadih kue, wede, san purba kege perguedi.
Al isgued igarba pehedse kangue ga sunmake, igar napiraguad soimaidbali; tehegine tule kuen urwosurmala we kaiya narmailesadgine, ar tehegile nia purba do.
An yeher ittoe ibmar napiraguadbali; An wehergue Esús bali; ar an sanpurba pentaisa, sohoneggine.
An negguebur wile take, tehgi Cristo na ulubgi pensuli, tule sanpurba pukidara. Esucristo asabin kuisgudabmaloe isgued suli.
Udios mar na wile take—Udios ye an sogedi, ar we tulemar gi tanimaladga an soge.
Tulemar Pab sorda surmalad, an sabbali. Tehginiguar na nue abdaisuli ehmar nugumaladi, unni Cristo na abingamalar kebe, tehegine yauag karaguad ba na toimalar kebe, ar igar inniggiguadba nanamalar kebmala, esanpurba nudaymalagala, tehgi kudihi kudoe, ibagan napi wilubtaileged sega.
Emidi kuenadgan, ar pemar Udios mar moga, tehegine pela napa tirbir naidi, we kaiya purba ittomala, ar Cristo kuage ulubgi mer pengumala. Tehegine Cristo kuage ulubgi pensurmalale, we kaiya purba pensurmar baloe, ar we Cristo kadi, al anga eh uisa; tehegi pela tulemar oturtaimala, nued taedgine.
Tehegi Cristo kaiya purba sulir, na pemar soged ba ga igar amimala; tehegine ar, Cristo kantikidgi immar sogoe pemargala ibagan napidgine; al ekangued nikadba pemar ga immar sogoe; al easabin kuisgutabmaloe, ar taimaloe pemar, anmoga, tehegi kuisgumalo ede anga soisa we ibi narmake, an tule nued sur iniguar na imaisa.
Ar Pab se na egise, Cristo nuggine anmar pukidar, perguablesuli, pentailegosuli nibneggine, we iba tummadsega napid.
Tehegine, emide kuenadgana, pemar pela Israel negginmaladi, ar pemar pela. ¡Ar pela napa tirbir naidi! Pemarga na sunmage, igi tule warkuen napba gi mai nosayobi: Tehgimar sunnoe, we ibagan taniggoed se sunna.
Al pemar Pabtummad tule nued taedba nagubi surmalad, ar Udios Kaiya purba ittobi surmalad, tehgi an Kaiya purba ittobi surmalad, ar PabMachi Kaiya purba sunmakoed ittogo surmalad we gihidba na napi pemarga soge, ar we Kaiya purba bali, ibmar pemala, yohoed se ibagan pergudele na taimaloe.
Tehegine, napaba an nuga mese, pemarga yoho oyoledabboe, igar napi mesle soggalile, ah asabínni; ar we yob tule tummad anga igar uisa, tehegi soggu ba na iggar imake. Tehgin Kadinye.

Wegi ani, Enos an takena, an pab tule machered mued nanasa we nap neggine an wisi—eibmar wismalad gine an oturtaisa ekaiya purba gin bali, tehegine Pab tummad owisomaidbali al aha nuggine.
Al an pega soimaloe Pab tummadse, an tummad wilesad an wisi, na san nodihid gine amba yoho an nugued abingaed gine.
Peh taiye, an sappurba ibmar mainadi; an pab kaiya purba an ittodihi gusana. Weligualed, tehgi san keg perguedgine, tehegine Pab igargandi nue an kuage ulubgi oubostole.
Al andina nue pina soggar sunna; tehgi Pab asapin yokorgi an sigisa; Pab se pinnasulidgi, ar ise wilegale an kote an san ulubgine osedonai, ar amba an Korsih tehgi ne mutikude, tehgi nibneise owarmaisa an Kaiya purba.
Ar Pab Kaiya purba an se Kornoniggi, wei soisa: Enos, peh san nosmaladina peh pentailes ye, ar purba nuegandina pehga uiles ye.
Enos, al ani, Pab tummad dina keg kakan saed an wisye; tehgi soggua an nosmalad elilesa.
Ar an soide: Paba, ¿Wede igi imaisa sunna?
Al an abin imake: (abin imaisa): Peh Cristo pensulidgine, ahadi peh kuen taisasuli, ar kuen ittosulidi. Pirgaba nanaoe Eh owisogoe na san nikuoed idugale; (sanar kusale); teisoggua, peh take, peh Pab pensulid gine pentailesa.
Ar we Kaiya purbamar ittosgua, weggusadgine bina na nue soggarmosunna, an Kuenadgan Nefitamar nabir, Kunaid pin soggarmosunna; tehgi soggua, aha tulemargala. Pabsega san ulubse an kotsa.
Al wegi purbale an kalitto nagua, peh tai ye Pab Kaiya purbadi kannar anse kormoni barye, soggali: Peh Kuenadgan se atainaoe, peh taked ba na saoe, an igar maidba peh nanaoe. We yala emarga an uisd napnei nuedi, isgued ulale kuen an istar gin pinsaosuli teisoggua, Kuenadgan tainaoe, an pega soisad bali, al e na igar pidsismalale non nunmaked tummad gin tanimaloe (pukib pinsamaloe).
Ani, Enos, al Kaiya purba ittosad sorbali, keb an ulubgi pengued kege pergued nikudsunna Pab gine; tehgine, an Kuenadgan Lamanitamar isgudidihid ga Pab se ga an kosha, undar peheshegi ar kantikidgine.
Pab se an tummad egidsad sorbali, al an tummad arbasad gine. Paba anga soisa: Peh an pensulid gine immar pina soidihidi nabir peh amioe.
Ar wegihidba we pina nue bur soidihidi; an negguebur abakar isgudele, Nefita negguebur, al obelolealile ibaguengine, ar Lamanitamar surmalale, an negguebur e igargan taniggid Pab tummad di sabogoe, Nefita tulemala, (tehginbali e kangued ba dibe), al amba Pab igargan sedihile sunna ibaguengine, yohoedsega Lamanitamar idudihi gudoe, san pentaileged igargangine.
Al emisguagine anmar san kangued napiraguad bar kannargi kuen na ittosurmala, ulubgi pensulid nikadi. Ar sae ittoedgi kodsamala, (pirga irba) ibmar kumaid, sunna anmar tare yokudele, tehginbali, anmar pabgan eigargan (etaed) moga.
Teisoggua, an nue wisi Pba tummadina (pirga irba) immar kumaid sunna osabogoe, se an egisdihgua, Eh anga soisa: Peh Pab pensulidgi ibmar an se egisoe, Cristo nuggi peh abingaoe, al amimaloe.
An Pab pensulidgine; Pabse na egusa (pirga irba) ibmar kumaid anga osagogegala, al an boh igar mesisa Lamanitamar sunnadga uilegoe al eibagan mosale.
Al ani, Enos, Pab eigar mesisadba imakoed an wisi, teisoygua, andina wis pogilesa.
Ar Pab anga soide: Peh pabgan anse amba egidsa moga, Pab pensulidba amisgusa; al ulubgi pensulid nikad emala.
Enos, al an kusa, Nefi neggueburgi an karmaidihi kusa, neiy akkarkuoed idugale kowisodihi an kude; an ittosad, an taisadi, napiraguadgin an sunmaisa.
Napiraguad, al an peh ga sogoe, Nefi negguebur, Lamanitamar gi tummad alamaisana, kannar Pab epinsaegala napiraguadgine, ar pensulid gine. Tummad alamaisamalad kuen igargan anga kudsuli, na istar taimalad kei na iemala, al ishagua nanaharmala, ibturgan yobi kudihi kudmala, tule ursirmalad ar ablis (abee) eogedbi wisi (tuli kuage sunna surmalad) ib isganamar, ar ibmar yamo sobarmalad ePabga na imaidemala, ibmar aTtursahar kunmala, al sappurba neisuli kahamaididihi, urmor neggi mamai, ib tulamar euka mutub ga na sahmala, (yargangi) nasihkegala, sailagiamar per emialed bihi, ar kingi esahmaladi, esobmaladi, esnori al akande, weh tulemar pur mas maki kunmala; anmar obeloged par nasidmarbali.
Tehegine, Nefi tulemardina ibmar taydemala kude, immar kwaydina nuhe wesmala (amismala); ar moli mimmigan akuidmarbali, ib tulamar kalaguen suli, sipadmar, tehgine sapur sipadmala, molimar tule sehedi, teyobbali.
Tehegine anmar abargine ner tummagana pukidar kudihi kusa; ar akgusunna tulemar ibmar nue ittomala key ibmar iemala.
Ar pehedshe gi na sunmaisa, yohoedsega pila nohoed idugale ney owisodih nanahaoed kalemai ar kintailemai kuarmala; na purged gin pinsadi na kuali key san pergued gine, Pab tobe karmaidih kudmaloe—we ibmarbi an na pemarga soimala, ar kaiya purba nuegan pukidar mamabalidi na pargasa ukkiale mer obelolegegala. Aha tulemar gine sikuas wegi an na pemarga narmake.
Al an tula dihidgine, na nue taisa Nefitamar, ar Lamanitamar boh pila ononaidi.
Tehegine, ar andina selebakusa, al pirgamardina pato tulataled ilakuen kaka tulapaha kakambe kaka pake paka (179) kudsadgine, Erusalen gine an pab Lehi noalid akale.
Na taide, napa yapa an togedmosa; Pab tummad sogedba angi purba nuegan oubolesa, Pab igargi sunmakegala, tehgi, ney owisodihi nanaegala, ar Kaiya purba onasogegala (Pab kaiya purba onasogegala), Cristo napiraguad maidi, wegi andihid bali pur pule weliguale an imaisa.
Ar emisgua an Pab neise naoe Cristodina obunnoged anga ukoed an wisi, an ibagan pergued mosale (purged) weliguar an imakoe, key par purge kuoe, Eh asabin kuisgutapoe; al eh anga sogoe; anse peh dage, peh tuldar nuedi; an Pab neggine ney kuagua pehga sihi. Tegin ye.

Al tehegine Mosiah epab ga soisad ibamar imasgua, tehgi pela tulemar iyarginedse nakodsa onmakegala, Pab ittoed neisega, erey Benjamin sunmakoed ittomalagala.
Tehegine tulemar pukidar ambigmnonimala, kege ebislege; ar negguebur tula pukidargusa, tehgi sugguka guebur di tungude.
Ar eimmar, (sapiturba, ibtula). Kebed nued na sesmala, Pab ga kintakegala, Moises igar maid ba imakegala.
Sunna na Pabtummad ga nuedye soimalaga, Erusalen yargi selearmaladi, eistarmalad gi pentailesmala, tulemar nuegan innigiguad sailamar tula oturdaimalad ye nuy imailesa, tehgi tule nued erey ga nuy imailesad, Sarahemla yargi neiy pogid nasigsa, ar oturtailesa. pab igargan maidgine, al welidar ittodih samalagala, Pab tummad sab kudih nanamalagala, ar pela tulemar tegimoga.
Tehegine Pab ittoed neise nonimargua, urmor nega na sobdemala ah waligga, bar ebilis na sismala, tulemar wawarguen emimmaigan pulakua, ar wede eome, emasmala, sisgan, emimmigan mimmimar, esisgan mimmigan, ar mahi idued, al pibiguadsega, kuenadiguar, tanar tanar na ambigudmala.
Ar e urmor neimar na sobsamala, Pab ittoed ney tikarbali e yawag di ittoed nei sihid ba na sismala tehgi suma urmor neggi sihi na ittomaloe erey Benjamin ekaiya purba sunmakedi.
Tehegine tulemar pukidar sogguka erey Benjamin keg kuena na pela Tulemaroturtake, Pab ittoed nei ekas dibir maid yabali tegi soggu arsan. Suid sobsa, sunna negguebur ittogegala eh sunmakedi.
Ar wegihidba arsangi kuidsi enegguebur ga na sunmaidesunna; al pela tutemar nue na ittos surmala, tule pukidar pukuadbali, tehgi na igargan uidesunna, e sunmaisad narmakar saoye, ar tulemar tikasur puimaladga nue par soi malagala, ahamala esunmaisad nue abingasmarmoga.
We eh kaiya purba soisadi ar narmailesa: Kuenadganye, pela wegi pemar ambigunonimaladgine ar sunna maga ittomaloe emi an sunmakoedi. Wegine pemarse na kodsa karya purba pulegan ittogegarsuli. An sunmaisadgine, ar únni nue pemar uhwaya ittomala, nue ittomalagala, kuage kantikidgi maga ittogegala, Pab tummad igargan osabomaid turtakegala.
Wese pemar, an tobguega tanisurmala, mer pinasamarbaloe na an kuenadgana, ar andi sunna tule purgemoga.
Tehegine andi pemar sunnaguadmoga. San purba ueleged niymoga, pemar gi san purba sun isgumoga; tehginiguale we negguebur. An susa, ar an paba purba nued, anga uisa, Pab tummad. Argan nuggi nu-imailesa sailaga ar erey ga kuegala, we neggueburgine; tehegine ekan gued nikgadba an osabosa, ega arbaega kantikidbali, ar kangued, tule tummad anga uisadbali.
Pemarga na soge, we ibagangi, pemarga arbaega na kue, amba na pemarga arbadihi emi; pemar or bina an soisuli, mani, ibmar niymalad binale an soi surbali;
Na kuen pehmar esgaryagi medsasuli, kuren odurtaisa surbali, mer na kindai malad, ibmar attursaed, tikarba noed; ar Kuen irgana pemar oturtaisasuli, unni la Pab tummad igargan maid na pemar oturtaisa, eh anga igargan uisadba imaisa.
Tehegine an sunnad arbasmoga, an argangine, pemarga maiga kuegala, mer pemargi mani Kaegala, tehgi mel-le weyob pehedse igargan megegala, ar pela we ibmar na soisadi, pemar nue wismala.
Kuenadgan, pela kuable we immar imaisad na nug otummoegarsuli, kuen pemargi nasiggegar surbah; al pemarga we immar soge nue wisguegala, emi Pab tummad asabin kuage nuedgi we immar sogemargala.
Wedih An Sunnad na pehmarga soisasuli, pemarga maigarbi kusdeye, kuen nug otummoegar surbali, unni Pab tummad ga arbaegarbi na kusa.
Tehegine we na pemarga soge ibmar turtakegar mala; na wisgumalaga, kuenadganga arbamalale, anni Pabtummadga arbaega kumala.
Wehegihidba, pemar an nuggimaisa erey gala; al pemar erey ga an nuggimaisad, pemarga arbaega na kue ¿pehmar arba marmo sursi, na muchubmuchub pentaimalagala?
Tehegi, (ani) pemar erey ye an nuisasmala, we ibagangi pemarga arbasa, al teginiguale, Pabtummadga na arbasa, an nued ye na pemarga soge, ¡igi, erey nibneyginedga nued ye na soimaloe!
Pemarga sogekuenadgala, al pela nuedge soibimalale, nui otummoe, sanpurba kantikidgi imakoe, we Pabtummad pemar obinnisadi, pemar sabosa, pemar selidihi, peh marga wergued uisa, ar pemar pohgi kudihi imaisamala.
Pemarga na soge kebe sailagi pemar obinnismalad ga arbamala, ar panebane pemar sedihidi, pemarga purba uidihid tula dihi saegala, karmaidihidgi, pemar sogedba (taedba) saegala, tehgi amba pemar panebane pentaidihid. Pemarga na soge, san purba pela ulubgi na ga arbadimalale, amba tehginiguar pemar nue arbasurmala.
Tehegine wegihidba, eh unnila pemarse egise, eigargan maid nue sehemala; ar pemarga soisa, napneggi nargumagoe; ar eh kege (ibmar) okuae immar soisadi; tehegine ar eigargan nue sehedihile pemarga ibnuegan ukoe al nasgumaloe.
Ar kebe, Eh pehmar obinnisa, al. Sanpurba pemar ga uisa, pemar we ibmargi kanimala.
Soibo, eh, anmar abege eigargan soisad imaked, ar nue ba nanaele, abga-yala anmarga igargan nuegan obane; tehgine pemar pennusmala. Al amba ibmar gi kanimala; ar pemar tehgi kudihi kadegua; al tehgi. ¿Ibiga na san tummar imaibimala?
Tehegine egismala emisgua, ¿Ibiga pemar na tuggin soimala ibmala, warguengine? Pemarga na soge: Suli, al pemar kege soimala ar pemar amba napa; tehginiguale pemar napagi tanimala; ar wegihidba napa, etule obinnisad gadi.
Al anmo surmoga, pemar erey ye an nug imaisad, pemarba tule nued surmoga, al ani pemar sunnaguadmoga, napa na sobar moga. Ar pemar. An take na sered kumai, tehgi an san purged na tanimoga, nana napa gala San ukoe.
Tehegine, igi na pemarga soisa, pemarga arbasa, Pab asabin nuedgi (na) ga arbasa, emi pemar onmaisa, isgued sulidgine, pemar ablisgi kuen odurtailego suli, Pab asabin kuisgutabbile, igar napi bar medshogalile, anga ibmar uilesad imaisadgine.
Pemarga an soge, pemar nigan kodsa onmagegala, an mor pemar ablisgi nutakegala, emi na purged ibagan mosa, sunna na pohgidiy purgoe, tehegi an purba kege purged nabin nigguoe, nibneggi pulagua namakegala. Pabtummad nuga otummoegala.
Ar pemarga na soibali, pemar onmaisadgi, an pemarga ibmar sogegala, pemar saila oturtaked, ar erey ga na bar kuosuli.
Tehegine emi pela an abgan na wawanmay ittoe, unnila pemarga na sunmake; Pab tummad an pentakkuishi, ar anga soisa pemarga sunmakoye; tehgi anga soisa, pemarga emi ibmar sogegala, an Machi Mosiah, pemar erey, ar pemar tummadi.
Ar kuenadgan emi, nue nanamaloe, igi ibmar imaisedgi emisguadshega. Tehgi igi an igarba nanasadgi al an Pab igargan ba nanasgi, al an Pab igargan ba nanasmalayobi, nu na nasgusmala, pemar istarmalad kuen pemar akkalos suli, ar an mashi igargan Pabtummad igargan ba nue tamalale, we napagi nasgumaloye, wede eh pemarga sogoe, tehgi pemar istarmalad kuen pemar akkalogosuli.
Tehegi negguebur! Nue taimaloe mer urwemalaga, al purba isgana ba mel-legi nagumalagala, ar wede an Pab Mosiah sunmaisadi.
Ar weheghidba, igar mesisa, tule ukbsalegoe, we tule, we purba isganaba taidibe; tule wargwen ba nanaele al kudihile, eisguedgi purgoe, esanpurba na tummad Wilegoe; igar abingaoe, oturtaileged kadeguadi, al eibmar. Pabtummad igargi na nosale.
Pemar an soge tule warguen gid kuen we igar oturtarled suli kuen kudsuli, unnila mimmimar purwiganabi wissuli; ar isesogaledgi na wisgusmala, Pab tummad nibneggined ga ibmar na niymalad pela uimaloe, kadeguo, wedi; kuen oturtailed suli kudsuli, igargan kusmalad, maid, nergan, nega owisosad gi mai, anmar paba Lehi eibagan gi noalid aggala Erusalen gine.
Tehegine anmar pab pela ibmar soisad, emi ibasega; ar wegi Sunmaisamala, Pabtummad ga (soisadi) sunmaisad, tehgi soggu we igar inniggiguad, ar napiraguadi.
Ar emidi pemarga soge, kuenadgana, ibmar wiskusad aturtailesmaladgine, Pag igargi na nodmala, igar ga soilesad kuen imaisurmala, tehgi Pab purba nued gi pangude, ar mer pemargi isgued oubomala ulabgine, na tuggin pinsaked gi na sehegala, tehgi purba nued abingamaloe, nasgumaloe, ar sabolegoe.
Pemarga an soge, tule pinged suli Pabgi urwele; purba isganaba ibimakele, igar nued e-aisuli; tehgi soggu. Paba negga ukosuli, al Pabtummad neg isganagi kege mege.
Tehegine tule isgued misulile, isgued bi wisgudihile, ar Pab e-istarad purgoe, nibneggined igar ga oyolegoe, san purba kege purgemalad ataimaloe, maga na ittogoe Pab gi nosadi, Pab tummad asapin pingekuoe, na tuggin saoe wile ittogoe, tummad wilegoe, igi soho kuabunye kuisiyob kudoe, kege par akginne.
Ar pemarga na soge bar wile tailegosuli we tule; tehgi soggu tummad wilegoe, kadegua.
¡Pela kuable, pemala, sergana, sappingano, mimmimar, sunna nue an ittomaloe, ar basur sunna pemar ga ibmar sogoe, maga an ittomalagala—pemarga na soge (egise) nue epinsamaloe, tummad na isgusmala!
Tehegine wis pemar gasoibibali tule nuedi, ar welidar ittoe, we tule Pab tummad igargan sedihle. Ar wehedi ibmar nuegan ga uilegoe, we napgined, ar purbaled (nibneggined); tehegi ba kudiile we napneggine, Pab eneggine abingaoe, we nega welitarad kadeguadi ¡Al epinsamala, epinsamala, we ibmar napiraguadi! Tehgi Pabtummad na soisa.

Tehegine Kuenadgan kannar pemar se na korbali, nue ittomaloe pemar ga ibmar soibaloedi; al wegihidba nue pemarga soge immar tani maloedi.
Ar ibmar pemarga sogoed, Pab anger warguen anga oyosa. Tehgi anga soisa: Attake, ar attake, wegihidba an asabin kuisgunoniki.
Al anga soisa: attake ar ittoge ibmar pega na sogoedi; wegi, pega ibmar soidaniki, gi wergue we an pega sogoedi.
Tehegine Pabtummad peh ittosa se kodsadi, tule innikiguadi pe edi, ar an parmiali peh owisogegala, werguegala; peh negguebur ga saimogae, tehgi wemar wergumogoe.
Wegihidba ibagan taniki, patomuisgua, tule tummad Kantikid neiy kanikid, tehgi kadegua, ar kadeguadi, (sadegua) kege perguedi, nibneggi aidegoe, napneisega, tulemar mimmimar abargine; ar suba (isedgi) isliguadgi megoe napneggine, tulemar abargi immar tummad tailedisulid imakoe, uelemalad nutakoe, purgismalad otulogoe, mali pisgarmalad nutakoe, ibiya surmalad onikuoe, tule uaya yal-lirmalad maga itto saoe, tehgi tulemar ponimar kalaguen sur niymalad onutakoe.
Ar nia ononnogoe tulemar mimmigan ulubgi purba isgana niymalad ga onogoe.
Wegihidba, kuage (pinsaed) abpurdihi kudoe, san nunmag ittogoe, uku mesoe, ar pudar ittoged ittogoe, tule ba bur pule na wilegoe, purgosuli; al wegihidba eabe sangi ber milegoe, ar enegguebur isgusadga tummad wilegoe.
Al nugkuoe Esucristo, Pab tummad Machi, nibneg, napneg epaba, kebe sailagi pela ibmar obinnisadi; tehgi e-nana nugkuoe Mariá ye.
Wegihidba eneggueburse nonikoe al tulemar mimmimarse sunna pentaileged nonikoe, enuga kuage ulubgi pensulidgine; teginiguale pela we ibi imaisale, tule yobi gin pinsamaloe niy soidemaloe ulubgi nia sehdih, ar pibyomaloe tehgi nacrusgi pioimaloe.
Tehegine iba pahagi, tulemar purgar malad abargi turguoe; wegihidba napneg ga napi igargan mesega kuiguoe tehgihidba pela we ibi imakoe, igar nued napira maid imakegala, tulemar mimmigan abargine.
Tehgihidba ar e-ablis ariogoe we tulemar Pab igar gi nosmaladgala, Adan Pabgi nosadgine, purgismalad Pab ibmar wisguddurmaladga, al ibmar wisgus suli Pabgi nosmaladgala.
¡Tule dar wilemaloe, Pab igar wisi nosmalad! We tulemar kuen pentailego surmala, unnila ulubgi pensulidgi isgued mier kebe, Esucristo nuggine.
Tehegine Pab tule tummad energan nuegan parmiali pela tulemar mimmimar abargi we ibmar sogegala, Kwenadgangala, negguebur mar, pela kuabingala, weyobi tulemar pensurmalad ga Cristo nonikoe sunna isgumalad na mimaloe (nutakoe) tummad wergumaloe igi wemar abargi eh arbi yobi.
Peh wegi Pab tummad imaisa iniguale, e-negguebur na taisa nonotudusuli, tehgi igar sokuwen ga uisa, eye Moises igala.
Tehegi, ibmar tummagan kuen tailedisulid ga oyosa, ibmar galaguen suli oyosa e-tanikoed iduale; nergan tule nuegan sunmas marmoga etanikaedgine; Ar tehginiguale, ekuagemar na sergudmala, al maga kuen ittonsurmala. Moises igar abelesulidi, unnila anmar isgusmalad ga eablis milegoe.
Ar mimmi purwigana sunna isgusale, kuen pentailego suli; unnila pemarga na soimala, we tulemar nuegana; Adan yob nomalale, ar tanigoedgine, tehginiguhar Cristo (ablis) anmar isgued pentakohe.
Teheginbali, an soge nuiy paid uilegosuli, igar paid surbali, al tulemar mimmimar pentaileged abingaosurmala, igar paid bali, unnila Cristo nuga, tule Kantikidi.
Tehegine wegihidba eh igar bar amie (mese), eigar innikiguadi; ar mimmi pibi purgisale kuen yokuosuli; al tulemar wileged na tuggin abingaoe, esanpurbaga Pab asabin pingegkudsulile, tehgi mimmimar yob kuoe, ar sogele pensulid pentaileged nasa, tehgibali, ar wegi, nonibaloe, anmar isgued ular Cristo abe ariosa, tule tummad Kantikidi.
Ar tule napneggined Pab istaradi, tehgi Adan nosad akkale we yobi, kusa tehyobi Kadeguoe, unnila purba nuedba taile tehyob taed surgudoe, kebe tule nuedga na kudoe Cristo anmar ular tummad wilesad nuggine, mimmigana yobi taoe; tule nue taoe, tule pohgidiki, pasur ittogoe, sabed wisguoe, tule tummad sogedba taoe, ibmar eh egisele ga saoe igi mimmi epab ba tae yobi.
Tehegine, pemarga na soge, ibagandi nonikoe, pela nepa tirbir naid wisgumaloe tule tummad nuga, Kuenadgan, kuabin, tehgi neggueburmala.
Ar we ibagan nonikile wehegihidba tule warguengihid, asabin Kuisgusuti unnila mimmimarbi, Pabtummad asabin ibmar osulogosurmala, ar na isguhed mimalale, ulubgi pensulid nikadgine, Pabtummad, tule Kantikidi.
Ar we yobi peh negguebur oturtaisale, Pab tummad peh parmialidgi, tehgine bar soilegosuli ibmar wissurdeye, Pab ibiya nugine, ar unni Kaiya purba pega soilesayobi kudoe.
Tehegi emi an soisa, Pab tummad Kaiya purba parmileali yobi.
Ar weyob tule tummad soge: Kwal-lu kae yobi kudoe, soge napiraguadgine, we negguebur ga ibagangi napi igargan bar amiledoe, tehgi na wawarguen ga igargan soiledoe, enanasmalad bali, nued, ar igar isgana dobeye.
Isganale, igargan isganaga kudoe, tummad wiledoe, tummad oturtailegoe tule tummad asabin yokudoe, wiledoe, bar surguosuli, al na kuen kannar bar nonikosuli, tehgi esanpurba natuggin abingasa wileged, oturtaileged tummadi.
Tehgi soggu, Pabtummad istar ittoed ga uisa sunna, Pab igar napirá megisad bar osulogosuli, igi Adan na nosad bar osulos suli yobi sappi turba sabed kudsogua; ar bar wile tailegosuli tehgi kadegua.
Ar ewilegoed (oturtaileged) soho, esnun kordiggid kae yobi kudoe, kege bar akkinne, waha puburmaggeyobi kege pergue, tehyobi kudoe ewileged, Pab tule tummad anga we yob soisa. Tegin ye.

Tehegine erey Benhamin summaked obelosa Pabtummaad anger ga soisadi, tehgihidba tulemar pukidar pukuad ar attaidegua, ar wegihidba tulemar napagine mamai taide Pabtummad tobed na tegigúdmala.
Na tuggin gi pinsadmala, etulemar isgana marye, napa ukub ba bur yaiguad ye. Tehgi pela na pinnasudidgi koddemala. ¡Tule na wiledmarsunna, wile peh anmar take Cristo wilesad anmarga peh ayoge, na isgudidihid iemalagala, ar kuage ulubgi nugu mar sunnoe, Cristo ulubgi pensulidgine, Pabtummad Machi, nibneg, napneg ar pela kuable immar obinnisadi, ar napneise aidenonimokoe, tulemar mimmimar abargine.
Tehegi wegi na immar soisagua, Pab purba nued emar ulubgi ubosa, ar ibiyob. Welidar ittomala, eisgusmalad osulolesmargua, pinsaed nuegan gi nagunonimala, kuage iulubgi pensulid nikadbali Esucristo gine, ede ar nonikoe, erey Benhamin soisadbali.
Ar erey Benhamin kannar sunmaidebali, soide kude: An aimar, kuenadgana, kilumar, an negguebur, nue kannar an iTtomaloye, nue ittomala, ar maga ittoegala napi pemar ibmar na sogoe.
Al wegihid ba wisgusmala Pab tummad tule sabedi emidi maga ittosmala uilubgine, pemar (ga) ibmar ga, kuen ya kuosuli, pemar isgued ba nagusadgi eh bar pemar abedsuli.
Pemarga soge, ar Pabtummad sabgued. Wisgusmala, ekangued tule yob niysuli pinsaed ibe di, tule ittoagua taedi, tule immimar siki, tulemarga isgued nutakedi, eigar mesisa kebe saila napneg nagusgua, we igarba sunna pentailemaloe, tule Pab gi nued pinsaele, pinsaed nued ba igar seoe, tehgi ulubgi pnsulidgi ba kiuihkudoe, we soile napneggi kudihidgine—
We an sogi, tule pentaileged abingae, isgued nutakegala, kebe nega saila unni we igar megisa. Tulemargala, pela kuable, Adan Pabgi nosed akkale, mai, kuen megosurdibe napneg kuinmakedsega.
We igarba pentaileged taniki, ar pentaileged paid masuli, we sunmailesadi, igargan paigan masurbali, tulemar pentailegedi, unnila we sunmailesadi.
Pabtummad kuage ulubgi mer pengue: gi peh pinsae, pela ibmar obinnisadi, nibneggined, napneggined, ibmar wisidi, kantikid nikadi. Nibneggined, ar napneggined, wisgumala tule na pela Pab ibmar widsuli.
Tehegine wisgumala sunna nugumaloe isgusmaladgine, iemala, Pab asabin pukib pinsamala, kuage ulubgi napiraguadgi egismala, eanmar isgusmalad iegohe; Ar pela gin ibmar pen surmalale, we peh imaimala.
Ar kannar pemarga soibali, idu soisadgi, al Pabtummad ekangued pemar wisgusa; wisgusmarbali esabedi, esabed anmar isyusadi, tehgi pemar sanpurba yeher ittoge, tehginiguale nue epinsamala, igar nuegan bi samala, epinsadi samaloe Pab tummad tule tummadi, pemar di Pab asabin kuen immarga Kuosurmala, tehgi eh anmar ibmar apiddoe, tule mimmimar widsur tamalad, ehasabin isgued mimale kuage ulubogine, na pukib pinsamala, tule tummad se panebane kole enuggine, kuage ulub pensuludgi eigar nue sehe, we tnaikidmosa, anger kaiya gi owisolesa.
Wegihidba pemarga na soge we yobi imakele, yeher ittodi kudoe, Pabtumanad pemar taidemaloe, pemarga soge, tehgi isgued iemaloe, wisgumai na kudmaloe, etule tummadi, pemar obinnisadi, wisgumarbaloe, tule innikigudi napiraguadi.
Al tule paigan kuen na bar oakkalogo surmala, unnila pogi karmaidikudma loe, tegi weyob wawarguen kudih na kudoe.
Mel-legi mimmimar ukkumesdih samala, mor yoed suli, Pabtummad igar maid mer pisgemala, mel-legi na urwed samarbaloe, ar niadi isgued esaila, purba isgana, anmar pabgan gi sunmaimaladi, ar ede pat igar isgana istaradi.
Unni igar inniki maid oturtaimala, nued taed; muchubmuchub sabgued na oturtaimala, tehgi muchubmuchub arkamarbaloe.
Tehegine pemar na pentaimarbali ibmar abedidihidgine; ibmar niymalad kuenadgan surmaladga wis uimogae; mellegi kuenadgan wilegedga samaloe, mer oban marbaloe.
Wis na soidemaloedibe: tule na tukin wileged senoniggi; tehgi soggu an argan ga ayogosuli, kuen mas kul-leged gar an ukosuli, kaen anmarmas kunno surbali, we yob wiledoe, eturtailegoe (wileged) napiraguadi.
¡Tule dar na wiledoe! an soge tule warguen weyob ib imakelo, isgued mied nue abegoe; tehgi na isgued osulogoe, we imaisadi, tehgi na. Weyob imaisulide na yokuoe, nibnega kuen ga uilegosuli.
Ar wegi ¿Na pela anmar wilemaladi? ¿Tule warguen ba na kudihmarsursi, eye, Pabtummad ibmar nuegan pela niymala, mas kul-leged, mola do, madu, tehgi, pela innmar nuegan niymaladih?
Tehegine wehegihidba, emisgua se kodsamala enuggine, isgued elimalagala ¿Ar eh pinsa sunna egidsa si? Suli; Eh pela purba nued uisa pemar ga kuage ulubgi oubosa yeher ittoedgine, al pemar kuabín pargasa mer bar nue immar piegala, pemar tummad wergusmala.
Emidi, Paba pemar obinnisa, pemar sanpurba gi seledihmala, tehgi immar per niymalad, pemar ga ibi uke, ibmar nuegan uke, ulubgi pensulid gi se egismala, gi nue pinsamala ibmar abin gamaloedgine, ¡igi pemar ibmar niymalad, na tulemar paiganga uimogoe!
Ar pemar se tule ibmar egisele, gi pemar mer sunmaimaloe, mel-legi igar oturtaileged abingaegala gi akkar sunmaimalale na tukin na oturtaimaloe yohoedsega wegi immar nal-le gusadbali, ar we ibmar anmar kadsuli, al Pabtummadgadi, anmar sanpurba ekadbali, tehgi We ibi anmargad suli, al isgued kuen iebi surmarbali.
Pemar ga soge: ¡tule dar wilemaloe ar eimmar nikad ba purge mogoe! We ibmar pemar ga na soge, mani niymalad unnila napnegginedi.
Teheginbali pemar soibali mani surmalad, pemar ibmar surmalad, pane immar abelegoed nikumlaoe, pela na pemarga soge, wilemalad obanmalad, ar wede ibmar sulidi, pemar unnila kuager pinsamala, soimaloe: na pega kege ibmar uke, al an nikana na ukoena.
Ar unnila kuager na tegi pinsamalale, kuen pegi ibmar naguosuli: tehgi sulile, pehmar gi noe; Al pemar oturtailegoe innikiguadgine, ibmar na abemala nikus surmaladi.
Emidi, we ibmar sabed ba na pehmar ga sunmaisa, we soilege, we sabgued nuo sehe, igar isgana obanmala, Pab asakin isgued suli kudih saegala pemar immar niymalad wilemalaga uimala, weyoki uke, ukku mesdimalad ga mas uke, mas surmaladga ukoe, uele malad takoe, nue, nutakegala, igi purbar malad ar napneggined ibmar abemaladbali.
Ar nue takoe ibmar imakoedi, nueidgi sabaloe; Al wilub opidsa se egisleyosuli ekanguedba na saegala. Tehgi nue na pinsamar sunnoe, tehgir weyob ib nued abinga maloe; tehgi suggu nuedgi ibmar samaloe.
Nue epinsamaloe, ehmar abargi peh ney tikar barmalad pese ibi egisele gar ukoe esoisadbah; tehgi, Pab igargi nohohe, kuenadgan pegi nomalo dibeye wegine.
Napi pemarga na soge; pela kuable we ibi pemarga na keg soge, we noed igar nuedgine; ar pukidar mai wehedi, tehgi soggua kuena keg na pemarga soimala.
Unnila sunna pemarga na soimalo, nue na taimalo ye, pemar pinsaed, sunmaked tehgi taedi, Pab igar nue taisurmalale, ulubgi pensulidgi nue sehsulile, we ittosmalad pemar uwagine, tule tummad, peh ibagan perguedse wegine na pergumaloe, tehgi emi! Tule nue epinsamaloe mel-legi purgegala.

Tehegi ibmar weyob kudsunna, erey Benahamin we yob neggueburga sunmasad pergusgua, tulemar parmisa, wisguegala eh immar soisad maga ittosmar dibeye.
Ar pela etulamar soidemala, Eye anmar pela maga ittosmala we ibi anmar ga soilesadi; al napiraguadi, inniggiguad bali, Pab tummad epurba nued anmar gi oubosa, anmar pinsamalad na kuaisamala, bar igar isgued imaibi surmala, unnila igargan nuegan imaimaloe tehgi kadegumaloe.
Tehegine amba anmar maga Pab tummad wile anmar taked ba, al purba nued ibmar soisadba, anmar nue wisgumaloe ibmar tanikoedi; tehgi, al nue abelegele. Sunna immar pela kuable par soimar mogoe.
Erey anmar ga immar soisadi, ar kuage ulubgi pengudsupmaladgine, ibmar pukidar wisgusmala, ibiyobi welidar ittosmala we immar bali.
Ar anmar, Pab tummad ebo igar mesmala, esogedba nanamalagala, tehegi eigar sogedba tamalagala, we napnegi kudihidgine, Eh mer anmar aturtakegala yohodsega, igi anger anmar ga soisayobi, al Pabtummad yohodse anmar se urwegala.
Tehegine Erey Benhamin weyob abesa, ehmar weyok igar saegala; teheginbali pemarga na soge; an abesa, weh kaiya purba pemar soisadi; Ar we ibmar mesismalad, igar innigiguadi.
Emidi pemar ebo igar mesisad ba nugimalemaloe, Cristo eh mimmiganye, eh mimmimala; emi eh purba nued sunsoged ubosadgi nuggusmala, imasmala, epunamala, tehe gi soisamala na kuage ulubgi kuaisamala, ulubgi enug pensulidgine, tehgi eba kualulesa, ar emimmigan ye nuggunomisunna.
Tehegine wehe nuiba pentailemaloe, al paid nuiba kuen pentailego surmala. Nuiy paid suli anmar pentakedi; tehgi soggu. Piddigidba pemar Cristo eh nuga abin gasmalana gadin ye, pela pemar Pab ebo igar mesis maladgine, eigarba nue nanamaloye, pemar san perguedsega.
Ar weyob kudoe, argan nued siki kuisguoe Pabtummad waligga, al na nuiy wisguoe; tehgi Cristo enuga seoe.
Tehegine we yob kudoe Cristo enuiy ga abinga surmalale, ar nuiy paid abingamaloe, al Pab tummad argan sabbiled siggi kuisgumaloe.
Al pemar nue epinsamar baloe, we nuga pemarga na soisa, ukoye, ar kuen osurguosuli, tehgi sokua, nue na taimaloe, mer isgumaloe we nuga mel-legi elimalagala kuagegine.
An pemarga soge: Nue epinsamloe, we nuga kuage gi narmakar nue sehmaloe, mel-legi Pab tummad argan sapiledsig kwisguhegula, ar unnila maga ittogegala, tehgi eh Kaiya purba maga ittomaloe pehmar se Kol-lealile, ar eh nugaguar pehmar se Kol-lemaloe de.
Ar ¿Igi wisgumaloe ah tule, etummad ba arba ibmar imaisasulile, al ega tule paidga kudoe, tehegi ekuage pinsad ba nue pinsanasulile?
Teheginbali ¿Tule warguen, eneg tikarbalid, ibe moli susale, ar osaboe? An soge wegi suli; almasgi okudsasurbalile, unnila na onosale. Pehmarga na soimala, weyob pehmar kudele enuga widsurmalale, pehmarse Kol-lealile.
Tehegine pehmar pidigibali, kege annire, siggurmake. Kusmar sunnana gadina, ar tehgi sadeguha, igargan nuegan bi imarsamalana Kadina, Cristo, Paba tule tummad sunna suga nasikohe ekad ga sahegala, nikneise sunna ba namaloe, tehgi sunna san pentailemaloe, san kege kuinmakedi, eh immar wisidba, Kanguhed, igar napiraguad innigiguadi, ar wile anmar takedi, we immar pela obinnisadi, napneggined, nib neggined, ar we Pab Tummadi. Tehgin Kadinye.

Tehegine weyob ibmar kude, abinadi summaisad pergusgua, erey, nerganga soide, pemar sedye, ar we tule pemar iploye.
Ar wemar tulemar abargi, tule warguen kwismoga, enuga Alma ye, Nefi ewagua moga. Tehegi ede sapinguagua, al Abinadi ibmar soisad ittosa, tehgi maga ittosa emar isgudidihidigi sunmaisadi al Abinadi de wisgusa, al eh na parsoisa emar isgududihidi; Tehegine eh de Abinadi napinsaidi kuali erey ebo na sunmade mel-legi Abinadi se urwegala unnula nuedgi parmidegala.
Tehigi, erey bur ulude, etulemarga soide, Alma ononamarye, emar abargi kuidsidgine, al ega maiga tulemar kumalad ga saide, paleginmar ye opurgegala.
A de aha tulemar ekidsa, ar tukusa kuen amisurguamala, tehgine ibagan undar tukuedgi na Kus moga, Abinadi kaiya purba soisadi.
Tehegine erey esordamar ga soide, pemar Abinadi, gamalagarye; ar etishamala esgar yaqi medemala.
Ar iba paha gi nergan igar ittosmaladgine, kannar erey se kodsa, eh asabin sedagegala.
Tehegine soidemala; Abinadi, we ibmar pegine anmar nasigmala, tehgi soggua peh purgoe.
Ibigala ar peh na soisa, Pab tummad tule mimmimar abargi aidego ye, ar dulale peh kindailegoe; peh osuloge we ibmar soisadi, tehgi bar peh purgo suli; idsagua Sunmaisa, an neggueburgine.
Tehgine Abinadi abinnimade; pehmar soisa. We kaiyah purba soisad neggueburga ar napiraguadide ye; ar pemar wisguegala napiraguadi, pemar argangi an Kalesa.
Eye, ar an wilegoe purgedsega, tehginiguale we ibmar an osulogo suli an soisadi; al we ibmar yohoed pemargi sunmailegoe. Tehegine an oburgemaloed, we tule nued eh ablis pemar mimaloe al yohoedse pemargi we ibmar nagudih kudoe.
Tehegine erey noe esigged naga kannar gualin, ar we Kaiya purba soilesad nue tobgude; eye, Pab se yohoedse wilegoed gi na pinsade, we Kaiya purba soilesad gine.
We gihidba nergan pinnasulid soidemola Abinadigala, tehegine egi ibmar nasigdemala, soidemala, erey gi idsagua summaidi ye. Tehgi erey ar se uludsunna, ar uide sunna oburgegala.
Tehegine edinnar sesmala; ar sohogi esan ogunmaisamala, eye tehgi oburgismala.
Ar sohogi ehsan Kunmaidegua, ehmarga soide:
We gihidba, igi pemar an imaisagi, we yobi peh tulamar yoho tanimalaed Wilemarmogoe, tummad oturtailemarmogoe sohogine; tehegine we yob kumaloed ar Pab tummad pensurmalad bali emar pentailemaloedbali.
Tehegine emar isgudidihmaladba, tummad wilemaloe, ponigan tummad abgamaloe.
Eye, ar pia nad sogelo tummad oturtailemaloe, al istar tailedi kudmaloe pia nadsogele, igi ibmar turgan tanar kudihi yobi ibtula ursulid se palegil-ledih kudmaloe.
Yohoedse, pemar galemaloe peh istarmaladsega; tehgi oturtailemaloe, an wilenaiyobi, sohogi tummad naipi ittomaloe, purgemaloe.
We yob Pabtummad abinsae, tulemar Pba negguebur ittobiele. ¡Paba an sanpurba peh abingae!
Ar Abinadi weyob ibmar soisagua purgisa soho gi kúnmakar purgisa; eye opurgilesa Pab tummad pensulid bali, al igar na mesisa napiraguadgine, eh Kaiya purba soisad ba na purgisa.

Tehegidba Alma, weh de erey Noe sordana gi waggidsa, eh isgudihid misa, tugguar neggueburgi toisa, Abinadi Sunmaisad, na odurdakar mosunna.
Eye, na soide kude ibmar kuoedi, tehgi soidebali tulemar purgismalad kannar turgumarbaloye, negguebur pentailegoedi we ibmar kuoeye Cristo kanguedba, wilegoed, ar purgoedbali tehgi kannar turgoe, al nibneyse naggoye.
Tehegi ekaiya purba oturtaisa tulemar ittobimaladbali. Ar tugguar odurtaimay kuali, mel-legi erey wisguegala. Tule pukidar ekaiya purba pengúd surmala.
Ar tulemar ulubgi pensulidgi abingasale, naddamala nega nuggua Mormon ye, we nuga erey warguen ba nuy imailesa we nega, tehgi we napnega guebur kuadilenaidgi nay, ar eniigan mosa ibmar Turgan ursirgan pukidar ainied mosa.
Tehegi Mormon yargi tihiwar nued maiy, aha walig Alma tuggunadtae, sappur tikar ba naidgise mer erey bar amiegala ibgine.
Wegihidba tulemar nabir ittosmalale, aha neise naddamala, eh kaiya purba ittoegala.
Tehegine ibagan pehedse nadedgine sappur Mormon ye nugadgine tulemar nuegan pukwadgine, Alma kaiya purba ittomalagala. Eye tulemar kuage gi pensurmalad pukidar pukua kuarmala ekaiya purba ittoegala. Ar odurtaisa, gar sunmaisabali nuguedgine, pendaileged, kuage ulubgi Cristo pensulidgi odurtaisabali.
Wegihidba ede soide: Wegi Mormon tihwar may (ar weyob niuysalesa); Tehegine Pab Tummad ba nagubimalale, eneggueburga nugguohe (esorda ga na kuoe) ar mushubmushub pentaimala.
Eye, ar pemar kuagua kudihi samala, podidihmaladga pomarmoga; eye al wile taimaloe, wiledidihidi, tehgi Pab Parsogega kumala, tehgi sodegua, pianad sogele, na purged sega, Pab Tummad pemar pentakegala, (idue) abga yar kannar turguega kuoe san purba kege purged abingaoe.
Pemar kuage ulubgi, weyob na pemar ittomalale. ¿Ibu pemarga sogo sunna, Bautisaz mer slaal mer Pab tihigi obmarye, Cristo nuggine, we ibmar napiraguadba sogegala, eh asabin sogegala, ebo igar mesye, ega arbaega na kuma sunna, tehgi ehigargan maidba nue nnaegala, eh sunna purba nued pemarga ukoe?
Tehegine negguebur (tulamar) weyob Kaiya purba ittosmargua, Argan ogóddemala, yeher ittosmala, ar pinnasulidgi soidemala, we ibmar anmar abemala.
Ar, tehegine Alma, Helam inse (Bautisar imoisa) ar pinnasulidgi kotte. ¡Tule tummad pirrigined ye, peh purba nued pirrigined ouboye pega na arbaed ga kuedgine, kuage nued gi we igar imakegala.
Tehegine weyob, Kaiya purba soisagua, Pab purba nued eh gi ubosa, ar soisa: Helam ye, Pba tummad anga uisad ba tihigi, an peh aiya, napiraguadgi sogegala, tehgi ebo igar mesisa gar arbaega kuye, purgedsega; ar Pab purba nued Paba pegi ouboye; tehgi Cristo peh pentakoe, pehga ukoe sanpurba kege perguedi, ar ede kebe napneg nasisgua we igar mesisa.
Ar Alma weyob ibmar soisad sorbali, Alma ar Helam ebo tihigi taisamala tehgi kannar nosmala tihigi toisogua, welidar ittosmala, ar Purba nued, gi ubononiggi.
Tehegine Alma tulemar baigan tihigi oisabali, kannar gi emar tihigi odosmoga, kebe saila imaisa yobi unnila tule paigan bi tihigi odosa, unnila ehde tihi abargi wisgusa.
Ar weyob pela tulemar Pab tihigi obsamala, Mormon yargine; ar tulataled ila pake kaka pake tulemar kue Pab tihigi obsamala, eye Pab tihigi obsamala, (Bautisar imaisamala) Mormon tihiwargine Pab tummad purba nued abingasmala.
Tehegine Pab ittoged neiye (sordaye) nuiy imalesa, ar Cristo ittoged nega aibagaingine nuggusa, tehgi tule Pab Kanguedba, Pab tihigi obsale esordaga Kumai Kude.
Ar Alma, Pab purba Kangued nikad ba nergan igargan uide kude, nergan nuiy imaide; tulemar tulataled ila pohgi ner warkuen nuiy sasa, Pab Kaiya purba par sogegala tehgi Pab igargan maid odurtakega se Kollesa.
Tehegine soide mel-legi igar paid odurtagoye, unnila eh igargan odurtaisad barbi, al Nergan tummagan ibmar nuegan odurtaisad, unni odurtaimarmoga.
Eye, gar soilesa mer igar baid odurtakoye, unnila isgusar, igarnued ginbi odurtakoye, tehegi pab Tummad, Kuge ulubgi pensulidgine, eh negguebur pendaisadi.
Tehegine soidebali, mer urwemaloye tulemar baigan eboye, unnila nue nanamaloye, kuagegi pensulid nikumaloye. Ar Pab tihigin bi obmaloye, kuage ulubgi nue na sabgumaloye muchubmushupi.
Ar weyob gar soilesa; Pab Kaiya purba parsogega kumar sunye. Tehgi weyob na tamalad kuaimardibe, Pab Tummad mimmiganga nuggusmala.
Tehegine gar soilesbali Pab iba nue takoye, ar nue gi pinsabaloye, Pab ga nued ye Panebane sogoe.
Al soidebali nergan ga yargan uilesmaladgala, na tuggin eh argangi arbamarbaloye, na nue semar babloye.
Ar ittoged gi ibakuen nasigsa onmaggegala, negguebur odurtakegala, Pabse kolegala, tehegine abeleged ba onmaididihi na kumaloe.
Tehgi negguebur nergan kuen pentakosuli; unnila eh arbaed ba, Pab ga ibmar ukoe, Purba nued ba kanguegala, Pab tummad wisgumay kuegala, weyobi Kangued ba odurtakegala ar Pabga igar uisad ba odurtakoe.
Ar Alma soidebala, Pba sordamar eh ibmar niymalad Pabga uimalo ye, ibmar pukitar nikale, merba uko ye, wilubba nikale isesahale na ukoye, tehgi tule ibmar sulile gar ibmar uilego ye.
Al weyob na ukoe ibmar nuegan nikale, eh ittolegedba na uimaloe, Pab tummad gi kuage nued naidba na uimaloe, nergan tummagan ibmar abegele ga ukoe; eye tulemar wilemaladga (ibmar sulid) weyob ga ukoe.
Tehegine weyob ede soisa emargala, Pab tummad ga soisadbali; Pab asabin nued nanasmala, mushubmushub na pentaidemala, napneggi ibmar abelegedbali, tehgi ibmar purbaled abelegedbali, ibmar abemaladbali.
Ar weyob ibmar kusa Mormon tihiwar nabali, sappur tihiwar naba naidgine, Mormon ye neg nugadgine, Mormon tihiwargine, Mormon sappurbali. Ibi yobi weyob tule taisale weyob ibmar kusad wisgusmalad tule tummadi; eye, ar ibiyob nuedi, al enug okannoega namaidih na kummaloe.
Wehe ibmar imaisamala yar kuadilenadgine, mel-legi erey wisguegala.
Wehegihidba ahagine erey we ibmar wisgusa, negguebur abargi ibmar kunaide, ega arbamalad parmisa neiy nue takegala. Tehegine ibakuengi onmaipakuadgi Pab tummad Kaiya purba ittogegala, erey wisgusa, emar pukuadgine.
Tehegine erey, Alma go soide, peh negguebur oimaidiye, ehgi aiginegala; tehgihidba esordamar parmisa obelogegala.
Ar Alma tehgi Pab sordamar weyob ibmar wisgusgua, erey sordamar taniye; tehegine na eibmar taidemala urmor nega, emimmimar, ar ukub tummad nega tule sulid ba nadmala.
Tehegi ah tulemar tulataled ila pahabag kaga tulatar kumar ye.

Wegihidba weyob ibmar kude Alma, Zarahemla yargi Pab kaiya purba parsoide tehgi, pela yarmar naidgine.
Tehegine weyob kaiya purba, soide kude ittoged neggine, neggueburgala, Zarahemla yargi sihidgine, soide:
Ani, Alma, Anga Pab igar uilesa, nertummad idued eigala Pab ittoged neggine, an paba Alma anga uisa we igala, ar purba kangued nikadba, Pab igar anga uisadba we ibmar an imake, wegi pemarga soge ittoged nega na siar kuale; Nefi yar kuadilenaidgine; eye, yar nigadgine Mormón neggueburye; eye, ar Ekuenadgan (Bautisar imaisa), Mormón tihwargine.
Tehegine wegihidba, pemarga soge, erey Noe gi waggismala (nosmala) kuen akkar gudsurmala, Pab tummad wile taked ba, ar Pab kanguedbali.
Tehegi ah sorba, wegine Lamanitas tulemar, ukub tummad tule nega sulidba nue isgusmala; eye, pemarga an soge nue wile pukua kusa, ar Pab tummad kaiya purba Kanguedba onosa; al we yarse anmar seali, tehgi Pab ittoged nega anmar siar kude, pela we yargine.
Tehegine kuenadgan ye, pemar Pab sordamarga kuedgine, wegi pemar se an egise: ¿Pemar nue ebinsasmala anmar pabgan tummad wilesmaladi? Eye ¿Ar nue gin pinsasmala, Pabtummad, sabgusad, ar wile taisa, ar Pab tummad ittos suli pemar bali? tehginbali ¿Nue na ebinsasmala, ede pehmar san purba pentaisa?
Wegihidba eh pemar kuage pinsaed okuosa; eye, kab pukuadgi ataisamala, ar Pab tummad gi ataisamala. Wegihid ba neg sishidba kudimalana; tehginiguer eh kaiya purba pemar san purba gi kual-lu ogasa; eye, pemargi attinnar naina purged igala, ar nia neygadina, tehgi wiledi na kadegumalana.
Tehgi pehmarse egise, an kuenedgana: ¿Pehmar pergusmala? Wegihidba soge, ar suli; weyob na pergudsurmala.
Ar pemar se egisbali: ¿We purged igargi attinnar nagusad, pemar esissamala, tehgi soho nega eigar obelosmala? Pemarga an soge eye; esismala, tehgi, al pemar sanpurba tungusmala, tehgi sabedba namasmala. Pentailesadgine. Tehgine pemarga soge pentailesmala.
Tehegine emidi pemarse an egisa: ¿ibigar sunna pentailesmala? Eye, ¿ibugi pemar pentaileged abidtosmala? ¿ibigar sunna purgedgi na sanpurba pentailesmala, eye ar soho neggi san purba pentailesmarbali?
Wegih pemar ga an sunnad soge. ¿Kuage ulub pensulidgi ittosmala. An pab Alma, Abinadi Kaiya purba soisadi? ¿Tehgi eh ner tummad nued nanasa? ¿Pab kaiya purba gi sunmaisursi, ar an pab Alma kuage ulubgi pengudsuli?
Ar eh pensulidgi kuagegi toed kuaisa. Wegihidba pemarga an soge wehe ibmar ar napiraguadi.
Tehegine eh Pab kaiya purba par soisa, anmar Pab gangala, ar: Kuage ulubgi an tamala kuaisamala. Al pukib ittosmala (pingekusmala) ar Pab tummad gi nued pinsaed na sismala, tehgi bar nue nanasmala, tehgisoggu pentailesmala.
Ar emidi pemar se an egise, kuenadgan ittoged negginmalad ye: ¿Pab tummad igar ba pemar purbar kualules mar soge ye? ¿Eh taileged sunna pemar abingasmalale, pemar wagargine? ¿Ar kuagegi ittosmala, pemar taed kuaisamala?
¿Kuage gi pensulid pemar okannomar ye? ¿Attaimala yoho ibmar kumaloed pensulidgine, ar taimala we san purgaled kannar turgoed, kege bar purgedgala kudoe, al isgued, nugudoe, sunna Pab asabin wisgudabbigala, tehgi igargan bar amiledoe, immar imaisadbali, we napneggi kudibi kusgua?
Pehmar se an egise: ¿Sunna gi pinsamala; Pab kaiya purba kole, ittomaloe iba kwengine: An se taimala tulemar nuegana, wegihid ba pemar nuegan nanasmaladi, we napneg tirbir naidgine?
¿Pemar wis soge, sunna tule tummadga kakansamalo si. We ibagine, al soge: Paba Anmar ibmar nueganbi imaisamala, napneg tirbir naidgine; tehgi pemar pentailemaloe?
Al paidba; ¿Sunna pinsasmalale, Pab tummad. Asabin na tuggin parsoimaloe wile ittogedgine ebinsamala pemar isgusmaladi; eye, ar pela kuable isgusad na wisgumaloe; eye, ebinsamaloe, Pab igar ba kuen nanas surmalad?
Pemar se an egise: ¿Suna Pab taisaimalale, we ibagangine kuage nuedgine, argan suiligidgine? ¿Sunna niba ataidemalale, Pab wagar gi nue pinsamaloe anmar wagargine?
¿Sunna pin sasmalale pentailemaloe; 4 pehmar se an egise—ar sana pemar nia ba nanaid osulomala?
Pehmar ga an soge we ibagangi pentailego surmala; kuen pentailego surmala, ar ekege take imaisasurmalale eye ar pemar mor nuhe takuh imailed sulile, eh ablis milesadgine, anmargala Anmar pabgan soisa mala, sogohoedse enegguebur isgusad pentainoniggoe.
Ar emi pemar an egise, Kwenadgan ye: ¿iti pemar ittomaloe, isgued abargi kuidsi Pabtummad asabinni pemar mor ablis bi tailege tehgi isgued nakege? Wegihidba, ¿Ibi anmar par soimaloe napiraguadbali?
Wegihidba, ¿Napiraguadba na parsoisasurmalarsi anmar tule kintakedi, tehgi anmargi ibmar isgusmalad nagumaloe?
Wegine an kuenadgana ¿Wis pemargana soge sunna kusardibeye, Pab arkangi sihid naba sigismogale, igi Abrahan, Isaac, ar Hacob sihigismoga, tehginbali nergan tummagan gimoga, emar mordina ablisgine suli, ar ibi yobi mor tagguhu taileke?
Pehmarga an soge wegob suli; ar Paba sunna kakan samogardi nabirdo, kebe saila unni nega na kakansuli, ar pemar tehe yob pin samalar ar teyob mer pinsamaloe Pab neggi weyob tehye; Al mel-ledmaloe, ar mimmimar nia neggadi.
Tehegine emide an kuenadgana, weyob na ibmar ittosmalo kuager kwaisamala ar pemar pule namaibi ittomala, sabedba namake, pentakedgine, wegi pemar se an egisbie: ¿Emide weyob sunna ittosmalale?
¿Pemar, Pab asabin ibmar widsuli kudihgusa? Ar pemar emi purgemalale, ¿Sunna na soisamalale kuagegine, yaistiki pule kudihi kusmardibe? ¿Al pemar na nue isgued mismar dibeye, tehgi kuage takuhu imaise mar tibeye Cristo ablisgine, ar tanikoe enegguebur isgusad pentakegala?
Wegihi ¿Ar pemar san tummar san saed osulos mardibe? Tehegi sulile pemarga soge anba yoho pemar kuagua. Kudihi kumala, Pab asabin kuis gumalaga, wegihidba kusale nugumala; Paba taniidmosa, tehgi tule kuagua kuidsulid, san purba kege pergued nikuosusuli.
Wegi ¿Tule dar wilemaloe pemar abargine, eisgued anba yoho elie? Pemarga ansoge. We tule yoho kuagua kudihgue; tehgi kuage na nugue; ar wadsigan modaniki, al widsuli sana eibagan moe; ar we tule nuedgi asabinni kwisgumogoe.
Tehgi na pemar ga soibali: ¿tule dar wilegoe, peh mar abargi, we tule ekuenadgi todoele ar wiodoe?
¡Eh tummad wilegoe! Ar aular kuagua kudisuli, al ibagan modaniki, isgued na mioe, ar tehgi. Sulile kuen pentailego suli.
Eye ¡Tule dar wilemaloe pemar isgudidihidi! ¡Nugumala, nugumala; ar Pab tummad soisa!
Wegihidba ede pela tule mar se kole. Ar pela wemar se ekargan oyoge wiletaked kine, ar soge: nugumala, pemar na a abingaoe.
Eye anse peh tage, ar sapi tarba sanpurba nikad ittomoga; eye madu kúnmogoe, ar koboe ittolegedbali, tehgi san purba ittogoe.
Eye anse tage, al igargan nueegan sedage, mer sohoneise par mel-legegala.
Ar wegihidba ibagan modaniki, tulemar igargan imaidihid, ar widsur taele, wilegoe tummad pohoe.
¡Napneggi, pemar isgudidihid, isguedbi Wisgudid al igargan nuegan wisgusmalana, tehginiguale pemar isgudmala, igi sibad edarbed suli yob kudmala, ar sibad edarbed warguen pemarse kodsamalana, al anka pemarse kornai, tehgi pemar ittobisurmala ekaiya purba!
Wegi pemarga an soge sibad edarbed nued pemar sekole; eye, pemar nuiba kole, ar Cristo nuibali; tehgi sibad edarbed nued itto surmalale, al enug ittesurmarbalile, enuiba kol-lenmalodgine, ar pemar esibad surmala.
Tehegine sibad edarbed, esibad surmalale, ¿ar pemar toa sibádmar sunna? Wegih pemarga an soge nia pemar tummadi, ar pemar ah surdamala, tehgi ¿toa osulogo sunna? Wegihidba, pemar ga an soge, tule we osulogele, kakan saed tule, nia mimmi.
Ar pemarga na soge, ibmar nuegan Pab gi taniki, tehgi ib isgana nia gi taniki.
Tehegine tule ibmar nuegan imakele, sibad edarbed nued ekaiya purba ittoe, ar ebanae; ar tule ibmar (igar) isgana imakele, we de nia mimmi, al ekaiya purba ittoe, ar eka tae.
Al we ibmar imakele eh mani abingaoe; tehegine purged abingaoe emaniga kuoe, ar igargan innikiguad maidi, we ibmar nuegan imasadi ba purge mogoe.
Tehegine emide, an kuenadgan wis an ittomala, san purba kanguedba an sunmaki; wegihidba pemar ga nue soisa, Pab tummad igargan maidbali, mer bar nomalagala.
Ar an se kol-lesa weyob sunmakegala, Pab tummad anga igar nued uisadbali, Esucristo igarbali, eye an igar nika we neggueburga ibmar napiraguad gi sogegala, anmar pabgan odurtaisamala ibmar tanimaloedgine.
Al we ibmar pela kuable suli soilesa. ¿Widsurmar si, ar an sunnad We ibmar nue wisi? Wegih napiraguadgi pemarga soge, an nue wisi we ibmar soisad napiraguadi. Tehgi ¿Igi nue na wisi we ibmar napiraguadi?
Wegihidba, pemarga an soge, Pab purba nued anga soisa al Pab se kodsa panebanegi, al iba pigua nanasa, we ibmar nue ansunnad wisguegala, tehgi emidi ansunnad. Wisgusa, al Pab purba nued angi ubosa ibmar sogegala; ar wede purba nued ibmar owisoed anse noniggi.
Teheginbali, pemarga soge Pabgan kaiya purba summaisad, anga soilesmoga, ar napiraguadi, purba nued an gi ubonoiggidgine, al Pab purba nued soisad bar moga.
An soge, an sunnad na wisi pemar ga ibmar yoho kuoed sogele ar napiraguadi; tehgi pemarga an soge, an wisi Esuscristo tanikoe; eye, Pab Machi warguen nuggi, purba nued nika, napiraguadba (tule subgue). Tehegine napneg isgued eh nutakoe, eye tulemar eh nuga pen surmalad, isgusmalad nutakoe.
Tehegine enuidi pemarga soge, we igargan maidba anse kol-lesa; eye an kuenadgan ga Pab kaiya purba parsogegala, tehgi napneg tirbir naidgi tulemar puguadgala; eye, pela gar sogegalo, sergangala, sapin ganagala ar maiga kudihid gala, ittolegedba kudihmaladgala; eye, ar sergana, sapingan, mimmigana, na gar soide isgued mimala, ar kannar kualulemala.
Eye, purba nued weyob soge: isgued mimala pela pemala, napneg tirbir naidi ar nibneg eibagan mosa; eye, Pab machi taniki kantikidgine neig seoe: Eye, kuenadgana, pemarga na soge purba nued sosge; wegihidba napneg erey ibi yobi kanguedi tehgine nibneg erey bali, tulemar mimmimar abargi nonikoe emisguagine.
Tehegine purba nued anga soidebali, eye, pinna sulidgi anga soide: take ar we neggueburga sunae. Isgued mimala, al pemar imaisurmale nibneg abingao surmala.
Ar teheginbali, purba nued pemarga sorbali: sapi maligine akan yoi kuaguagua. Tehegine sapi widsur turba makele siglegeo, ar sohogi kún maggoe; eye soho kege perguedgine, soho kege akinedi. Wegihidba nuegi pinsadi samaloe, Pab tummad nued we ibmar soisadi.
Tehegi emidi pemar se an egise, kuenadganye: ¿Sunna we kaiya purba abingamaloye? Eye, ¿Sunna we ibmar mimaloe, Pab igar gi annamaloe? Eye, ¿sunna tukin san otum momaloe kuagegine? Eye, ¿sunna pemar mor ollobihid yohoe, ar kuage gine na san otummamaloe we napneggi, ar pemar manigine?
Eye ¿Pemar weyob pinsadihile, tulemar paiganba, tule nued ye? Eye, ¿teyob sadeguale, kuenadgan palegindima lale, wiodihile, ar Pab tummad sogedbali, igar nuegan ba itohed neggi toisa—ar Pab purba nued ba nugusa kuo ye—ar na soisa isgued misa, igar nuegan imakoye?
Eye, ¿Tulemar wiledid basur takele, ar tule ib—mar abeged basurtakele, pemar ibmar nuegan nikad osulogae?
Ar napi pemar ga soge, isgudidihid pemar osulo surmalale, pemarga na soge, ar sohogine pehmar parmel-ledmaloe al isgued misurmalale, weyob kudmaloe.
Tehegine pemar pelaguable. Sibad wawad edarbed ba nabimalale, emide pemarga an soge: ib isgana abargi kudidihid gi nomala, ar panggumala mer ib isgana ebumaloe; ar tihgi tulemar isgana enugo elilegoe, tulemar nuegan abapgi bar nug imailegosuli; Pab kaiya purba soisadba igar ki begala, ar soge: tulemar isgane encetaimala kuen abirosuli, an negguebur bali.
Ar tule nuegan enuga narmailegoe karda purba nikad gine; ar an naba sigmogoe. Tehegine kuenadgan ye; ¿ibu anmar osulog sunna? Pemar sogele we ib isganaye, ar basur iltomaloe; ar Pab kaiya purba ba imailegoe.
Ar ¿Tule warguen sibad wawad ibed dike sibad pukidar nikale, nue taisulile, mer atchu kunnegala? tehgi achu sappur warguen gi toinoniggile esibad abargine, ¿toaha ononnod sulile? Eye, nab ibe obelogodole.
Ar emidi pemarga an soge, sibad edarbed nued, pemar se kole; al ekaiya purba ittomlaa, egaluse pemar sehdoe, ar esibad ga kumaloe; al eh de kuen achu odogo suli mer pemar pelobegala.
Tehegi emi, Alma, pelamarga sunmake an parmialid nukine pemarga sogo, we kaiya purba soilesadba nue nanamala.
Pab igar maidba an soge pemar ittoged sordamargala; ar we igarba pemarga an soimoga. Tulemar yoho Pab sordaga kumaladi; taimala, ar Pab tihi gi obmar moga isgued mimala tehegi keb pemar. Sappi turba san purba nikad ittomar moga.

Tahegihidbali, Moises igar mai tummagan igargan taimalad, nuiy malesmalale, ar pennuilemala earbaed imaisadbali, igargan imas maladbali.
Ar tule warguen mani kasale tule paidgine, pennuidisulile, ah tule tummagan ga soinad tae; tehgi tummad igar maidba na imaide tae, kebe tule mani kasulid seddamala tummad sega; tehgi tule mani kaniggid pennugedse imailedae, tehgi sulule ibmar nikad iba suli gae, ar tulemar aburge soilego dibe, tule addur saegala.
Al tumman, earbasad ba mani abingaoe; ibaguen abingaoe; senine kuaguen, or kuaguen, senum mani kuaguena, ar ekadsgue. Senine or kuaguena. Ar eigargan mesisad ba pennuilegoe.
Tehegine we mani nuimala, or mani ebo akkale ekanguedbali, nefitasmar nuig imaisadbali, ar udios mar Erusalen gi kudihi kusmalad sunnaguad ebidsurmala; al aha mani sunna guad kangu surbali, wis akkala emani nuga emar soged bali, ar etaked ba mani nuk mesmala, ar tummagan igargan taimailedse nue mesnomimala, erey Moises igar maidba mesismala.
Weyob do emaninug ebismala: Senine or kuaguen, senon or kwaguen shum or kwagwen, tehgi limna or kwaguena.
Senum mani kwaguen, amnor mani kuaguen, esommani kuaguen, tehgi onti mani kuaguen.
Senum mani kuaguen, senine or kuaguen emar kaukue, ar ebo, ibmar kwagua enuisaled yob kangue.
Tehegine seon or kuaguen, ar senine irba kangue.
Al shum or kuaguen, ekangu ed, seon irba kngue.
Ar limna or kuaguen, pela paigan yob kangue.
Amnor mani kuaguen, se mumes kuabo kangue.
Esrom mani kuaguen, senu meo irpake kangue.
Ar onti kwagen, ikmas pargan yobi kangue.
Al wedo emani nug kangued yaliguadi.
Shiblon Kuaguen, senum abala kangue, shibban kuaguen cebado unsaleged yob kangue.
Shiblum kuaguen, or shiblon abala kangue;
Leah kuaguen, ar shiblum abala kangue;
Tehegi antion or kuaguen, ar shiblones kuabalia kangue.
Emide, unnila na kuarguen ibmar abehe, ar earbamaladba pennuilemala; tehgi soggua igargan oburmai kuarmala, kalaguen suli, igar gan idsoarmala, we neggueburgine arbaed tummad nikumalagala, ar bur melo pennuilemalagala, tehgi negguebur Alma se, ar Amulek se uluarmala.
Tehegine Seesrom Amulek se ibmar egidde, soide: ¿ibmar anga peh sogoe, peh se an egisoedi? Tehgi Seesrom tule niaba naidi, igar nuegan obunnoegala; amulek soide: ¿An abinsaoye, peh se ibmar egisoedi?
Amulek soide: Eye, eye Pab purba an gi ubononikid bali; kuen Pab purba gi an oakaloga suli. Tehgi Seesrom soisa: wegine onties mani nergua; pehga an ukoe, Pab tummad peh osulogele.
Tehgine Amulek abinsade: ¡Nia mimmiye! ¿Ibiga pinsaed peh an ga bie? ¿Widsur si, tule nuegan keg pinsaed kalege?
¿Peh wisi Pab masuli? An soge sadi. Nue peh wisi Pab warguen na mai, ar unni peh mani sabe, peh Pab sabsuli.
Ar peh anga kagan sae, Pab asabinni. Peh anga soisa: wegi peh ga ukoe onties nergwa ar mani saila, (karge saila), al sanpurba sunna abegoe, ar unnila peh abege, ani, Pab napiraguad maid osulogedi ar sunna peh an obelogoena, abelogoena. Wegine igar isgana peh soisad, aha wilub ibmar abingaoe.
Tehegine Seesrom soide: ¿Peh soge Pab tummad napiragua mai?
Ar Amulek abinsade: Eye, Pab tummad napiraguad kuarguen mai.
Tehegine Seesrom soide: ¿Igi we ibmar peh wid sunna.
Ar eh abinsade: Anger warguen anga soisa (owisosa).
Al Seesrom kannar egide: ¿Toa taniko sunna? ¿We Pab machi?
Tehegine Seesrom kannar napi egitebali. ¿Peh negguebar pentakoe isguedgine? Ar amulek weyob abinsade. Peh ga an soge suli, ar e purba soisad kuen osulolego suli.
Ar Seesrom neggueburga soide: we ibmar nue ebinsamaloye; ar eh soisa, unni Pab warguen namoye; tehegine soisa Pab machi nonikoe, ar enegguebur pentako surye; Igi eh igargan kan Tiyobi Pabga we sogedi.
Al Amulek kannar soidebali: Wegi peh. Kagan sasa, tehgi soge, Pab tummad yobi sunmake, ar an soisa enegguebur pentako suli isguedgine.
Tehegine kannar soidebali enegguebur kuen pestakosuli. Isguedgine; ar purba kege an osuloge, al. Eh soisa ib isgana nibneg se nao suli; teheginbali, ¿Igi anmar pentailego sunna ar kuen nibneyse naosurmalade? Tehgi soggu kuen na pentailego surmala isguedgine.
Tehegin bali Seesrom kannar egidebali: ¿We Pab tummad kadeguhad napiraguad emachi?
Ar Amulek soisa: eye, we Pab kategwadi, nikneggined, ar napneg ginedi, pela ibmar gi nikadi; we kebe sailadi ar perguhedi, iden hed, tehgi etuggu;
Tehegine napneise nonikoe enegguebur penta kegala; ar ede wehmar isgusmalad nutakoe kuage uhibgi enuk pensur malad; tehgi wehman de sanpurba kadeguhad nikumaloe, ar kuen tule paid nuggi kuen pentailego surmala.
Al tulemar isgana kuen akar kursurmala, igi pen taked igar suliyob kumalophe, unnila purged gi kuen akkar kuosuli; wegihidba ibagan tanikoe purgis malad turgumoloke, ar Pabtummad. Asabin kubisgutabmaloe, igargan napi gar amiledoe, enanasmaladbali.
Wis sakuhas purged nia; Cristo purgisad gi pentaslemaloe, we purgedgine, pela tulemar bar turguegala.
Purba ar san ebo kannar al togoe etailege yobi; pela kuable sangi ibmar nikad al togae, igi emi anmar tailege yobi kudoe; Tehegine Pba asabin sedma loe; Ar ibmar pela wisgumaloe, igi emi ibmar wisiyobi, ar pela. Kuable ibmar wisgumaloe na kusmaladi.
We yob tulemargala, ibmar kudoe ar sergan, sapingane, tulemarg, tule eittogedba kudihid, machergan, omegam, tule isgana ar tule nuegan; sailagia kaguengihid kuen yogguosuli; pela kannar san kuabla nikuoe emi niymalayobi; ar Cristo asabin kuisgumaloo emachi tehgi Pab, ar purba nued wemar Pab kadeguadi, igargan bar amimalagala, ar nued al isganadibeye.
Wegi an summaisa san sunna purged gine. Tehgi san purgaled kannar turguoedi. Pemarga soge we san sun purged. Kuisguoe, san keg bar purged gala, we soilege, purged gi turguoe, eye iduked san purba purgoed mer bar purgegala, epurbamar kannar san se nonimaloe, bargi padsiguo suli, ar we kannar attogoe purbar kusen bar purgosuli, mel-legi isgued bar takegala.
Tehegine Amulek Weyob sunmaked pergusgua, negguebur kannar keger ittode, ar Seesrom kwagidmoga. Tehgi weyob Amulek kaiya purba soisa, al we pela narmailesa.

Tehegine taide Amulek ibmar soisad gi, Seesrom bar sunmas suli, ar Amulek ib soisad, keg ittode na kagan sasadi, emar pinsaed gasadi, al Seesrom ittosnade, kuaggide, egusa, Alma na soidemoga, Amulek ibmar soisad bar soidemoga, ar ibmar soilesad kannar nue soidemoga.
Alma, Seesrom ga sunmaisad tule pukidar ittasmala, ar tule pukidar abargi sunmaisa; weyobi sunmaisa:
Seesrom peh takena, tummad peh kagansasa, tulemar epinsaed Kaed bisuli, Pab gi kagan sasbali; ar eh de pela peh pinsaed wisi, eh purba nued ba anmarga soisa;
Tehgine peh na wisi, peh pinsaed na we ibmar woge, nia pinsaed bali, ar kagansae, we negguebar yamodihi, al orwegala, anmar gine, tehgi anmar gi pinsamalagala, ar anmar ononoegala.
Ar we igar peh imaisa, peh istarángala, kangued eh nikad bali. Tehgi nue epinsaoe peh ga an sogedi, pela tulemarga an soge.
Ar wegi, peh ga an soge, pela tulemargala, peh istarad, peh iamasa, eigar mesisa pemar yamoegala, negguebur pinsaed. Kaegala, al eba nagumalagala, eh pemar sehedi kuegala, obelogegala, tehgi ekangued ba sehedi pemar saoena.
Al Alma sunmaked pergusgua, Seesrom tummad tobguar kude, ar na wisgumai kude Pab tummad ekanguedi; tegi na wisgusbala Alma, Amulek wismala ebinsae di, ekuage gi pinsaed wisgusmala; ar we kangued gar uilesa purba tule owisoed soged bali soisamala.
Tehegine Seesrom ibmar pukidar egide, Pab nibneggined igar na egide Ar Alma soisa: ¿Ibu soilege, Amulek soisadi, purgisar kannar turguedi, purgismalad pela turgumaloe, tule nuegan tule isgana, ar Pab asabin seled maloe, igargan gar amiledoe eh nanasmalad bali?
Ar Alma ga soide; al tulemarga igargan pugidar uilesa, Pab igargan tugguar mamaidi wisguedi, tehginiguale, igar pehedse kangu mai, mer tulemarga sogo ye, unni Pab soged ba tulemarga soilemogoe; tehgi tulemar edamaladbali, ehnanamaladbali.
Tehegine tule kuage isganale, kaiya purba idseh abingae, ar tule kuage. Purba nuedile bur melu abingae, Pab igar otugguar maid wisguoe, pela maga ittoged se ga.
Ar tule kuage isganale, wis idsegua ya uilege kaiya purba, bar wisguosuli nue, Pab igala; tehgi nia nadoe, ar ehsogedba ibmar ba imaidoe se perguoe We soilege sohonegginedi.
Ar Amulek nue ga soisa, purged igor gi nue sunmaisa, al we sanpurgaled nibneise naoe, bar sn keg purged ga kudoe tehgi Pab asabin sehledmaloe, igar bar amiledoe enanasmaladbali.
Tehgi Anmar kuage isgudele, eye, ar we kaiya purba gi anmar kuage isgudele, bar anmar wisguosurmala, ar tehgi soggu tummad wiled maloe, odurtailemaloe.
Anmar sunmaked, anmar tummad odurtakoe, eye, ar pela anmar taedi; easabin kuen ol-libi tailego surmala, anmar pursgoe, anmar wiodoe, Tehegine Pab tummad anmar toibi suli kudoe, al yer ittos malale akua anmargi mile dele, al yarmar namar gi paddidoe, anmar otugguegala.
Tehginiguale we yob kuosuli, ekangued, etaileged asabin na kuisgutakmaloe, kangued, ar eigar maidba, igar kudoe, anmar asabin pingeguedse kudmaloe, pela eigargan inniggiguadi; eimmar imaked inniggiguad. Gi na imake; tulemar mimmigan wile take, ar kangued nika tulemar pentakegala, emi pensurmalad isgued mimaloe, we igar nuedi.
Ar we gihidba pemarga, an soge purged tnaiki, purged irboguadi, wede purpaledi. Ahade isguedgi purgedi, al sigguas purgedi, purbar purgebaloe, eye igargan nuegan maidba purgemaloe.
Tehegine, soho, tihmadda ol-liled esnungihidgi wiledoe, kege akkinnedi, tehgine tummad wiledih kadeguoe, nika igarba kudihi kadguoe, se wiledoe, esogedba sehdi pemar sadoe.
Pemarga ansoge, weyob kadeguoe, pentaked igar suli yob, bar pentailego surmala Pab tummad igar maidba, igar imailedoe, tehgi bar purgo sur mala, al igar isgued pergusa.
Ar Alma weyob soisagua tulemar bur pule keger ittosmala.
Tule warguen Antiona ye nugad, ede negguebur tummadga kudihidi, ar soide: ¿ibu peh soisa tule kannar turgubaloye purgisale, kuaidoe sunpurged, kege bar purged ga kudoe, al sanpurba bar purgo suli.
¿Ibu soilege kaiya purba gi mai, soimala, Pab tummad, paliwiturmar urbisa, espunniar soho yobi kae owidsisa, tada naggue siggi napir ittoleged neggine, ar anmar pabgan sailaginmalad mel-legi bar sapi purba tulad ittogegala, tehgi kudihi salegeagala? Taimala kuen igar nue masuli; Kudih kadeguad igala.
Alma tehgi soide: We pemar ga an nue sogoe. Wismala Adan Pab gi tummad nosa, sapi ised kudsagua, Pab kaiya purba soimaidgine, ar nue tarmala eh nosad, pela tulemar yoggusmala, ar isgusmala.
Wegihidba, pemar ga an soge, ar Adan sapi sanpurba nikad ittosgua, al purged sulina, tehgi kaiya purba pinsa soielesana, Paba tule kagan saed tulena ar eh soisagusana: ar sapipurba nikad peh kudsale, purgoe.
Tehegine tulemargine purged noniggi; eye, Amulek sunmaisa wis sigguas purgedi; tehgi. Tule ga ibagan sigguas nasiysa. Sunna isgued miegala; ar we napneg anmarga nasigsa, anmar wilubtakegala; yoho Pab asabin na ibmar tuggin parsogegala. Ibagan ibmar nutakega, ibagan kege perguedi, anmarga soile sadi, kannar turgusale, we ibagan nagu noniggoe.
Wegihidba, kebe sailagi pentaileged igar megis sulina, kuen kannar turgued igar megosulina; ar wegihidba igar megisa, purgisale kannar turguedi, wegi gi sunmailesa.
Ar wegihidba anmar pabgan sailagine, sapi sanpurba ittos soggudina, wiledihi nakudmala, we napneggi na gi pangudmalana, igargan idued imaked kud surbali; ar weyob pentaileged igar megisad, igarga ga kudsulina, tehgi Pab kaiya purba napiraguadga kudsurbalina.
Ar weyob kudsuli; idue igar megisa, tulemar purguhed iduale; tehgi purgisad sorba Pba asabin kuisguegala, igar bar amiegala, eye, we igar gi anmar summadi, perguoe.
Tehegine Paba ibmar weyob imasa tulemargala, na taide tehgi soggu wisguhed nue abelege, igargan megismaladi.
Ar angermar parmiali, ga sunmakegala, al emar Pab neg takega imaisamala.
Ahakale tulemar se kolar kuarmala; tehgine, Paba emar ebo sunmaisa, pentaileged igargi odurtailesa, kebe saila napneg nagusgua we igar megisadi; tehgi emar pensulid nikadba odurtailesa, isguhed miedi, ar igar nuegana.
