Tehegihidba, tulemar ga igargan uilesa, ar igar idued gi nosmardibe nohoe igar napnegginedi ar Pabgan tummagan yobi nakudmaloe, wisguoe igar nued, igar isgana, na wilub tailegega nonimar sunna, eibmar imakedbali, ehittoleged ba taoe. Nueddibe, ar isguodibe.
Tehegihidba, igar pentaleged wisgunmargua, Pab eh igar uisa, mel-legi igar isgana imaimalagala, a imakele se odurtailegoe purged soiboyguadgine, we purged kateguadi, wede igargan nuguhed igala: pentaileged igar wehmarga kuosuli, Pab tummad tulemar sabedbali, igar nuhed maid kege osuololege.
Al Paba tulemar se kodsa, emachi nuggine (we pentaileged igar megisa) soide: Pehmar nugumaloe, ar kuage nugu maloe, tehgi wile an pehmar takoe, an machi warguenaguad nuggine.
Tehegine tule nugusale, ar kuage nudasale, wile tailegoe, an machi wargwennagwad nuggi, eisgusad gi bar pinsalego suli; ar wemar anba kudih kudmaloe.
Ar tule kuage nutaisulile, isgudihile, wegihidba npiraguadba an soge, an walig kudih kuen kuosurmala.
Emide tehgi an kuenadgona, wegi pemarga an soge, kuage isgumalale, Pab ba kudih kuen kuosurmala; anmar isguhed eh orwemaloe keba saila yobi, eye, irbogusar keyob kudoe, al irbogus anmar urwer, anmar sanpurba tummad sewilemaloe; tehgi eh kaiya purba soisadbali, purged idued, ar weyob napi purged nonikoe.
Tehegine, an kuenadgana, anmar wisgusmala, ar napiraguadi, isguhed. Mimala, mer kuage isgumala, mel-legi Pab tumamd ourwegala, al anmar se uludoe, eigar gan soibo anmar ga uisa; unnila Pab tummad walig Kudihi samaloe eh kaiya purba sogedba mesisadi.

Tehegine negguebur se na nadmala, Pab kaiya purbagi sunmaimlagala, ittoed neggine, ar enegginmala ga sunmaidemala, Pab kaiya purba gine; eye, al neiy imbaba gar sunmaidemarbali.
Ar webihidba tummad arbasmargua wemar abargine, igargam nueganga nade, tulemar wilemalad abargi arbasmala, tehgihidba, ittoged neggi ononnoledmala kudmala mormar wilesaggua yomaladbali.
Tehegine, wemar kuen odolessurmala ittoged neisega, Pab se kolegala, ar ib isgana yobi gi pin sadmala; al nue na ittobimalana; eye ekuenad gan gin pinsadmala kagan turgan yobi, ar ibmar surmaladba wilesagua kudidihi, kuager wilesaggua na ittomarbali.
Tehegihidba Alma neggweburga adurtaidigua, ar gu sunmaidihi Onida yargi kuargua, eh se tulemar pukidar nonimala ittomalagala kaiya purba, tulemar anmar gi bad sunmasmalad tulemar kuagegi wile ittodidihid, ar ibmar surmarbalidi.
Ar ah tulemala Alma se nonimala; ehmar idued ga kudihid soide: wegi ¿Ibu wemar imaimaloe, anmar kuenadgana? Wilesaggua kudimaladba tulemar istar taimala; eye ar nergan istar anmar take, ar tummad arbasmala ittoedneg sobegala, tehegi anmar obadsamala, ibmar surmaladbali; tehgi soggua, Pab se koled anmar surmala Ar ¿Ibu imaimaloe?
Tehegihidba Alma we ittosgua, eh se aibilide, ar nue taide yeher na ittogedgine; ar nue na wile ittomalad, na taimala, nue wile ittomala, tehgi ittobimala Pab kaiya purba.
Tehegine, tulemar paigan an soisule; argan na ogode; ar tulemar taipukuadga summaide, pela wemar tulemar napiraguadgi na isguhed mismala, ar soide:
An pemar take, kuage ulubgi Wile nue ittomala, ar tehgihile, pemar tule nuegana.
Wegi pemar kuenad soisa: ¿igi imaimaloe? Ar ittoged neggi anmar amilesa, tehgi soggua, anmar Pab tummad se na keg kormala.
Wegi pemarga an soge: ¿na pemar wisomala, unnila ittoged negginbi Pabse kol-lege?
Pemarse an egisbali; ¿pemarga an wissoge, unnila ittoged ibagi irguen Pab se kal-lego si?
Pemarga an soge, nabirdo, pemar ittoged neggi onilesgua, kuage ulubgi wile ittogegala, ar igar nuegan turdaimalagala, tehgine ibmar wisi kumaloe; pemar kuenadgan istar (pemar) taimala ibmar sulidbali, ahagala Kuage ulubgi na nugudmar sunna; ibmar abemaladba na kuager wilesoggua ittodmala.
Tehegine nue pemar nataidemargua nugudmarsunna, tule nuegana; ar tule na pingegguhele, keb na nuguhe, inbaguhenar isgusar nugumala; ar nue pemar ga an soge wile wemar tailegoe, tule wile ittoged ulubgi amiele, nued kudihiguale, yoho pentailegoe.
Ar pemarga pádo an soisa, wegi appor adurtailenmar soggudina, pemar nugudmarsunna, igar nuegan pemarga uilede, ¿Pur nued sursi ibmar nuegan uiledele, wemar napiraguadgi wiles ittomaloe, we kaiya purba bali?
Eye, tule napiraguadgi wile ittoele, ar isguhed miele, tegi nued kudihile, tule nugudoe eye, ar na nugusa tulemar paidba, appor imailesale nuguhegala, ar wiledihidbali.
Tehegine, tulenuedi, wemar na naibi ittosmalale, appoledgi imailed surmalale; nue sogoena, tule dar nue Pab kaiya purba ittosale, tehgi Pab tihigi obed igar imaisale, kuage isgualedginsuli; eye, kuen tule paid gar soisa sulidgine, kaiya purba wisguhegala, ar kuen appoledgi igargi odurtailed surgusa, yoho wisgued iduhe.
Eye tule pukidar, weyob soimala, ar anmarga ibmar nibneg gined ukosulile; nue wisgumaloe, tehegine anmar ittomaloe;
Ar Pemar se an egise; ¿We kuage ulubgi pensulidi? An soge tehgisuli; ar tule kuargwen ibmar wisile, nue ulubgi ittoed abelesuli, ar pad na wisi.
Tehgi ¿Pur tummad ukab salegoe, Pab ibmar nue wisile, ar bar imaisulile, unnila ulubginbi na wisi, ar sigguas wisgubiele, al Pab igargi na nomaloe?
Emide, we igarba, igar ga amiledoe, wegi na pemarga an soge, weyob kudoe, soggwen, ar paidsig tehyob kudoe; tehgi pela tulemar ibmar imaisadba igar abingadmaloe.
Tehegine, pemarga soisa yobi, ulubgi pensulid: kuage ulubgi pensulid nikale, pela ibmar wisguhed suli; Tehgi ulubgi pen sulid nikale, ibmar nue abtake, ibmar tailesulid, ar napiraguadi.
Ar emide pehmar ga an soge: nue epinsamaloe, Pab tummad tule nuedi, tulemar enug pensur maladgala; tehgi soggua, eh abege, tulemar ulubgi eh pensuli, eye ekaiya purba.
Al eh, kaiya purba sogega, angermar tulemar se parmie; eye mashergan garbisuli, ar omegan garmoga. Tehegine we pela suli, imbaguenar mimmimarga. Kaiya purba soibali, tulemar ibmar wismalad, sunna pinsaed oburre.
Nabirdo, an kuenadgana, ar pemar an se ibmar egidsa, al ber imaimalo ye, pemar tummad wilegedgi obol-lesmala—tehgi pemar mer pinsamaloe, an pemarga igar soideye, unni ibmar napiragwadba an sogoe;
Ar pemarga an soisuli pelaguable appoledgi wile ittosmardeye; ar napiraguadba an wisi pemar abargi tulemar, nu gubi kusmalana; ar ibmar akkakar sunna nugu mogoena.
Al pad an soisa pemar gala, ulubgi pensulid igala, ar ib pela wisguhed suli, weyob do an kaiya purba. Ar kwen abgayala wisguosurmala, napipargwadgine, igargan innikigwadi, ar teyobi ulub gi pensulid igala.
Tehegine, ar pemar nue ibmar wisgudele, an kaiya purba soisad nue imaked saegala, ar wis be ulubgi pensulid imaidi saoe, eye anba wis sigguas ulubgi pensulile, na mie wis ittoged peh imake an kaiya purbo soisadi.
Nue na taimala, sapi kwagua Kaiya purba ebogua, ar kwagegi wis oubogele, sapi kuagua nued gobi, anmar mer obanmaloe, Pab pur nued abin gamaloe, kuage ulubgi nasgudoe; tehgi pemar ittosmalale, ulubgi na soidemaloe: we sapi kwagua nuedide, ar kaiya purba nuedi, anmar sanpurba nued ittomaloe, pinsaed nikudmaloe; eye (igar) ibmar nuedga anga kudoe.
Wegihidba. ¿Pemar ulubgi pensulid nue nikumala? Eye pemar ga na soge; tegi soggua yoho pela na ibmar nue wisgumala.
Tehegine pinnabinna sapi kwagua tungudoe, ar na pemar soidemaloe, we ib nuedi, ar wegi tungumai.
¿We napiragua, tehgine sapi kwagua nuedi? Pehmar ga an soge eye; pela ibmar kuaimar nuegana egadhegadi.
Ar sapi kwagua tungudela, we sapikwag nuedi; ar tehgi sulile nued suli, al mel-ledoe.
Ar wegihidba, ibmar wisgusadba, sapi kwagua tiysa, ar nue túngude, napiragwadgi wismala, we ibmar kwagua nuedi.
Tehegi ¿Ibmar nue wismala? Ar pemar inniggiguadgi ibmar nue wisgus malale, ar pemar ulubgi pensulid kuen nasgusulile, ar pad ibmar wismalad ulale; pemar widsurmar si kaiya purba pehmar sanpurba pinnabinna uboge, anmar pinnabinna ibmar wisgumai kudmarbaloe, tehgi ibmar maga na nue ittomay kudmarbaloe.
Ar, ¿We napiragwa? An soye ar eye, al we kwal-les, ar igar nuedi, tehgi maga ittomaloe; ar we nuedi; tehgine ¿pemar pinsaed we inniggigwadi, igar nued ittosad sorbali?
Wegi, pemarga na soge, ar suli, kwage ulubgi pensulid mer intaimaloe, ar unnila sigguas we ittomala, weyobi nue na wisguhedse samaloe, pule nued dibe we sapi kwagua.
Tehegine, sapi tungumaid ba, soimaloe; nue tihigi oimaloe, nue emaligan ainiegala, tunguhegala, ar anmar ga turba nikudoe. Ar nue taidihile nued gi tigele, túngudoe, pemarga turba nikudoe.
Tehegi, ar sapi nue taisulile, pemar tihigi nue oisulile emaligan kwen ainiosuli; tad tummad kahalile tingudoe emaligan sulidbali, tehgi soggu ungiledoe, mel-legoe.
Ar wegihidba ekwagua isgana, al eturba isganabali; pemar napa nued suli, ibmar keg kuhe, tehgi soggua sapi kwen tungudsuli; tehegine kege turba nikuhe.
Teheba yobi, pemar, Pab kaiya purba nue ittomala, kwage ulubgi nue na taimala, pemar taedi kwen pemar sapi purba turba nikad, wemalosuli.
Tehginigwale kaiya purba nue ittomalale, sapi túngumaid yobi, ulubgi pensulid nasgumay kudmaloe, ibmar wisidbali, ittoagua saoe, nue abindaimaloe eturbamahalile, emaligan ainidoe, sapi kudoe, sanpurba kege perguhed gala.
Ar ibmar nue wisgubiedba, pemar ulubgi pensulid nue abidogoe, kaiya purba ittomaloe, pemargi nasgumalagala, ehibagangi ibmar nuegan amimaloe, pur ibmar nuedi, ibmar paiganbali, ibmar paiganba tarkuna, eye, ar ibiyobi nuedi ibmar paiganbali, yeher ittoged na ittomaloe, al kwen bar uggumesosurmala.
Wegihidba, an kwenadgana; anmar kwage ulubgi pensulid nikad ba ibmar nuegan abingamaloe, wismalale, abidomala, sapi pemar ga turba nikudoe.

Tegine Alma sunmaisad sorba, napagi sigisa, an Amulek kuisgude, adurdaide soide.
An kuenadgana pemar kwen widsuli kuosurmala, Cristo taniggidgi summailesadi, wede, anmar odurdaisa, we Pabmachi; eye, an wisi pemar pukidar odurdailesmala, we ibmala, pemar namaloed iduale.
Ar kwenad se egidsamalo, pemarga soisa ibmar imaimaloedi, wile ittomalaodgine; al eh pemarga soisa sanpurba nuguhedgine; eye, pemar ga pinsaed nued uisa, ulubgi pensulid nikumala tehgi ibmar abidomala.
Al ulubgi pensulid nue nikale, Pab kaiya purba nue wisgumala, ar nuedgi ibmar imaimala.
Tehegi anmar taisamala, bur tummagin pinsamala, ar kaiya purba, Pab Machi gaddibeye, al Cristo kadsurdibeye.
Ar pemar taisamarbali, an kwenad pemar nue odurdaisamala, kalagwensuli, al we kaiya purba Cristo gadi, pentailemaloe.
An kwenad Senos, kaiya purba, parsoisa, PabMachi gi pentaileged taniki, ar Senos Kaiya purbabali, al Moises Kaiya purba parsoisa bali, we ibmar napiragwad sogegala.
Tehgi emide, pemarga napiraguadba an sunnad an soge. Wegi pemerga an soge, nue na wisi Cristo tanikoe, tulemar mimmigan abargine, eneggwebur isgusad nutakegala, napneg isgusad eliegala, ar Paba tule tummad soisa.
Ar nue abelege kindailegedi; al Paba Kadeguan igar mesisadba imailegedi, nue abelege kindaileged, ar tegisulile, tulemar pela purgemaloe; eye tulemar pela isgusmala eye, tulemar pela Pab igargi aibadsamala, ar pela yokusmala, tegi wargwen windaile sulile pela purgemaloe, ar nue abelege.
Al nue abelege, tummad napi kindailegedi; tule kindaileged suli, ibdula kindaileged suli, nuhugid surbali; tegi soggua tule wargwengid purgosule, ar unnila wileyed kege perguhedi, sadeguadi.
Tehegi tule wargwengid kwen na tuggin kindakosuli, tule paid isguhed nutakegala. Ar tule wargwen oburgele wegi. ¿Anmar igar maid ba imakoe, we napiraguadi, sanpurba ekwenadgadi? Pemarga an soge wegi suli.
Ar igar soimai tule wargwen kindaisale, unnila igar maidba imailegoe, sunna napneg isguhed nutakoe.
Tehgihidba we bur nue abelege, napi kintailegedi; ar tehegine, ablis arioged osolegoe; wegihidba Moises igar maid ba gudoe; eye, pela imailegoe, kwen soggwengid osulolegosuli, kwen akkar kuosurbali.
Ar wegi, we soilege igar pelaguable, al pela pebbigana, tummaganse, ar napi wen dailegoe; tegi we tummad napi kindailegoed, ar Pab Machi; eye kege perguhedi, tehgi Kadeguadi.
Tehegine, pentaileged senonimogmkoe, enug penguosurmaladgala; ar we napi kindailegoedi; wiledaked, sabed igar nue imakegala, igar nued inniggaguadi, ar tulemarga uilege, ulubgi pensulid; isguhed eliegala.
Ar weyob igar napiraguad, wiledaked, sabed, nue abelege, tulemar nue na semaloe; al tule wargwen ulubgi pensulid keg nue imakele, nuguhedsega, obal-legoe igar napiraguad maidbali; ar unnila tule ulubgi pensulid nikad isguhed eliele, igar tummad kadegwad gar imailegoe.
Tehegine, an Kwenadgan ye, Pab tummad pehmar ga we iger uisad, imaimar sunna, ulubgi pensulidgi nugumala, enug nuedgi se kolegala, ar sunna wile pemar takoe.
Eye, se egise sabed wildakedi, ar tule kantikidgi anmar per utake.
Eye, wileittomala, ar katig Pab se kormala.
Eh se kormala, arbanaile, sapurbali, eye pela pemar ibmar turgangala.
Pemar neiy uyaga se kole, eye pela pemar neggala, waidara, yohoruggu, tegi sedogi.
Eye, Pab se kole, pemar istarmalad se mel-legi akkargumalagala.
Eye, nia mer pemarse tagegala we igar nued istaradi.
Pab se kole, pemar ibmar tigar naidgala, nue sanmakegala.
Pab se kole ibmar turgan sunna melogegala.
Ar we kuablegua weyob imailesuli, nue kuage ulubgi Pab se kormala, neg uhuyagine, wargwen padsiggigwa, ar pemar nega tute sulidbali.
Al pemar Pab se korsulile, kuagegine nuhe epinsamala, palibali se kormala, pemar nudakegala, tegihinbali, tulemar pemar walig kudidihidgala.
Wegine, an kwenadgan, pemarga an soge, per morgin pinsamala we ibmar imakedi, ar wegi imaisa, tule wileged peh istar takele, ibar surmalad peh istar take, immar peh uibi sulile, uelemalad nue taisulile, wile ittodihid wile taisulile, peh marga an soge we pemar pinsagi Pab se kordimala, ibmarga pemarga kuosurmala, unnila tule pinsaed tarbogwadga kudoe, ulubgi pensulid na osulodidihi.
Tehegine, pemar insasursurmala wile emar takedi, pemar turgan yobi kudoe tulemar pemar bar abegosurmala, ibmarga kwen guosule (abele sulidbali) tulemar gi annadmaloe.
Emide Kwenadgana, anmar ibmar soisamalad pemar abingasmala, ar kaiya purba narmakar maid pad soilesa, we ibmala, wis taimala, ar isguhed na mimar sunna.
Eye, kwage nuedgi taibmar pemar an abege; ar wegi emi pentaileged iba; tegi soggu, ar pemar isguhed mimala, mer kuage isgumala, pentaileged igar maid ba imaimaloe.
Ar we napneggi tulemar na nugumaloe, Pab asabin kuisgumalagala; eye we ibagangi tule na ibmar imakoe.
Tehgi pemarga idu na soisa, bad ibmar pukidar pemarga soilesa napiraguadgine, pemarse na egise, mer bar iba osugumala, nugumala, perguhed sega; ar we ibagan pergusad sorbali, anmar ga uilegoe, sanpurba kadeguadi, wegi anmar nugusmalale, we ibagangine, ar nega sishid tanikile, kwen ibmar bar imaimalosuli.
Kwen sogosurmala, we ibagan tummad wileged tanidibeye; an nuguoe; Pab ba na naguoe, kwen weyob sogo surmala; ar anmar san purba nikad, wegihidba nodele, we ekanguhed nikuoe pemar sangi yohoed sega, nib niggine.
Ar anmar sanaroele, isguhed miedi, pemar purgedse nugusulile, wegi nia purba ba pemar nagusa, ekad yobi pemar sadoe; tule tummad purba nued pemargi pángudoe, pemargi bar togosuli, al nia pehmar sedi; ar we ib isgana pergudoe.
Ar we an wisi, tule tummad soisa, neg isganagi togo suli, unnila tule kwage nuegangi togoe; tegi soisabali, tule nuegan eneggi sigoe, mer bar noegala; ar emormar sibbula nadoe PabMachi ablis bali.
Tehgi emi kwenadgana pidigi ebinsasmalena kadina, we ibmala; Pab tobed gi pentailemaloe; Cristo taniggid mer bar pengumaloe.
Ar Pab purba nued ebo mer bar urwemaloe, unnila abingamala, Cristo enuga sehedih samala; pemar wilesaggua ittomala Pab se kormala, piar kudidibe purba ar napiraguadbali; al panebane nuedye ga soge, ibmar nuegan pemar ga uididihidbali, peman ga ede ibmar nuegan uibaloe.
Eye, ar pemarga soibali, kwenadgana, nue na taimala, palibali Pab se kole mer nia se pinsaed kalegegala, mer pemargi nagguhegala, esordaga mer kuhegala, ibagan nabid gine; ar wegi ede ibmar nuegan pemarga uisuli.
Kwenadgana pemarga na soge wilesaggua ittogedgi ibmar abingoe, mel-legi idsagua sunmaimala, pemar obad samaladgine, pemar ibmar sulidbali, ar weyob taele, tule isgana kumarmogoe emar yobi.
Ar mer pai ittomala, nue na ittomala wile dihidi, yohoedse we ibmar pela pemar ga pergudmaloe.

39.intro: Alma, e machi Corianton ga igar soisadi.
Machi, an ibmar soged pega na nika, peh kwenadgan ibmar soisa ba wis targwena; al wegihidba. ¿Peh taisasursi, pekwenad, nued edaedi Pab igar maidba eh nued tae? Wegi ¿Pega edaed nued oyodsursi?
Al ibiga dpeh, an ibmar soisadba imaisasuli, soramitas abargine, peh kwenad yobi. Al we peh ba an nasuli; kwen peh taed nue tasulli, ar ibmar peh wisidi.
Ar machi we bisuli. Peh ibmar imaisad, peba na nue nasuli; peh ga igar uilesad indaisa, Siron yarse nadgusa, Lamanitas yar kuadilenaid sega Isabel kamba saedba nade peh kude.
Ar we ome tulemar kuage obur dihile; Teginiguier, peh keg akkar sogede, susu Peh ga igar nued uilesad na nue taidih kuoena nuedgi pega uilesadi.
¿Al peh widshursi, Machi, we ibi immar isgana tule Tummad ibiya nugine. Eye bur isguhed tummadi, isguhed paiganbali Unnila we soibogwad bur tummad isguhedi ablis eyoged tegi Purba nued osulogedi.
Wegine Purba Nued sunsoged osuloged, peh sanpurbagi ubosan sorba, al wisi be osulogele, wegihidba, we igar isguhed kege bar pendailege; eye, ar Pab ibmar Nued wisid osulogedi; tegi Soggu we ibi keg Pab iege; eye Machi pega na soge we ibi kege basur osulolege.
An Machi pidiggiba we igar isgana mer pegi nagusana yeherbana. Mer bar gi sunmakena yehaebana we igar isgana imaisad, peh sanpurba mer pukib obinsaegala, al unnila peh onudakegala.
Wegihidba, na Pab asabin we igar isgana kege peh oduggwe; al unnila na peh isguhed, we ibmar na piraguadba yoho ibagan napi naguder sogoe.
An Machi, pidiggidba na peh nugusana yeherbana, al isgusad iedshaoe. Tegi mergi san ibmar abeged ba taoe, mer we ib isgana imakoe; al we ibi imakele Pab nibneg peh ga ukosuli. ¡Tegi mer we iegoe; kuage ulub se nue pinsaoe, ar we ibmar mer bar imakoe.
Tegi pega an soge, peh iamarse, arbaed igar nue egise; ar peh anba sapin kuagua peh kwenadgan, peh pentaimalad abelege. Ar emar pinsaed abingae.
Mal-legi igar isganaba, naoe; mer nia se pinsaed kalege, omegan kamba samaladba mer pinsaed kalege. Wegihidba ibiyobi peh soramitas idshosa; al peh taed taidemargua, bar an kaiya purba ittobisur guarmala.
Ar tule tummad purba nued anga soge: peh mimmiganga na soge nugumarye, merbar tulemar kuage oburegala. Tegi Soggu Machi pehga na soge, Pab tummad tobe ittoe, mel-legi bar ibmar (igar) isgana imakoye.
Kannar tule tummad igargi nue peh pinsaoe kandikidgine ar mer bar tulemar paigan kuage kaoe (isguhedgine) ibmar isgana imakegala, unnila Kannar emarse naoe, al peh isgusad sogegala tegi emar isgusad nudakegala.
Mel-legi ibmar napneggined amie, mer tummar na san sae, ar we ibi kwen sedosuli, nibneisega.
Ar emide machi pega wis ibmar soggoloena, Cristo tanikidih. Wehe pega na soge, al eh de nue tanikoe, napneg isgusad eliegala; eye Eh ibmar soinonikoe, eneggweburgala, igar nuegan pentailegedi.
We igar pega uilesa, pese kol-lesa; igar nuegan sogegala we neggweburgala, esan purbamar nudaimalagala eh margi pendaked igar taniki, emimmimar sanpurba kuagua dihi saegala, kaiya purba ittoegala, eibagan tanikidgine.
Tehgi emide wis nue gi pinsaoe, wegine, pega sogoedi. Wegihidba keger na peh ittoe ibigar sunna we ibmar idue wisguoe wegi. ¿Al peh san purba ibiyobi nuedi Pab asabinni emisguagine, Igi kudoe eibagan taniggidmodele?
¿Al abelasursi, pentaileged igar odurtakedi, we neggwebur, pemar mimmigan yobi.
¿Tule tummad, emisguagi eangemar par sur sunna keg parmidage, we ibmar sogegala, igar nuegana, igi anmar mimmigan yobi, al ibagan earbid sorba teyob soilebaloe?

Tegi an, pega ibmar soged amba nika, Machi, al wegi an peh takele pogi ittosuli pinsaedi, purgismalad kannar turgumarbaloedgine.
Wegi, na pega soge, kannar turguhed suli, ar kaiya purba wis akar an sogoena, kege purgen kwen abingasuli, isguhed yoga sahar kege abingale ib nued kege isguhed, ar Cristo nonikoed sorba we ibi abingamaloe.
Wegi, eh kannar turguhed igar mesisa taginigwele, Machi, turguhed igar yoho amba noniggi. Emide ibmar tugguar maid wis pega na sogoe; teginiguale, pukidar ibmar osabelemai, ar tule kwen widsuli unnila Pab tummad bi wisi. Ar pega ibmar wis oyogoena, Pab se na kuage ulubgi egidshadi, wisguhegala; al we ibi kannar turguhed igala.
Wegi, ibagan nagusa, pela purgismalad kannar kuisgumaloe. Teginigwer we ibgan sana nonikoe, tule kwen widshuli; ar Pab Tummad bi ewachi nonikoed na wisi.
Tegi, ar pasuli, soibigua turguhed niydibeye, irgwen irbo, ar irpaha nuydibe; al Pab tummad pela ibmar wisi ar wegi wisile pad unnidba ibmar wisi; ibagandi nagusa, pela kannar turgumaloe purgisale.
Ar ibagandi nika an epinsae, purged iba, tegi kannar turguhed ibagine.
Tegi emide an egise: ¿Igi tulemar sanpurba kudoe, ibagan purgisadsega, al ibagan kannar turgumaloedshega?
Al akarsuli, ibagan nagusa tulemargala, kanna turguhed eiba, ar tule pela purgo surmala irgwen sahale, tege we kwen akarsuli; Pab ga we iba pela ibagwen yobi, ar unnila tulemarga ibagan wilubsahar nay.
Tehgine, tulemarga eibagan turgumaloed soilenay, purgisar kannar turguoedi; ar eibagan wis ol-lole nay, purged iba, al kannar turguhed iba. Ar we ibagan soilege, tulemar sanpurba kudoedi, we an kuage ulubgi na egidsha, tule tumad sega wisguhegala; ar we ibi an wisi.
Ar pela kannar turguhed ibagan nonikile, wedo, Pab tummad taimaloe, wisi igi we iba mergu soilena dibeye tulegala.
Emidi, sanpurba tula dihid, purged, al kannar turguoed ibagande, wegi anger wargwen anga soisa pela tulemar epurbamala, sangi pangudele eye, pela tulemar purba, tule nued dibe, ar tule isgana dibe, ar seledmaloe we Pab tummad sega, anmarga sanpurba tulad uisad sega.
Tegi weyob kudoe, purba nuegan abingamaloe, weligualed neise togegala: obunnoed nega, pogidigid nega, wegi wile ettodi kusad perguoe, ar tummad pukib ittosad perguoe.
Ar tegine kudoe, purba isgana, eye tule isgana—ar wegi kwen tule tummad purba nikuosuli, ar igar isgana na susmala, ar ibmar isgana imaisa, ibmar nuedba pule tegi soggu nia purba ulibgi oubosa, ar enegga imaisa—Wemar nega sishidse parmel-ledmaloe; wegi tummad pomaloe, nugar ogodemaloe, ar eisgusmaladba weyob kudoe, ar nia soged ba igar imaisamala esoged ba selesmala.
Al weyob tule isgana esanpurba kudoe; eye, nega sishid gi tummad wiledoe, ar tobed tummadi, Pab tummad uludoe wemar sega, tegi weyob na kadegumaloe, igi tule nuegan weligualed neggi kudihigudoe, teyob na wiled marmogoe, ibagan kannar turgumalad sega.
Ar kwengwena na ittosmala, we yeher ittoed nega, al sanpurba wileged nega kannar turgumaloed idualedi, kebe saila turguoedi Ar we soidibe, we purba, al sanpurba dibe, ar igar maidi, werguhed, al wileged dibe, sunna na sogoe kannar turguoedi we igi, gi sunmailesayobi.
Tegi wegi soilesbali kannar turguoed kebe sailadi, we turguhed ibmar ambigusad, ibmar kudidihid tula ibmar ambiguoed, Cristo turgusadshe, turgumarmogoe.
Teginiguale, mer soimaloe we kannar turguhed iduedi, gi sunmailesadi, we yobi sunna san purba turguhedga kuoedi, welidar, ar tummad wilegodibe ye, mer ittomaloe weyob soiledeye.
Wegi pehga an soge; ar unnila soilege, sana an purba ebo kannar addononimar baloedi, Adan ibagangi tulemar kudih kusmalad, ar Cristo turgusad eibagansega.
Tegi irgwen naguadgi, pela kannar addomaloe, purba ar sana, we tule margi sunmailesadi, tule isgana, ar tule nuegan, bar an sogosuli; al unni an soge, pela turgumaloe, kannar turgumaloed, wemar purgemaloed, kuoedi, al Cristo kannar turgusad sorbali.
An soisuli, machi, peh turguoed, Cristo ibagangin dibeye; unnila an pinsaed pega na soge, tule nuegan sanpurbamar turgudmaloe Cristo turguoed ibagangine, ar nibneise naggwedsega.
Tegi weyob kuodibe, peh turguoedi, ar sorbardibe, pega an sogosuli; ar an pega soge ibagan naiy, purged, al turguoed ebogua, welidar ittoed, al wileged neidibe sanpurbagala, Pab tummad ibagan soisad sega, purgismalad kuisgumalagala tegi purba, san ebo kannar addoegala, ar Pab tummad asabin seledmalagala, eibmar imasmaladba igar ga meslegegala.
Ar weyob kannar ibmar kudoe, wemala, ner tummagan kaiya purbagi soilesadi.
Sanpurba kannar kuisgudoe, sanpurba pogua; eye, ar pela kuable pemar sana; eye kwen sailagia kagwen gid yogguosuli, ar pela edaileged kannar turgumaloe.
Wede Machi, kannar turgumaloed nergan soisamaladi.
Tegi tule nuegan Pab neise Kadabmaloe.
Tehegine, wegi purged wileged nonikoe tulemar isgana sega; ar eibmar nued takedba na purgemala, al isgana, tegi, Pab neise ib isgana kwen togesuli; ar parmel-ledoe, eibmar imasmaladba, na nadmaloe, ar idshagua nanasmala, al ib isgana na kobmaloe.

Tegi emi machi, peh ga ibmar soged wis an nika kannar turgumarbaloed gi sunmailesadi, ar wegi kwennagwenna kaiga purba maid eittolegedba soisamala, ar aulale yoggudmala. Ar an peh takele, peh pinsaed pohonasuli, we ibmar soilesadgine; ar wegi pega na nue sogoe.
Ar Machi, pega an sogi, kannar turguhed igar maidi, Pab tummadga nue abeleged igar inniggiguad maidi, ar we nue abelege pela kannar ibmar nued gi ambiguhedi Wegi nue abelege, inniggiguadi, Cristo al turgusadba, tule sanpurba kannar turguhed sanale kude, tegi wede pela ibmar nikad kannar nikuoe.
Tegine Pab igar maidgi nue abelege, al tulemarga igargan amilegoe, eibmar imamaladbali; ar tehegin bali, eimmar nuegan wegi imaisale, kuagegine nued imaisabahle, wehmar kannar nuhedgi kwisgumaloe, ibagan pergudele.
Ar eimmar imaisamalad na kudmaloe, isganale, idshagua turguoe tehegine ibmar pela eigargan megisadbali, kannar ambigudoe; ibmar soisogwen edanikiyobi—sun purged kuisgudoe, kege bar purgedgala; ib isganna kege bar isguhedgala—turguhed welidarad keg perguhedi, Pab neise naegala, al tummad wilegegar dibe, kege perguhedi nia neg abingaegala, ibmar soggwen paidshigi, al ibmar paidi;
Tule wargwen turguoe dibe wergwegala, eibmar abegedbali, werguhed nuedgindike, ibnued abesadbali, tegi paid ib isgana, ibmar isgana abesadbali; ar wegihidba ibmar isgana imaidihi kusadi; weyob na ibmar isgana abingaoe, mutikid tanikile.
Tegi weyob ibmar kumoga paid shiggi, al isgusad nue misdibe, ar igar nuegan bi imasdibe eibagan perguhed sega, teheyobi igar nuegan gar uiledoe.
Wehmarde tule tummad ba pentailedoe eye, al mutikid keg perguhedgine sanpurba onogoe; al weyob nuguodibe, al isgudodibe; wegihidba na wawargwen igar amidmaloe, al ibmar nuegan imakodibe, ar ib isgana imakodibege.
Ar Paba igargan mesismalad Keg kuage, tegisoggu tulemarga pela igar megisa, we tule abegile sunna eh ba kudihi kudoe, ar pentailegoe.
Machi mer nagi todoe, Pab tummad mer nug idshoe, we igargan odurtaimaidgine, wese na peh san idshosa, isguhed igar bali.
Mel-legi na sogoe, ar kannar turguhed igargi an sunmaisadi, isguhedgi na kannar, werguhodibeye Wegi an soge igar isguhed, kuen, werguhed igar nued suli.
Pela tulemar kudihid edaniggigua, ar igi san nika kudihi yobi, na naibi ittodidihi, tegi na isgudidihi; Paba tummad suli kudidie napneggine, ar Paba ba ib imaisasuli, tehegine yeher ittoe kwen kudisuli.
Tegi wegi. ¿Soilege kannar ibmar nonimaloed, tanikidyob kúdoe, ar ibmar tankidbo kusulile, ar ib nonikoed kwen tanikidba kuosuli?
Machi weyob suli; al soilege kaiga purba kannar bar ibmar amiledoe, kannar (nuedi) pineledoe, isgana al isganagala, sana ar sangala, ib nia ga ar nia gadi, nued, ib nuedi, igargan nuegan, nueganga kudoe.
Tehegine, Machi nue tae peh kwenadgangala; nuedgi sabguhe, igar inniggiguadba imake, ar ib nuegan bi imake, tehegine peh ib nuegan abingade; eye wile taked kannar pes nonikoe; igar nuegan kannar megoe, ar ibmar nuegan uiledoe.
Tehegine peh gi ibmar nodmaloedi, kannar pese nonibaloe; tegi soggu Kaiya purba kannar nonikoedi, tule isgudihid odurtailegoe, soged bali, ar kwen gar wis igar akar soilegosuli.

Ar Machi an peh takele, wis ibmar gi amba nue pinsasur an take, ar akar peh ittoe, Pab igar maidgine, tule isgana odurtailegoedgine; al ibiga na pinsae, kuen igar inniggid suli, tule isgusdihid, nei isganase naoe.
Wegi, Machi, na pega nue sogae. Paba tule tummad anmar pabgan sailagined. Werguhed neggi parmeded sorbali, napneggi arbadih saegala, ar ibe sulesa—eye, tule onosa, tegi werguhed neggi tada nakwesigi paliwiturmar okuidshisa, ar esa sohoyobi kae imaisa, igar oburegala, sapi sanpurba tulad odugguhegala.
Taimalana, ar tule Pab tummad yobi kude, na wisgudmala ibnued, ib isgana; tegi mel-legi argan oyogegala, al sapi sanpurba tulad mer suegala, ar kunnegala, kadegu kudihi saegala, Paba tule tummad, paliwiturmar okuidshisa, ar esa kaniggi sohoyobi kae imaisa, tulemar mer bar sapi turba ittogegala.
Tegi anmar taimala, tulega ibagan uilesa, nuguhegala; eye, ibagan wilubdailegedi, ibagan isguhed miedi, ar Pabga arbaegala.
Tegi wegihidba, ar Adan eargan no oyosana yogasahale, sapi sanpurba nikad ittoegala, al ede bar kwen purged ittosulina Pab tummad kaiya purba soisadba kudoena, kwen na isguhed miosulina, eye, ar Pab tummad Kaiya purba kwen nuedga kudshurbalina, tegi igar tummad pentaileged mesisad kwen ga ibmar ga kudsulina.
Ar wegi, tulega purged ogalesa—al tegi sapi sanpurba tulad gi padshigusa, teyobi napney tirbir naidgi padshigusa—ar tulede nue isgud taile sunna, tegi sadegua; eye, tule isgana ga na kudoena.
Tegi, peh Take, teggi soggu anmar pabgan sailagined, tule tummadgi na pangurdmala napneggine, ar purbale; tehegine. Wawargwen eittoleged ba na kudmar sunna.
Wegihidba, nabir suli tule pentailegoed wis shiguas purgedgine, tegi soggu igar tummad yeher ittoed maid obelodoe.
Ar tegi soggu, sanpurba kege purged soggudina, ar tule isgusadgi purged nonisunna, teyobbali noniki sigguas pingedi pela tulemargine. Weyob soilege yobi, tule tummad asabin padshiggude—tegi soggu igar nue mesisa, pela tule pentaileged we purbar purgedgine.
Tegi na sanginbi pinsadmala, isgude, ar nia ga na san uidemala, taniggidgi, we nega wilub taileged ga nagusa, wemar ga na nudaimmalagala; tegine we nega ibmar nutakega kudsunna.
Tegine Machi mer iegoe, igar pentaileged sulina (wis obane) pemar sanpurba. Wiledmaloena purgidele, al Pab tummad walig bar kudihi kuo surmalana.
Ar pentaileged igar sulina tulemar isgusmalad gala, eh tuggin na imaisa, ehba ibmar imaisad sulidbali.
Tegi soggu, igar pentaileged maidba imailed sulina Unnila, eisgusmalad na mismalana, we gi wilub tailedihidbali, eye we napneg wilubtailedi; ar tegi sulina, wile taileged ibmarga kuosulina, igar nued maid kwen akalogosurbali. Ar igar nued imailemaid, kwen idsholego suli, tegi ar Paba, Pabtummadga bar kuosuli.
Ar weyob na taimala, pela tule mar igar inniggiguad, igar samaloe; eye Pab igar maid soilemai walig kudihi na bar kuosurmala.
Ar igar wiledaileged maid, key kwe nudaileged sulile; tegi soggu Pab Tummad napneg isguhed mioe, igar wiledaileged maid ba imakegala, Pab tummad, Pab inniggiguadi, nuedi ar wile anmar taibalidi.
Ar nuguhed sulina, tulemar kwen odurtailege sulina, tegi soggudina, we odurtaileged igar kadegumogoe, igi sanpurba tulad kadegua yob moga, igar welidarad maid ebo akala, ar kadeguadi, igi san purba yobmoga.
Tegi ¿Igi tule nuguoe, ar isguhed sulile? ¿Igi na isgumaloe, igar maid sulile? ar ¿Igi igar imailegoe, odertaileged sulile?
Ar odurtaileged igar megisa, tegi igar inniggigwadga kusa, tulemarga na nue wile ittoed epinsaed ga uilegegala.
Tegi igar uilesulina, tule wargwen, tule oburgele oburgelemogoe. ¿Tobed nika na ittosale purgoedi, ar tule wargwen oburgisale?
Al igar masurbalina, isguhed ga akale, tulemar kwen tobe isgudidih sulina.
Ar igar meisulina. ¿Igi igar maid kusana tulemar isgudele? ¿Al wiletakedi? Tegi kwen tule akalogosulina.
Tegi soggu igar uilesa, odurtaileged igala megisa, al isguhed mied igar uilesa, teisoggu wiletaked abelegedi; tegi sulina, igar inniggi maid, tulemar tula didihidgi sogoena, ar igar imakoe, soged bali odurtailemaloena, igar inniggigwad maid perguoe, ar Paba, bar Pab tummadga kuosulina.
Paba, kwen Pab tummad ga perguosuli, ar wiledaked igar soimai isguhed na elimala; tegi wiledaileged taniki isguhed elied igargine, as isguhed igar noniki kannar turguhed igarbali. Purgismalad kannar turguhed, tulemar ga kusa Pab se nakwegala; tegi weyob kannar nakwisgudabmaloe, igargan napi balamimalagala, igarsogedbali, ar igar maidbali.
Tehegine wegi, igar maid, na ekanguhed ba igar imakoe, al wiledaked igar na eigar maid egismoga; ar weyobi tule wargwengid pentailegosuli, ar tule isguhed napiraguadgi na misulile.
¿Weyob kudoe peh ebinsasa; wile taked igar, igar inniguad ibe eigar addursae? Pega an soge weyob suli; pibigid suli. Ar wegihile, Paba, Pab tummad ga bar kuo suli.
Tegine, weyob Pab tummad eigargan mesisad kadeguad imake, ar pado mesisa napneg kebe obinnisgua. Ar weyob pentaileged imake tulemar pentailegegala, teheginbali, na tummad wilemalodibeye.
Tehegine, Machi na taibimalale, sunna taimaloe, eittolegedbali, tihi sanpurba nikad sega; ar taibisurmalale abbole imailegosuli; teginiguale ibagan pergudele, kannar onolegoe, ibmar imasmaladi.
Ar igar isgana imaibiele, al isguhed misulile eibagangine, wegi ib isgana abingaoe, Paba kannar ibmar oniedshega.
Al emidi Machi, weyob na peh pinsadihid indake, we ibmala unnila peh isgudihid bi na pinsae, we peh pukibpinsaedi, peh isgusad nudakegala.
¡An Machi ye, pidigibali Paba igar inniggi maid mel-legi osulegen yeherbana! Mer peh isguhed, pibisahale na gi bar pinsae, Paba igar inniggi maid ba imake, ewiledaked igala, ar ekanguhed sehedihidi, pela peh kuagese ouboge; ar Pab asabin na peh pingeg kuoe.
Wegihidba Machi ye, Paba pehse Kodsha, ekaiya purba par sogega Kuhegala, we neggweburgala. Peh igarba, na peh nae, Machi, Kaiya purba napiraguad gi parsoinae, tegi sunna tulemar isgusmalad nudakegala, igar wile dáked maid sunna imailegegala wemargala. Tegi Pab tummad igar pega ukoe, weyob na peh ga soisa yobi.

Tegi pirga tulataled igalagwen kaga tula paha kaga nergua gine, Nefitas mer amba na isgididih kudmala, eye, isguhed tummadi, Lamanitas mardina kandikidgi nue Pab igarba nanadmala, Moises igar soimaidbali.
Ar we pirgagine, ibmar weob kude, Sarahemla Gwebursega, Samuel ye tule nugad noniggi, Lamanita wargwen, Pab igar parsogegala neggweburgala. Tegi isguhed nutagedgi gar sunmaide ibagan undaradgine; al ononnosmala, tegi nue na nasoggalina eneggwebursega.
Wegihidba tule tummad kaiya purba se Kornoniggi, Kannar peh naye, ar neggwebur Owisonaye, peh kuage gi, pela ibmar gi peh pinsaedi.
Tegine yabba neggweburse odobi kuarmala tehegine Kasdibir midgine nakuisa, argan oyode, tegi kantigidba ibmar soide, neggweburga ibmar kuoed owisosa, Pab ga kuage se ibmar oubosad na soisa.
Ar an soide: Wegi, ani Samuel, Lamanita wargwena, tule tummad Kaiya Purba an soge, an ga soisadi kuagegine; tegi webi. Eh de purba nued angi oubosa, na pehmarga soimoga. We neggwebur tummad wilegoe, igar napira maidmali; al kwen pirga tulataled ila pake onaosuli, we ibi kuoe.
Eye, tummad nega akarkuoe, al napira taniki, ar tule wargwen gid kwen pentailegosuli, unnila na isguhed mimalar kebe, tegi Esucristo tule tummad ulubgi pensulidgine, ar napiragua napneise nonikoe, ibmar pukidar, tummad wilegoe, eneggweburgala purgoe.
Tehegine, anger wargwen anga soisa, anga ibmar nuegan, ulubse weligualed soisa. Ar wegihidba, an parmileali pehmarga sogegarmo, tegi soggua ibmar nuegan pemar abingamarmoga gala; ar teginiguar pehmar an abingad surmala.
Tehgine weyob tule tummad soge Nefita Tulemarur ekuage tudusuli, al unnila isguhed na mimalar kebe, an kaiya purba na obanguoe we margine, an purba nued onobaloe, ar bar abdakosuli, we tulemala, tegi ekwenadgan gin idshagua pinsadmaloe.
Ar pirga tuladaled ila pake kwen aosuli, ani naibi ittoged. We neggwebur saoe, eye, urwed tummad tanikoe, uki mesedi, tummad purgemarbaloe.
Eye, an gin tummad uludoe, ar pehmar wagan soebaked tanikid gi wis istarmalad nonikoe, kudih kudmaloe pehmar pela obelogegala; ar we napira kuoe, isguhed misurmalale, tule tummad soge; tegi wagan soipaked gine tanimaloed takoe, pela obelolegoe.
Tehgine pehmar isguhed mimalale, Pab tummad se na taimalale, an urwed na osulogoe, tule tummad soge; eye, weyob Paba soge; tule dar nuedi, tulemar isgudidihid mismalale, al an se kannar taimala. ¡Ar tuledar wilegoe isguhed misurmalale!
¡Eye, Sarahemla Neggwebur wiledoe, ar wegihidba tulemar nuegan nikadba pentailesa! ¡Eye ibiyobi wiledoe we neggwebur tummadi, al wegi an take, tule tummad soge, tule bur melu angi isgusa, Paba soge.
Ar tule nuegan al isgusad na mismala, al an pendakoe. Tehgine tulemar nuegan sulina, we neggwebur tummadgi soho nibneggined an odegoena neggwebur obelogegala.
Wegihidba tule nuegan sabedbali pentailesa. Teginiguar ibagan taniki, Paba soge, wehmar abargine tulemar nuegan onolegoe, tegi soggua wegihidba obelolegoe. ¡Eye, we neggwebur tummad na nue wiledoe eisgudimaladbali, wegi tummad nega akar kudoe.
¡Eye, Edeon neggwebur na dar nue wiledoe isguhed tummad nikadbali!
¡Eye, pela neggweburmar tikarba puimalad, Nefitasmar Tanikid, tummad isgusmala!
Tehgi, wegine, we neggwebur tummad ugabsalegoe, Pab tummad we yob soge, we neggwebur isgusadbali, ar nue isgus puimala.
Ar weyob neg kudoe, Paba tule tummad soge, eye anmar Paba tummad napiraguadi, al pela ibmar nuegan odukusmalale napa yobali, kwen bar amiosurmala, tummad ukab salesadbali neggwebulu, unni tule nued we ibi odukusdibe, al Pab tule tummad soged ba imakegala.
Tehgi, tule tummad soge, an abeged ba ibmar osabogoe, angala. Ar ukabsalegoe we tulemar, we ibmar anga osabosulile, anga ar kwen osabosurmala, al tulemar nuegangala; tegi tule wargwen anga ibmar nued osabosulile, al ukabsalesadgine.
Ar ibagandi nonikoe e ibmar osaboedi, al na maniginbi pinsadi kudmaloe; e istarmalad gi pangudmalale, na keb ibmar nuegan osaboe; ar we ibi anga osabodsurmala, tegi soggua ukabsalegoe, ibmar bogua; al ah ibagangine tummad odurtailemaloe, nailigkumaloe, weyob tule tummad soge.
Wegine neggwebur tummad edulamar an Kaiya purba ittomala; eye, tule tummad Kaiya purba ittomala; ar wegihidba eh de soisa, pehmar ukabsalesmala, mani niymaladbali, al pehmar mani ukab salesa ar mani ginbi pinsadidihidba, we tule ekaiya purba soisad, pehmar nue ittos surmaladba.
Pehmar na epinsasurmar si, tule tummad, pehmar Paba, ibmar unnidibali pehmargala uisadi, al unnila pehmar mani ginbi pinsamala, Paba ibmar pehmarga uisad ga nuedye soisurmala; eye, pehmar Kuagegi, Pabgi pinsurmala, unnila tummar ba na imaibimala, na san odummobimala, istar na taimala, urwedih, itoagua pimsamala, tule kindaimala, ar isguhed pukidar na niymala.
Tegi Soggua Paba tummad we neggwebur wiode, pehmar mani ukabsalede, ar wede pehmar isgudidikidbali.
Eye, ¡We neggwebur nue dar wiledoe, al ibagan noniki, ner tummagan obademala, we morgine na pehmar tododmala, akkuagi maidemarbali, tegi kindaisamarbali, eh margi tummad nodih kudmarbali, ibagan epinneguad yobi imaide marmoga.
Emide, pehmar summaidibe, soidemala: Ar anmar Pabgan ibagan gi kudimalana, kwen nergan oburgiles surmalana; kwen akkuagi maisa surmalana, kwen ononnoled surmar balina.
Wegihedba, wehmarba, pehmar tule isgana sunnadi, ar tule tummad mai, pehmar se ner tummad noniggile, Pab kaiya pruba gi summainonigile, pehmar isgudidihidbali, eh se pehmar ulud damala, al ononnod damala, pehmar, tehgi oburgebi tamarbali; eye, pehmar soidemar balile, ner sunnad suli, tule isgana, ar magadi, al pehmar isgudihid, ibmar isgana imaimalad soge.
Tehgine, tule wargwen peh marse nonikile, al pehmar ga sogele: we peh ibmar imake, ar isgana suli; wede peh imake, ar kwen akar kuosuli; eye, al peh mar soge: peh taed ba, na peh tae peh kuage bali; eye, peh ittolegedbali, peh takedbali, tegi na pehmar ibmar imakoe kuage bali, ar tule wargwen weyob pehmarga sogele abingasmalale, tegi soide malale we nele tummadi.
Ar pehmar odummosmalale, al pehmar ibmar nikad gar uisamalale; pehmar olo, mani nikad ga uisamalale, ar mor nued ga yosmalale, pehmarga ibmar nuegan bi soisale, tegi, eh isguhed pehmar taisasurmalale.
¡Ar tule isgana sunnadi; pehmala Gwebur Kwen nuedsuli, al kuage isgana! ¿Iba pule melu pehmar, Paba pehmar abiddogoe? Eye, ¿Sana we igar isgana pehmar osulogoe, aku ittomala, tule isganaba pehmar nanamala? ¿Sana na osulomaloe nei sishidgi Kudidihd, ar nei mehguad amimaloe.
Eye, wegihidba Pab Tummad ulude pehmar isgudihdba; wegi neggwebur ukabsalesa, pehmar isgusmaladbali.
Tegi wegi wadshi oarmaisa, pehmar mani niymalad ukabsalegoe, ar kwen bar kaosurmala, kwen bar osabosurmala; ar wileged iba nonikile kwen bar nudailegosuli.
Ar wileged wadshi noniggi le, Pabse koddemaloena; tehgi na pinsase kormaloe al pado wileged tummad noniggi, ar napiragua pehmar pergumaloe, tegi Soggua na podmaloe, ar pinnasur kodemaloena, tule tummad soge; tehgine tummad pukib na ittomaloe, ar soidemaloe.
¡Tule wiledmala, na nugusmalana, ar nergan purgidsulina, al akkuagi maisasurmalana, ononnodsurmarbalina! Eye, we ibagangi soimalona al anmar Pab Tummad epinsaimalana, mani we ibagangi anmar ga uisagua tegi soggua weyob anmar gi pangudsulina, ar kwen anmar oedsulina, ar wegi ani ar mani, anmargi wagidmala.
¡Wegihidba, wegi esgoromar na opedmala, ar panegidba bar taimalosuli, wegi anmar esmar metemala, ibagangi amismalana urwegala.
Eye namar oduggusmala anmar mani, al anmargi yokusa, we neggwebur ukabsalesadgine.
¡Ar anmar isguhed mismalana, Pab kaiya purba anmarse nonigua! Tegi we napney ukabasalesa, ar pela ibmar tuhurmaide, kwen keg bar kalege.
Wegihibba, nia anmar ebilisa, eye, anger isgana anmar ebilisa, anmar san purba obelobi kusmaladi. Wegihidba anmar tummad isgusmala. Pab tummad ¿Anmar se peh urwed wis sunna osulosale? Tegi weyob pehmar na soidemaloe yohoe.
Wegihidba, ibagan wilub taileged nasoe; pentaileged ibagangine pehmar abid dosurmala, ar padnasa, tegi wileged tummad nue taniggi, eye ar pehmar ibagangi na mani bi abesmala, ibi nued kwen nikudshurmala; ar werguhed amismala na isguhed imaidemala, ibmar edanikidba akale, we igar innigiguad mardi, anmar tummad sadeguadi.
¡Ar pidigiba we yala an Kaiya purba ittosmalana Kaidina! Tegi na pehmarse kole, Pab Tummad urwe maid osulomala, al pehmar isguhed mimala, ar pentailemaloe.

Tehgine Samuel Lamanita ibmar pugidar owisosad, ar kwen namailes suli.
Ar pehmarga na soga: wegi, pehmarga ibmar oyogoe, al pirga atale nadoedgine, tehgi wegidba Pab Machi nonikoe, tulemar enuga pensurmalad pendainonikoe.
Al wegidba a ibagangi pehmarga ibmar oyalegoe: Ar wegine kual-lumar tummagan tailedagoe nibali, tegi soggu nega sishid naguosuli mudiki, edaniggile, al tulemar ga tailedoe ibgine yobi.
Tehgine, ibagwen naguoe, mudiki, ar iba paidi, ibagwen yobi, al mudikid kwen naguosuli; wedi ibmar oyolegoe pehmargala: ar tada arguanmai tailegoe, tegi tada nakwe tani tailedoe; ar weyob wisgudmaloe napiraguadgine ibbo naguoe, ar mudikid ibagwena; teginiguale, neg sishid naguosuli mudikidbali; al kualulegoed idu mudikid naguoe.
Ar wegihidba nihisgua kuabid naguoe, kwen tailedisulidi; tegi we yob pehmarga ibmar oyolegoe.
Tegi, wegi, webi we ibmar oyolegosuli, ar ibmar pukidar oyolegoe, ibmar tailedisulid tailegoe nabneggine.
Al ibi yobi keger pehmar taidemaloe, tegisoggu napagi na megid maloe, keger tagedbali.
Ar weyob kudoe, Pab Machi pensurmalad ulubgine, san purba kege purged abingaoe.
Tegine wegi, tule tummad an parmiali, e anger wargwen anga ibmar soisadba, peh taiye we ibmar sogega; eye, an barmiali pehmarga we ibmar owisogega; eye an ga soisa: we neggwebur ga ibmar soge: ar isguhed mimala, tegi Pab igarba nanamala.
Ar ani Lamanita, al tule tummad Kaiya purba parsoisa, an parmialidbali, tegi pehmar napir ittossurmala, pehmar an se uludmala, tegi pehmar an oburgebi kusmala, pehmar an ononnodmala.
Unnila an kaiya purba pehmarga na soge, aulale kasdibir pirgine an nagwisa we neggwebur gine, we ibmar ibmar pehmar ittogegala, ar Pab tummad igar maid na imaidoe, pehmar abiddomai, pehmar isgusmaladba, ar wisguhegarbali isgusad mied eigar maidi.
Al wisguhegarbali, Esucristo tanikidi, Pab Machi, nibneg e Paba, ar napnega ePaba, kebe saila unni pela ibmar obinnisadi; tegi wisguhegala edaniggile ibmar oyolegol kuage ulubgi mer enuga pengumala gala.
Tegi enug pensulile pehmar nuguhele, sunna we yob pehmar pentailesale, ar eh nued taedbali.
Ar wegi pehmar ga ibmar paid oyolebaloe, eye, epur goed pehmarga oyolebaloe.
Tehgine, napiragua purgoe, al pendaileged sunna nonikigala; eye, pur nue abelege purgedi, purgismalad turguhegala, tehgine wede tulemar, sunna tule tummad kannar nakwegala.
Eye, wegine, we purged, senonikoe turgwedi, pentailegedi, pela tulemargala, purged iduedi, wede purbar purgedi; ar Pab gi padsikusmala, Adan Pab gi kebe nosgua, soilege tulemar pela kuable purgismala, we ibmar napneggined, teh yobbali ar ibmar purbaledi.
Wegihidba Cristo turguhed, pela tulemar pendakoe, eye, pela kuable tulemala Pab tummadse kannar namalagala.
Eye, nugued igar maid imakegala, tule wargwen na isgwed miele kwen oper guosuli, ar sohogine mel-lego suli; al tule wargwen na nugusulile obelolegoe, sohogi mel-ledoe; tegi soku kannar purged purbaled se nonikoe; eye, purged soiboguadi, al kannar ibmar pangudoe, igargan nuegan maidgadi.
Tegi soku nugumala, nugumala, mel-legi wwidshuli yob saoe we ibi, ar we igar imaisulile tummad wiledoe, ar purged soiboguad peh sedoe.
Igi na pehmarga sunmaisad yobi ibmar oyolegoe, epurgoed oyolegoe, wegi eiba purgoedgine nega sishid naguoe, ar pehmarga Kual-lu Kaosuli, teyob kudbaloe nihi, nihisgua, tehgine we napneggine nega meheguad tai legosuli, iba paha we naguoe, ar eiba turguedsega, tulemar purgismalad abargine.
Eye, epurba na uisad ibagine, mala pukub imaidoe, wadshimar undar naguoe, ar napneg wawanmaidoe; al akkuamala, napba yaba simalad, napba pirgi pukuad, emi anmar wisi tudusur puguadi, ar mamaridoe.
Eye napa apalal-la maridoe, al tegi kadeguoe, ahsorbali, napa olo-ol-lo kudoe, ar mamaridoe, kwen bar akarguosuli, pela napa tirbir naid teyob kudoe, eye napa pirgine, al napa yabali.
Tehgine purwa tummad nohoe, yar pukidar surgudoe, nebamarga kudoe, nebamala yarga pinnidoe, yala tummad ga kudmaloe.
Ar ibmar pukidar mamaridoe, tegine Gwebur pukidar surgudoe.
Tehgine uannega pukidara eburgarmalad uidemaloe, ar tule nuegan pukidara tailedagoe.
Al wegi, wede eh anger anga soisa: ar anga soisa, mala pukidar imakoe, wadshi undaradbali.
Al anga soisa, undar mala imakedgine, purwa tummad noedgine, we ibmar tailegoe, tegi nap nega pela kuable nega sishid ibapahagua naguoe.
Tehgine anger anga soisa ibmar tummagan pukidar kwennagwennagua toidemaloe, mer bar pengumalagala, al ibmar tailedisurmalad tailedoe, we yargine, mel-legi tulemar mimimar penguegala.
We tulemar pengubisurmalad, sunna pentailegoe, ar tulemar pengumaloedi, igar tummad wileged gar oyoledoe, na tuggin samaloe.
Tehgine ebinsamala, ebinsamala, kwenadgana, tule yokuoed, yoguoe na tugginne, isgudihile, na tuggin wiodoe; tegi wegi, pehmar ittolegedba. Kudidihi, ar pehmar wawargwen ibmar imaidimala, al Paba, pehmarga ibmar wisgued uisamala, ittolegedba kudimala.
Eh pehmarga, ibmar nued imaked uisa, ibmar isgana imaked dibe, ar san kadeguad, san purged suodibe; tegi nued tamalo dibe, ibmar nuegan imako dibe, ibmar nueganbi abingamalo dibe ye, al igar isgana imako dibe, ibmar isganabi imaidi kudodibeye.

Ar emide an kwenadgana, wegi pehmarga soge, ar pehmar nugusurmalale, pehmar neimala kwena bar ambiguosurmala.
Eye, pehmar isguhed misurmalale, pehmar omegan poed gin obiddemaloe eibagan mimmimar nikudmalale; al waginbi na kudmaloena, kwen tugguhed nega amiosurmala; eye. ¡Tule dar wiledmaloe, tey dihidgine ukkusulidba keg wakin kudmaloe; tehgine gin yoledmaloe, ar obeledoe purgegala.
Eye, ¡Ar tule dar wiledmaloe we neggwebur, enuga Nefita neggwebur ye, ar nugusulile we ibmar pela oyolegoe; ibmar tailedisulidi, ga oyoledoe! Tehgine tule tummad we neggwebur egadga na imausa, ehde Nefi neggwebur sabgusa, tegi tummad odurdaisa bali, eye ede tummad wiosa eibagan isgusadgine, al ede sobe.
Tehgine, an kwenadgana, Lamanitas di ede isdar taisa eisgudidihidbali, nue isgusmala, epabgan isgusmaladbali. Teginiguale, ehmar pentaileged iba noniki, Nefitas mar ga Pab igarba sunmas maladgine; ar tegi soggu Paba eibagan ga osugusa.
Ar pehmar nue taimala Lamanitas di, bur melu nue, kandikidgi Pab igar maidba nanadimala, ga igargan uilesmalad, Paba igar maidba tamala, Moises igar soile maidbali.
Eye, pemarga soge bur melu emar weyob tamala, nue gin pinsamarbali, ekwenadgan odurdaimala ibmar napiraguadgine; tegi soggua, tule pukidar panebane Pab ba nagumala.
Al wegihidba pehmar nue wismala, ar taisamala, tegi emar ibmar napiraguadba wisgusmalale, na taide damala epabgan tanikid eigar nue isgana, tegi soggu Pab kaiya purba maid ulubgi pensuli na kuddama eye, ibmar kuoed owisolemaidi, narmailesadi, Pab tummad kuage ulubgi pensulid, ar isguhed miede, na taed oguamala kuagegine.
Tehgine na nue wisgunonimalale, pemar sunnad wisgunonimaloe, kege bar kuage ulubgi pensulud nikudmaloe, ar wemar de eittoleged ba kudih imailesa.
Ar wismarbali, na tobe ittomala kannar a wemalad, ar bar isgubisurmala; eye, na nue taimala, na tobmala isguhede, tegi wegi bar mer pukib pinsamala, mel-legi istarmalad oburgegala ehmarsega mer bar kingi oyomala; wede kuage ulubgi Cristo pensulid nikusadbali.
Al-ulubgi pensulid nikudmalale, kandikid ba kudih na kudmala, ehmar ibmar nue wisgusmalale, wegihdba tule tummad ibmar nuegan uke, ar eibagan gar omeloe, isgusmalan inigwena.
Eye, amba Pab ieddamar inigwena, tule tummad eibagan ga asugwe, ibagan nonikidsega, anmar pabgan nega oisosadshega, tegi weyob ner Zenos, tegi nergan pukidar owisosa, anmar kwenadgan Lamanitas kannar ambigunonikoedi, igar napiraguad kannar wisgudmaloe.
Eye, pehmarga soge, Paba ibmar soisadi, anmar kwenadgan Lamanitas ibagan nabid se nonimaloe, ar tummad wilemaloe, teginiguale we yob na wisgudmaloe, istar tailedmaloe, obadledmaloe, paleginnedmaloe, nap neggine oburguledmaloe, oduhurmaledoe, kwen tukwed nega amiosurmala, Paba na wile ehmar taidebaloe.
Ar wede weyob owisolesadbali igar napiraguad wisgwed selenonibaloe, ar wede epentailegoed wisguoe, al eidued tummadi ar eagwed napiraguadi, tegi esibad paiganba addomamogoe.
Tehgine pehmarga na soge ar bur nuedi emargala, pehmargala, ar pehmar nugusurmalale.
Wegihdba al emarga ibmar pukidar oyelesana, peh marga oyelesadgi, eye, weh mar na pengudmala, epabgan tanimalad igar na imaidemala, pemar na nue taimarmoga, kwen bar pergudsurmala.
Tehegine, Paba soge mer bar obelogoe pela kuablegi, unni yohoe ibagan tanikoe, anse kannar taimaloe, tule tummad soge eibagan gar nonikoe.
Ar wegine, weyob Paba soge Nefita neggweburgala: Al nugusurmalale, an igar (maid) sogedba nue dasurmalale, pela obelolegoe, ehmar ibmar pengudmaladbali Pab tummad soge, ehmar abargi ibmar oyosa; ar Paba mai we ibmar kuoe eh de soge.

Tehgi weyob kude Samuel Lamanita, kasdibirgi ibmar soisad tule pukidar ittosmala. Ar ulubgi pengudsurmala ekaiya purba soisadi ahmar Nefi aminadmala; tegi amismargua tule isgusmalad na soidema egusmaladi, kwen osulos surmala, tegi Pab tummad ba bautisar sabi na kudmala.
Ar Samuel kaiya purba pengudmalad, se uludmala; al akkuagi midmala, sigu pukidar gi midmala, kasdibir pirgi kwiskusgua; ar Pba purba nued, ehba Kudih, Kwen akkalossurmala.
Al weyob taisamargua kwen akkalos surmala, tule paigan pukidar esunmaisad penugdsurmala, Nefi aminad kudmala, bautisar imaimalagala.
Tegi wegihidba, Nefi tulemar baudisar imaidi nakude, ibmar tanikid owisode, ar Pab igar maid odurdaide, ibmar tummad tailedisulid oyode, tegine tule ibmar sadi sulid imaide, neggwebur abargine, teyob na wisgusmala Cristo emisgua taniki.
Ibmar kuoed owisode emisgua gi kudmaloedi, wisgumalagala, ar epinsamaloe, idu pado soilesadi, eibagan nagunonikile, mer bar pengumalaga; tegi soggu, Samuel Kaiya purba soisad tulemar pengudsurmalad, Nefi se na nadmala baudisar samalagala, isguhed midmala, tegi na isgusad soidemala.
Ar bur melu Samuel ibmar soisad ittos surmala; tegi soggu, taidemala kwen akkalossumala, tulemar etummaganga pinnasuli koddemala, kamarye, al edinmarye, we tule nia sedihi, tegi nia purba kanguhedba kege akkarguye; tegi soggu kamar ye edismarye, oburgemarye.
Tehgine tulemar ehse nadmargua, wegihidba kasdibir taisig na aidesa, eyarse wagidsha, ahagine igargan maidba na summaide, ar odurdaidebali, al nega owisodbali, edulemala weyob uwisode.
Ar wegihidba ehde bar ittoles suli Nefitas mar abargine; tegi weyob na neggwebur ga na arbadi nakude.
Teyob pergusa pirga tulataled ilagwen kaga turbah kaga nergua, tummagan neiytaimai kusmalad ibagangine, Nefi neggweburgine.
Ar weyob pirga tulatale irgwen kaga tula paha kaga kuhile pergudbali, tummagan neiy taisamalad ibagangine bur melu tulemar isgudidih na nue kudmala, al tule idshegua Pab tummad nanadmala kandikidgine.
Ar amba weyob neg kude pirga tulataled kaga paha kaga pahabaka gine, tummagan neiy taimai kusmalad ibagangine.
Tehgi pirga tulatale kaga tulapaha kaga pakebaka wis sigwas neiy Kwaisa, ar amba nega isguhed na kege pengwe, nue tummad isgudmala, Pba igargan maid kwen imai surmala.
Tegine pirga tulataled ilagwen kaga tula pake gine, ibmar tummagan tailedisurmalad, tailede we neggweburgine; ar teyob kude nergan ebbinne neiy owisosmaladi.
Ar tulemar ibmar wisimalad, angermar taidemala, nega owisodmala, welidaradgine; teyob we pirga, ibmargude kaiya purba narmailesmaladi.
Teginiguale tulemar nue isgudmala, Nefitas mala, teyob moga Lamanitas mala unnila tulemar nueganbi, we ibmar nue maga ittosmala, eibmar wisgusmaladba soidemala.
Ibmar pukidar na ittolegedba soide kudmalana; al wegi na wismala ibmar tummagan dailedisurmalad owisolesad kege pela kuable kwe.
Al na pinsadmala, soidemala, wawargwen soidemala.
Ar tule wargwen Cristo ye nugan Kwen tanikosur insasurmala; eye weyobi Pab Machi de, Paba nib negginedi, ar napnegginedi, ar igi soisa, ¿Ibiga Erusalem gi ibmar oyelesa yobi anmarga oyolego suli?
Eye, ¿Ar weyob oyolemogo ibmala we yargine, igi Erusalen yargi ibmar kusayobmoga?
Tehgine anmar wismala anmar pabgan etanimalad igargan isgana, anmarse okuales moga, ibmar tummagan oyolegoed mer pengumalagala, al anmar abargi Kuosuli, ar yar tika sur naidgine we ibi kuoe, ar anmar widsulidi; Kwen anmar sunnad takosurmala.
Ar ehmala nia ibmar saedi, ibmar tailedisurmaladi, anmar akku ittomaladi, ehde esordamar ga anmar sadmala, ekaiya purba bali al wehmar teyobmoga, wehmar teyobi anmar odurtaidemaloe, teyob anmar sadoe ibmar widsulidi, anmar ibagangine.
Ar ibmar pukidar na soidemaloe eittogedba, na pinsaed akar kudmaloe; ar nia pinsaed kadmaloe, igar isgana imakega; eye, ar we yargi pela tulemar uludmala, ulubgi isgumala ga, ibmar nuegan mer imakega ibmar tanikoed mer ittomalaga.
Pab neggwebur abargine ibmar taile disulid ga oyolesan inigwena, ibmar saledisulid imailesan inigwena, nia di tulemar pinsaed kasa we neggwebulu, we yargine.
Weyobi we pirgamar kwenmaisa, Nefi neggweburgine.
Tehgi weyob Elaman Kaiya purba na narmaisad pelosa, Elaman karda narmarsadbali, tegi emachimala.

1.intro: Tehgine Elaman Ehde Elaman Machi, al ahde Alma Machina, Alma Machi, ar Nefigi taniki, ahde Lehi Machi we tulede Erusalengi aligusa, Sedicias kebe saila unni neiy taimai kusa, uda erey.
Tegine pirga tuladaled ilagwen kaga turba kaga kwen saggine, ar Lehi Erusalen gi pirga tuladaled ila nergua noalidgine; al we pirgagangi Laconeo saila tummad mai unni.
Ar Nefi Elaman Machi Sarahemla yargine noali, al emachi. Nefi kebe sailagined ga esnun maderged narmakar maid ga uisa, pela tadgan igarmar tanikidmaid ga uidebali, pela igargan sabed mamaidi, Erusalengi Lehi noalid akar igar maidi.
Tehgine yargine na noali, ar tule kwen bar wisgudsurmala pia naddibeye; ar emachi Nefi igar mamaid na sabodmoga, eye, we neggwebur igargana.
Tegihidba pirga tuladaled ila kwen kaga tula pake kaga pogine, ibmar wisolesmalad wegihidba tailede, kuablegua nergan soisamaladi; al ibmar teyob kude, ibmar tummagana, tailedisurmaladi, we neggweburgine.
Abala tulemar soidemala, we ibagande pado nasa, Samuel Lamanita kaiya purba soisadi.
Ar ekwenadgangine todadmala, ga al-lidmala, soidemala: wede pado we ibagan nasa, kwen kudsurgusa Samuel ibmar soisadi: tegi soggu pinsar pehmar na yeher ittosmala, pehmar ulubgi pengudsurmalad kwen igarga kudsurmala.
Tegihidbali, we yargine neg oimakar kudmala; ar ibmar pensurmalad nue pukib pinsadmala tobe na ittosmala we ibmar sun kudsuliledbali, ga soilesmaladgine.
Tegine nue na abdadmala, pensulidgine we ibagandina nonikoe, mudiki, ar ibgindibeye, ar ibagwen naguoe, kwen mudikuosuli, na nue wisgumalagala na kuage uluibgi pinsa kwen pengud surmala.
Ar wede, weyob kude nega, tulemar penmalad, ibagwen nasismala, tulemar pensurmalad oburgemalagala, we igar tanikidi, unnila ner Samuel ibmar owisad kudele osulolegoe weyob igar mesisad maladi.
Tegine wede, weyob kude, Nefi, Nefi Machi pukib nue ittode, eneggwebur isgus pukua taidegua.
Weyob na nadsunna, napagine na megide, Pab tummadse na kode sunna, eneggweburgala, eye, pela tulemar oburgelemaloed gala, ulubgi pensurmalad niymalad ulale epabyan tanimalad igargine.
Tegine ibagwen Kuage ulubgi Pab se kodsa, al wegihidba tule tummad Kaiya purba se noniki, soide:
¡Nono onake, al wergue, wegine ibagan mosa; ar we mudiki ibmar ayolegoe, tegi pane napneise nonikoe, tulemarga oyolegoe, pela ibmar saegala, nergan nuegan Kaiya purbagine owisolesadi.
Wegine an tulemar se na taniki ibmar saegala tegobi eMachigine, Paba angine, ar Machi anginmoga, aulale, an sangine, wegine ibagandina mosa, we mudiki oyolegoe.
Tegi kudsunna, Nefi Kaiya purba abingasad, teyob soilesa yobi; ar Wegine tada arguadgua, kwen neg sishid nagudsuli, ar tulemar keger taidemala, mudikidba kwen neg sishid nagud sulidbali.
Ar tulemar pukidar we Kaiya purba ittos surmalad, nergan soisamaladi, napagine megidmala, purgarmalad yob megidmala napagine, al wemarde tule paigan oburgedgi pinsadmalana, tulemar nergan Kaiya purba pensurmaladi, al ibmar soilesad oyolede.
Al wemarde maga ittosmala Pab Machi taniki; eye, weyob soilege, we yargine pela tulemar tada arguanesiki, tada nakwesiki, termansiki, yarsiki puimalad Keger taidemala weyob neg kudedi tegi napagi megidmala.
Tegine maga ittos nadmala, nergan ebbinegua we ibmar soisamala, soisamala we ibmar oyolegoedi, tegi na taidemala; tobgudmala na widsur tamaladbali, we immar ittos surmaladbali.
Al mudiki neiy sishid nakudsuli, ibgine yob nega nagusa, tegi pangine tada nagnoniki kusgu nageyobi, tegine na ittos nadmala wede emidi iba nagunoniki, Pab Machi Kualulegali, al ibmar oyelede.
Tehgine pela ibmar oyolede, eye kwen sokwengid pedsuli, nergan soisadi.
Ar weyob taledbali, nihisgua Kuabíd nagunoniki soilesadbali.
Tehgine we ibagangine, gin kagansalede, nia weyob neiy imaide, mel-legi ittomalagala, we ibmar oyolesadi, ibmar tailedisulid taisamaladi, teginiguale, kagansaed, yamoledi kudmar iniguale, tulemar bur melu pengudsurmala, ar Pab ba nagudmala.
Ar Nefi de, tegi tule paigan neggweburse nadmala, baudisar imaidi kudmala tulemar isgusmalad mismaladi, ar tummad isgusmalad na elidmala. Tegi weyob webur na kannar neiy pogid nagude.
Al nega bar akar kudsuli, unnila, tule pokuah na Pab igargin sunmaidemala, Kaiya purba maidba taidi kudmala, ar Moises igar maid bar kwen abelesur ye; ar kaiya purba narmakar maid akku ittosmala.
Tehgine sikuas nadedgine mag na ittosnadmala, ehmar akku ibmar ittosmalad, arga soilede igar gan maid yohe nue ar abeleye imaileged, kwen sogwengid peosuli; eye ehmarse noniki we Kaiya purba, ibmar imailegoed, ar kwen sogwen gid obelolegosuli, tegi soggu we pirgagine na taidemala, ibmar na akku ittomalad, tegi na nosmalad soidemala.
Weyobi pirgamardina pergudsuna, yeher ittoleged nega nagusa, weyob ibmar tailesad ulale, nergan nuegan ibmar soisadba kusa.
Pirga tuladaled kaga turbah kaga pahagine nega pohoguad amba nagusbali, unnila. Gadianton Sordamar ibmar adsursamalad bi yargine pugwa kudmala, tulemar paigan kadihkudmala; ar pukidar nue pugua, tegisoggu tulemar na kwen akalomala, ar tule pukidar se oburgilede.
Tehgine pirga nadedgine mergumai kude we sordamala, tule pukidara. Negweburgi nodmala, Nefitas mala esordamarga Kudmarmoga; tegi soggua tummad pukib na ittosmala Nefitas mala we yargine.
Al weyob kude, Lamanitas mala tummad pugib pinsadmala, wede mimmigan pukidar miymala, na odummosmala, we Kaiya purba na nuedga imaidimaladbali, ba nadmala, kagan samaldbali, Kwengwena Soramitas tulemala, al Kadianton sordaga kudmarmoga.
Lamanitas marmoga tummad na pugib pinsadmala, ulubgi pensulid pergumai na kudmala, al napiraguadi, emimmimar isgudmaladbali.

Emide nabirdo, anmar tanikid igar maidi, al wede napiraguadba wismala, tule nued ede sabod kude, napiraguadba imaisa ibmar imailedisulidi, Esus nuggine, unnila na nued kudihidgine, ar isguhed kwen niysulile.
Tehgine weyob tailede, ar we tule de Kuen Kagan sadsuli, anmar ibagan ibmar kuoed soesadi, pirga turgwen kakambe kaga paka nadedgine.
Ar tulemar nue abdaidemala, we ibagine Nele Samuel Lamanita soisadi, eye we ibade, iba pahagua naguoe nega sishidi, pela we napagine.
Na nue pengud kudmala, kalagwen suli na soidina, ibmar ga oyolesa inigwena, weyob pengudmala.
Tehgine pirga turgwen kakambe kaga pakegine, nihi kebe kuisgasadgine, purwa tummad korali, we yargi kwen kordisulidi.
Ar weyobi nega kudbali, ibiyobi purwa tummad korar kusa; al mala tummad imakali, pela napa nega kig-limaide, igi napa soibo mariledeyobi kude.
Mala tummad ibbide, ibiyobi, tailedisulidi, we yargine.
Ar Moroni Gwebur temargi toisa, al edulemar kundiledmala (purgismala).
Al Gwebur Moroniah napagine toisa ar wegihidba neggwebur yargala pinnide, teyob tailede.
Tegi yala tada nakue siki nega tummad akkargusa.
Ar wegihidba yala tada arguanesiggi bur nega tummad akkergusa; al pela napa nega kuaisa, purwa tummadbali, malamar kodshadbali, nega pandur tummad nagusgua, we ar pela kig-limaisadbali.
Tegine igarmar pukidar pidsisa igarmar akkar gusa, tegi napagine akkua pukidar ainide.
Ar Gwebur tummagan pukidara napagine toisa, pukidar kummaidebali, nega pandur neimar oisa, ar edulemar pukidar kirgusa, tegi neimar tule sulidga kude.
Al kwengwena gweburmala sigisa, teginigua le tummad akkargusa, edulemar pukidar purgisa.
Tehgine tulemar kwengwena purwaba seledmala; ar kwenbar wisgulesmarsuli, unnila wisgusmala oelesye.
Ar we yalapela nue akkurgusa, purwa tummadnosa, mala tummad imaisa, nega pandur nasad ulale, we napagine.
Wegihidba akkuamar mamarisa al nue napneggi pela mamarisa, tegi soggua we yargine pela napa mamanidi.
Tehgine neiy pogilesgua, ar wegihidba, ebinsamargua, wadshi ila pah nagusa; kwengwena na soidemala, bur wadshi suhi nagusa; teginiguale, nega tummad akkargusa, ebinsagua wadshi irbaha nagusa, tegine nega sishid nagusa pela we yargine.
Wegihidba ibiyobi nega sishid nagude, we napagine, tulemar kwen akkar kudsurmalad na nue taisamala, nega sishidi.
Ar wen nei meheguad nagudsuli, nega sishid nagusadbali, kwal-lu kege kae kude; sappan tínnagana keg kae kudbali, tegi soggua, kwen neiy meheguad nagudsuli.
Tehgine kwen kual-lu kadsuli, tada, nihi, nihisguamala, kwen tailedsuli, al nega sishid nagusadbali, pela napa tirbir naid weyob kusa.
Weyobi napneg kude, iba pahagua kwen ney meheguad tailedsuli; ar tummad posmala, wile ittosmala, pela neggwebulu; eye tummad posmala, neiy sishid nagusadbali ar tummad nei akkar kusadbali.
Ar neiy sogwengine poe ittosmala. ¡Ar anmar isguhed mismalana we neiy akkar guoed iduale, tegine anmar kwenad gan pentailes malana, ar kwen kummadsulina, Sarahemla neggwebur tummadi!
Tehgine tulemar paigan, poeittosmala, soge: ¡Pidigi anmar nugusmalana gadina, we iba gan tummad neg akkarkwed iduar! ¡Ar nergan oburgidsurmala, tegine anmar nargan, masmala, sisgan kwen akkar kudsurmalana, ar Moroniah Gwebur akkar kudsurbalina! Ar we yob tulemar tummad posa.

11.intro: Nefi neggweburgi Esucristo tailede, tulemar pukidar abargi yala ibmar ibedgine, ar eigar maidba na arbade, weh tulemargala, teyob tailede.
Tehgine Nefitas tulemer pukidar puguadgine, Pab ittoged neg tikarbali, yala ibmar ibedgine; Ar ikiyobi keger taidemala, ar na oyodmala ibmar tailedisulid kudedi.
Ar Cristo gine sunmaidemarali, al ede purgigua ibmar tailedisulid oyosa.
Al weyob ibmar kude, sunmai puguadgine, kaiya purba kole ittodmala igi niba koleyobi; ar na adaidemala, akku ittomala, kaiya purba ittosmargua; toidar pinnasulidgi kole ittolesule we kaiya purba; tehgine pinnasdigi kole ittosmala, tulemar pukuad abarse warmaisa, tegi soggua tule wargwen kwen ittossuli kudsuli, na togbudmala; eye san purba ulubse ubosa, we kaiya purba kagese nue ubosmala.
Tehgine kannar nue kaiya purba kole ittodmarbali, ar akku ittosmala.
Ar ila pahagine kaiya purba ittodmarbali, al euayagi nue ittomala, kaiya koled ba nue adaipugua kudmarbali; niba nue adaipugua kudmarbali; ibmar kole ittoedbali.
Tehgi ila pahagi kaiya koled gine maga ittosmala; ar soide:
Wegine an machi sabedi ahabali welidar an ittoe, ar ede an nuga odummosa, pehmar eh nue ittomala.
Wegihidba maga ittosmargua, niba kannale adadmala; al wegi taidemala tule wargwen aidedaniki nibali, ar mor sipugua suidi yoi; aidenoniki, ehmar abargi kwisgunoniki. Al tulemar kuable nue taidemamala, tule wargwen gid kwen sunmaisuli, ar tulemar paiganga kwen sun maisurmarbali egisegala, we ibu soiledibe ye, unnila na pinsamala wede anger wargwen aidenoniki.
Tegine eargan na oyode, al tulemarga soide:
Wegine, ani Esucristo, ar nergan, an tanikoedgi sunmasmala (neiy owisosa).
Ar wegine ani napneg ibeguale nasikedi; al ani ina kaibid kobsa, Paba anga uisadi, Paa nuga odummosa, ani napneg isgusod abingasa, Pab tummad soisadba, ibmar an imaisa, kebe soila yobi.
Esucristo ibmar soisagua, tule pukidar puguad napagine megidmala; na nue ebinsadmala nergan soisamaladi, ehmargala, Cristo tailedagoye nibneise nakisad sorbali.
Kuisgumarye, ar anse taimala, an tikar pehmar argangi ittomala, tegi esgoro yolesad egannar ittomalagala, teyob ittomarbali maligine, na nue wisgumalogala, ani Israel Paba, al ittomarbali maligine, na nue wisgumalogala, ani Israel Paba, al napa neg Pab tummad bali, napneg isgusad ular an purgisa.
Tehgine tule pukidar se nonimala, etikar eargan gi nue na ittosmala, esgoro yolesadi, teyob bali emali ebusmarbali; pela tulemar teyobi imaisamala, tegi nue taisamala, ittosmarbali, nue wisgusmala, napiraguadba parsoisamala, nergan gin sunmaisamala, al narmasmarbali kaiya purba gin sunmaisadi, eh tanikoedgine.
Ar pela tulemar taisamargua, pínna sulidgi koddemala.
¡Ibiyobi Pab tummad tule nuedi, enuga! Tegi emali naba na sigid mala, enuga odummosmala.
Ar wegihidba Nefise kodsa tulemar abargi kuismoga, ese tagega sekodsha.
Tegi Nefi kuisgusa, ar se waliggusa, napagi yokorgi sigisa, emali usa.
Ar Cristo ya soide kuisguye; tegi na kisgusa, eh asabinni.
Ar ga soide: peh ga na purba kantikid uke paudisar saegala we tulemala, an kannar nibneise nadele.
Tehgine tulemar paigan se kodshabali; teyob soidebali ehmargala, ar purba kandikid ga usabali paudisar imakegala, ar soide: weyobi paudisar samaloye, al tule bar kwen urwosurmar ye.
Pehmarga napiragadba soge weyobi paudisar samaloye, pehmar kaiya purba ittosmalale isgusmalad mismalale, paudisar sabimalale an nuggine: wegihidba tihigi togo ye, ar an nuggi pautisar imaimaloe.
Ar wegine pehmar ga ibmar soimaloed, wawargwena enui ba se kodesunnoe.
Esucristo anga igar uisad ba, ani paudisar pehsae, Pab tummad nuggine, ar eMachi, tegine Purba nuedi, teginye.
Tehgine tihigi aidegoe, al kannar tihigi noe.
Al weyobi paudisar imakoye, an nuggine, wegine pehmarga napiragua an soge, ar Paba, Machi, purba nued, ar wargwennagua, ani Pabgine, Paba angine, al Paba, ani, anmar wargwennagua.
Tegi pehmarga soisad yobi pautisar samaloe ar kwen urwosurmala, wegi emi pehmar puguad yobi, igar maid kwen noarnoar imaimalosuli, igi pehmar walig kudih yobi.
Ar napiragua, napiraguadgi pehmarga soge tule wargwen urwed nikale, we de igar angadsuli, ar nia gadi, wede ab urwedule, kage tulidshoedi, tulemarga urwed igar uke.
Wede an igar masuli, mushubmushubbi tulemar kuage idshodihile tule paigana; unnila we an igar maidi; mer bar we ibi imaimala.
Wegi napiragua, napiraguadgine pehmarga soge; an igar maid pehmar sogoe.
Tegine we an igar maidi, al Paba igar maidi anga uisa, ar napiragadgine, ani Paba, parsoge; Tegi paba an parsoge napiraguadbali, tegi purba nued, napira parsoge, Paba, ar ani, tegi napiraguad ba an soge, Paba pela tulemarga soge, we napneggine, nugumala, ar an ittomala.
Ar an pensurmalale, paudisar saele, pentailegoe; tegi wemala, Pabnega eh gadga kumogoe.
Tegi an penmalale, paudisar imaisurmarbalale, tummad odurtailegoe.
Napiragua, napiraguadgine pehmarga soge wede an igar maidi, tegi wede napiragadgi Paba, an parsoge; al an pensurmalale, tegi Paba pensurbalile, al ehde Pabga peh parsogoe angine, ede peh se nonikoe seho abargine, ar Purba Nued ukoe.
Tehgine Paba napiraguadgi an parsogoe, ar purba nued napiraguad ba Paba persogoe an parsogoe, tegi Paba, ani, Purba Nued, anmar wargwenmala.
Pehmarga an soibali, nugumala, ar mimmigan yobi samala, ar paudisar imaimala an nuggine, ar tegisulile kwen we ibi abingamalosuli.
Ar kannar pehmarga soibali isguhed mimala, paudisar samala an nuggine, purwigana yobi na tomala, teyb sulile kwen Pab neg abingao surmala.
Napiragua, piraguadi pehmarga soye, wede an igar maidi, ar weba ibmar saele anba igar imake, tegi sohonega kwen wehmar akkalogosurmala.
Ar wehmar wissikuas imake, al an igar maidi, wede igar nuedba kudisuli, anba kwen igar imaisuli unnila ukkubgi nega sisa, al soho nega eyawag argalile peh idu sihu tihi tummad muhlualile, tegi purwa tummad koddele we nega perguoe.
Tegi soggua, we neggwebur se peh nae, al ibmar soinaepela napa tirbirnaidi, kaiya purbagi summaisad soisaoe.

Tehgine Esús weyob soisad sorbali Nefi ga ar tule paigan se kodsha (ambe kaga pogua tulemar kwe, kanguhed, igar ga uiledmala tegi paudisar saed igala ga uilesmarbali) wegihid ba argan oyode tulemar pukidar puimaladgine sunmaide, ar soide: tulemala nuedi, pehmar nue ittomala ambe kaga pagad ekaiya purba, an kodsha di pehmar abargine, igargan nue takegala pehmar gala, nue imakegarbali. Al ani ga uisa kanguhedi, pehmar paudisar saegala tihigine; tehgi paudisar imaisale, a sorbali, soho gine an pehoibalo, ar purba nuedgine pehmar arbaloe. Tehgine soggu tule nuegan, an pensurmalale ulubgine paudisar imaimarbaloe, taisad sorbali, ar wisgusmala, ani de.
Ar paidbali, bur tule nuedi, we tulemar pehmar sunmaisad pensurmalale, ar an taisamala, wisgusmarbali, an sunnadi. Al tulemar pehmar sunmaisad pengudsurmaladi, nue pukib ittosmala ulubgine, paudisar imaisamarbalile, soho, purba nued se noniki, tegi na isguhed mimaloe.
Ar tule purba wilesa ittodihle, anse tagele, al tulemar nibneggi nega tirbir namalad egadidde.
Al wegihidba tulemar podidihid, ar wehmar wile tailegoe.
Tulemar pai kwen ittosurmaladi; ar ah tulemar napneg egadga kuoe.
Tulemar igar napiraguad pina ukku ittodihile; ar ah tulemar imme nabir ittogoe.
Ar tulemar wilesakua ehmar taidihile, we tulemar wile tailedmaloe.
Tegi tulemar kuage nuegana, ar wehmar Pab Tummad takoe.
Ar tulemala kuage pogidig samaladi, al weh tulemar Pab tummad mimmigan ye, palegoe.
Al tulemar an nug ular solegagar kudimaladi, ar wehmar nib neggi nega tirbir namalad egadidde.
Tegi tulemar (an nug ular) pehmar idshoar sun dibe, solegaguah peh sardibe, tehgine an ular kalagwensuli kagangi pehmar gi sunmahar dibe, an ular;
Tehgine wergwe, ar pehmar weliguar ittomala, ar nibneggi pehmar ib nuegan abingamaloe; ar teyobi nergan tummagan, pehmar idu solegaguar imasmala.
Napira, napiragua pehmarga soge, ar an pehmar abege, palu yobi nápagala; ar palu egaibid surgusdibe. ¿Igi palubalu kubarsunnoe? Ib nued ga keg bar ku soggu unnila miledoe, tegi tulemar idu annaega miledoe.
Napirá, napiragua pehmarga an soge, pehmar we neggwebur naid kual-le mehegadi neggwebur yarmulu pirgi sihle keig tuggwe.
Wegi ¿Tulemar kual-lu ogaele, tegi sile urba siegarsuli? Ar esiged gi siegala, tegine nei yagi pela puimalad ga neiy mehe sae.
Tulemar wagab pehmar kal-lu mehe pehmar samala, adi ehmar pehmar arbaed nued takegala, tehgine nibneggi pehmar Pab maid nuga okannoe.
Mer pinsamala, igar megisad, ar nergan igargan mesismalad osulogega an noniye, osulogega an nonisuli, ar we imake ga noniki.
Ar napiragua pehmarga soge, kwen soggwen gid akarguosuli igar megisadi, unnila angine we ibi pela imailesa.
Al wegihidba, pehmarga igar uisa, ar an Pab Tummad igala, mer an penguhegala, isgusmalad mimala anse taimala kuage ulubgi wile ittogedgine, ar purba nuedgine wegine pehmar niymala igar narmakar maidi, ar igar maid imailesa.
Tehgine an sega taimala, ar pentailegoe; ar napiraguadgi pehmarga soge, ar an igargan sesurmalale, emi pehmarga uilesadi, kwen nibneise toguli.
Pehmar ittosmala igi epínne sergan marga soilesgua: ar pehmarga narmarlesbali; mer ehmar iblogoe; tehgine tule kwen iblodibe, ah tule wilub tailegega igar nabirogoe.
Pehmarga an soge, ar tule sae ittoele ekwenad ebogua, igar maidgi noed tummadi. Tegi toa ekwenadgan soidibe, ye, igargan maidba ga imailedoe; ar tule soidibe, kegega, sohogi tanikoe.
Tehgine an se tanikile, ar an se taibidibe, ebinsaoe peh kwenad ibmar soged pehga nika.
Peh kweanad tainae, ar ebo abga nuguoe, tegine kage nuedgi an se tagoe, al an abingaoe.
Peh istarad ibo nugumala iduale, igarba ebo edihile, idue nugue, mer wadshi widsuli peh ga egaegale, ar esgaryagi melegoe.
Napiri, napiragua, pehga soge kwen nohosuli, we ibmar pela pennugedse nohoe. Tegi mel-lesihile. ¿Sunna wede pennukoe? Napiragua, napiragua an soge kwen pennukosuli.
Wegi, serganga ebinne narmailesa; mer peh igar suli machered, tehgi ome tikarba yolegoe.
An pehmarga soge, we toa tule ome wargwen gi akar pinsahele, we pado ekuagegi ebo igar suli yolesa.
Wegi, na pehmarga igar uke, pehmar kuagegine we ibi mer odogoe.
Pur nabirsursi, pehmar we ibi mel-le imakedi, pehmar isguhed sedihile, tegile nia neiyse par mel-ledoe.
Ar narmailesa, toa tule eome mettele, a tule omega, ome metted karda ukoe.
Napira, napiraga pehmarga an soge, we ome metted igar unnila wegi mai, ome tikarba neiy sishidgi yolesale keb mel-legoe, ar sulirdibe ome tikarba yoleged ga imaisunnoe; tehgine toa tule ome mel-les gusad nikudibe, a tule neiy sishidgi tikarba igar suli yoledi.
Pado we narmailesa: Immar imako peh soisadi mer pisgoe, ar tule tummad asabin ise kolar peh soisad imake.
Ar napira, napiragua, pehmarga, soye: mel-le ise sogar ibmar soge, nibneggined surye, ar ahgi Pab tummad argangi sihitteye.
Nap neggined suli, ar ahgi enag onailegedide ye.
Mel-le peh nono pali ise sogar saoe; peh soibaloye, al peh sailagia gi kwensahale, keg peh sibbugua tehgine sishi saye.
Al peh sunmagedi unnila ibgwen suli; napira, napiragua, suli, ar suli; tegi ibmar ba pur pule we isguhedide.
Ar we narmakar mai ibiya kuagwen, ibiya kuaguena, puged saoeye; nugar wargwen, nugar wargwen puged saoeye.
Tehgine pehmarga soge, pehmar mer tule isgana abinsae, ar toa tule wagar nued sigi peh pibyo dibe, ese wagar paid obilis saoe.
Ar tule wargwen igar maidba abin-abin peh imake tibe, ar peh mor susdibe, peh mor uubgined ega uibali.
Al toa tule sikuas nabi ba peh abedibe, ar osuguhe eba naedsae.
Tule peh se ibmar egisele ega uke, tehgine tule pehgi ibmar kaele, mer surye ega sogoe.
Al wegine narmakar mabali; peh na sabgumala kwenadgana, tehgine tulemar pehgi kuisgudimalad isdar peh takoe.
Teginegwena we pehmarga soge: Tulemar pehmargi kuisgudimalad ulubgi sabgwe, tegine solegar pehmar imaidimalad nabir egipeh pinsae, tulemar isdar pehmar taidimalad nue akwe, tehgine solegaguar pehmar samalad, ulubgi peh Pab se ega kole.
Ade pehmar, peh Pab nibneggi maid mimmigan ga kuhegala, ah tule kuage isgana, ar tule kuage nuegan gi eh tad onaggwe (ogae).
Tehgine we ibmar tikasurgusa pad mai, we igar ba imailege, pela we ibi angine imailesa.
Ibmar sergan pado nasa, tegi pela we pinid ga kusa.
Tegi soggu, ulubgi tule nued Kumala, Igi an yobi, ar igi pehmar Pab Tummad nib neggined ulubgi nuedi.

Napira napiragua pehmarganasoge; yamo tulemar peh takegar ehmar wagab peh imaidi kudager ye; tegirdi peh Pab Tummad nibneggi maid keg nue a pugeb bar peh pennukoe.
Tegi soggu ibmar sogwen gi peh ehmar pendaibiele, mer peh idu pinnasur gar kordi sae, tule kuage tarbotamaladgi, igi udiomar ittoged neggi, ar igarganba korditae, ahdi tulema e oganno maloedde ye soidimala. Napiragua pehmarga an soge, ehmar pado na pennuilesmala.
Ar peh immar soggwen gi ehmar pentaidibe, mer peh argan sapiledi, peh argan nued imaidih wisgwe.
We peh immar soggwengi ehmar pendagedi arbake sae; tegine peh Paba arbake peh taidihi, ehmar wagab peh pennuggoe.
Tehgine pehmar Pab tummad se kordibe, mer peh tule kuage tarbo tamaladgi peh taoe, ar ahmardi udio mar ittoged neg yagi Pab se kuishi kole, ar kalu muruganagine Pabse kole, adi tulemar etake gala. Napiragua pehmarga an soge, ahmar pado na pennuged nika.
Ar peh, peh Pab se korsoggalile, peh neiy yaba toge, keb peh ya edie; tehgine peh Pab tummad. Arbagge pela peh taimaidi, ehmar wagab peh pennukoe.
Al pehdi, peh Pab tummadse korsoggalile, mer kannar-kannar ibpioe, tulemar Pab wishurmalad gi, ar ahmardi ibmar pukidar piele keb maga ittolego ye pinsamalade.
Tegi soggu, mer emargi pehtae; ar peh Pab tummad yoh peh immar egise pado peh wisi, ibumar peh abehdi.
Weyob Pab se kormala: Anmar Pab Tummad nibneggi maidi, peh nuga di nue suilidigi obariledi gusdibe.
Napneggine peh pinsa maid igargan pehsae, nibneggine gimoga yobi.
Tehgine kuage gi nodi malad anmarga ebe, igi anmargi nodimalad an nabiroe.
Al mer igargan wilub taileged se an nidmala, ar isguhed igar anmargi obane.
Ar neiy tirbir peh taimaid pehgadi, kanguhed, peh odummolege, tegi na sadegua, tegin ye.
Ar pehmar tule isgudimalad ga igar peh nudake, pehmar Pab tummad nibalid pehga kuage isgudihid nudaimogoe.
Tegine tulemar peh isgudimalad ga igar pehbo nabo sulile, kege peh Pab tummad nibalid kuage isgudidihid nudaimoe.
Tehginbali peh marga pagele mer tule kuage tarbo tamalad gi per wagar obinsahagua kudisae; ar ahamar yamo eh wagar tinna oyodidih, adi tulemar maga etake gala masga baidi. Napiragua an pehmarga soge, ahmar na eh pennugged nika.
Ar, pehdi, peh masga pagele, peh nono peh nue wie, tehgine peh wagar enuke.
Ahdi pehmar ga paidihi tulemar ga mer oyogoe. Ar unnila Pab tummad arbag peh taimaid gar pi, tegine peh Paba arbake peh taidihide, ehmar wagab peh pennukoe.
Mer peh napneggined ibmar peh na napneggi urbemala, ar ahgindi sunna pehy iudumese, ar isgue, tehgine sunna addursamalad arpag toge addursaegala.
Pur nibneggined immar nibneggi na peh urbe, ar ahbine keg pehy udumese, tegine, ar keg addursamalad arbag toge, addursaegala.
Ar pia peh immar nuegan pugua, ahgin bi peh kuage pinsamai kumogoe.
Ibiya di sanga kual-lu mehe guadi, tegi soggu, peh ibiya nuedile, peh san pela ibeguale.
Ar peh ibiya peh ga isguhele, pela peh san neiy sishidgi kwe. Al tegi soggu, neiy meheguad pehga. Kudihidi neiy sishid ga nadele. ¡Ibiyobi neiy sishid pehga nagus sunnale!
Tule wargwen, kege tule tummad warbogua ga mailege; ar kwensag isdar take, tegi pur paidi sabgu nai kusale, ar sulirdi kwensag ginbi alamainai, paidi mesaguar imaidi kusale. Kege peh Pab tummad ga maile nay, tehgine immar nuegan neggined ga maile nai kubali.
Tehgine Esus weyob soisagua kaiya purba, ambe kaga poguadse adaide, ar sules maladi ga soide: Nue epinsamaloe. Pehmarga ibmar pehmarga soisadi. Ar wegi ani pehmar eguasa igar imakegala we neggweburgine. Al peh marga soge: Mer peh san purba gi peh pinsae, ibu kunmaloe, ar ibu peh kobbaloe; tegi pehmar sangin surbali ibu yohdibe. ¿Ar we sanpurba mas kunned pehmar sangin surbali ibu yohdibe. ¿Ar we sanpurba mas kunned ba pur ibmedi, tegine sangi mor yoleged ba pur nued sursina?
Niba ibtula kuggudimalad peh take, ahmar ibmar tiysuli, wesurbali, tegine obumar yagi ibmar urpedi suli; ar tehgine peh Pab nibalidi masgi omadi. ¡Ibi yob pur pule siggui marba pehmar pur nued kusunna.
¿Tehgine pehmar toa we na peh pinsaed bali, na peh san osuosarsunna?
Ar ¿ibiga peh mor yoleged pina peh soisunna? Tudumar peh take, igi tungud tae, ahmar arbasuli, tup morga sobdi suli.
Tegidde an pehmarga soge; Salomón ibiyobi kangu mor yosa kusan inigwele, amba ahamar yobi yodsurkusa.
Ar tegi Pab tummad di nainumar gi gagan marga mor yodi, tehgine a ibmardi emi iba ginar tegidde paned gi pado ogummailegedide. Pehmar ulubgi pensulid pibi niymalad. ¡Iki we yobi pehmar ga Paba pur mor yomalo sunna!
Tegi soggu a ular mergin pinsamala: ¿Ibu an kunmaloe, ibu an kobmaloe, ibu mor an yohomar balodibe ye?
Ar peh Pabtummad nibneggine pela ibmar abehedi pehmar wisi.
Tegine Pabtummad eh soged ba igargan semaid inshe peh amie, eh igar napiraguadi, pela we ibmar keb pehga mergumai kudoe.
