Tegi soggu, mer panedgi peh pinsae, ar panedi na wargwen ibmar guhedba nagudoe. Iba irba na eponigan nika kumala.

Tehgine weyobi sunmaisad sorba, Esús kannar tulemar pukidar puguad ga soidebali: mer tule paidgi sunmake, tule paid mer pehgi sunmakegala.
Ar peh ehmar wilub takogua ibu igar take pehmesedbali, pehmar wilub taile mogoe, tehgine peh immar wilub imaked gine, aka pehmar wilub salemogoe.
Ar ¿Ibiga peh kwenad ibiya yaba turgan maid magar ba peh taisunna, ar peh ibiya yaba suar maidi peh aku suntake?
Al ¿Igi peh kwenad ga peh sogo sunna: Peh ibiga yaba turgan maid an onobie, tegi peh ibiya yaba suar maid peh taisulile?
¡Pehmar tule kuage tarbo tamalad! Pina peh ibiya yaba suar maid peh onogwele, tehgine keb peh kwenad ibiya yaba turgan maid onogega keb mag peh takoe.
Mel-le achumarga ibnued uke, tehgine mer pehmar morbeb akkuagihid sinmar ga mie; ar unnila naggi tidi egi annaoe, ar aka pehgi aibinoe.
Egise, tegine pehmarga uilegoe; amie, pehmar amimaloe; yawag ogole, pehmarga egalegoe.
Ar pela tulemar ib egismaladi, abingae, tulemar ib amidimalad, amie; tegi yawag ogormalad gala, ega argaoe.
Ar ¿Toa tule pehmar arbargi emachi ese madu egishar dibe, ega akkua uisale?
¿Al ua egisdibe, tegi ega naibe uisale?
Tehgi soggu pehmar isgudimalan iniguele, pehmar nusganaga ibmar nuegan uked peh nue wismala. ¿Ibi yobi pur pule peh Pab tummad nibmaidi tulemar ibmar nued ese egismalad ga ukosunna?
Ar, tegi soggu, pela tulemar peh ga ibmar sabi peh abehed, asumna peh ehmarga samoga; wede igar megisadi, nergan tummagan igala.
Yawag waraguaba peh toge; ar yawag yadadadi, ar igar madda pibisulile, ahdi neiy tule osulogedi, senad sunna, ar ah igarba tule pukidar eba nadabmala.
Al yawag asogua, igar waraguadi purba keg purguhedi, tegi tule poggua a igardi bar amimaloe.
Nergan ehmar yardaidi maladgi nue salagale, ahmar yamo sibad wawa mor yoi noni tae, ar ulubgin di achu pubur yob sabsur taedi.
Eh tamalad mai peh taimaloe ¿Emi tulemar iggo sapigi ubas sapi turba kuan soge, ar sapi turbagan iggo nikad sapigine iggo sapi turbagan kuanbar soge?
Teyobi sapi nuegan, sapi turba nuegan san make; ar sapi isgana sapiturba isgana sanmake.
Sapi sargwen nuedi keg sapiturba ishagua sanmake, ar sapi ishagua keg sapi turba nued sanmaimogoe.
Pela sapimar keg nue sanmaimaladi olalegoe tehgine soho yadshe miledoe.
Tegi soggu, esanmaked gi pehmar ah sapimar maga taimaloe.
Ar pela tulemar anga soimalad: tuletummad, tule tummad, Pab tummad nibneg tirbir igar kanigid se togosuli, unnila tulemar; an Paba nibneggi ehpinsamaid igarganba ibsamaladbi.
Al ah ibagi tulemar toga anga sogoe: tule tummad, tule tummad ¿Anmar peh nuggi ibmar parsoisa surmala, tegine peh nuggi niamar onodigud suli, tegine arbaed nuegan kwen tailedisurmalad pukidar, peh nuggi imaisa sursogoe?
Tehgine keb ehmarga an sogoe; ten kwen peh widshurmala: angi peh pangumala, pehmar isguhed ginbi arbadimala.
Tegi soggu, toa tule we an sunmaked ittod, ar ehba ibsaele, ah tule, tule pinsaed nika kusa yobi, ah tuledi akkua pirgi neiy sobsa kusa.
Ar tihi wiali, tegi tihwarmar noali, neggi purwa kolali, tegidde nega kwen ailadsuli, ar akkua pirgi sobar kuishidde.
Tehgine toa tule we an sunmaked ittodibe, ar ah tule ehba ibsa sulile we atule, tule pina kuddu pinsaed suli kusa yobi kuoe, ah tule ukub pirgi nega sobsa kusadyobi.
Ar tih wiali, ar tihwarmar noali, tehgi purwa kol-lali neggine, ar neg sihid ayalide, al nega di tummad pibishisa.

Tehgine Esús sunmaked pergusgua, tula pukidar puguadga soide: wegine ibmar ittosmala, odurdailesmala, ani Pab se na koled iduale wegi odurdaisa; tehgine toa tule we kaiya purba nue ebinsaele, bar ib imakele, yohodshe nibneise naoe.
Ar wegihidba Esús ibmar soisagua, na taide tule kwengwena abargi ku-ismalad keger ittosmala, ar egismala al ehde igi Moises igar saosunna; al na aku ittomala kaiya purba soilesadi ibmar sergan pad nasa, ibmar pela pini kusa.
Ar eh soide: mer keger taimala, an soisa ibmar sergan pad nasa, ar ibmar pela pinolesa.
Wegi pemarga ansoge, Moises igar pado imailesa.
Wegihidba, ani pemarga igar cusadde, ani, an Israel neggwebur ebo igar mesisadde; tehgine angine igar imailesa, al igar megisad imakega an noniki; tegi soggu pelosa.
Wegihidba nergan ibmar soisad osulogega an nonisule; ar yohe pela na imake, napiragua na pemarga soge pela imailegoe.
Pehmarga soisa ibmar sergan pad nasa, al osulogosuli an soisadi ibmar nue taniggi.
Al wegi, yohoe pela ibmar imaileke, an neggwebur ebo igar mesisadi; ar Moises ga igar uilesad an se pergusa.
Wegine, ani igala, ani kual-lu, nue an taimala, nue tamalale perguhedsega, ar kudihi kudmaloe; al tule ib nuedimaidihle, san purba kadeguad ga an ukoe.
Tehgine, pehmarga igar gan an uisa; al an igar nue semala. Tegi wede igala ar nergana, eh marde napiraguadgi an parsoisamala.
Ar Esús weyob sunmasgua, soide esordamar waharme kaga poguad gala.
Pehmala an sordamala, ar pehmar we neggweburga kual-luga kamar sunna Osé mimmigan moga.
Ar wegine, we yala pemarga uilesa; al Paba pehmarga uisadi.
Al Paba kwen anga soisasuli pehmar kwenadgan Erusalen ginmaladga sogodeye.
Paba kwen anga soisasuli, sogodege ablis paigan Israel neggwebur ginedgi sunmako deye, ar Paba yar paidshe parmiali.
Wede Paba an parmiali, pehmarga sogegala.
Sibad wawagan paigan an nika, ar weginedsuli wehmar de an se nonimogoe, an kaiya purba ittomarmogoe; yoho soggwenna amkiguoe, ar etaked wargwenna nikuoe.
Tehgine kuage isganadba, ar penmaladba aku an kaiya purba ittos mala; tegi soggu, Paba anga soisa mer parsogoe.
Napiragua pemarga soge, Paba an ga igar uisa, ar ani pemarga soge, pehmar, emargi obal-lesa, eisgudidihidbali; tegi soggu, eisgusmaladba, pehmar widsurgusa.
Tehgine napiragua pemarga soibali, Paba emargi, pehmar obadshamala, ablis paigangine; ar eisgusmaladba wehmar widsurgusa.
Ar napiragua pemarga soge, pemargine an summaisa: sibad paigana an nika wegined suli; wehmar an senonimarmogal, ar an ittomarmogoe; al soggwen na ambigudoe, eidued wargwen nikuse.
Al aku ittosmala, ar tulemar Pab widsurmalad ye gi pinsasmala; al aku ittosmala, ar ga Pab igargi sunmailegoe esordamarga keb kummarmogoe Pab widsurmaladi.
Kwen an ittos surmala, an soisadi sibad paigana an ittomarmogoe; aku sunna ittosmala, ar tule Pab widsurmalad kwen Pab kaiya purba ittogosurmala; ar kwen ibmar emarga soilegosuli, ar purba nued ba ibmar ga soilegoe.
Tehgine, pemala an ittosmala, ar an taisamarbali; al pehmar an sibadi, nug imailesmaladi, Paba anga uisa.

Napirá, napiragua pemarga an soge we yar ginedsuli, kwen Erusalen yargined surbali, ar kwen ah yar ginmaladsuli, tegi pia an kudihi kusad ginsurbali.
Ar wehmar gin yohoe an sunmake, ar yohoe an kaiya purba ittomala; kwen yohoe wemarse an adainae.
Ar Pab igar an abingasa wemarse naegala, an kaiya purba ittomarmogoe, tegi an sibad wawan ye soilemogoe, ar soggwenaguaga kuoe, eidued wargwenna nikuoe; ar wemarse an atainaoe.
Tehgine pemarga soge narmaimala, we kaiya purba, an naoed sorbali, osabogegala, ar yohe tulemar Israel neggin surmalad ga sogegala—ar an neggwebur Erusalen gala, tulemar an taisamalad, anga arbas malad, kwen Pab se egidsurmala ibmar wisgubimalale, Purba nued bali, pehmar puimaladi, ar ablis paigana, wehmar kwen widsurmala—yohedse tuemar Israel neggin surmalad wisgumaloe, sunna abingalemarmogoe, ar an wisgumarmogoe, epentake di, an neggwebur mimmigana, Erusalengine, we napneg tirbir naidgi mimiledoe, ar ibmar pengusmaladbali.
Tehgine pela napneg naid, gine ambi kudmaloe pulale; ar igar megisad ga imaledoe, pela neggweburmar, Paba ebo mesisadi, Israel nega.
Ar ibi yobi tulemar Israel neg ginsulid kuage ulubgi an pensurmaladba, Paba nued an parsoge, tegi Paba.
Wegine an pensurmalad ba, Paba soge, pehmar ulubgi penmaladba, Israel nega, napiragua, tulemar Isael neggin surmaladsega nonimogoe ibagan napidgine, we ibmar pela ga soilemarmogoe.
Ar ¡tule dar wiledmaloe, tulemar Israel neggin surmaladi! Paba soge—al an we napneise nonimar iniguena, an neggwebur mimilede, wedo Israel nega: ar wehmar abargi parmel-ledma, an neggwebulo, wede Israel nega, ar ah margi annadmala.
Ar Paba we tulemar sabed ulale, Paba igar gar mesisa, an neggwebur ga poni mesisa, wede Israel nega, napira, napiragua, pemarga an soge, an neggwebur oagalosad sorbali, tummad naibi ittomaloe, wilemaloe, ar purgemaloe, wehmar abargi parmel-ledmaloe, isdar tailed marbaloe, ibmar isdar taileged ga kudmarbaloe.
Tehegine Paba an soisa, sogoye: ihagan tulemar Israel neggin maladsulid, an igargi niddibe, ar isgudmalale, ekuage isgudmaladbali, yarmar pela kuable, neggweburmala, we napneggine, ar kakan pukidar nikudoe, gin tododmarbaloe, yardailedmarbaloe, tummad isgudmaloe, pela kalagwensuli na kudmaloe, nergan tulemar yamodi kudmarbaloe, omegan, machergan na gin nodmarbaloe, an kaiya purba obadmaloe, wegi Paba soge, an igargan maid wehmar abargine obanoe.
Ar an ebinsadoe, an neggweber ebo igar mesisadi, al Israel nega, an kaiya purba na sedoe.
Al an oyogoe, Israelnega, tulemar Israel neggin surmalad, kwen pehmar oakalogo surmala; ebinsaoed iduale, ambo igar mesisadi, Israel nega an kaiya purba ittodabmaloe.
Ar tulemar Israel neggined surmalad nugubimaladi, ar anse taibimalale, Paba soge, wegine, an neggweburga nuggumogoe, ar Israel nega.
Ar an neggwebur kwen abegosuli, weyob salegedi, wede Israel nega, kwen oakalogosurmala, Paba soge kwen gin anna osunmaibali.
Ar anse taisurmalale, ar kaiya purba ittosurmarbalile, an weyob imaidoe, eye an neggwebulu, Israel nega, wehmar gin annamaloe, palu yobi kudoe, epalubalud pergudoe, tegine bar abelegosuli, unnila miledoe, gin annaledbaloe, an neggwebur maligine, Israel nega.
Napira, napiragua, Paba weyob anga soisa: ar we yala, we neggwebur uilesa peh margala.
Tehgine ner Isais kaiya purba imaledoe, ar soisadi.
Pehmar edarbemala kaiya pinnasuli koddoe, pular namaidoe, eibiya nugi taidemaloe tule tumadi Pab neggwebur kannar siynoniggoe.
¡Pinnasuli Kormala weligualedgine! ¡Namaimala pulale, Erusalen nega tule sulidbali! Tule tummad ennegwebur wile taisa Erusalen pendaisa;
Tule tummad saggua ised oyode pela neggweburmar ibiya nugine, pela napneg tirbir naidgine, Pab tummad pentailegoedi.

Wegi na sunmaked pergusgua, Esús kannar taidebali tulemar pukidar puguadi, ar ga soidebali: wegine an wadshidi mosa.
An take, pehmar nol-logua, pehmar pela an kaiya purba maga ittosurmala, Paba an parmioli we ibagangi sogegala.
Tehgine, pehmar neise namala, ar we ibmar pemarga soilesad gi nue pinsa mala, al Paba se egise an nuggine maga ittokegala; nue gi pehmar pinsamala, panaegala, al pehmar se kannar nonibaloe.
Ar emidi Pab se an nae, tegi an oyobaloe Israel ablismar yokusmaladi, a Pab gardi kwen yokudsule, ehde wisi pia nadmardibeye.
Tehgine Esús weyobi sunmaisad pergusgua, na taide tule pukidar puguadi al popugua, tegi nue pogi pugua, igi ar egispugua yobi, ehmar walig wis napi kudiki kuye.
Tehgine soide: Wegine an kuage ulubgi pehmar na nue sabe.
¿Pehmar abargi tulemar ueleged nika? Wese sedamala. ¿Niymala mali pisgarmaladi, ibiya sulid, sakkua pisgarmalad, poni niymalad, yahabimalad, uwaya yal-lirmaladi? Wese sedamala, ar an nudakoe, al pemargi nued an pinsae; kuage ulubse ga na peh samala.
Tehegine an pehmar take ibmar taibimala, pehmar kwenadgan Erusalen gin malad ga ibmar an imaisad, ar pehmar take kuage ulubgi pensurmala, pehmar nudailemaloed.
Ar weyob sunmaked pergusgua, pela tulemar pulagua se nonimala, se sesmala tulemar uelemalad, poni niymalad, mali pisgar malad, ibiya surmaladi, pela na poni nigmalad nugubimaladi, ar pela nudailesa, eponigan niymaladbali.
Al pelaguable weyob tulemar nudailesa, enaba yokorgi sihnonimala, nuga odummosmala, ar tule pukidar se nonimar kusgua, emali nugusmala, tegi soggu ehmar ibiya nikusa emali nikusa.
Ar mimmimar purwigana se sesmala, eh tikarba urbismala napagine, al Esús abargi kwisgusa, tegi tule pukidar naba puimalad pangusmala, purwigana tikarba urbemalagala.
Tehgine pela teyob sesmargua, ar Esús di abargi kwisgusa, tulemar pukidar puimaladga soide napagi yokorgi sihimarye.
Ar weyobi na kude pela tulemar napagi yokorgi sigismargua, Esús kuage ulubgi wile ittosa, ar soisa: Paba nue pugib an pinsae, Israel neggwebur isgusadgine.
Ar weyobi soisagua, napagine yokorgi sigismoga; tegi wegine Pabse na kodsa, ar ibmar soisad kwen narmailed suli, al tule pukidar ittosmala, napiraguadgi parsoisamala.
Tehgi weyob na soisamala: kwen weyob taidisurmala, kwen ittodisurmarbali euwayagine, we ibagansega kebe ibiyob taisamala, keger tailege, ar tailedisulidi, weyob taisamala, ar ittosmala, Esús Pab se kodshadi.
Al kuabin soggwenkid kwen kege soilege, tule wargwen gid kwen narmadsuli, tule wargwen maga ittossurbali ibmar tailedisulidi, ar ittoledisulidi. Esús sunmaisadi; tegi tule pela weliguar ittosmala San ulubsega, anmar ittosmargua, Pab se kodsha an margala.
Ar weyob ib kude, Esús Pabse kodshad pelosgua, kuisgusa; al tule pugidar puguad welidar ittosmala.
Ar Esús deigar sunmaisa, ga soidebali kuisgumarye.
Tegi kuisgusmala tehgine soide: tuledar nuegana, pehmar kwage ulubgi pensulid nikadba. Wegine emide pela an yeher ittoe.
Ar weyob ibmar soisagua, na pohsa, al tule pukidar puimalad napiragua parsoisamala; al emimmigan; wawargwen ga purba nuegan gar uisamala tegine Pab se ga kodshabali.
Tegi weyob imaisagua, kannar na pósbali.
Tegi tule púgidar puguad gi ga soide pehmar mimmimar taimala.
Ar wegihidba attaidegua, niba attaide, taidemala niba nega argade, angermar aidedaniki tailede, wegi taidemala soho abargine aidenai, tegi aide nonimala, purwigana se nonimala, ar sohoyob tikarba nagunoniki; tegi angermar pentaidemala, igargan imaigegala.
Tehgine tule pukidar puguad taisa, ittosmala, ar parsoisamala; wismala we ibmar napiraguadi, wawargwen taisamala, ar ittos marbali, tule mili pahagua kumala, mashergana, omegana, ar purwigana.

Tehgine Esús soide esordamargala, madu, tihi sedamarye.
Ar sunadmargua, tulemar pukidar puguadga soide napagi sihimar ye.
Al esordamar madu, tihi senonimargua, madu purwi imaisa, tegi Pba se ga kodsha unaegala; isordamarga uisamarmoga, gar soide kúnmarmoye.
Ar kudshamargua tegi nued na ittosmala, ga soidebali esordamargala, tulemar puimaladga mimiye.
Tegi tule pukidar puimalad kudshamarmoga, nued ittosmala, esordamarga soide: wegine, pehmar wargwen ga igar uilegoe, purba kandikid ga an ukoe, madu, tihi unaegala, an ittoed neggala, pela tulemar penguosurmalad, ar paudisar an nuggi imaibaloe.
Ar taidimaloe, we imailegedi, igi an imaisa yobi, weyobi madu unasayobi, pehmarga an uisa.
Tehgi we imaimaloe an sangi pinsaegala pemarga oyosadi. Ar Pab ga soimalagala pehmar angi pinsadi kumalagala. Al pehmar angi pinsadi kumalale, an purba nued pehmar nikumaloe.
Weyob, we kaiya purba soisagua; esordamarga soidebali tihi sunamarye, al eh tihi kobmarge, ar tule pukidar puimalad ga uimarmoye.
Ar weyob imailesa, kobsamala, nued ittosmala; tulemar pukidar puimaladga uisamarmoga, kobsamala, nued ittosmala.
Tehgine esordamar weyobi imaisamargua, Esús soisa: pehmar tulemar nuegana we ibmar imaisamala; an igargan maidba imailesa, ar Pabga soimala we igar imaimaloye, pehmarga an soisadi.
Al weyobi imad kumaloe, pela tulemar isgusad mismalale, paudisar an nuggi imaisale; an ablis milesad nue ebinsaegala, pehmar ular milesa, sunna Pab asabin soimala gala, pehmar angi pinsadi kumaloe, tegi pehmar angi pinsadi kumalale, an purba nued nikumaloe.
Ar pehmarga na soge we ibi imaimala. We ibmar sadimalale, pehmar tule nuegana ar wede an akkua pirgi sihmala.
Ar pehmar abargi tule wis sigguas we ibmar imakele an akkua pirgi enega sisuli, unnila ukubgi enega sihy; ar tihi wialile, tihwar tummad nodele, purwa tummad kollalile, wehmar neggine, ayalidoe, tegi nia yawag pado ga argasih odogegala.
Tehgine pehmar tulemar nuegana, ar an igargan maid osabodimalale, Paba anga uisa, pehmarga ukegala.
Napira, napiragua pehmarga an soge, nue na taimala, Palibali Pab se kormala, mer nia pehmar pinsaed gamalagala, ar pehmar sedoe.
Ar igi pehmar abargi Pabse na kodsha teyobi an ittoed neggi koloe, an neggwebur abargine, an nuggi paudisar samala. Wegine ani na Kual-lu; pehmarga an taed oyosa.
Tehgine weyobi esordamargala sunmaisad sorba, Esús kannar tulemar pukidar puimaladga soide:
Napirá, napiragua, pehmarga an soge, nue taimalad abelege, ar palibali Pabse kormala mer pinsaed galemalagala, ar nia di ekadga pehmar sabi mala.
Tegi soggua, Palibali Pab se Kormala an nuggine.
Ar pab se ibmar egisele an nuggine, ulubgi pensulile ibi abingaoe, ar we nuedile, wegi pehmarga uilegoe.
Pehmar mimmigan mala Pab se kormala, palibali an nuggine, tegi pehmar omeganga, mimmimar ga purba nuegan ulegoe.
Wegine pehmar palibali anbigumala, ar kwen pemarga ised nasikosurmala, pehmar tanar ambigumaloe, ar kwen pehga osulogosuli.
Ar Pabse wemarga kormaloe, al mel-legi obanoe, ar palibali pemarse nanaele, Pab sega kormaloe an nuggine.
Tehgine pehmar kual-lu onaimala, napneg mehesaegala. Wegi ani kual-lu, niba onaimala: tulemar an taisamalad imake, wegi pehmar an taisamala Pab se kodshadi, ar pehmar pela nue taisamala.
Ar pehmar taisamalad ga an soisa kwen pehmar panguosurmala, unnila pehmar anse taimala, tegi sun ebumalaga, takegala; ar teyobi napneggi imaimaloe; al toatule we igar pisgele, wede pinsaed galedih nia sega.
Tehgine Esús weyob soisagua, kannar adadbali esordamar sega, ewesadi, ar soide.
Wegine napirá, napiragua, pemarga soge, pemarga igar paid uimarbaloe, aha sorba an Pab se naoe, igargan paigan imakegala, eh anga uisadi.
Ar wegihidba we igar an pehmarga uke: Ib wisidgi kwen ittogo surmala, nuedgin suli, an sana, an ablis igar uilealile.
Al toa tule kunnele, an sana, ar an ablis kobele, kuage nued ginsuli, esan purba ga poni tummad nasiggoe; tegi soggu wisdibe tule wargwen nued dihsulile mer kúnnoe an sanna, mer koboe an ablis, isedi ga nasikoe.
Teginigwele mer obanoe pehmar abargine, ar ega uimogoe Pabse ehga koloe an nuggine, ar isgusadmisdibe, paudisar sasale, ar an sana, an ablis ga uimogoe.
Tehgine nugusulile an neggwebur sordaga kuosuli, mer pelogegala, ar wegi an sibad wa wagana magar an take, wemar ebisar pugua.
Tehginigwena, mel-legi ittoged neggi obadmaloe, ar neiy paigan Pab se koled gin surbali, ar wehmar igar uilesad imakoe; ar widsurmarsi, nonimarbaloe kannale, isgusad mismalale an se nonikoe kuage nuedgine, ani nudakoe, pehmar ibmar pentaked senonimaloe.
Tegi soggu we kaiya purma nue taimaloe, mer pehmar odurtailemalagala; tuledar wilegoe Paba odurdaidele.
Al pehmarga we igar an uke, pehmar akar akar pinsamalad bali. Tegi tule nuegana pehmala, weyobi pehmar na pinsaed sulina.
Al emide Pab se an nae, na eh se naed nue abelege, pehmar sabedbali.
Weyobi imaisa Esús sunmaisagua, esordamar wawargwen argangi ebusa na se kodshadi, pela na ebusa, ga sunmasbali.
Ar tule pukidar puguad ittossurmala weyob soisadi, tegi soggu, kwen bar soisasurmala; unnila esordamar (12) parsoisa, ega kangwed usad maladbali, purba nued ukegala. Ar yoho pemarga oyolegoe we ibmar soilesad napiraguadi.
Tehgi Esús pela ehmar ebusgua, poho pukidar paddenoniki, ar tulemargine, tegi tulemar puguad Esús aku taidemala.
Ar poho pukidar paddisgua eh nibneise nakuide wehmar abargine niba nade. Tegi esordamar (12) taisamala napiraguadgi bar soisamala niba neise nade.

Tehgine Esús niba naded sorba, tule pukidar puguad pela tuhurmaidemala, omeromele, emimmigan mala eneise nadmala.
Ar aha ibagi we ibmar taisamalad nasgude pela neggweburgine, mudikidbali, ar ehde na igar imaisa. Weh margala, al aha pangi tule pukidar ga we ibmar oyodmarbali.
Eye, ar weyob Esús taisamalad na soidemala mudikidbali; tegi soggu neggwebur pela wisgudmala, we ibmar pukidar kusadi, ar sordamar mergude, tummad na arbadmala mudikidbali, pangi Esús Kaiya purba ittomalagala tulemar ibmar taimarbaloedi.
Al pangine tulemar pukidar puguadgine, wegine ar Nefi, ekwenad wede kannar turgusa purbarmalad abargine enuga Timoteo ye, emachi Onas ye nuga, Matoni, Matoniah eKwenadi, ar Kumen, Kumenoni, al Eremias, Shemnón, Onas, Sedcios, al Isaias—tehgi wehmar nuisalesmala Esús sordamala (12), tulemar pukidar abargi Kuisgusmala.
Wegine, tulemar pukidar soggu dina, mamarisa sokambe kaga pogua.
Tegi ambe kaga poguad, tule pukidara odurdaisamala, ar wehmarga soidemala, yokorgi siymarye, al Pab se kodshamala Esús nuggine.
Tegi esordamar (12) Pab se kodshamala, Esús nuggine tegine kuisgusmala, ar igargan maid gi neggwebur odurdaisa.
Aha sorba na sunmaidemala, Esús igi ga soisa yobi (kwen soggwengid oguadshuli Esús sunmaisadi), wegi kannar yokorgi sigismala, Pab se kodshamala, Esús maggine.
Ibmar abemalad egidshamala, ar bur nue abemalad egiddemala Purba nued emarga uilesmala.
Tegi weyobi Pab se kodshamala, tihiwarse aidedmala, ar tule pukidar ba nad marmoga.
Ar Nefi tihi se aidesa, ar paudisar imaisa.
Tehgi na nosa tihigine ar tulemar paudisar imaide, pela tulemar paudisar sasa, Esús na sordaga imaisadi.
Ar tulemar pela paudisar imaisamala, ar tihi gi nosmargua, Purba nued se aidenoniki wemarsega, kuage ulubgi se ubosa, purba nued, soho yob gi aidenoniki.
Wegine sohoyobi gi aidenoniggi nibneggine, tule pukidar taisamala, ar parsorsamala; al angermar aidenonimala, ar igar imaidemala.
Tehgine sordamar igargan abinganamargua, wegi Esús aidenonik, wehmar abargine, eh marga igar uisa.
Ar tulemar pukidar puimaladga soide napagine kannar yokorgi sihimarye, ar esordamarga (12) teyob soisamoga.
Tegi pela kuable napagi yokorgi sigismargua, esordamarga (12) soide, Pab se kormarge.
Pab se na koddemala, Esús ga kodshamala, tule tummad nuggine, tegi E Pab tummad nuggine.
Tehgine Esús sigguas pangusa, eh margine, ar nono tuggin napase imaisa, ar soia:
Paba nued ye pehga na soge, wemarga Purba Nued ga peh uisa, wede an nuiymasa; ar an pensurmaladba an wisa napneggine.
Paba, pehse egise Purba Nued ga ukoe tulemar peh Kaiya purba pensurmaladgala.
Paba Purba Nued ga an uisa, an pensurmala, ar peh maga ittoe, an se kormaladi, ar anse kormala, wemarba na kudihi.
Emide Paba wehmarga an peh se egise, tulemar peh Kaiya purba penguosurmarmogadi, an wisguegala, ani wehmar abargi kudihi kue garmoga peh yobi Paba, peh ole anginmoga, wargwenna guaga kumalagala.
Esús weyob Pabse Kodshagua, esordamarse nade, ar wegi, Pabse Korsi Kudmala, ar kuable Sunmai pugua kudmala; Pab se ibmar egis pimaladba na egismala, ibmar nuegan nue wisgubimalad bali.
Tehgine Esús purba Nued Ehmarga uisa, Pabse Korsigua, al ewagar wehmargi kae, wagar nue mehe kae tailege, wegihidba sihbúh taile nade, Esús mola pela siybúguad tailedisulidi.
Ar Esús ga soisa: Pab se korsi samala, teginiguhele korsi na kudmala.
Tehgi kannar wehmargi na wis pangude, nono na tul-lu sigisa, kannar Pab se Kodebali, soide:
Paba nued ye na peh ga soge, al wehmar nudasmaladgine, ehmar ulubgi pensulid nikadbali; ar peh se egise wehmargala, tegi ekaiya purba penguo surmalidga korbali, angi nikadbali, peh kaiya purba pensurmaladbali, weyob angi nikumalagala.
Paba, napneg ga peh se korsuli, unnila peh anga wegi ibmar uisadgala, ehmar ulubgi pensulid nikadbali, nue wisgus maladbali, angine nugumalagala, ar ani wemargine, peh yob moga, Pbaa pehdi angine, na wargwen kumalgala, ani weh margi nuga tungwegala.
Ar Esús weyob ibmar soisagua, kannar nonibali esordamarsega, wegihidba, Pab se nue korsih kudmala, ar kannar ewagar na kade sibúgua, weh margine; al wegi wehmar wagar kadmarmoga Esús yobi.
Tehgine kannar wemargine pangudbali, ar Pab se kodsha.
Ar kwen parsoisasurmala, ePab se kodshadi, tule wargwengid kwen narmadsurbali ePab se kodshadi.
Tegi tule pukidar ittosmala, ar soisamala; ekuage ulubse nue ittosmala, eKaiya purba Pabse Kodshadi.
Teginiguale, esunmaisad keger ittosmala; ekodshad kwen narmailed suli, tule wargwen gid par soisa surbali.
Tegine Esús Pab se kole pergusgua kannar esordamar se (12) noniki, ar ga soide an kwen udios mar weyob taisasuli, ulubgi pensurmalad nikad; tegi soggu kwen gar oyoled suli ibmar saledisulid, ar penmalad bali.
Napiragua pehmar ga na soge wehmar kwen ibmar tummagan taisasurmala, pehmar taisadi, ibmar tummagan ittos surmarbali, pehmar ittosadi.

Tehgine tule pukidar puguad, ar esordamar (12) ga soide mel-le bar kormar ye; al soide kuage ulubgi nue kormaloye.
Madu purwi imaisa kannar unasbali, esordamarga (12) wis kunmalagala.
Tegi madu kusmargua ga soidebali, tulemarga madu mimiye.
Ar tulemarga mimisgua, tihi uisabali ga soide bali, kobmarge, tegi soidebali tulemarga mimibar ye.
Al esordomala (12), tulemar, madu, ar tihi kwen sedsurmala neise ga.
Tegi napiragua uisa tulemergala, madu kunnegale, ar tihi kobegala.
Ar ga soide: we madu kundible, al an san kunne, esan purba gala; tegi we tihi kobele, an ablis kobe esan purba gala, ar esan purba kwen uku mesosuli, al nued ittogoe.
Tehgine tule pukidar kunshamargua, kobsamarbargua, wegihidba, Purba Nued ulubgi se ubononiki; tehgine pinnasuli koddemela, ar Esús nuga odummosmala, wegihidba taibuimaladgine, ar ittos marbali.
Ar wegihid ba Esús nuga odummosmargua, ga soide: wegine emide, an Pab igar maidba an imaisa, an ga uisadbali, we neggwebur gala, tegi wede Israel neimoga.
Pehmar ebinsamaloe, pemarga sunmaisadi, ar soisa Isaias Kaiya purba soisad imailede—wegi narmakar mai pehmar gadi, tegi soggua nue wisgumaloe.
Napirá, napiragua pehmarga soge weyob imailedele, ar Pab ebo eneggwebur igar sabed mesisadi, Israel nega.
Tehgine wehmar napneggi mimiles puguadi, yoho weledoe, tada nakwesiki, tada arguanesiki, temarbalid, yarbarmalad, ar tule tummad Paba ye na wisgumaloe, epentaimaloedi.
Ar Paba anga soisa pemarga we yala na ukoe.
Tehgi peh marga an soge tulemar Israel gin surmalad kwen nugusurmalale, ega ib nuegan uilemaloed sorba an neggwebur oduhurmaisamalad sorbali.
Tehgine pehmar Agob neggin marmogadi, ehmar abargine namaloe; wemarde tulemar pukidara; ar kudih kudmaloe wehmar abargine kudimaloe igi soilagan achu yobi, igi ibmar turgan sapur abargi kudihi yobi, ar igi soilagan achu mimmigan sibad wawad abargi kudihi yobi, kwen pendako surmala.
Peh argan onakidoe, pehmar isdarmaladgine, ar pela pehmar isdarmalad pelolegoe.
Ar ani, an neggwebur wedoe igi tule ibdurgan wedoe yobi eibagan mosale.
Ar an neggwebur Pab ebo igarmesisadi, eye, peh pebe esgoro yobi na sadoe, peh konu sibugana esgoroyobi kangue saoe tegi neggweburmar pukidar obelogoe; a ibmar nikadi, mani Pab ga ukoe, pela ibmar nuegan nikadi we napneggine. Ani imakoe.
Weyob, Paba soge ibagwengine tummad odurdailegoe wehmala; tegi na nugumalar kebe; Paba soge wemargi aibinoe, eye, tulmar Israel neggin surmaladgine.
Tegi weyob kudoe an neggwebur sigidoe, Israel nega.
Wegine we napneggi, we neggwebur sigoe, Pab Agob ebo igar mesisad saledoe; tegi Erusalen pinelegoe. Ar nibnega gar kangwed we negweburba kudih kudoe; eye, an sunnad pemarga kudih kudoe.
Wegine Moises angi sunmaisa, soisagusa: Tule tummad pehmar Pab Tummadi pemarga ner wargwen odegoe, pehmar kwenadgan abargine an yobi; eh wehmar ibmar pela ittomaloe, pemarga sogoedi. Tegi tulemar we nele ittogo surmalad neggwebur abargi parmel-ledoe.
Ar napiragua pehmarga soge, pela kuable nergana, eye, ar Samuel akale, a sorbarmalad, napiraguadba angi sunmaisamala.
Wegine pehmar nergan e wagana, ar pehmar Israel neggwebur gin maladi; ar Paba pehmar tadgan ebo igar mesisa, tegi Abrahan ga soisa: peh wagangala ibmar nuegan uilegoe, pela ekwenadgangala we napnegginmaladi.
Ar Paba, an parmiali, pehmarse ga abgayala, pehmar wawargwen sulesa, pehmar isgusmaladi; tegi soggu pehmar emimmigana ebo igar mesisadi.
Igargan uisad sorba, tehgine Paba Abraham ebo igar mesisad keb imakoe, soide: Peh wagan ga igar nuegan uiledoe pela kwenadgan napnegginmaladi, Purba Nuegan uilegoed sega, tulemar Israel neggin surmlaadgala an ukoe ar we ibmar uilegoedi tulemar Israel negginsulidgala kandiki kuoe pela paiganbali, an neggwebur ononnoledoe, Israel nega.
We neggwebur tummad wiledoe, we yargine. Teginiguale, ar pela an igargan abingasale, ekuage isgudmaloe, angine, kannar isgud marbaloe, na tuggin samaloe, Pab tummad soge.
Tegi ani ebinsaoe, an neggwebur ebo igar mesisadi; wehmar ebo igar mesisa eibagan nonigidshe na weoe, ar kannar ePab yala ga uiledoena, wede Erusalen yala, napa nega ga urmailesadi, tegi sadegua, Paba soge.
Ar ibagandina nonikoe, pela Pab Kaiya purba parsoiledoe.
Tegi an penguosurmala, ani Esucristo, Pab Machi; ar Pab se Kormaloe an nuggine.
Tehgine edaimalad pinnasur Kaiya Koddemaloe, ar pulale namaidemaloe; ar eibiyagi na taidemaloe.
Tehgihidba Paba Kannar urbenonikoe, ar Erusalen ga uiledoe, eyala ga uilesadi.
Tegine welidaradba na Koddemaloe. ¡Pular namaimala, Erusalen nega tule sulid bali; ar Paba wile taisa eneggwebulu, Erusalen pentaisa.
Pabtummad esakkua onakuide pela Kuable Gweburmar taidemaloe; ar pela napneg tirbir naidi, taimaloe, Paba pentailegoedi; ar Paba, ani anmar wargwen nagua.
Tehgine wegi narmakar noid imailedoe: ¡Kuisgue, kuisgumala, kannale, ar Sion peh ogannoe; pehmarmor nued yomala, Erusalen Gwebur nuedi; kwen pehoe ib isguhed bar nonikosuli!
¡Ukkub peh mie; kuidsigue, ar nue sige Erusalen; peh kambu addinnaled esigge, Sion ebunagua!
Ar tule tummadsoge: pehmar pinsarsunna uisamala, ar mani suli pentailegoe.
Napira, napiragua pehmarga an soge an neggwebur, an nuga wisguoe, eye ibagwengine wisgumaloe, an sunnad sunmake.
Tehgine soidemaloe: ¡Ibiyobi taile tulemar yarpaigangined kaiya purba nuegan sedanimaloedi; pentaileged igar soinonikoe; Sion ga soge: Peh Paba nega takoe.
Tehgine pínnasur koled na ittodmaloe nomala, ainimala, wegine nomala, ibisgana mer ebumala, weh abargi nomala, nued na tamala tule tummad nuki sedmaloedi.
Ar mel-legi kuaegua nodmaloge; mer wakideyobi nodmaloe; ar tule tummad pehmar idugoe, Paba pehmar iduedga kuoe.
Wegi, anga tule arbaed nue pinsaoe; nibnega abingaoe, odummolegoe, ar iduega kuoe.
Weyobi tule pukidar peh taisamalad—peh wagar nue taile disulina, tulemar paiganba purbule, tegi tule mimmigan ba pule.
Weyob neggweburmar pukidara parmel-ledoe; eh asabin ereymar ekaiyamar bar sunmakosurmala, taidemaloe ibmar kwen taisasurmaladi, kwen ga soiled sulidi, weyob soidemaloe, kuen ittossurmala.
Napirá, napiragua peh marga soge we ibmar pela tailedoe, Paba anga soisadi tehgine Paba eneggwebur ebo igar mesisad imakoe, ar an neggwebur kannar ambigudoe Erusalen gine, ar we yala ega uilegoe.

Tegine napiragua pemarga an soge, ibmar pemarga oyogoe eibagan nagunonikoe, we ibmar. Kudsokalile ar an neggwebur na wisoe mimiles puguadgine, Israel nega, wehmar abargine Sion kannar sigoe.
Ar wegi wede pemarga na oyodoe—al napira pehmarga soge, tulemar Israel neggin surmalad, wisgudmalale we ibmar pemarga sogedi, an sunnad soge, Purba Nued kanguhed bali, Paba pemarga ukoe, tegisoggu tulemar Israel neggin surmalad wisgumaloe we neggwebur Agob etulemoga, (waganmoga) we an neggwebulu, ehmar ononnogoe.
Napira, napiragua pehmarga na soge, ar Paba we ibmar owisogoe—tegi Pab gi weh mar tanikoe peh margala.
Tegi Paba ibmar wisid, ba sunna we napneggi neggwebur sigisale, eittolegedbali, pah kanguhed nikadbali, we imbar sunna wemarba nonimogoe, pehmar wagana, ar sunna weyob kudoe Pab ebo neggwebur igar mesisad, ar Israel nega.
Tegihidba, ar wemar ibmar emisguagine pehmar abargi, tulemar Israel gin surmaladshe namala pehmar wagan tanimaloedi, Pab tummad iedmaloe, eisgus maladbali.
Ar Paba weyob abeye, tulemar Israel gin surmalad, gi nonikoe, ibmar kangued oyogoe, tulemar Israel gin surmaladga, wemala, kuagebar isgusurmalale, nugumaloe, anse taimalo, ar paudisar samala an nuggine an igar maid napiragua wisgumaloe, ar sunna an neggwebur sordaga kumogoe, ar Israel nega.
Tegi we ibmar kudele, ar pehmar wagan wisgudmaloe, tegi we oyoledoe, wisgumala gala Paba earbaed imaide, ar tegi neggwebur ebo igar mesisad imakegala wede Israel neggwebur.
Ar we ibagangine weyob kudoe ereymar eKaiya pogiledoe, ar ibmar ga suledsulid taidemaloe, ar soidemaloe kwen we ibi ittossurmala.
Ah ibagangi Paba ib sadoe, an ulale, ibmar tailedisulidi, ar ibiyob tailedoe wehmar abargine; wehmar abargi tulemar kwengwena ittogosurmala, amba tule paigan ga sogo inigwena.
Ar wegi, anga arbamalad esan purba an argangi na seoe; tegi soggu kwen akalogosuli; amba ewagar akalomalo inigwena. Tehgine ani nudakoe, ar an oyogoe imar wisidi, wede nia ba pur tummad ibmar an wisi.
Weyobi kudoe, ar tule, an kaiya purba penedi, an gadi, Esucristo, Pab Kaiya purba imaidoe, eh sedoe tulemar Israel gin surmalad sega, kaguhed ukoe. We Kaiya Nued sedegala tulemar Israel gin sulidgala (Moises soisad ba imailedoe) an neggwebur abargine parmeledoe, ar ambo igar mesisadi.
Tegi an neggwebur, ar Agob negginmarmogada, tulemar Israel ginsurmalad abargi kudoe, eye, wehmar abargine, igi ailigan Achuyobi, sapurba ibmar turgan abargi kudi yobi, ailigan achu mimmigan, ar Sibad wawad abargi kudih yobi, ar gin annaledoe, kwen tule wargwen gid pentakosuli.
Ar eargan oyodoe, eister maladga, tegi pela kuable eisdarmalad pela se obelolegoe.
Eye, ¡tule dar wiledmeloe Israel neggin surmaladi ar nugusurmalale! Ar ibagwen gi kudoe soge Paba pehmar moli suledoe peh abargine, al pehmar karromar pelolegoe.
Ar neggwebur perguoe, peh yargine al pehmar kasdibir omukuledoe.
Ar peh yargi tule kiadakaler obelolegoe, al tulemar yamomalad obelolegoe.
Pehmar argangi ibmar sobarmalad, pehmar asabinid sumaloe, ar kwen barse kolosurmala pehmar argangi ibmar sobaledshega.
Tegi pehmar sapimar pelolegoe, pehmar abargine; pehmar neggweburmar pergudoe.
Al weyobi nega kudoe, kakan saed, pergudoe, tulemar yamoed, istar taked, nergan kiatakaler, ar machergan, omegan tikarba nanaed pergudoe.
Wayobi kudoe, Paba soge we ibagangi an neggwebur abargine parmel-ledoe, pela tulemar nugusurmalale, an Machi sabedse taisurmalale, ar Israel nega.
Tehgine abinsaledoe, ar uludoe wemargine, weyobi kudoe Pab widsurmalad abargine, tegihidba kwen ittosurmaladi.
Ar isguhed mimalale, kuage nugumalale, an ittoed nega wehmar abargi simaloe; ar anbo igar mesoe, Agob sordaye nuiysalemogoe, wegi weyala ga an uisadi.
Tegi an neggwebur pentaimaloe, Agob edulamala, weyobi Israel negginmalad tanimalale, Gwebur sobdemaloe, nuiysaledoe Erusalen pinidi.
Tegine an neggwebur pentaidoe, wegihidba mimiles pugwadgi we yargine, ambigunonikoe, Erusalen pinid sega.
Tegi niba nega kanguhed wehmar abargine aidenonikoe ar abarse ga an nonikoe.
Ar we ibagine Paba na arbadoe, eye, ar we Kaiya purba pela parsoilesale we neggweburgine, napiragua pehmarga soge, we ibagine Paba na arbadoe, pela kuable an neggwebur mimiles puguadgala, eye ablis yokusmalad abargine, ar Paba Erusalengi onosadi.
Eye an neggwebur mimiles puguad gi igargan mesledoe, Pab ebogua tegi ga igar nudake gala, sunna an se tagoe, sunna Pabse kormaloe an nuggine.
Eye, tegine imailedoe, Paba ebogua igar mesidoe, pela neggweburmar abargine sunna eneggwebur kannar nonikoe, eyar ga uilesmaladshega.
Tegine pela neggweburmar namaloe, ar kuaeguae nodosurmala, ar kwen wakideyob nodosurmala, an wehmar abargi an naoe, Paba soge, an iduedga kuoe.

Tehgine we ibmar narmailesad imailedoe: ¡Namake, ar ome, koe keg nikwedi, pehdi kwen mimmigan nikudsuli! ¡Yeher ittoedgi namake, pehdi kwen poni nikudsuli! Ar wede mimmigan nega tule sulidginedi, abirgin nikad kadi tule tummad soge.
Pehnega odummoe, ar pehmar maidgi emor odummoe, ibmar suliyob mer tae, pehmar duba esigge, ar peh nega ogannoe.
Tegine argan nuedshigi, argan sabbiledsiki odummoe; ar peh wagan yala ga uiledoe, tegi nega tule sulidba ambigudoe.
Mer tomgwe, ar kwen obingeg kulegosuli; mer isdar ittoe, ar kwenbar obineg salegosuli, tegi peh istar taisamalad, kwe peh bar ebinsaosuli, ar peh machered suli kusadna peh iegoe.
Ar peh pentaked, peh Manchered, tule tummad iduedshe kole; ar peh pentakedi, Israel isliguadi, Pab tummadye nugguoe, pela napneg tirbir naidgadi.
Igi ome mel-lede yobi ulubgi na pugib pinsadi, Paba se kodsha, ar igi ome nudshugua obal-lesa yobi, peh Pab tummad soge.
Ar sigguas mel-ledoe, ar pur tumma wiledailege peh suoe.
Wis sigguas an ulusa, an wagar oduggusa pehgine, an wile taked kadeguad nikadgi na wile peh taisa, tule tummad soge peh pentakidi.
Ar weyobi kudoe igi Noe gi tihi tummad mulusa yobi; igi na soisa yobi Noe gi tihi tummad mulusad kwen bar muhrosuli napneggine, weyob an soisa, peh pogua kwen bar urwosuli.
Ar yarmar yokkudoe, tegi sapurmar pergudoe, an sabed kwen perguosuli, kwen osulolegosuli, igar sabed mesisadi an neggwebur ebogua, Pab soge ar wile an peh takedi.
¡Ar tule wiledmalale, purwa tummad gi nodmaladi, ar wile par tailegosulidi! Wegine pehmar akkua nued tailegedgi neg sobdemaloe, pehmar nega enapa akkua nuedgi sobledoe.
Pehmar yawag akkuamar yer tailegedgi sobdemaloe, pela kuable pehmar nega akkua nuegan gi sobdemaloe.
Ar pehmar mimmimar, Pab ibmar turdaidoe, tegi pehmar mimmigan pogi anbigudoe.
Igar inniggiguad ba ambaguoe, tikasur istar malad gi ambigudoe, bar tomgu osurmala, kuaiyed bar walika kuosuli.
Wegi napiragua pehmar pinar ambigudmaloe, ar se an kodshasuli, toa tule peh istar taedemalale; peh ulalale perguoe.
Wegine an obinnisa, esgoro sobmaladi, sohgin ogamaladi, ar eibmar sobmalagala, tegi obinnisa we obelogegala.
Kingi kwen bar soblegosula, peh pinale; ar pela wabinmala pehgi aibiddemaloe igar amiegala. Wede Paba ga arbamalad ga uiledoe, ar eigar napiraguad angi taniki Paba soge.

Ar tehgi emidi pehmarga soge, we ibmar turdakoe. Eye pehmar ga na igar uke, we ibi turdaimaloe nuedgine, ar Isaias Kaiya soisad tummadi.
Tegi eh napirá sunmaisa pela we ibmargine an neggueburgadi, Israel nega tehgine nue abelege, eh sunmake tulemar Israel neggin surmaladgala.
Tegi na pela ibmargi sunmaisad imailesa, ar Kaiya purba soilesad pela imailegoe.
Tegisoggu an Kaiya purba ittomala, pehmar ga an ibmar soisad narmake; ar eibagansega, ar Pab sogedbali, tulemar Israel neggin surmaladshe namaloe.
Ar toa tule an Kaiya purba ittoele, ar nugumalale, tegi paudisar imakele, pentailemaloe, nergan soisamalad turdaimala, ar we ibmar pukidar parsoimala.
Tegi Esús weyob kaiya purba soisagua kannar sunmadbali, weyob pela soisa, Kaiya purba marmailesad abingasmala, ar soia wegi narmaibimala, an pehmar paid Kaiya purba masulidi.
Ar wegihidba Nefi ga soisa: Igar kusmalad narmakar maid peh sedaye.
Tegi Nefi se sesgua we igar narmakar maid, ar eh ga uisa, Esús nue taisa ar soisa:
Ar napiragua pehmarga soge, ani Samuel Lamanitaga soisa, we neggweburga sogoe, Paba eibagan nonikoe, enuga odummolego angine, Pab sordamar pukidar purgismalad tailedoe, ar igar imaidemaloe. Tegi egidsha: ¿Weyob kudosi?
Tegi esordamar (12) soidemala: Eye, tule tummadi, Samuel napnega owisosa, peh ibmar soisadbali, ar pela ibmar imailesa.
Esús ga soisa: ¿Ibiga pehmar wede narmaisasuli, ar Pab sordamar pukidar turgusadi, ar ibmar imaisadi?
Ar Nefi de ebinsasa, wemarde narmaisasuli.
Tegi Esús soide wede narmaiye; tegi soggu narmaisa, eigar soisadbali.
Ar Esús pela weyob soisagua, Kaiya purba narmailesad, soide odurtaimaloye we ibmar eh soisadi.

Tehgine ga soisa Pab kaiya purba soisad, Malaquias ga narmaimaloye, ar ede kannar soide baloye, ar weyob soisad sorbali nue ga soidebali. Al we kaiya purba sunmaisad soide: weyob Paba, Malaquias ga soisa: we (tule) an kaiya purba parsoged permidagoe, ede an idu igar nudakoe, ar ukiale ittoed neise nonikoe, we tule amimala, eye tule kaiya purba parsogedi ebo igar mesisadi, wede pehmar ittoe yeherba; wegi tanikoe, tule tummad sorda idued soge.
¿Ar toa tule abinkuisguoe etanikile? ar ¿toa abin sunna kuisguo tailealile? Ar igi soho ibmar okummake yobi tailedoe, tegi morgauk gi mor enuke yobi tailedoe.
Tegi sigidoe, igi mani ogolegedyobi sadoe; Lebi mimmigan nudaidoe; igi olo, mani okolegeyobi na imaidoe, sunna tule tummadga ib nuegan na imaidemaloe igar innikiguadbali.
Tehgine uda, ar Erusalen Pab ga ib sadoed na nued takoe, igi ebbinnegua yobi, igi ar pirgamar nasa yobi.
Tegi ani pehmar se nonikoe igar innikiguadbali; ar emisguagi taisamalad tulemar yamomalad parsogoe, ar machergad, ome na tikarba nanamalad, tegi kakansamalad, tule wilemalad sabsursamalad, ome machered sulid, Pabgan sulid, tule paigan we yargin surmalad istar takele, ar kwen an tomsurmalad tule tummad soisa.
Ar ani tule tummadi, kwen kuaisasuli; tegine kwen pergudsuli Agob mimmigana.
Pehmar pab gan iban akale, pehmar an igar gi aibaddemala, ar kwen nue taisa surmala. An se taimala, ar ani pehmar se taimogoe, tule tummad sorda idued soisa. Ar pehmar soge: ¿Igi anmar kannar pehse nonikoe?
¿Tule Paba adsursasa? Tegi pehmar an adsursasa. Ar soge: ¿Igi anmar peh adsursasmala? mani poguadgine.
Pehmar tule isgana sunnadi ukabsaledmala, ar pehmala pela we yala gi adsursasmala.
Maniboguad sedamala an neg sega, an neggi maskul-leged nikwegala; tegi wede ittomala emidina, tule tummad soge, tegi sulile pehmarga nibneg egaosuli, ar pehmar ib nuegan unnidiba uilegoe.
Tegi tule istarmalad an kaoe, pehmar ulale, tegi pehmar ibmar tihsamalad kwen isgudsuli, ar pehmar adi nuegan nikudmaloe, yoho eiba moele, tule tummad soge.
Ar gweburmar pelaguable soidemaloe, tule nuedi, ar pehmar napa nuedga kudoe tule tummad soge.
An kaiya purb peheshegi na pehmar ittomala, tule tummad soge teginigwena pehmar soge: ¿Ibugi na pehgi sunmaisa?
Soisamala: Pab ga na pinsar arbarmala: ¿Ar Pab igar nue taisamalana yeherbana ar tule tummad asabin wile ittodi kusmala?
Tegi emide tule tummarba na san samalad, tule nuedye ga peh soimala; eye tulemar isgididihid kuisgudmaloe, eye Pab idshodimalad pasurdarledmaloe.
Tehgine Pab tomgudimalad mushubmushubbi sunmaidi na kudmaloe; ar tule tummad se koled ittosa, tegi gin pinsalesad. Karda narmarsa. Eh asabinni ar toa tulemar, tule tummad tobgusmaladi ar enuggi pinsamala.
Ar an gad ga kuoe, tule tummad soge ibmar nued ibagangi weledoe; ar na sabogoe ar isgusad an iegoe, igi tule emimmigan isgusad iesa, ga ibmar imaidoe.
Tehegine pehmar nonimaloe, ar ibmar nued, ib isgana wisgudmaloe, Pab ga arbamalad abargine, tegi ga arba surmarmogad.

Wegihidba ibagangi soho yobi kadoe; ar pela tulemar tummar na samalad, eye tulemar idshagua tamalad; ar ibagan nonikoe kummaidoe tule tummad soge, ar teyobi kudoe, kwen emaligan, egagan pedosuli.
Ar pehmar an nug tommalad; Machi Nued Kuisgudoe, ede san suilidiggid se noniggoe; tegi nonimaloe, ar pehmar nue taidemaloe, sibad wawa mimmigana yobi.
Tegi tule isganagi annaledoe; ar purú yobi pehmar gin annadmaloe, ani we imakoe, tule tummad soge.
Moises igarmaid ebinsamaloe, anga tule arbaed na parmisa, Oreb sega, pela Israel gala.
Pab ibagan puled tanikoed iduale, ner Elias, pehmarga an parmidoe.
Ar eh; Pabgan pinsaed na mimmigan se nonikoe, ar mimimmar pinsaed nonimogoe epab gansega, mer na tanikir napneg peloegala.

Esús weyob we na soisagua tule pukidar puimaladga nue soide; ar pela ibmar nuegan soide, igar tummagana, igi igar purwigana yobi.
Ar soide: we igargan narmakaledi pehmar kwen nikus surmala, Paba soisa pehmarga na sogoye; ar Paba eibmar wisidba na owisogoye pehmar wagan tanimaloedgala.
Tegi ibmar pela na soisa, eye, kege nega saila unni, ar eh kandikidgi tanikoed ibagansega; eye, napneggi pela ibmar kuoedi, pela ibmar perguoe neg tiopisulidbali, ar napa ber obirmailedoe, ibmar nol-logua yobi, nibnega yokudoe, tegi napnega.
Ar ibagan perguoedsega, pela neggweburmar, kwenadgan, Gweburmala, tegi kuapin akar-akar puguad, Pab Tummad asabin Kuisgudmaloe, ehmar nanasmaladba gar igar amiledoe, tegi nued dibe, ar idshaguadibe.
Ar nued nanas dibe, sanpurba kadeguadga uiledoe; tegi tule idshagua nanasdibe parmel-ledoe; nuedgine soiledoe, yobbira igar maidbali, sogwen paidshigi, ar paidba paidshibali, ewile takedbali, igar nue maid ba Cristo imaidoe ar napneg nagusa idue kudigua.
Tehgine kwen sokwengid narmailed suli we karda maidgine, Esús ibmar napiraguad odurdaisedi we neggwebulu.
Ar wegi Nefi Kaiya purba narmailesad pur melu mai, we ibmar odurdaisadi.
Tegi wegi na ibmar narmaisad, pur idshe neggwebulu odurdailesa, an narmaisa we neggwebur kannar sedagegala, tulemar Israel neggin surmaladgi taniki, Esús Kaiya purba soisedbali.
Tegi wemar ibmar abingasmalale, ar abelege idue wisgumala, tegi ulubgi pensulid nikad wilub takedi, na penguosurmala, tegi gar ibmar tummagan soiledoe.
Ar we ibmar wisgubisurmalale, ibmar tummagan bargar soilego suli, ena wiledmaloe.
Wegihidba na nue narmak sokalina, Nefi Kaiya purba gi maidi, ar tule tummad anga ised nasisa soide; wilub tailegoloe ulubgi pensuled, an neggwebulu.
Tehgine ani Mormón, ibmar na narmake tule tummad anga soisad. Ar emide an Kaiya purba pelosa, ibmar anga soisad imaidoe.
Tehgine wisgubi an pehmar abemala, tule tummad neggwebur odurdaisadi, iba pahagua; ar we sorbali pali bali na ibmar soidi kude, al palibali madu mimidi na kude, tegi unasa, ar mimisa.
Weyobi mimmigan purwigana odurdaisa, tulemar pukidar puguadgine ga sunmaisa, ar ga eigar maid imaisa wemargala; tegi na sunmaidemala, ar soidemala igargan tummagana epabgangala, neggweburga ibmar tummagan soisadbali; ar na pasur sunna sunmake imaisa mimmigana.
Tehgine nibneise nakuisad sorba—kannar na ibmar oyosa, ar Pabse kannar nadbali, tulemar ueledimalad nudasa, naipisgarmalad, nudaisa, ibiya surmalad ga ibiya egasa, uaya yal-lirmalad maga itto imaisa, poni kala gwensuli niymalad nudaisa, ar tule wargwen purgismalad abargi odulosa, tegi na epurba kanguhed na oyosa, ar Pab se nade.
Wegihidba ah pangine tule pukidar ambigunonimala, ar ittosmala, taisamarbali, we mimmipurwigana, eye ar pur pibiguad na sunmaisa marmoga ibmar ittole sulidgine; tegi ibmar na soisamalad, tule wargwen gid ga soiled suli narmaimalodeye.
Tehgine Esús sordamar na wesad we ibagangi paudisar imaidemala, ar tule ba nagubimalad wehmar odurdaidemala; tegi paudisar imailesale Esús nuggine, Purba Nued se ubononiki.
Ar wehmar taisamala, ar ittosmarbali ibmar soiledisulidi, ar kwen gar soiledsuli narmaimalodeye.
Tegi na odurdaidemala, igargan maid imaidemarbali, ar pela pulagua na imaidemala, igar nued maidi mushubmushubi.
Ar pela ibmar imaisamala, igi Esús ga soisa yobi.
Ar paudisar imailesmalad Esús nuggine, Cristo ittoed neiye nuggusmala.

Tegi Esús sordamar, Pab igarba sunmaidi na kudmala, ibmar ittosmalad, ar taisamalad, teg paudisar imaidemarbali, Esús nuggine, ar ambigudmala, kandigid ba Pabse kodshamala, ar amarga wis ised nasismala.
Ar Esús kannar se nonibali, ar Pabse ibmmar egidsamalad ulale; tegi Esús noniki abarsega, ar ga soido: ¿Ibu pehmar ga uibi pela, an, abemala?
Tehgine gar soidemala: Tule Tummad ye anmar wisgubimala, igi nuisamaloe we ittoed nega, ar we neggwebur na egis mala, nue wisguhegala we ibi.
Ar tule tummad abin imaide: Napira, napiragua pehmarga an soge: ¿Ibigar sunna we neggwebur urwesunna, we ibmar ulale?
¿Kaiya purba narmakaled. Kwen absos surmarsi, ar soge pehmar Cristo nuga sedi samaloe, wede an nuga? Ar we nuiba nuggumaloe, ibagan napidgine.
Tegi tule an nug sedihle, ar sogedba nanadihle eperguhedsega, wede pentailegoe ibagan pergudele.
Tehgine ib imakalile, an nuggi imakoe weyobi ittoed nega, an nuiba nugguoe; ar Pabse egidele, an nuggine, ittoed ga purba nued ukegala an nuggine.
Ar iggudosunna an ittoed nega, anbali nuisulile? Ar ittoed neg sogwen Moises ye nugale, al wede Moises gado ittoed nega; tegi tule wargwen nug, nuidibe ittoed nega ar ahagaddo; tegi an nuiba nugale, ar ittoed nega angaddo, ar an igarmar maidba nue sigisa.
Napira, ar napiragua pehmarga an soge, pehmala an igargan maidba dihmala, tegi soggu nugimakele an nuiba nuisamaloe; tehgine ar Pabse egisele ittoed neg gala, Paba pehmar ittomaloe, ar an nuggi imaimalale.
Ar ittoed nega an igar maidba sihile, ar Paba eibmala pehmarga oyodoe.
Tegi an igarba sihsulile, unni tulemar imakedi, ar nia igardibe, napiragua pehmarga an soge, siguas eigar megidoe, ar wegi eperguhed iba nonikoe, ar pergudoe, mel-ledoe soho abargine, tegi Kannar Kwen siynonikosuli.
Ar ibmar imaisad ba naoe, eibmar imaisadba, wiledbaloe; ebinsamala, tegi pehmarga na ibmar soisadi.
Wegine pehmarga an igar uisa, ar we Kaiya purba maid pehmarga na uisa; Pab sogedba an napneise noniki, an Eh an parmiali.
Ar an Paba, an parmiali nagrusgi purgega turguegala; tegi nagrusgi nai purgisgua kannar turgusa, tegi ani sunna tulemar an se na sedagegala, ar tulemar pela sunna turgumarmogoe, Paba weyob sunna odulogoe, an asabin igar ga amiledoe, eh nanas maladbali, ar nued dibe, ar isguhed dibe.
Ar aulale an Kannar turgusa, tehgine Pab purba kanguhedbali, an se pela tulemar sedagoe, eibmar na imaisadba ga igar bar amiledoe.
Ar wegihidba na isguhed misale, tegi an nuggi paudisar imaisale, nuguoe; tegi nued kudihi kudele, wegi Pab asabin an ibmar widsulid ga sadoe, ani we ibagan napidgi napnegga igargan napi palamidele.
Tegi tule wargwen, igargan maidba nue disulile, pergudoe, ar sohogi parmel-ledoe, wegihidba kwen bar nohosuli, Pab igar innigigua maid ulale.
Ar wede we Kaiya purba ehde uisa tulemar mimmigangala; ar tegi Soggu an sunmaisad, imailedoe; ar kwen kagansuli, unnila pela eKaiya purba imailedoe.
Tehgine ib isgana nibneise togosuli; ar tegisoggu tule wargwen kwen se togosuli, unnila tule emor an ablisgi enuisadi, eKuage ulubgi pensulid nikadbali, isgusad pela na misale, ar nued soged ba nanadihile.
Ar wede igar maidi: Isguhed mimala pela pehmala, napneg tirbirnaidi, ar an se taimala, paudisar samala an nuggine, a nugumala, Purba Nued uiledoe, tegi ibagan pergudele, an asabin Kuisgumalagala sansulidigidgine.
Tegi napira, napiragua pehmarga ansoge, wede, an igar maidi; pehmar ibmar wismala, an ittoed neggi ibmar imailegedi, ar pehmar an taisa imake weyobi, imaimarmogoe, ar wehmar an taisamalad pehmar imaimarmogoe.
Tegi sogga wede pehmar imaimarmogale, tule nueganga kudoe, ar yohose nibneise namaloe.
Narmaimala ibmar taisamalad, ar ittosmaladi, unnila ibmar ised pehmarga nasiysad narmaimalosuli.
We neggwebur ibmar imaisad, narmake, yohoe ibmar samaloedi, teyob narmailes bali ibmar imaisamaladi.
Tehgine wegi karda narmailesad, ar narmarlebaloed, weba igar ga amiledoe, we neggwebur gala, ar weba wehmarga owisoledoe ibmar imasadbali we tulemar.
Wegine, Paba pela ibmar narmaisa; tegi soggu napnega igar napi amiledoe, karda narmailedmaidbali.
Tehgine pehmar nue ittomala, we neggwebur tummagan ga pehmar nuisaledoe, an igar ga mesidoe, napiraguad ba uiledoe. Tegisoggu ¿tule igid ga na kumaloe? Napiragua pehmarga an soge an sunna pehmar tamala.
Ar emide Pab se na naoe Tegi napiragua pehmarga an soge, an nuggi Pabse ibmar egisele, pehmarga uilegoe.
Tegi soggu, egise, ar abingamala; kole, pehmarga egalegoe; ar tule egise abingaoe; tegi se koler ga egalegoe.
Ar wegihidba, an na nue yeher ittoe, ar pela guablegua na welidar ittoe, pehmar ulala, ar tulemar we ibaganginedi; eye, ar Paba yeher ittoe, tegi pela kuable angermar nuegan gala, pehmar ulale we pirgaganginedi; ar tule wargwen gid perguosuli.
Wegine nue wisgumaloe, ar tule emi tula kudidihidi, ga an soge; tegi wehmar wargwen gid kwen yokuosurmala; ar na nue yeher ittoe wehmarbali.
Tegi wegine nue na pugib ittoe, wagan soipakedgine, we ga soiledoe, ar eh se wiledmaloe igi machi isgusadyobi; ar pehmar an uimaloe manigine, ar orgine, pela udubi kuedi, ar tulemar addursamalad addursadoe. Tegi we ibagangine an tainonikoe, pehmar ibmar imaisamalad, kannar pehmarga obinoe.
Tehgine Esús weyob sunmaisad sorbali, esordamargala (12) soisa: yawagba peh toige, ar yawag yatada, tegi igar mata pibisule, ahdi neiy tule osuloged se nad sunna, ar aigargine tule pukidar ba nadabbi. Ar yawag osogua, tegine igar ganawaguadi purba keig pergued nikue, ar tule pogua a igardi par amimaloe, ar midukidba nonikile tule wargwen gid bar arbasuli.

Tegine Esús weyob sunmasgua esordamarga soide wawargwenadgala, ar soede: ¿Ibu pehmar abemar ye, Pabse an naded sorbali.
Ar pela abinsasmala, unnila warbahaguad kwen soisasuli: anmar abemala, tulemar pergudele, arbaed pelomarmogoe, tegi peh anmar se kodsamaladgine, sunna pehse kuae namaloe, peh neisega.
Tegi eh soide: Pehmar tule nuegana. We abemalad an ibmala, tegi soggu, pehmar pirga tula kuhile kaga pogua nikale, an neise namaloe, ar an walig neiypogid (ittogoe) amioe.
Ar ga sunmaisagua, warbahaguad se adaide, ar soisa: ¿Ibu imaibi pehmar an abege, pehmargala, Pab se an nadsogele?
Tegi kuage gine pugib pinsadmala, ar keg na soimala ibmar abemaladi.
Ar eh de soide: wegi pehmar pinsaed an wisi. Uan an sabgusad abesad yobi pehmar abemarmoga, we tule ambo arbasa an igarbali, an udios mar a bargi turgusa.
Tegi soggu pehmar tule nuegana, ar kwen purged ittogosurmala, unnila pehmar Kudihi Kudoe Paba pela ibmar imaisadsega tulemar mimmigangala.
Ar purged kúen ittogosuli; unnilagua ani nibneggi mai aidealile san purged nikad kuaidoe, san kege purged abingaoe, ar kabideyobi na ittogoe; tegine an Pab neggine pemarga purba nuegan uiledoe.
Tehginbali, kwen nunmaked ittogosuli napneggi kudihile, wile ittogosuli, unnila napneg isguhed ga pugib ba ittogoe; tegi pehmar ibmar abemalad pela na imakoe, pehmar na abesmala tulemar an se tagedi, napneg naid gine.
Ar we ulale yeher ittomaloe; an Pab neggi siydabmaloe; eye, pehmar pela welidar ittomaloe, Igi Paba pela werguhed anga uisayobi, ar an sunna kumarmogoe, igi ani Paba yobi, tegi Paba, ani wargwennagua.
Tehgi Purba Nued, Pab tummad, ani parsoge, ar Paba Purba Nued uke tulemar mimmigan gala, an ulale.
Ar weyob imaisa, sunmaisad sorbali, Esús wehmar wawargwen eargan gi na ebusa, ar warbahaguad di kwen ebus suli, al pemaloedi, tegi na nade.
Wegihidba nibnega argade, wemarde niba nagguidmala, tegi ibmar ittosmala taisamarbali kege bar kannar tailegedi.
Tehgine kwen gar soiled suli we ibgi summako deye, Kanguhed Kwen gar uiled surmarbali, we ibmar ittosmalad, taisamalad, bar sogegala.
Ar kwen na soisa surmar bali, san nikadibe, ar surdibe; wegi take saele wehmar kuaisa yobi tailege, san kege purgedgala, Paba ibmar sunna take garmala.
Ar weyob kude kannar eigargan gar uilesmala imaidemala napneggine; teginiguale, kwen soisasurmala ibmar taisamalad, ittosmalad, nibneg akar igar ga uilesmalad ulale.
Tegine ar napneggi kudihi na kudmala san purgaled niydibe, ar san kege purged dibe, eibagan san kuaisad sorbar, ar na nue widsuli.
Unnila na wisi igar kusad maidbali, we yargi kudihi kusmala, earbaed na imasmala, pela neggweburmar abargine, paudisar imaisa ittoed neg sordamar omelode, ibmar odurdaisa ittosmaladi; tegi paudisar imasmargua, Purba Nued abingasmala.
Ar tulemar esordasurmalad esgaryagi medemala, tegi kwen akalossurmala egalu ga ayalid se tae.
Tegine napa yaba odolesmarbali, Pab Kaiya purba bali napa yaba mai kannar nosmala ar purba kanguhed nikadba napyaba mai noddamala; tegisoggu tikasur tiymardibe kwen akargusurmala.
Ar ila pahagua soho yaba mel-lesmarbali, kwen akar kudsurmala.
Tegi ila pogua ibmar tulad ursirmalad abargi mel-lesmala; ar wegihidba mimmigana yobi we ib tuladgi todosmala, igi sibadpurwimalad yobi gi todosmala, kwen akalos surmala.
Ar weyobi kudihi nakusmala Nefi neggweburgine, Cristo igargi sunmaidi kusmala, tulemar we yargin maladgala; ar Pab ba nagudmala, Cristo ittoed neg sordaga kusmala; tegi weyob neggwebur na nugudmala, tulemar we ibagangin maladi, Esús Kaiya purba soged bali.
Tegi wede an obedoe, Mormón, narmasad we ibmar gine emidega.
Wegi na nue narmag soggalina, tule warbahaguad nuga, purged ittogo surmaladi, ar tule tummad anga ised nasiysa, tegi soggu na narmakosuli, ar napneggi oduggulesa.
Ar wegine, an taisa, tegi Ehmar anse arbimala.
Tegi wede, tulemar Israel neggin surmalad abargi kudihi kudmaloe, ar wehmar aku taimaloe.
Udios mar abargi Kudih Kudmarbaloe, tegi wehmar de aku taidemarmogoe.
Tehgine tule tummad pinsad dibe ibagandi noniki, eibmar wisid wegihidba igar gar uiles malad imaidemaloe, pela Israel ablis mimiles puguad abargine, ar pela neggweburmar, kwenodgad, kuabinmar, ar Gweburmala tegi wehmar abargi tule pukidar. Esús se sedmaloe, eibmar abesmalad imailegegala, ar aukinbali kanguhed nikadba gar sogegala Paba wehmar abargidihye.
Ar igi Pab angermar yobi; tegi Pabse koler Esús nuggine sunna ib oyoge tulegala we nued takele.
Tegihidbali ibmar tummagan tailedi surmalad imaisamala, yohoe ibagan tanikidsega a iduale, ar pela kuable, Cristo asabin kuisgudabmaloe.
Eye, tulemar Israel neggin surmalad igar imaidemarmogoe, ibmar tummagan ar tailedisurmalad, ibagan napidgi igar par amiledoed iduale.
Tegi pehmar pela karda narmailesad niymala, Cristo igar tummagan imaisad soinai, wismala, Cristo ibmar soisadbali, we ibmar napiraguadba kudoe.
Ar ¡tuledar wiledoe Esús Kaiya purba ittogosurmalad, ega Kaiya purba parsoimalad ittos surmarbalid! Tule Esús Kaiya purba kwen abingasulid, tegi eh tule parmialid kaiya purba parsogega abingan surmarbali; ar eh de kwen abingaosuli; ar tegisoggu. Eh na abingaosuli, ibagan napidgine.
Ar mer bur kualulesana nabirina. ¿Tegisoggu pehmar Pab Tummad igar maid ittosurmala, ar tulemar gin annadmala, we sogedba sunna pentailegoena?
Tegi wegine wehmar ga na sunmasad, Paba wehmar susa—ar warbahguad nibneggi naguidmala—ar na widsuli, esan kuaisadibe, kege bar purgedgala.
Wegihidba na narmaisad sorba, tule tummad se egidsa, ar eh anga soisa sanga an oguasa, tegisulina ar purged ittomaloena.
Tegi soggua, mer purged ittomalagala, na sanga oguasa, mer nunmaged ittoegala, unnila na pugib ittogoe napneg isgusad ulale.
Tehgine wede san ogualesa, weyob kuosuli ibagan napidgine; ar wehmar san kuaisa, ar nia mer pinsaed kaegala, kwen akalogosurbali; san purba nued imailesa, ar napneggi kwen akalos surmarbali.
Ar wegine kudih kudmaloe, Cristo igar napi bar amiedsega, tegi we ibagangi san na kuaidemaloe bur tumma webali, ar Pab neggi abingaledoe, mer bar noegala, unnila Pab tummad weliguar kudih kadguoe.

Tegi emide wegi pehmarga an soge, tule tummad ibmar wisidba igar amidoe, tulemar Israel negginsurmaladgala ekaiya purba nonikoe, esoisadbali, tegi soggu na igar imaidoe Paba igar mesisadi Israel mimmimar ebodua, ekannar obinononiggoe napneisega ega uilesadi.
Ar wisgumaloe tule tumamd kaiya purba nergan parsoesad, pela imailedoe; ar kwen sogo surmala, Israel mimmigansega tule tummad tanikid yokusa.
Tegi mer na kuager pinsamala, pinsale ar wegihidba tule tummad ebinsadoe Israel mimmimar ebo igar imaisadi.
Ar we Kaiya purba pehmar nai taidemalale kwen isdar taked tailesuli, ibagan suidi tule tummad mesisa, ar igar súnsoged argan nued siki kuisgudoe; tegi wegine we ibagangine eibmar imaisad isdar taidemalale, eh de pehmar palegiddoe.
¡Tule dar wiledoe Pab ibmar imaisad isdar taimalad; eye tule wiledoe Cristo osulodmalad ar eibmar imaisadi!
Eye, ¡Tuledar wiledoe Pab ibmar oyosad osulodmalale, owisolesad, purba nuegan uilesad osulodele, ar tule sogele, tule tummad bar ibmar oyosuli, owisosuli, kuabinmar, tule nudaimalad, tegi purba Nued Kanguhed osulodmalale.
Eye ¡Tule wiledmaloe we ibagangine na wargwen mani onaidele, ar Esucristo kwen imaisuli, ibmar toiledisuledi! Ar tule weyob sogele, igi mimmi isganaga kuoe, ar wehmar wile tailegosurmala, Cristo soisa.
Eye udios mar isdar kwen bar tailedosuli, kwen gin todolegosuli, teyobi kudbaloe Israel tulemala; Paba na ebinsadoe, ebo igar mesismaladi, ar wehmar imaidoe na soisamaladi.
Tegi soggu mer pinsamaloe Paba argan nued siggi, argan nued siggi kuisgumalodeye, mer eigar sogedba imakegala, igar mesisad na sadoe Israel tulemar ebo imaisadi.

¡Ittomala Israel neggin surmalad, ar Esús Kaiya purba nue ittomala, Pab tummad Machi tuladi, anga soisa Kaiya purba sogoe pehmargine sunmainaidi! Ar wegi Eh anga soisa, narmaiye, soide.
¡Taimala, pehmar kuable, Israel neggin surmaladi isgusmalad; ar ibmar idshagua imaidid mimala, pehmar kakan saed, ar tue tododihid, mashered ar ome gin nonodihidi, igar tugguar sadid, Paba suli kudidihid, tule kindaked, nergan isgudidihid, isdar emar taked, urwedidihid, tegi pela pehmar isgudidid, ar an se tage, paudisar imaimala an nuggine, isguhed mimalagala tegi Purba Nued nikumaloe, pehmala an neggwebur sordaga kumarmogoe, ar wemarde Israel negginmaladi.

1.intro: Nefi Neggwebur Gi Sunmaimaidi Eigargan Kusmaladbali
Tegi pirga turbaha kaga pake ar pirga turbaha kaga tale nadedgine; wegihidba. Esús sordamar (12), eittoed nega nue eigargan mesidmala weyobi imaide pela napneggine, ar isgusmalad na nugudmala napiraguadgine, paudisar imaidemala, Esús nuggine; tegi Purba nued abingadmala.
Ar pirga turbaha kaga nerguagine pela tulemar. Pab sordamarga. Kudmala napneggine, Nefitas ar Lamanitas; wehmala urwed suli nanadmala, ar nued kudihi kudmala.
Tegi pela tulemar yobbira ibmar nikudmala, ar tule mani ibed, wileged suli; tule maigan, tule eittoleged kudihid suli, unnila pela tulemar nued tamaladbi.
Tegi pirga turbaha kaga kuhile, napneggine pogidnagudbali.
Ar Esús sordamar (12) ibmar tailedisurmalad tummagan imaidemala, tehgine uelemalad nudaidemala, purgismalad odulode, mali pisgarmalad nudaidemala, ibiya surmalad onikudmala; uwaya atiarmalad egasa, tegi ibmar tailedisurmalad imaidemala tulemar mimmimar abargine, unnila Esús nugginbi imaidemala.
Tegi we pirgamargine nega pogid nagude; eye pirga tulataled ila kwena kaga pakebakagine.
Ar tule tummad napnega onasode; Eye neggwebur paigan soplede, neg kummasmaladgine.
Eye, ar Sarahemla neggwebur tummad kannar soblede.
Tegi neggweburmar pukidar taisamala, napa, tihigi nagude; tegi soggu We neggweburmar kege bar sobleh.
Ar Nefi neggwebur na kandiki sigide, ar nasgude, Gwebur yeher tailenade.
Tegi na abirgin nikudmala, ar abirgin nikudmarbali, ibmar nuegan abingadmala (nikudmala) Pab tummad ebo igar mesisadbali.
Ar Moises igargan maidba kwen bar nanad surmala, Pab tummad igargan maidba na ib imaidemala, Pab tummad ga uisadbali ised masga naside Pabse Kordi Kudmala, ittoed neggi ambigudih Kudmala.
Ar neggweburgi tulemar urwed pergude, nega pogilede; tegi Esús sordamar (12) ibmar tailedi surmalad imaidemala.
Tehgine pirga tula kuhile nasa; eye, ar pirga tulataled ila kwen sega, tegi Esús sordamar (12) Pab nega pado susadgine, unnila warbahaguad pelesmalad bi kudimala ar paid warbogua esorda sulesa, ar wehmar inale; tegi pukidar pad tulemar wehmar ibaganginmalad purgismala.
Ar weh yargine nega pogid nagusa, neggwebur, Pab tummad sabed nikadbali.
Tegi isdar taimalad suli, urwedsuli, abirgin noed surmala, kagán saed, kindagéd suli, ar tegi soggu neggwebur baid yeher taileged suli, Pab argangin ibmar obinnilesadi paid suli.
Tule adsursaed suli, kintaged suli, Lamanitas suli, ar tule paigan surbali, unnila Cristo mimmiganbi, unni wargwen na Kuayobi Paba nega abingamaladi.
¡Ar ibiyobi Paba ibmar nuegan ga uide! Tegi tule tummad eibmar obinnisad ga uide; Paba napnega onasgude, pirga tula taled ila pah nanasadgine. Ar tulemar kebe abingusmaladgine, pado Cristo purgisad sorbali, tegi we yargine urwedsuli.
Ar Nefi di purgisa igar kusmalad osabosadi (ar neg kusmalad na sedisunna Nefi Kaiya purbargine) tegi Machi Amos ahagine na sesmoga; ar Nefi Kaiya purba maidgi na mesidmoga.
Tehgine pirga tula pahabag kaga pakegine nega pogid amba nagude; unnila siguas Pab igar maidba na nódmala, ar Lamanitas kannar tailearmala we yargine.
Ar Amos purgismoga (pirga tulataled ila kwen kaga turbakebaka Cristo tanikoed iduale), ar emachi, Amós, na sesmoga igar kusmalad maidi; Nefi Kaiya maidgi narmasmoga, we Kaiya purba maidgi narmasmoga.
Tegine pirga tula taled ila pake nasa; ar pela tulemar idumalad purgisa; wis wawargwen napi kudih.
Ar ani, Mormón, wisgubimar an, pehmar abege, napneggine tulemar mergude, tegi soggu we yargi tulemar pukidar ambigude, ar mani ibegan ga. Kudmala, ar Cristo ga ibmar uisamalad ulale.
Tegi we pirgamar sikuas nadedgine, tule wargwen wehmar abargine na san ogánnode, ar mor yeher taileged na yode, ar nasidmala, we napneggi ibmar yole disulid na yode.
Ar weh pirgamargine ibmar nuegan niymalad na midmala ibmar yobbira nikadi.
Tegi aka-akar tulemar mimilede, ar Pab ittoed nega sobdemala maniga imakegala; ar Cristo ittoed nega napiraguad osulodmala.
Tehgine pirga tulataled ila pake kaga ambe nadedgine, pado we yargine ittoed nega pukidar sigide; eye ittoed neimar eigargan maid, Cristo wisye na soimalana, teginiguale purmelo eigargan maid bar imaisurmala, tegi soggu igar isgana imaidemala, igar iséd igar nuegan ga imaidemala ar nuedsuli.
Ar we ittoed nega mergude eisguhedbali, tegi nia ekuage pinsamalad kade.
Tegi paid ittoed nega sihbali Cristo osulodi; a wede Cristo ittoed nega napiraguad esordamar palegin narmala, emer guhedbali, tegi Cristo pensurmaladbali, tegi isdar tailedmala ibmar tailedisulid imaidih maladbali, wehmar abargine.
Tegine eigargan kanguhed imaidemala, Esús sorda margine (12) wehmar abargi pelesmaladi, ar esgaryagine medemar bali, Pab Kaiya purba kanguhed weh marba Kudihi, esgaria ga argad tae, nosmalale neggwebur abargine ibmar tailedisulid imaide tamala.
Teginiguale ar weyob ibmar ibmar imaidamar inigwena tulemar na kuage isgudmala, oburgebi tamala, Igi udios mar Erusalengi Esús oburgisayobi, esoisad bali.
Ar soho abargine méde tamala, tegi kwen akargudsurmala.
Ar tehginbali ibmar turgan ursilid puguadyagine mel-led tamarbali, mimmimar yobi gi todod tamala igi sibad purwigana yobi saddamala tegi kwen akar kudsuli nodtamala.
Teginiguale, neggwebur etulamar na ekuage nue isgude, ar nergan, ner tummagan isgana nikad bali, ehmar. Kuage idshode, ittoed neg paigan siegala, tegi igar isgana imakegala. Ar Esús Gwebur wisode; tegi Esús neggwebur kwen abin imaisasuli, tulemar nue isgude, Pab igar pengudmala, tegi pirgamardi nue ga isgud marsunna, ar tula taled ila pake kaga turbaha nadedgine.
Ar we pirgagine, eye pirga tula taled ila pake kaga turbaha kaya kwensag, tule pukidar na mimiledmala.
Tegi weyobi we pirga de kudsunna, tula tangwen Nefitas marye nuggude, ar wehmarde Cristo pensurmaladi napiraguadgine; ar wemarde Lamanitas ye nuga, etula paigan (esordamar) nuymarbali, Agobitas, Osebidas ar Soramidas;
Ar tehgine Cristo sordamar sunnad (Esús sordamar (3) warbaha wehmar abargine kudimala) enuimala Nefitas, Acobitas, Osefitar tegine Soramitas.
Tegine tulemar Pab igar obaddemalad nuimala Lamanitas, Lemuelitas, Ismaelitas ye, ar wemarde kwen iedsurmala, unnila Cristo Kaiya purba wismaladgine na uludmala, tegi emimmimar odurdaidemala, mel-legi ittomalagala, igi epabgan gi igargan taniki yobi.
Ar ehmar paba isgudmaladba, isgudmarmoga, igi kebe kusmalad yobi. Odurdaisamala Pab tummad mimmimar isdár takegala, teyob bali Lamanitas mar mimmimar isdár takegar odurdáisamala Nefitas mimmimar.
Tegi pirgamar tula taled ila pake kaga turpake kaga tale nasa, ar we yobi neggwebur mar eigargan kude, ar tule isgana mergude. Pab neggwebur bali.
Ar amba ittoed nega sobdemala, ibmar yeher tailedba sobdemala (mani, olo) teyobi weh pirgamar nasa.
Tegi weyob kude neggwebur tulemar iskusmalad na arba ke igargan isgana mesidmala Gadiantón igala.
Ar na kuagegine tummar na imaidemala, Nefi neggwebur ye nuga, mani nikudmaladba nue isgudmala, ekwenadgan Lamanitas isdár taidemala.
Tegi Pab sordamar (12) nue pubig ittodmala, napneg isgus naidbali.
Tegine pirga tula taled ila nergua nadedgine, Lamanitas, Nefitas nue na isgudmala.
Ar Gadiantón sordamar adsursamalad mergude, we yargine; Unnila Esús sordamarbi (12) tulenuegan Kwe, Tegi neggwebur olo, mani na osabodmala, ibmar nikad neiy paid se na uidemala.
Tegi pirga tuladaled ila nergua kaga tulatale (ar we neggwebur amba isgude) Amos purgisa, ar ekwenad Ammarón we igar narmakar maid na sesa.
Ar pirga tula taled ila nergua kaga turbo nasadgine Ammorón Pab purba nued gin ubononiki igar sabed maid osabosa, eye pela igargan sabed maidi tadgan akar taniki di tegi Cristo arbid sorbalid sega.
Tehgine Pab sogedba osabosa ar kannar yoedse nodabbigala, Acob wagangala, nega owisolesadbali, ar tule tummad ib soisadbali tegi weyob Ammarón Kaiya purba narmasa pelosa.

Emide ani, Mormón, wis sikuas na soimoga ibmar ittosad, ar taisadi tegi ani nuisaoe Mormón Kaiya purba narmakaled.
Ar ebinsagua pirgamar Ammarón igargan sabed odukusadgine, tule tummad sogedbali, an tainoniki (an pirgambe nika ebinsae, an neggwebur ibmar wisid na nue turda kali) ar anga soisa; an peh takele sapingua puleba, ar basur ibmar pela turdake.
Tehgine nue ebinsaoe ibmar peh taisad we neggweburgine ar pirga turgwen kaga pake nikusale Antuna yar se peh naoe, yar mul-lu-gua nuga Shim ye; Ahagine igar sabed narmakaled an osabosa, we neggweburgadi, tule tummad soged ba na imaisa.
Ar wegihidba na peh sedoe Nefi Kaiya purba narmakar maid; tegi pia peh nadsogele paigan obegoe; ar Nefi Kaiya purba narmailesad gi mesmogoe neggwebur gi pela ibmar taisadi.
Tegine ani Mormón ani Nefi gi taniki (ar an pab nuga Mormón ye) nue na ebinsasa Ammarón anga soisadi.
Tehgine pirgambe kagá kwenság an nikadgine, an paba tada nagwesiki an sesa, eye, Sarahemla yar sega.
Pela we yargine nega pukidar soblesa, edulamar de pukidar kwe, igi ukubba nika yob mergwe.
We pirgangine urwed tummad nagusa Nefitas mas pogua, ar esordamar Nefitas, Acobitas, Osebitas tegi Soramitas; we ulu de Lamanitas ebogua, Lamanitas sordamar de Lemuelitas, ar Ismaelitas.
Lamanitas, Lemuelitas, tegi Ismaelitas, nuggusa Lamanitas ye; tegi sordamar soibogua nuga Nefitas, tegi Lamanitas ye.
Weyobi neg urwed nagude Sarahemla, yargine, Sidón tihwar nabali.
Tehgine Nefitas sordamar onmaisa mili pahagua. Ar we pirgagine na uludmala, Lamanitas kalagusa Nefitas mar sega, ar sorda pukidar kirgusa.
Ar Lamanitas de igargan na oguasmala, tegi we yargine nega pógid nagusa, pirga pakegi, tegi kwen na ablis areodsurmala.
Tegi we yargine neidi nue isgusa, ar tule tummad de esordamar onosa we yargine, tegi ibmar tummagan imailedisulid bar oyoledsuli, uelemalad bar nudailed suli, neggwebur isgusadbali.
Ar tule tummad ibmar nuegan bar uisasuli, tegi Purba nued kwen bar tulemar se warmaisasuli eisgusmalad bali, tegi Pab tummad pengudmalad bali.
Tegi pirgambe kaga tar nikwedgi, ar pad na nued taed na wisi, tule tummad an se adagábi, ar na nue taisa Esús nued taed na taisa.
Na Pab igarba sunmak sogalina we neggweburgine, na Kaiya adil-lede, ised anga nasiysa, wegine Pab igar maid gi nodmala, tegi esapingan onosa we yargine, we yala isgus nagusad ulale, we neggwebur isgusa.
Tegi ani wehmar abargi na kudihi kude, teginiguale ised anga nasiysa, eigargine mer sunmakegala, ehmar kuage isgus maladbali, isgusmaladba neggwebur ugabsalede, wemar uale.
Wegihidba Gadiantón sordamar addursamalad, Lamanitas abargine kudimala, we yargi pukidar nika tegi tulemar ibmar nuegan niymalad napa yaba na osabódmala, ar nue osabodmala, tule tummad de napa ugábsade, tegi sógu. Kege bar na nikunadmala.
Tehgine igargan isganede nue nika, nergan isgana; ar kanguhed isganadi nai gúdsunna, we yargine Abinadi pela ibmar soisad, tegi Samuel Lamanitas ibmar soisamogad imaidemala.

Tehgine pirga tulataled ila nergua kaga tula kuhile kaga paha (373) Nefitas eneggweburgine na nodmala, nega tule sulidbali, esordagan mala, Lamanitas ebo urwegala.
Nefitas sordamar parmel-led-mala, neggwebur tule sulidbali; ar amba púdar ittomaladgine kanar Lamanitas sordamar wehmar se nonimala; ar tummad uludmala, Lamanitas, Gwebur tule nega sulid na susmala, Nefitas pukidar purgismala, tegi pukidar seledmala yar paidsega.
Ar Nefitas mar abala wagidmala, Gwebur Teancum, ar edulamar ba abulude, yar wadile naidgi ambigudabmala, temar sigi neggwebur tule sulid nabar sahele.
Tegi Nefitas sordamar, Lamanitas ebo uludmala, pela obeloledbali; ar weyob kude, Lamanitas kwen kalagúdsulana.
Wegine Pab Tummad igar mesisadba na uudoe wehmar sega tulemar isgusad bali; ar we tulemar isgusadba odurdailedoe, wehmar tulemar pinsaed kadih ablis eoegala.
Ar Lamanitas na nue ambi kude Teancum neggwebur se urwenaegala.
Tehgine pirga tulataled ila kuhile kaga nergua, Lamanitas, Teancum neggwebur se nadmala urwegala, ar sue garbali.
Ar tegine Nefitas sordamar, Lamanitas odos surmala, Nefitas weyob taisagua, ehmar nakisad, Lamanitas margine na tummarba imaidemala, tegi na gi nue pinsaedba yala tule sulidba nadmala kannar suegala.
Tegine pela we ibmar weyob kusa, tule pukidar purgisa sordamar soibo pela, teyobi kusa Nefitas, ar Lamanitas sordamala.
We pirgamar nadedgine Lamanitas kannar uludmala Nefitas bogua; ar Nefitas eisgusad na kwen nugusurmala, isgudih na kudmala.
Ar tule kuabin ba keg soilege, tule keg narmake, ise tummad ulutesad, tummad purgismala we neggweburmala, tegi pela kuage isgusmala, unnila tulemar oburgedginbi na pinsadmala.
Ar weyob isguhed kwen tailedsuli Lehi mimmimar abargine, Israel neggweburgi kwen weyob tailes surbali we isguhedi, tule tummad we soge igi we ibmar kunaid yobi, we neggwebur abargine.
Tegine Lamanitas neggwebur tule sulid na susmala, ar sordamar bur melu nikadbali Nefitas marbali.
Ar nadmarbali Teancum neggwebur sega ebo urwegala, tegi edulamar pela onosmala, ar tule pukidar selesa, omegan, tegi mimmimar, ePab ga oburgiledmala.
Wemar pirgamar nadgine Nefitas tummad ulude, Lamanitas, eomegan, emimmimar oburgismaladbali, urwedgi na nadmala, wehmar sega, tehgine Lamanitas gi obidsamala, eigargine onoledmala.
Tegi Lamanitas mar, Nefitas ebo bar uludsuli, ar pirga kwengi uludbali.
Ar we pirgargine. Kuable esordamar, Nefitas marse urwe nadmala; ar keg ebislege, sordamar pukidar nikadbali.
Wegihidba Nefitas bar tailed surmala, ar wehmar abargi yokud tailede.
Ar Lamanitas, neggwebur tule sulidba na toisamala, tegi tummad uludmala Nefitas mar pogua.
Tehgine Lamanitas gi wagidmala, ar Boas neggebur se nadmala; wegihdba Lamanitas ebo uludmala kandigidbali, na kannar uludmala.
Ar kannar nue uludmala, Nefitas kwen nakidsuli, ar tummad purgismala, eomegan, mimmigan ePabse oburgiledmala.
Tegi Nefitas kannar wagidmala, pela edulamar sesa igi neggweburmar, ar eneimala, pela sesmala.
Ar ani, Mormón Lamanitas, pela edulemar sesa an taidegua, tegine Shim yar se na nade, Ammarón ibmar narmaisad odugusad pela na onosa, ar Pab tummad sogedba imaisa.

Ar emide napi na soge an neggwebur pergusad, Nefitas Gwebur tegi na nadmarsunna Lamanitas iduale anmar neg tanigidbali.
Tegine ani, Mormón na karda narmaisa, Lamanitas erey sega, ar ga an soisa, an neggweburse nae ye Cumora yarsega, Cumora yar mulukua sahar sid walika, ar wegine ar wemalagala.
Ar Lamanitas erey, anmar ibmar se egidsad nued ittosa.
Tehgine na nadmala Cumora neggweburse, ar tordo nega sobdemala Cumora yar tikarba; ar we yala sihi tihi pukidar nika tihwala, tegi wegi abiddosmala Lamanitas gi nakwegala.
Ar pirga tulataled iba nergwa kaga tula pahabaka Kaga pake nadedgine anmar pado pela an neggwebur edula na wesmala, Cumora yargine.
Tehgine ar pela tulemar na wesgua Cumora yargine, wegi ani, Mormón, na seredgusa; na nue wisi we nabi urwoedi an neggweburgala, ar Pab tummad an ga soisa igar sabed maid mel-legi Lamanitas sue ga saoe ye, anmar pabgan anmarga uisad (ar ibiga Lamanitas de idsodoe), Nefi Kaiya purba maid ebo na nue taisa, ar Cumora yargi na sabosa, pela yargan Pab tummad anga uisa nuedgine, unnila idsesar we igar maid an machi Moroni ga na uisa.
Tehgine an Gwebur eomegan, ar mimmimar emide Lamanitas sorda taidegua esigi taniki, ar nue tobgudmala purgo na ittosmargua, tulemar isgana eobelomae na abdaidemala.
Ar wegi nonimala ebo urwemalaga; ar tule pela tomgudmala, esordamar pukidar nikadbali.
Tehgi an neggwebur ebo uludmala, esmala, kusi, akkan, pela ibmar urwed nikad senoniki.
Ar pela an soradmar se kirgusa, ar ani naibigusa ehmar abargine, ar Lamanitas an naba nasmala, tegi kwen an oburgidsurmala.
Tegine anmar gi pela nasmargua ar pela neggwebur pergusa, unnila anmar turgwen kaga pake turgusa. (Wede an machi Moroni Turgusmoga), panegi Lamanitas eneise nadmargua, anmar turgusmalad. Cumora yar pirgi na nue taidemala, an sorda mili ambe kirgusa, ar an edummadina.
Ar taidemarbali sorda mili ambe an machi Moroni eidusad pela purgismarmoga.
Wegihidba Gidgiddona sorda mili ambe purgismala, tegi Eh de wehmar abargi purgar mamoga.
Tegine wehmar purgismala, Lamah, Gilgal, Limah, Oneam, Cameniah, ar Moroniah, Antionum, Shiblom, Shem, tegi Osh na sordamar mili ambe niymalana wawarkgwena pela purgismala.
Ar ambegi purgismarbali, eye pela an sordamar purgisa—unila turgwen kaga pakegua (24) amba kudihmala, ar idsesahale wagidmala tada nakwesiki ar idsesahleu Lamanitas ba nadmala—ar sana, eablis napneggi milesa, tulemar oburgis malad, midmala, napagi wehmar pergudoe, ar kannar enapase warmakegala.
Ar ani ulubse naibi ittosa an neggwebur sordamar purgis malad ba, tegi na soidi:
¡Ibi yobi Gwebur yeher taileged, ibiga tule tummad igargi pangudmala! ¡Ibi yobi Gwebur yeher taileged, ibigar sunna Esús obadsamala, ehde pehmar abiddosana!
Wegihidba, ar weyob kudsurmalana kwen purgis surmalana. Emide pela kirgusmala ar na poe pehmar purgismalad ulale.
¡Ibiyobi masmala, ar punamala yeher tailemalad, pehmar pabgan, nangan, pehmar mashergan omegan, Gwebur yeher taileged ibigar sunna pehmar pergusmala!
Ar wegi, pela yokusa, an naibi ittoed kwen bar kannar na ittogosuli.
Tegine ibagan nonikoe pehmar sana sunna purged bar purgo surmlaa, ar weh sana emide basur perguhed ibagan nonikoe kege perguhed; tegi Cristo a sabin na kuisgudmaloe igargan napi bar amiega, pehmar tegi Paba igar nuegan ukoe, pehmar pabgan bogua, pehmar idu purgismaladi.
¡Ibiyob pehmar nugusmalana, pergumaloed iduale! Ar emide na pergudmar sunna, Paba, eye Paba Kadeguad nibneggined, pehmar kuoed wisi, ar Eh ibmar imake, pehmar ibmar imaisadbali, igar nued maidbali, ar wiledakedi.

Ar wegihidba wis ibmar soibie we Gwebur ambigusmalad, sunna ibmar, eye, pehmarga na sunmake, pehmar Israel neggin malad moga, ar we Kaiya purba pehmarga na soge.
Wisgumala, pehmar nugumaloe, ar tegi sulile pentailego surmlaa.
Wisgumala, pehmar mer bar urwemala, ar mel-legi bar ablis eomala, tegi mer bar urwed samaloe, unnila Pab tummad sogedba pehmar imaimaloe.
Wisgumaloe, wisguhed nue abelege, taimala pehmar pabgan wisgumala, ar pehmar nugumala isgusmalad nuguhe, ar igi Esucristo penguosurmala Pab Machi, Udios oburgisa, ar Pab Kanguhedba kannar turgusa, weyob purgedgi nakuisa; ar Eh de purgedgi obidasa nunmaged abargine.
Ar purgismalad pela odulosa, aulale pela tulemar turguoe, eigar maidba imaidoe.
Tehegin bali tulemar napneggined pela pentailesa, ar iba napi igar amiledoedgi ibmar widsulidyob Eh asabin Kuisguoe sunna Pab neise naoe werguhed kege perguhed abingaoe namaidihi kadeguoe, nibneggi pular naimailegedi, Paba, eMachi tegi epurba nued, wehmar de Pab tummad wargwénnaguadi.
Tehgine nugumala, paudisar samala Esús nuggine, ar Esucristo igarba taimala, únnila we igar maid ginbisuli; pehmar se we igar nonikosuli, ar udios marse namarmogoe, ar Pab sorda surmaladse nonimogoe we igar maidi.
Ar wegine we narmailege pehmar mer pengumalaga, wehmar pensurmalale, ar we pehmar pensurmar surbali, we pensulile na wisgumaloe, pehmar pabgan, teyobi, Pab tummad ibmar tummad tailedisulid wemarga imaisadi.
Ar wisgumarbaloe pehmar Acob wagan moga, tegi soggu pehmar neggwebur kebe ebo igar mesisadi; tegi Cristo pensulile, paudisar imaimala tihigine, ah sorba sohogi oilebaloe Purba nued gine Cristo oyosad imaimar mogoe, Eh anmarga igar uisadba, tegine ibagan igar nabi amilede anmar snaonomaloe. Tegin ye.

Wegi ani Moroni, an pab igar kusan na obelosunna, Mormón Wegi, ibmar idsesar na narmake, a an paba anga soisade.
Ar, tehgine Cumora yargi tummad ulusmargua, wegi Lamanitas, Nefitas amidmala tada nakwesigi wagidmala, ar pela obelogedse imaidemala.
Tegi an Paba purgismoga, Lamanitas sega, ar an bi wargwen pelesa, an neggwebur pergusad igar narmakegala, naipi ittogedgine. Wegihidba pela pergusa, ar an pab igar sogedba imake. Tegi na widsuli an oburgemalodibe, ar suli.
Ar, na narmakoe, napa yapa odugguoe, ar kwen akarsuli na yoho kuoedi.
Wegine an paba we igar maid anga uisa, ar wegi wehmar narmaisa. Tegi an narmaimogoe, mani karda nikale narmakoe; ar an suli mani karda gidi, na wargwen kudihi. An pab purgisa argwenagua, teyobi kudmoga an kwenadgan dina surbali, ar naed surbali, tegi Pab tummad pule melu nabi karmaidih kudodibe, an widsuli.
Wegine pirga tula taled ila pahabake nasa, Cristo arbid akale.
Tegi wegi Lamanitas an neggwebur palegidsa Nefitas Gwebur Gweburbali, wargwen gid kwen pidsuli; ar tummad kirgusmala; eye ibiyobi tummad purgisa an neggwebur edula, Nefitas mala.
Ar wegihidba Pab tummad sogedba weyob kusa. Tegi Lamanitas na tukin uludmala; ar pela napnegi urwed nagusa kwen pergudsuli na oburgidmala, ar ablis eodmala, tulemar kwen widsurmala san perguodibe we urwedi.
Ar bar na sunmakosuli weh margine, tegi Lamanitas marbi kudih, ar addursamalad pukidar gusa we yargine.
Tegine tulemar suli Pab tummad napiraguad wisid, unnila Esús esapín-gana, wehmarde we yargi kudihi kudmala, we neggweburgine, ar tule kwen widsuli napnegi kudimardibe, ar surdibe ye.
Ar wegi an paba tegi ani taisamala, ar wehmar anmarse arbimala.
