Tegi toa tule we igar maid abingaele, ar kwen akar sogosuli nue narmakarsulidgine, we ibmar ba bur tummagan wisguoe. Wegi, ani Moroni; tegi sunna bardibe, ani pehmar owisomaloe pela we ibmargine.
Wegi, we neggweburgi bar sunmakosuli. Ani Mormón Machi, ar an paba Nefi wagwa.
Ar an odugusa we igar kusad, tule tummad soged ba na imaisa; ar we kaiya purba maid eganguhed suli, tule tummad igar maid ulale. Napiraguad gi soisa, tule kwen na ibmar ga imakosuli wargwena; ar igar kusad maid. Yeher kangu mai, ar tule tummad ibmar nuegan ukoe, tule wargwen we igar maid onogoed.
Ar kwen tule kanguhed nikuosuli we igar maid onoegala, unnila Pab tummad sogedba imailegoe; ar Paba abege we ibmar onoleged enug odummoed, ar sergan pentakegala, tikasur mimiles puguadi, Gwebur Pab ebo igar mesisad.
Tegi tule dar nuedi, toa tule we ibmar onogoed, ar neiy sishid naid, neiy mehe saoe, Pab tummad kaiya purba sogedba imaidoe, eye, napa gi maid onolegoe, ar nega sishid mehekudoe, ar neggwebur. Wisgudoe, ar Pab tummad purba kanguhedba imailedoe.
Ar wis akkar naile, we tue imaisa. Ar wegi na widsurmala pule innigi mai dide ye, ar Pab tummad bi pela ibmar wisi, tegi soggu, nue taimaloe, tule we osulogele mer soho igar puled se seledmalagar.
Tegi tule wargwen soidibe: oyoge, ar naibi kuodibe nue takoe, tule tummad ised nasigsad mer imaimaloe.
Ar wegi tule abbor igar mesidele, abbor igar ga meslemogoe; ar ibmar imakedba pennuliegoe; ar tule naibisasale, tule tummad onaibi samogoe.
Wegi kaiya purba namarkar maid soge: tule kwen naibi saosurmala, kwen igar mesosurbali; ar igar mesed an gadi, tule tummad soge, tegi puged saed angan bali, ar pennuggoe.
Ar toa tule urwedgi sumakele Pab ibmar imaisadgine, tule tummad eneggwebur ebo igar mesisad gi sunmakele, wede Israel Gwebur, ar soidibe: Pab ibmar imaisad osulomala, ar tule tummad igar mesisad iedoe, Israel Gwebur ebo mesisad, we tule poni tummad gi tanikoe, ar sohogi parmel-ledoe.
Tegi tule tummad igar mesisad kadguadi, tegi sadeyuoe, pela ibmar soisad imakedsega.
Turdaimala Isaias neg owisosad. Wegi an narmaisasuli. Eye, wegi pehmarga na soge wehmar tule nuegan an idumala, we napneggi kudihi kusmala, soimaloe, eye napa yaba pinnasur kotemaloe tule tumsega; ar Paba mai epinsaoe ebo igar mesisadi, wehmar ebogua.
Tegine Eh de wisi tule se kormalad, ar wisi ekwenadgan pentaimaladi. Ar Eh wisi tule ulubgi pensurmalad, enuggi sunna yar oníre, ar enuggi napa ogiglimaisa mala, ar e kaiya purba kanguhedgi esgaria ealismala; eye, ar soho sihid kwen akkalodsuli, kwen ibdur ursulid, tegi naibe poni nikad kwen akalodsuli, ar ekaiya purba kanguhed ulale.
Ar wegi, e Pab se kodsamalad, nibneise nakwisa, Pab weh tulemar ga ibmar osanarosa.
Tegine tule kwen sogosuli we nohosuli, ar tule tummad soisa, nap gi nodoe, tule tummad argangine, ar tule kwen kaosuli; tegi ibagan gi soidemalo ibmar tailedisulid; bar imailegosuli; tegi igi tule wargwen purgaled ga sunmake yobi.
Ar ibagan kudoe, tule nuegan ablis tule tummad se pinnasur kottoe, ibmar oduguar imaked ulale, ar igar isgana imaimalad ulale.
Eye ibagan modoe Pab purba kanguhed pangudmaloe; ar ittoed nega isgudoe, e kuage ulubgi tummarba na sadmaloe, eye, ibagan nonikoe tummagan, sailagan odurdaked ittoed neggi na tummarba imaidemaloe, tegi na wehmar isdar taidemaloe esordamala.
Eye ibagan nonikoe, sohogi sunmailedoe, nega pandur gine, ar we ibmar gi sunmailedoe yar paigangine.
Ar ittoled baloe, pila (urwed) tummad nai ar nega pandur pukidar ittoledoe yar paigangine.
Eye, ibagan modoe tummad isgudmaloe pela napneggine; oburgidmaloe, attursaed, idsomalad, abingin nodmaloe, pela isgudmaloe; we ibi tailedele tule pukidar soidemaloe; we peh imake, we de imake, ar pasur tailedoe, we ibagan napidgi tule tummad we ibi imakega tule imaidoe. ¡Ar we tulemar wiledoe, tummad wiledmaloe, tummad isgusmaladbali!
Eye, we ibagine ittoed nega suledoe soidemaloe: an se taimlaa, ar manigi pehmar isgudihid osulolegoe.
¡Ar tule dar isgudmala! ¿Ibiga pehmar ittoed neg sobsamala, mani nikwegala? ¿Ibiga Pab Kaiya purba osulodmala, pehmar san purba wio gegala? wegi Paba ibmar oyosad nue taimala; ar ibagan nonikoe, we ibmar pela oyoledoe eibangine.
Wegi, tule tummad ibmar tummagan an ga oyosa, emisgua sahale ibmar kudoedi; pehmar abargi we ibmar tailedoe.
Wegine pehmarga soge igi pehmar emi kudihi yobi, ar teginiguar yoho ibagan moe. Ar wegi Esucristo peh marga soge, tegi na wisi pehmar ibmar imakedi.
Ar an wisi pehmar santummarba na sadimala; tummad isguamala, unnila tulemar idse nap kudihi nued tamalad, mor kerged yodmala, isdar taidemala, uludmala, isgudmala, pugib na ittodmala. Ar pehmar ittoed neg eye pela isgudmala, pehmar kuage gi na tummar ba imaidemala.
Tegi wegi pehmar mani sabkudmala, ibmar niymalad pehmar mor mani kerged yodmala, pehmar ittoed nega ibmar nikad sabgude, ar unnila tule wilemalad sabgumala, tule ibmar abe dihid, uele malad, ar wile didihid nue taimala.
¡Tule dar wiledmaloe, tule isgusad, tule tarbo pinsamalad, sailagan sorda odurdaimalad, pehmar tulemar idsode! ¿Ibigar sunna Pab ittoed nega idsosmala? ¿Ibiga pehmar pingemala Cristo nuisaed? ¿Ar we napneggi tummar ba na sabimalad ulale, widsur marsi welidarád kege pergwed bur nue abelegedi, tummad wiledoed bali?
¿Ibigar sunna pehmar abemala ibmar purba sulidi, ar teginiguale pehmar pasur taimala, tule ukkumesdihid, ibmar abedihid ueledihid, wiledihidi?
Eye, ¿Ibiga pehmar isguhed ginbi pinsamala, mani nikwegala, ar ibmar uke ome mashered sulidgala, pabgan surmalad podidihid tule tummad asabínni; ar napagi epabgan ablis, emashergan ablis puged soed egismar Pabse ga, pehmar nonobirgine?
Wegi igar sunsoged maid pehmarga soimai; ar ibagan emisgua taniki tule nuegan ablis (abe) ariosad abinsaed nonikoe, tegi na bar abingaosuli egormamaidi.

Tegine emide na soibali tulemar Cristo penmaladgala.
Wegi ¿Pehmar pensurmala we ibagangi nonikoed—wegihidba Tule Tummad taileahle eye we ibagi Tule Tummad tailealile napnega karda yob nol-loh-kudoe, ibmar pela tihire kudoe, tiopisulidbali; eye we iba Tummad gi Pab Machi a sabin kwisgudabmaloe—ar soidemaloe Pab Tummad masuli?
¿Cristo pengudih pehmar kudmaloe, ar Pab Machi sunna taimaloe? ¿Wis pinsamala, sunna pehmar kudihi walig kudmaloe isguhed niymalale? ¿Sunna na wergudihi kumaloe tule nued waligga ar pehmar eigar gan ba nue nanadsurmalad we napneggine?
Wegi, pehmar ga an soge tule dar wiledmaloe, Pab waliga kudih, na taidemalale pehmar isguhed wisid, pehmar san purba wiledih kadguoe nia neggine.
Ar wegihidba Pab asabinni peh mar isgudidihid na nue taidemalale, ar Pab Kanguhed taidebalile Esucristo tule dar nuedi, soho kege akínned pehmar kadoe.
Kannar taimala, Pab pengudidihid; Pab Tummadse kormala pinnasulidgine Esús nuggine, sunna isguhed osulogoe, pehmar san suilidig kudoe ar ibagan arpidgine Cristo ablisgi na nudaidemaloe.
Tegi pehmar sunmaisa, Pab ibmar oyoged pengude, ar soimala we pergusa, Pab ibmar owisoged pergusa, igar nuegan uileged, uelemalad nudaked, kuabín paigan sunmaked, we ibmar pergusa.
Wegi, pehmarga an soge, we tule, we ibmar penguhe, Cristo Kaiya purba narmakar maid kwen widsuli, eye ar absodsurbali; tegi ar absosale; akku amba ittoe.
Ar ¿Absosurmarsi Pab tummad, sogedi, emidi ar kadeguadi, Eh de keg guage tegi kadeguad keg guagedi?
Tegine, ar pehmar pinsamar dibe, Paba sunna guaged, ar Eh sunna guagele, pehmar weyob pinsamalale we Paba ibmar tailedisulid keg imaked ar Pab suli.
Ar wegi an pehmarga oyogoe Pab tummad ibmar tummagan imakedi, eye, Abraham Paba, Isaac Paba, Acob Paba; ar Pab tummad emala nabneg ar napneg obinisad, pela ibmar nikad obinnisadi.
Wegi, Eh Adan obinnisa, ar Adan Pab gi nosa, ar Adan Pab gi nosad ulale Esucristo noniki, eye Pab tummad madu; tegi Esucristo noniki tule pendakegala.
Tegine tulemar pendaked ulale Esucristo noniki, wehmar kannar seledoe Pab Tummad asabinni; eye pela tulemar pendailegoe, ar Cristo purgisad tulemar kannar odurgusa, kabed kadeguad gi kannar ottaged noniki, ar pela tulemar attaidemaloe, Pab Tummad kanguhedbali, kala kaiya gined kotele attaidemaloe; ar sergan, mimmigan Pab Tummad asabin kwisgudmaloe, ar purgedgi san onomaloe, wede sigguas purgedi.
Ar igar inniguad soiledoe, wehmargala, tehgine wegine tule isgana kadeguoe, ar nued, tule nued. Kadeguoe, tule yeher ittoed, yeher ittodih kadeguoe, tule isgudihid, isgudih kadeguoe.
Ar emi, pela pehmar pinsamala Pab Tummad ibmar tummagan tailedisulid keg imake, pehmar se an egisbie: ¿Pela we ibmar nasa pehmarga soilesadi? ¿Perguhed noniki? Wegi pehmarga soge ar suli; Pab Tummad ibmar tummagan imaked kwen pergudsuli.
Wegine, ¿Pab Tummad ibmar imaisad, tummarba sursi pehmar ibiyagine? Eye, ar ¿Toa tule mag ittogoe Pab Tummad ibmar tummagan imaisaidi?
¿Toa tule sogoe Pab ibmar tummad oyodsuli, ekaiya purba ba niba nega nasig sa ar napa neg ansig sa; Ar ekaiya purba kanguhed ba tule obinnisa napsahabali, ar ekaiya purba kanguhedba ibmar tailedisulid oyosa?
¿Ar toa tule sogoe Esucristo ibmar tummagan tailedisulid imaisasuli? Tegi esapingan (12) imaisamarmoga ibmar tummagan tailedisulidi.
Tegine ibmar tailedisulid imaisamala. ¿Ar Pab Tummad pergudsi, ibmar tailedisulid bar imaisuli, ar Eh de amba keg guagedi? Wegi pehmarga soge, Eh de kege guage di; eye ar weyobile bar Pab Tummad kwen suokuosuli, ar Paba ibmar tailedisurmalad oyogedi.
Ar ibigar sunna Pab ibmar tailedisulid bar imaisuli tule mimmimar abargine, na pengudtamaladba, tegi Pab igargi arbad tamalad ulale, Pab nagi nued pinsaed surgud tamaladbali.
Wegi, peh marga an soge, toa tule Cristo pensulir, kwen pensulidgi Pab se ibmar egisele Cristo nuggine ibmar ga uilegoe; tegi we igar soilesa pela tule mar gala, napneg tirbir naidgala.
Ar wegi, weyob Esucristo soisa, Pab Machi esapingan (12) wegi pelaloed gala, eye esapingan pela pemarmogoe, pela tulemar ittomala: Pab igarba sunmas mala pela napneggine, ar tulemar mimmimar odurdainamala Pab igargine.
Tegi tule pensulid, ar paudisar saoe, pendailegoe; ar tule ittogosulid tummad odurdailedoe (wiledoe).
Ar we ibmar oyolemai kudoe tulemar pensurmalad gala; an nuggi nia onogoe; kuabin paidba sunmakoe; naibe kadoe, ina kaibid kob dibe kuen akkar kuosuli, uelemalad onudakoe.
Tegi toa tule an nug pensulile, kwen akar pinsasulile, ani kaiya purba pela ga sogoe, amba pela napneg tirbir naidgine.
Ar wegi ¿Toa, tule tummad ibmar imaisad abin kaoe? ¿Toa e kaiya purba osulogoe? ¿Toa tule, tummad kanguhed gi obinoe? ¿Toa tule tummad ibmar imaisad isdar taidoe? ¿Toe tule, Cristo mimmimar isdar takoe? Pehmar nue pinsamala tule tummad isdar taimalad, ar pehmar keger taidemaloe, ar purgemaloe.
Tehgine mer isdar taimala, mer keger taimala, we iduar tule tummad kaiya purba ittomala, ar Pabse egismala Esús nuggine ibmar abemalad mer pengumala, igi ibagan ebinneguad yobi imaidemaloe, ar kuage ulubgi tule tummad se taimala arbamala na tuggin pentaimalagala, taked be imakoe.
Nue tamala pehmar ibagan wilub tailedgine; ib isgana midmala; mer ibmar isgana pinsoimala, unnila ibmar kege perguhed egise, mer pehmar pinsaed kalegegala, unnila Pab tummad maid ga napiraguadgi arbamala.
Nue na taimaloe mer isguhedgi paudisar imakoe, nue takoe Cristo ibmar unahaled mer isguhedgi ittogoe, we ibmar ittogoed iduar nued tamaloe, ar Esucristo nuggine, Pab tula maid eMachi; ar weyob imakele, ar tegi sadegua kwen bar mel-le-dosuli.
Wegi, peh marga sunmakoe igi purgarmalad abargi sunmakeyobi, ar na nue wisi pehmar an Kaiyapurba ittogoe.
Mer angi idsagua sunmaimala, teyob bali an Pabgine, pehmar na taked ulale, tegi teyob bali we kaiya purba narmakaled, Eh iduale; unnila. Pab ga nued ye soimala, pehmar ga an isgudihid oyosa, ar sunna turdaimaloe, pur ibmar nuegan wisgumaloe anmarbali.
Ar wegi anmar namasmala we igar kusmalad, anmar ittogedbali Egipcio kaiya bar wis targwena, wehmar uilisa, anmar wis oguasa anmar sunmaked bali.
Tegi anmar mani karda wis tummaganana, ebreo kaiya ba narmailesana; ar anmar wis oguasmarbali, tegi ar anmar ebreo kaiya ba narmar sana wegi kwen akkar kudsulina, anmar igar narmaisadi.
Ar Pab Tummad ibmar wisi anmar narmaisad, ar neggwebur paigan anmar kaiya sunmaked widsurmala; tegi soggu, Eh igar mesisa ekaiya ogualegoedi.
Ar we ibmar narmake, anmar mor nudákegala, anmar kwenadgan ablis gine wehmar Esucristo pengusmaladi.
Tegi wegi, we ibmar anmar abesmalad. Anmar kwenadgan gala, eye kannar Cristo wisgumaladsega, Pab se ekormaladbali, pela tue nuegan we gargi kudihi kusmalad.
Ar Esucristo ibmar ukoe pehmar se koled bali abinsaoe, epensurmalad bali; ar Pab tummad. Paba eigar mesisad bali, Israel mimmigan ebogua, ar pehmar kuage ulubgi pensulidba, Pab pentakoe, Esucristo nuggine; tegin ye.

Ar ani, Moroni, Ared neggwegur igar kusad obelosad sorba, bar na pinsadsuli narmakedgine, yoho na purge; Lamanitas ga yoho na soge, ar an oburgemalo dibe.
Tegi wegi urwed tummad nai emar-emala, tegi na isdar taimalad ulale Nefitas Cristo pensurmaladba oburgidmala.
Ani, Moroni, Cristo ulub yi na pensuli; tegi soggu an ittolegedba kagamaidi kude, an san osabogegala.
Tegi soggu wis na narmaibaloe, na ittosadba akala; ar na bar narmakosulina; wis sigguas narmake, kwenadgan Lamanitas gala yohoedse abelegoedi, tule tummad soged ba imake.

Cristo sunmaisa esapingan ambe kaga poguad sulesmaladgine, ehmarga argan nono pirgi mesisgua.
Ar enuiba na kodsa soisa: Pab se egisoe an nuggine se koloe kuage ulubgine; ar we imaisad sorba, kanguhed nikudoe, purba nued ukegala, toa tule ukodibe, ar an nuggi ukoe, ar weyob an sapinga weyob imake.
Weyob Cristo sunmaisa kebe taile nonigua; ar tule pukidar ittos suli, unni esapingan bi ittosmala; ar tulemar ga argan nonogi mesisa wehmargi Purba nued ulubse ubosa.

Tegi sapingan Pab purba kanguhed idued niymalad se kol-lesa ittoed neggine, sailamar tule unaed ar sailamar tule odurdaked ga igar ukegala.
Pab se kol-lesad sorba Cristo nuggine, wehmar nono pirgi argan mesmala, a soidetamala:
Esucristo nuggine peh ga igar uke saila tule unaed ar saila tule odurdaked tule isgudidihid ga Pab Kaiya purba soge gala, ar isgudihid nudakegala, Esucristo ulale, enuga ulubgi penguosuli, ar eh perguhedsega. Tegin ye.
Ar weyob igargan uidemala sailamar tule unaed ar soilamar tule odurdaked gala, ga uilege Pab se koled bali macher gangala; ar Purba nued kanguhedba uilege, wemarba kudihkud tamala.

Pab purba kanguhed idued nikad sailamar tula unaed Cristo esan, eabe unaed igala ittoed neggine; ar Cristo igargan maidba unamala, inniggiguad ba wismala, imaimala; ar tummad Pab purba kanguhed idued nikad saila tula unaed unamala.
Ar ittoed neggi yokorgi sihimala, ar Pab Tummadse kormala Cristo nuggine soidemaloe:
Pab Tummad, Paba Kadeguadi, Esucristo nuggine, Peh Machi, peh se anmar egismala, we maduga purba nued uke, tulemar ittomaloedgala wehdi; Peh Machi San gi pinsamaloed kudmaloed, ar peh asabin napiraguad ba parsoimalaga, Paba, Paba kadeguadi, Peh Machi nugginbi pinsadi samaloedi, ar peh igarba nanamalagala, eh anmarga uisadi e Purba nued ba Kudihi Kadegua. Tegin ye.

Tihi unaed igala. Wegi noga purwigana sioe, ar soidemaloe.
Pab Tummad, Paba Kadeguad, Esucristo nuggine, Peh Machi, peh se na egis mala, we tihi ga purba nued uke, tule pela kobmaloedgala, peh Machi ablis gi pinsamaloed kobmaloedi, ar peh asabin napiraguad ba parsogegala, Pab Tummad, Paba Kadeguad, peh Machi nuggin bi pinsadi kumalagala, ar peh igar ba nanamalagala, Eh anmarga uisad e purba nued Kudihi ba Kadegua. Tegin ye.

Ar emidi pehmar ga na sunmake psudisar igar imailegedbali. Wegi Pab purba Kanguhed idued niymalad, sailamar tule unaed, ar sailamar tule odurdaked, paudisar imaimala tule nuegan taer kebe, ar yoga sahar kwen imailesuli, we igar maid gar uilege.
Kwen yogasahar uimar surbali paudisar saegala, unnila kuage ulubgi pugib ittoedgi nonikoe, ar purba wile ittoed ba, napiraguadgi sogoe. Isgudihid napiraguadgi mioe.
Ar tule kwen oguasuli paudisar imakegala, unni Cristo nuggin bi na pinsaer kebe, kuage se nue arbaegala, purgedsega.
Tegi paudisar imaisan sorba purba nued wehmar kuage ulubgi ubosangi isgusadmisale, Cristo ittoed neggi esordamar ye nuggumaloe; enug megoe egi nue pinsalegegala, Pab Kaiya purba nued uilesadba, igar innigiguadba nanaega, ar Pabse palibali Kolega. Cristo nued gi pinsaoe, Eh de ulubgi pensulid nikadi.
Ar ittoed neggi palibali ambiguoe, Pab se kolegega, mas ga pagegala, ar muchubmuchub sunmakega, san purba nudakegala.
Tegi palibali osunmaimala, madu, tihi unahaled ittomalaga Esús nuggine.
Ar nue taidemala igar maid, wehmar abargi mer isgumala gala; tegi tule isgusar ar Pab purba kanguhed idued niymalad igar ga amiledoe, ittoed neggi tule warbahguad ga amiledoe igar ga sogoe, isgusad misulile, na parsoisulile, enug osulolegoe, Cristo sordar abargi enug bar megosuli.
Ar isgudihid na elidihile we igar egisele napiraguadbali, eisgusad iege.
Tegi ittoed neg taimalad igar ittolealile Purba Nued ba sadmaloe, Purba Nued Kanguhedba; Purba Nued sogedba imailedoe isgusmalad nudaimalaga, pinsaed nued ukega, Pab se Kolega, ibmar egisega, namakegar dibe ye weyobi imaile ye.

Tegine ani, Moroni, an pab Mormón kaiya purba soisad sigguas wis narmake, ulubgi pensulid igar, kuage ulubgi ibmar abdaked, ar sabgwed igala; weyob neggweburga soisa, ittoed neg soblésad gi we yob na sunmaidi kude.
Amide ani, Mormón pehga na sunmake, an kwenadgan; ar nuedba Pab Tummad tule nued sogedbali, ar Esucristo tule tummad ibmar nuegan ukedi, se Kol-le-sadba, emide pehmarga wis na sunmakoloe.
Tegine, pehmarga wis sunmakoloe ittoged neg sordamar; Cristo esapingan neg poho samalad, kuage ulubgi ibmar abidoed nikusmala, tule tummad obunnoed neise sunna toimaloe, emi ibagangine, Eh walig nibneggi nega pohgid amidabboe.
Ar an pinsae weyob pehmargine, an kwenadgan, pehmar pohgi kudihmaladbali tulemar mimmimar pogua.
Ar Pab Kaiya purba an epinsae, soisadi; ibmar imakedba na wisguoe; ar eibmar imaked nueganale, pela wehmar nueganmoga.
Ar wegi Pab Tummad soisa, ar tule isgana, kege ibmar nued sae; ibmar nuegan ukele, tegi Pab se kole, unnila napiraguadba imaker kebe, tei sulile ibmarga kwen ga kuosuli.
Tegi wegi, igar inniguad maidba kwenga soilegosuli.
Ar wegi, tule wargwen isgudihile, ibmar ukele, nuedgi kwen uisuli; tehgine, we soilege ibmar kwen uiles suliyob tailege; ar Pab Tummad asabin we nued suli.
Weyob soilebali tule wargwen pab se koler, ar Kuagegi ibmar nued imaisurbalile; eye ar we ibmar kwen ga kuosuli, ar Pab Tummad we ibmar weyob abingaosuli.
Tehgine, tule isgana, ibmar nued kwen imakosuli; kuen ibmar nued uisurbali.
Ar wegi, tihiwar kaibid tihi nued kege uke, ar tihiwar nued kege tihi kaibid uke; teyobi tule nia ba igar imaidihile, Cristo sorda keg kule; ar Cristo sorda keg nia ba nakwe.
Tegi soggu, pela ibmar nuegan Pab Tummad gi taniki; ar ibmar isgana nia ba taniki, ar nia de Pab Tummad isdaradi, ar Pab ebo ehde urwedigua, tulemar isguodgi pinsaed kadihi, ar isgwed ginbi pinsae.
Ar wegi, ibmar Pab Kadile, nuegan bi imailege; tegi soggu pela wehmar ibmar nuegan imakega salege, Pab Tummad sabed ba arbae, purba nued gi ubononikid bali.
Nue taimala, an kwenadgan, mer pinsamala, ibmar isgana. Pab gi tani ye, ar ibmar nuegan Pab gad nia gi tani ye.
Ar wegi, an kwenadgan, pehmar ga pinsaed uilesa, nue wisgumala ga ibmar nued, ibmar isgana; ar maga tailege we ibi, maga ittolege, igi neg ibgined yo bi, neg omeslege yob tailege.
Igi wede, pela tulemarga Cristo Purba nued uilege, sunna maga takegala ibmar nued, ibmar isgana; tegi soggu pehmar na odurdake nue pinsamalaga; ar pela ibmar nuegan imaibi abelege, wede kangwed nued ba taniki Cristo ga uisad ba, tegi weyob nue wisguoe we de Pab Tummad kadi.
Ar tulemar pinsaed kamalar Cristo pengwedgi, Pab penele ar ga arbasurbalile, tegine nue wisguoe innigiguadgine wede nia gadi; ar weyob nia tule pinsaed kae, Eh de tule marga soisuli ibmar nuegan imar deye, pela teyob tulemar abege, ar eangermar, tule mar ba nanaidi ibmar isgana imakega sae.
Emidi, an kwenadgan, igar nued wisgusmala, igi nue pinsamalo dibeye, ar Cristo igala, nue na takoe mer isgued gi pinsamaloe; ar weyob pinsader we pinsaed ba pehmarga igar amiledoe.
Tegi soggu, pehmar se na egise kwenadgan, nue pinsahagua Cristo igarba nanamala, igar nued maga takega, ar maga taibaloe igar isgana; pehmar igar nueganba tamalale, mer gi idsagua pinsamala, Cristo mimmimarga kudmaloe.
Tehegine an kwenadgan. ¿Igi igar nuegan walika kumaloe?
Emide we ulubgi pensulid nikumala, ar pehmarga soisa, an gi sunmakoye; ar pehmar ga na nue sogoe igi ibmar nueganba kudihi kumaloe.
Ar wegine wismala Pab Tummad pela ibmala, ar kadeguadi, kege pergwedi, Eh angermar parmiali ehga arbamalaga, tule mimmimar gala, Cristo taniko edgi owisogega ar ibmar nuegan Cristo gi nonikoe.
Tegine Pab Tummad pado soisamoga nergan tummagan gala eKaiya purba, Cristo tanikoye.
Ar wegi, ibmar nuegan kalagwen suli oyosa tule mimmimar gala; tegi pela ib nuegan Cristo gi taniki; tegisulina pela tulemar isgusana, weh marseca ibmar nuegan se nonikosulina.
Weyob angermar igar mar imaidemala, pab Tummad kaiya purba soilesad, tulemar kep Cristo pengudsuli; ar ulubgi pensulid nikadba ibmar nuegan pela waliggude; ar teyob kusa Cristo nonikidsega.
Tegi nonikid sorba, tulemar pentailes marmoga enuy pensurmalad bali; ar kuage ulubgi pensulid nikadba Pab Tummad mimmimarga kudmala. Ar napiragua Cristo taila mai, igi we kaiya purba soilesa anmar pabgan gala, soide gusa: Pab sega ibmar egisele an nuggine kuage ulubgi nued taele pensulile we ibi abingaoe, wegine, peh marga ukoe.
Ar tegisoggu, an kwenadgan. ¿Ibmar tummagan bar tailedisuli; ar Cristo nibneise naded ulale, Pab argan nued siggi sigisa, Pab ga ibmar soge ga, tule mimmimar wile taked bali?
Ar Eh de igar maid imaisa, tegi na egise Eh pensurmalangala, ar Eh gi kuage ulub gi pensurmalad nikad ga ibmar nuegan se nonikoe, tegi soggu. Eh de tulemar mimmimar ibmar pentake, nibneggi mai degi kadegua.
Tegi ar wede imaisa. ¿Ibmar imaked bar imaisuli, an kwenadgana? Wegi peh marga soge, weyob suli; angermar kuen pogulesuli igar maid imakedi, tulemar mimmimar abargine.
Ar wegi, Eh ba nanamala eigar maid imakegala, eh soged bali, tegi tulemar kuage ulubgi pensurmalad niymaladga ibmar nue gan imake, Purba Nued soged bali.
Tegi eigar maid imake tulemar ga sogegala nugumala; ar Pab igar mesisad imake tule mimmimar gala; tegi tule mimmimarga igar uke, Cristo Kaiya purba odurdake, tule tummad sogedbali, napiraguadgi Eh parsogoe.
Ar weyob Pab Tummad ibmar imake ga igar nued mesegala, tule kuage ulubgi pensulid Cristo gi nikwegala, sunna Purba Nued. Sunsoged kuage gi ubogoe, ekangwed nikadbah; tegi Pab igar mesisad na imake tulemar mimmimar bogua.
Tegi Cristo soisa: Ar kuage ulubgi pensulid angi nikale, sunna purba kangwed nikwe ibmar imakegala, an nued takele.
Ar Eh soisa: isgwed mimala, pela pehmar napneg tirbir naidgine; an se taimala, ar paudisar samaloe an nuggine, ar (an gi pensulid nikumala) mer an pengumala, sunna pentailegoe.
Tegi soggu, an kwenadgan, ar we ibmar pehmar ga na soisad napiraguadi—ar Pab Tummad napiraguadgi pehmar ga we ibi oyogoe ibagan napidgine, kangwed, taileged, we napiraguadi—ar bur napiraguad dibe. ¿Ibagan ibmar tailedisurmalad oyeleged pergúde?
Ar ¿angermar bar tailedisuli tulemar mimmimar abargine? ¿Eh obelosa Purba Nued Kanguhed? Ar ¿Ibmar amba imakoe napneg naidgine ar tule wargwen kudihi napneg pentaked?
Wegi, pehmarga soge weyob suli; ar pensulid gi ibmar imailege, tegi pensulidgi angermar tailege, ar tulemarga igar imake, tegi soggu, we ibmar pergusar, tule mimmimar dar wiledoe ehmar penedbali, ar bar abelegosuli.
Ar Cristo soisa tule kwen (na) pentailegosuli, unni tule enug pensulid pentailegoe; tegi soggu we ibi pergusar, pensulid igar pergudmogoe; tulemar tummad wiledoe, pentaileged suliyob kudoe.
Tegi wegi, an kwenadgana pehmar ibmar nuegan abidomala, ar an epinsagu pehmar Cristo pensurmala, kuage gi wile ittoedonikad bali; ar Eh gi nisulile, pehmar nued ye nig soilegosuli, eittoed neggi esordoga bar kuosurmala.
Ar an kwenadgan, pehmar ga na soibali ib abidtoed igargine. ¿Igi kuage ulubgi pensulid nikuoe, ulubgi ib abidoed niysulile?
Tegi ¿Igi pehmar abidomala? Wegi pehmar ga an soge, ulubgi ib abidoed nikale, Cristo purgisad ulale, eturgusadgi, pehmar turgumarmogoe san purba kadeguad nikuoe, ar we de gi pensulid nikad ulale, eigar mesisad bali.
Tegi soggu ar tule wargwen ulubgi pensulid nikale, nue abele bali ulubgi pensulid igar nikwedi; ar ulubgi pensulid sulile, keb ib abidobali.
Ar wegi, pehmarga na soibali, tule pensulid nysulile, keg ib abidoed nibali, ar nued tegi kuage ulubgi wile ittobaloe.
Tegi sulile, e ulubgi pensulid, ib abidoed kwen igar ga kuosuli, ar Pab Tummad kwen abingaosuli, unnila tule kuage gi nued taed, ar tule wargwen kuage nued taele, Purba nued kangwed ba napiraguad gi parsogoe. Esús de Cristo, ar abelege sabed nikwedi; niggusulile ibmar ga kwen kuosuli, ar sabgwed nikwed nue abelege.
Sabed kuage gi wile takedi, isdar taked suli, kwen akarkuosuli, ekádbi ibmar amisuli, keg urwe idsagua pinsasuli, ib isgana imaisuli, unnila naragua ibmar soge, pela wilege pela pensuli, pela abdake, pela abingae.
Tegi soggu, an kwenadgan, ar sabgwed surmalale, ibmarga kwen kuosurmala, ar sabgwed keg pergwe, Sabgwedse, pehmar taimala, we ibmar paiganba búr tummadi, ar pela ibmar pergudoe.
Ar sabgwed wile takedi, Cristo kadsunnadi; ar kadeguadi; tegi toa tule we nikale, ibagan pergudele pentailegoe.
Tegi soggu, an kwenadgana, Pab seib egismala kuage kandikidgine, we sobgwed omelogegala, Eh uisa pela esordamar napiramalad gala, eMachi, Esucristo; ar Pab Tummad mimmimar ye nuggoe; ar Eh sunnaguad tailege kumar mogoe eh tailealile, ar etaileged sunnagua tailed mar mogoe. Tegin ye.

An paba Mormón, Karda an ga, Moroni narmaisad; ar Pab ga arbaega anga uilesad sorbali; ar weyob anga narmaisa, soisa:
An Machi Moroni sabed, per welidar an ittoe Esucristo tule tummad peh ebinsasadi, ar peh se kodsa ega arbaega kwe, ar earbaed nuedi.
An peh gi pinsadigua Pab se koled irbali, Pab tummad Paba se pehga na Kordigua, Esús eMachi Nued nuggine, étule nued pensulidgine enuggi na pensadigua, ar pergwed sega.
Ar emidi, an Machi pugib ittoedgi na peh ga sunmakoe, nue na kuage ulub nunmag ittoe, ar pehmar na nue take pinsaed akkar-akkar niymala.
Tegi napiraguadgi nakwisgusa, pehmar abargine eittoleged gi pinsamala paudisar mimmimar purwigan saedgine.
An Machi, Nuedgi na peh arbae wehmar arbargi weyob pinsaed niymalad osulogega; ar we ular karda pehga na narmake.
Ar we ibi wisgusadgi yoisar, tule tummadse na egide; ar tule tummad kaiya purba an se noniki, Purba Nued Kangwed ba, soisa:
Cristo Kaiya purba ittoe, peh pentaked, peh tummad, ar peh Paba. Wegi, we napneggi tule nuegan se kolega nonisuli, unni tule isgusmalad nudakega noniki; tule uelemalad ner nudake, ar tegi soggu mimmimar purwigana tule nuegana, ar isgwed widsuli; tegi Adán pramel-lesad angi osulolesa, tegi soggu ekangwed weh margi pergusa; ar igar isliguad megisad, angi pergusa.
Weyob purba Nued an odurdaisa, Paba Kaiya purba; tehgi an Machi sabed an wisi Pab ibya nugi we todomala, mimmimar purwigan paudisar saedi.
Wegi peh ga na soge we igar odurtakoe; isgwed miedi, ar paudisar igar samaloe, tulemar sunna isgumalad; eye pab gan odurtake, isgwed mimala, ar paudisar samala, ar wile ittoged gi imakoe emimmimar purwigan yobi, tegi pela pentailemaloe wehmar emimmimar ebogua.
Ar emimmimar isgwedna widsuli, ar widsurbali paudisar imaked. Wede baudisar saed isgwed eliedi, igar maid weyob imakegala, sunna isgusad elilegega.
Tegine mimmimar purwigan Cristo gi taniy kebe saila na panagusgua; tegi sulir Paba, Pab tule innigiguad suli, Pab tulemar Kuable sabsuli; ar ¡Pule melu mimmimar purwigana purgisa yoho baudisar sae!
Tegi ar mimmimar baudisar imaisasulir pentailegosuli, wede wehmar nia neise namalodole.
Tehgine, peh ga soge tule soidibe mimmimar purwigan baudisar saed nue abelege, we tule isgwed tummad nika kudihi; ar kuage ulubgi pened nika ib abidoed suli, sabed suli; tegi soggu weyob pinsadihile purgidele, neise naoe.
Ar isgwed tummadi weyob woilegele Paba mimmimar baudisar imaisadbi pentake, ar paigan we imaisa sulid purgemaloe we igar abingad sulid ulale.
¡Tule dar wiledoe, tule tummad igar idsomala! Ar Tummad odurgailedoe isgwed midsulile. Wegi na tobed suli sunmaisa, ar Pab Tummad igar maid anga uisa; tegi tule ibmar imaked an tobed suli, sabed sunsoged nikar tobed osuloe.
Ar an kuage ulubg sabed kadeguad nika; tegi soggu pela mimmimar anga emarbi, tegi mimmimar purwigan nuedgi an sabe; ar pela pentailemaloe.
Tegi an wisi Paba, Pab Tummad tule isgana suli, keg kuagedi, unni widsur kuagedi kadegua, tegi sadegua.
Mimmimar aku ittoed isgwed miedi tegi soggu isgwed tummadi, Pab tummad wile taked nikad osuloele, ar Pab gi pela ibmar san purba nikadi, e sabgwed nikadbali.
Ar tule sogele mimmigan baudisar imaked nue abelege, Cristo wile tule taked nikad pengudih, ar isgwed osuloed penele.
¡Tule dar wiledoe, ar purged poni tummad gi tnaiki, nia neggi tummad wilegoe kege pergwedi! Pehga na soge tobsulidgine, ar Pab Tummad an parmiali. Kaiya purba ittoge, ar ebananae, ar peh na sogo dibe Cristo igar amioed asabinni.
Ar wegi pela mimmimar Cristo ba kudihi, ar weyob bali tulemar igar sulid kudimaladi. Ar igar pentaileged kandikid wede pela tulemar ga mamoga, tulemar igar widsurmalad gad moga; tegi soggu, tule kwen akar kuosuli, ar kwen akar soilegosuli, isgusad kwen mio suli; ar we baudisar saed kwen igar ga kuosuli.
Pab ibya nugi, mimmigangi todoed Tummadi, ar Cristo sabed nikad osuloe, ePurba Nued Kangwedi, ar ibmar pasur purgedgi pinsamala.
Wegi, an Machi wede weyobsuli, ar isgwed miedi, we tulemar odurdailemaloe, isgusadbali, igar tummad maid gi nosmaladbali.
Ar giar idued isgwed miedi wede baudisar samaloe; tegi baudisar imaisale ulubgi pensulid nikuoe igargan tummagan maid saegala; Pab igar maid imaisale isgwed miede.
Tehgine isgwed mied, ahsorba taniki yaisdiki taed kuage ulubgine, ar weyob taele Purba Nued sunsoged se nonikoe, wile tule taked ibmar pela abidoedi, sabgwed napiraguadi, sabed wisid ba Pab se Koled ba sabolegedi, ibagan pergwedsega, Pab ebo tulemar nuegan Kudihi Kwedsega.
Wegi, Machi, pehga na kannar narmake, Lamanitas gi na yoho nodoe, wegi we neggwebur tummad isgude, ar Nefita neggwebur wehmar opelodmaloe na isgwed misurmalale.
Weh marga Pabse kole, Machi, sunna na isgwed mimalagala. Ar wegi an tobeh ittoe Purba nued earbaed gi pangude weh margala; ar we yargine. Pab igar kangwed mesisad pelode; Tegi Purba nued pengudmala.
Ar we ibmar wisgusmalad na osulodmala, Machi, emisgua purgemaloe, nergan nega owisosad imailedoe, weyobi Cristo sunnad anmarga sunmaisa.
Machi, Tegimaloe, kannar narmaked se balo, ar na Kannar takedse bardibe. Tegin ye.

9.intro: Karda soiboguad Mormón narmaisad, eMachi ga.
An Machi sabedi, pehga kannar narmaibali peh na wisgwegala, amba an tula dihi, ar peheche na pehga narmake.
Ar wegi Lamanitas ebo tummad ulusa, anmar kwen nakidsuli; ar Arcanteo purgisa, teyob moga Luram ar Emron ye, ar anmar sordamar nuegan pugidar purgisa.
Tegi na tobe, Machi, Lamanitas we neggwebur pelogoe; ar na nugusurmala, nia wehmar kuage idsosa, ehmar ehmar urwemala.
Wegi, ga sunmaidigua; ar Pab Kaiya purba ba na kandikidgi sunmaidele; tobgud tamala, ar ulud anse tamala; ar kandikidgi an sunmaidele kuage isgud tamala; tegi soggu an na tobe tule Tummad Purba Nued eba bar Kudisuli.
Ar wede urwed tummad nai, purged kwen tobsurmala; tegi sabgwed pergudmala, ar wede purged sudmala, ar oburgemala.
Teginiguar, an Machi sabed, nuedgi arbamala; anmargi purged tanikoe anmar indakele. Ar anmar abaed sokwen niymala imaked we napneggine, tegi anmar isdar maladgi obinegala, igar nued maidba, ar anmar san purba Pab neise obunnoedsega.
Ar emidi sigguas narmake we neggwebur Tumma wilesad, Amorón an owisosadgine, wegi Lamanitas tule pukidar sesa, Sherrisa Kasdibir susmala; wehmar de kumala machergan, omegan, ar purwigana.
Tegi we omegan emachergan, purwigan epabgan oburgismala, ar machergan sana eomegan ga uilede ogún negala, ar mimmimar ga ePab gan san ga uidemala. Kunnegala; ar unni la tihi bi ga uidemala.
Ar tehgine we tummad isgudmala Lamanitas mala, anmar neggwebur Moriántum ba pule isgwedmala; tegi san nued sedihid esisgangi todoledmala, we ibmardi búr nue abelegedina (abgan surlidikid).
Eye weyob imaisamalad sorba oburgiledmala, tummad pibyodmala oburgedsega; ar we imaisad sorba esan kúddemala igi ibmar sapur balid yobi na imaidemala, ekuage isgusmaladbali, ar weyob na oyodmala ekangwedi.
Ar Machi, ¿Igi we neggwebur nue kudoe weyobi, nugwed suli—
(Ar weyob sulina pirgamar nasgwa neggwebur yeher tailegena, ar nued tamalana.)
Ar Machi ¿Igi sunna kudoe we neggwebur unni na isgwed ginbi pinsadimala—
¿Igi sunna Kudoe ibu abdaimala, Pab eargan oyodoe annar Tummad odurtakegala?
Wegi an kuage gi pinnasuli na kole: ¡Paba tage wemarga igar amie, ar eisgusad oduggwe, ar peh wagar taisa eisgusmaladi!
Ar teginbali, an Machi, omegan, we surmalad, epunamala, Sherrisa gi penmala, ar Lamanitas emaskwen sedsuli, wegi Senefi sordamar susmala, obeledmala eiddolegedba nadmala, nega suli nadmala, kwen mas amis surbali, ar pukidar muhuguamar neg oedmala nanaed bali, ar purgidmala.
Tegi sordamar anba kudimalad ar idshegua, Lamanitas sordamar undar anmar obaddemala, Sherrisa neggweburgine; tegi Aarón sordamar anmar naba nadmargua na taide Tummad wilesmala.
¡Ar an neggwebur ibmar widsulidi! Igar kwen na surmala, sabgwed surbali. Wegi unni an tule, ar kangwed na pergude, ar ani tule wargwena, tegi sordamar bar anba igar sasurmala.
Tegi wehmar nue isgudmala; ar isgwed emarbi, ar tule pela oburgemala, sapingan, ar sergan pela oburgemai; ar gi tododmala, unnila tule nuegan wes pendailede; ar anmar omegan, mimmimar wiledmala, we yargine; eye, ar kuabin sogwen kid keg na soge, ar kege narmailebali.
Ar wegi, Machi, wegi na bar sunmakosuli we Tummad isgusmaladgine. Pado peh wisi we isgumalad, peh wisi ar idued sulidi, ar kwen ulubgi pinsaed niy surbali, eisgwed bur Tumma Lamanitas.
Wegi Machi, Pab Tummad ga na keg Parsoge, Eh tobedbali, an odurtakoe.
Ar wegi Machi, Pab ga na soge, ar Cristo gi nued pinsae an pentakoe, ar egise Pab sega an osabogegala, we neggwebur odurdakega isgused miegala, ar se perguodibe, na wisi, na purgemaloe, isgwed misurmalale, ar Eh se taimala.
Ar purgemaloe, Areditas yob kudmaloe, eisgusmalad ulale, abinsaed, ar ehmar oburgedginbi pinsamala; eye we yobi purgemaloe.
Wismala anmar kwenadgan pukidar Lamanitas ba nadmala, ar pukidar wagidsamala, weh margine ar napi, Narmake, peh osabolego dibeye, andi na purgoe, bar na pentakosuli; ar na nue pinsae emisguopih diabalodibe, tegi igar narmakaled na sedihi na peh ukoe.
Machi, Cristo ba nue taoe; we peh ga narmaisadgi mer wileittogoe, ar peh purgodibe; unnila Cristo peh ogánnohoe, egi peh purgo dibe ar peh sanga ibmar oyosa anmar pabgangadi, tegi esabedi, ar ibmar obiddoedi, enega abiddoe, ar san purba kadeguad gi peh nue pinsae.
Tegi Pab Tummad ga nued ye soge, Paba neggi maidi, ar anmar Tummad Esucristo, Pab argan nued sig sihidi, ekanguhedba Eh pela ibmar kadoe, peh ba Kudihi kwe, tegi Kadegwadi. Tegin ye.

Ar emi ani, Moroni, na narmake, nue gi pinsaega; ar an kwenadgan Lamanitas ga narmake; tegi na wisgumaloe, pirga tulataled ila pahabaka kaga turgwen nasadgine (420) Cristo nonikoed oyolesadgine.
Tegi siggwas sunmaisad sorba unaed igar, soilegoe, we igar maidgi na wilub nasiggoe.
Wegi, peh marga nue soge, we ibi absoge, ar Pab Tummad nued gi pinsaele al absoe, gi pinsamaloe tule tummad, tulemar mimmimar wile takedi, kebe saila Adań obínnisgua ar wehmar ibagan gi ibmar abingamaloed sega, ar kuage gi pehmar nue pinsamaloe.
Ar we ibmar abingasmalale, pehmarga nue an soge. Pab kadeguad, Pab se egismala, Cristo nuggine, ar ibmar búle napiraguad surdibeye; ar Kuage gi napiraguad ba egisoe, napiraguadbali wisgwega, Cristo mer penguoe, Eh de pehmarga sogoe napiraguadgine we ibmala, Purba Nued Kangwed bali.
Tegi Purba Nued Kangwedba wisguoe, we ibmar napiraguadi.
Ibmar nuegan, ar nued napiraguadi; tegi soggu ibmar nuegan Cristo keg pengwe, Eh tula kudihid uisguoed iduale.
Ar Purba Nued Kangwedba wisgumaloe Eh tula dihi, tegi ar Eh soisa Pab Tummad kangwed mer pengwe; Ar Eh ibmar imake, tule mimmimar ulubgi pensulidbali, emi emala, pane, tegi sadegua.
Tegi pehmarga soibali Kwenadgana mer Pab ibmar uked pengumala, ar pukidar ibmar uke, tegi Pabginbi taniki we ibmala kalogwensuli ebulege (imailege), ar Pab di emala, pela we ibmar uke, ar tulemar ga igar uisa, Pab Purba pehmar pentakegala.
Ar wegi, tule Kwensaga uilege ibmar wisgwega odurdakedi, Pab Purba Nued bali.
Tegi paidba Pab ibmar obinnisad wisgwed Purba emala.
Ar paid, kuage ulubgi pensulid odummoed, ar paidba, ueleged nudakedi purba emala.
Tegi paidba, ibmar tummagan tailedisulid imakedi.
Ar paid ba, ibmargi nega owisoedi;
Tegi paid, angermar takedi, ar Purba ehmar pentakedi;
Tegi paid, kuabin paigan parsoged; ar kuabin kalagwensuli parsogedi.
Ar pela we ibmar nuegan nikwed, Cristo purbagi taniki; tegi Eh soged ba uke tule wawargwengala.
Tegi pehmarga na soge, kwenadgan ibmar nuegan uilesad gi nue pinsamaloe, we ibmar nuegan uileged Cristo gi taniki.
Ar peh marga na soge, an kwenadgana, Eh pinsamaloe Eh de emala saegi, emidi, ar sadeguadi, pela we ibmar nuegan gi peh marga sunmaisa, wede purbaledbi, kwen osulolegosuli, napneg naidgine, unnila tule mimmimar pengudele we ibi osuloledoe.
Tegi soggu, ulubgi pensulid nikale, ib abidoed nikubaloe ulubgine, ar ib abidoed nikale, sabed nikubaloe.
Ar sabed sulile kwen pendailegosuli Pab neggine; ar ulubgi pensulid niysurbalile kwen pendailegosule Pab Tummad neggine; ar ib abiddoed ulubgi surbalile pentailegosuli nibneggine.
Tegi ib abidoed sulile pugib pinsaed tummadi, ar wile ittoed tummad isgwedgi taniki.
Ar Cristo napiraguad gi anmar pabgan ga soisa: Kuage ulubgi pensulid nikale, sunna ibmar abeleged pela imakoe.
Ar emi an sunmake pela napneg tirbir naid gala: tegi ibagwengi eKangwed Kudihid pergudele, tegi ibmar nuegan uked, pehmar Pab pen gudmalar aular weyob kudoe.
Tegi ¡Tule mimmimar tuledar wiledmaloe, ib weyob kudele; ar pehmar abargi tule ibmar nued imaked suli, kwen wargwengihidi! Ar pehmar abargi tule ibmar nued imaked amba kudihile, wede Pab Tummad Kangwed nikadba ar ga uilesa.
Ar ¡Tule dar wiledmaloe we ibmar bar imailesulile, ar purgemaloe eisdarmaladba purgidmaloe, Pab neggi pentailego surmala! Tegi Cristo Kaiya purba nue epinsamaloe ar an kagansasuli.
Tegi pehmarga na soge nue ebinsamaloe, ar ibagandi taniggirba, wisgumaloe an kagan sasuli, ar Pab asakin ban taimaloe pehmarga sogoe: ¿Pehmarga na soisuli we tule kaiya purba, igi purgarmalad abargi sunmakeyobi; igi napa yaba mai sunmakeyobi soge?
We ibmar pehmarga soge nega owisoilegedi, ar wegi Paba Kadeguadi Kaiya be soiedoe; ar eKaiya purba ittolegoe tegi kadegua.
Ar Paba pehmarga oyodoe napiraguad ba narmailesa.
Tegi Kannar pehmarga an soge Cristo se taimala, ibmar nuegan walig kudih samala; ib isgana mer ebumala, igargan isganna mer imake.
¡Atake, ar kuisgwe, Erusalen; eye tegi pehmar yeher taileged yoe, ar Sión sisgua; peh na ogánnoe; kuadilenaid bar ogankwe tegi sadegua, mel-legi aku peh taimalagala, ar Pab Kadeguad ebo igar sabed mesisad kudoe, Israel nega!
Eye, Cristo sega tage, ar Eh gi nugumala ar ibmar isgana mimala; isgusad mimala, ar Pab Tummad sabgumala, pehmar Kangwedgine, san purba, ar Kandikidgine, tigi eh nued pehmar taidoe, ar nuedgine nugudmaloe Cristo bali; Pab tummad nued takoe, pehmar Cristo gi nuguoe, Pab Kangwed kwen penguosuli.
Teginbali, Pab nued takedgi, pehmar nugudmaloe Cristo gine, eKangwed pensulile, Cristo gi nudailedmaloe. Pab sogedbali, eablis ariosadbali, Pab igar mesisadba isgwed nudailedoe, ar nudailemalagala, tegi san suilidigi kudoe.
Ar emide pela pehmar obedsunna. Emisgua an obunnonaoe Pab neg weligualed sega, wese an san purba, ar an purba Kannar addononiggoe, ar igargan amiegala seledoe purwabali, igar nabi mesegala, Paba igar maidba miegala, tule Tummad igar bar amied Kadeguadi, tulemar tuladga, ar purgarmalad gala. Tegin ye.
